src: at the same time, however, we will need to spend more to support the restructuring of soes like eskom and saa.
tgt: nokho, ngaso lesi sikhathi, sizodinga ukusebenzisa imali kakhulu ukuseka ukuhlelwa kabusha kwamasoes afana noeskom kanye nosaa.

src: as a result, we expect a net reduction of r156 billion in noninterest spending over the medium term.
tgt: ngenxa yalokhu, silindele ukuncipha kwengenisomali ebanjelwe ngezigidigidi ezi ngamar156 ekusetshenzi sweni kwemali okungena nzalo esikhathini esiphakathi.

src: this will help to narrow the deficit and reduce our borrowing needs.
tgt: lokhu kuzosiza ukunci phisa ukuntuleka kwemali nokunciphisa izidingo zoku thi siboleke.

src: a large part of the savings will come from reducing the rate at which our wage bill grows.
tgt: ingxenye enkulu yokonga izoqhamuka ekunciphiseni isilinganiso sethu somthetho sivivinywa samaholo esi khula ngakhona.

src: this will require focused discussions among all social partners, but particularly with public sector unions.
tgt: lokhu kuzodinga izingxoxo ezigxi lile phakathi kwabamele u mphakathi, kodwa ikakhu lukazi nezinyonyana zabase benzi bakahulumeni.

src: these engagements need to be conducted in a spirit of seeking solutions.
tgt: lezi zingxoxo zidinga ukuthi zibanjwe ngomoya wokufuna izisombululo.

src: i am heartened by the willingness of all parties to engage in serious negotiations aimed at finding a solution.
tgt: ngiyathinteka kakhulu ngokuzimisela kwazo zonke izinhlangano ukuzibandakanya ezingxo xweni ezibalulekile ezihlose ukuthola isisombululo.

src: our approach is not to dramatically cut the size of the public service, but to examine the rate at which wages grow.
tgt: indlela esenza ngayo akusikho ukunciphisa ngo kumangazayo ubungako bensizakalo yomphakathi, kodwa ukuhlolisisa isili nganiso sokukhula kwama holo.

src: public service wages have on average increased at a much higher rate than inflation over many years, and we need to fix this if we are to get public finances under control.
tgt: amaholo abasebenzi bakahulumeni ngokuvamile asekhuphuke ngesilinga niso esiphezulu kunaleso samandla emali eminyakeni eminingi, futhi kumele si kulungise lokhu uma sifuna ukubeka izimali zikahulu meni ngaphansi kolawulo.

src: this also applies to the management of people’s personal finances, where if any expenditure item that rises at a rate more than inflation – be it electricity tariffs, mobile tariffs or food – will always put any individual person’s budget and finances under strain and out of kilter.
tgt: lokhu futhi kufaka phakathi ukuphathwa kwezimali za bantu, lapho noma ngabe yini ethengwayo ekhuphuka uku dlula amandla emali kunga ba intela kagesi, intela yedata noma ukudla kuzohlala njalo kubeka isabelomali nezimali zomuntu ngamunye ebunzi meni nokungabi nazinzo.

src: the wage bill remains the largest component of spending by economic classification.
tgt: umthethosivivinywa wa maholo usalokhu uyingxe nye enkulu yokusetshenzi swa kwemali ekuhluka nisweni komnotho.

src: growth in the wage bill has begun crowding out spending on capital projects for future growth and items that are critical for service delivery.
tgt: ukukhula komthethosivivinywa wama holo sekuqalise ukuminyani sa ukusetshenziswa kwemali kumaprojekthi amakhulu nasezintweni ezibalulekile zokulethwa kwezidingo.

src: the public service wage bill is by no means the only area where we are cutting costs.
tgt: amaholo abasebenzi baka hulumeni akuyona kuphela indawo lapho sinciphisa khona izindleko.

src: i have decided that there will be no increase in the salaries of senior public office bearers this year.
tgt: senginqume ukuthi akuzukuba khona ukunyuswa kwamaholo abasebenzi bakahu lumeni abangabaphathi base mahhovisi kulo nyaka.

src: this follows a reduction in benefits stemming from changes to the ministerial handbook.
tgt: lokhu kulandela ukuncishiswa kwezi nzuzo okwenzeke emva kokwenza izinguquko encwadini equkethe uhlu lwezinzuzo zongqongqoshe.

src: we will publish a new law this year introducing a remuneration framework for public entities and state owned companies to prevent excessive pay for board members and executives.
tgt: sizoshicilela umthetho omu sha kulo nyaka sethule uhlaka lwamaholo lwezinhlanga no zikahulumeni kanye ne zinkampani eziphethwe uhulu meni ukugwema ukukhokhe lwa ngokweqile kwamalungu ebhodi kanye neziphathima ndla.

src: our trade union compatriots are right in saying that we should in a demonstrable way prevent leakages of public funds by addressing corruption, ending irregular, fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tgt: abalingani bethu bezinyo nyana zabasebenzi baqinisile uma bethi kumele sivimbele ukuvuza kwezimali zikahulu meni ngendlela ebonakalayo ngokubhekana nenkohlakalo, ukuqeda ukusetshenziswa kwemali okungekho emthe thweni, okungenamiphumela nokuchitha imali.

src: we will do this and much more.
tgt: sizokwe nza lokhu nokunye okuningi.

src: as much as containing the public wage bill is critical to stabilising public finances, improving public sector performance is imperative if we want to build a more capable, efficient state.
tgt: yize ukuba nomthethosivi vinywa wamaholo abasebe nzi bakahulumeni kubalule kile ukuletha uzinzo ezima lini zikahulumeni, ukwenza ngcono ukusebenza komkha kha kahulumeni kubaluleke kakhulu uma sifuna ukwakha umbuso onekhono, nose benza kahle.

src: we need more of the right people in the right positions.
tgt: sidinga abantu abaningi abalungile ezikhu ndleni ezilungile.

src: as we contain public spending, we are pursuing growth.
tgt: sisabhekene nokusetshe nziswa kwemali kahulumeni, siphokophelele ukukhula.

src: it is for this reason that, despite the fiscal gap, there are no major tax increases.
tgt: kungenxa yalesi sizathu ukuthi, ngaphandle kwe gebe kwezezimali, akukho ukunyuka okukhulu kwe ntela.

src: instead, there is some relief for individual tax payers and several measures to broaden the corporate tax base.
tgt: kunalokho, kukhona ukukhululeka kubakhokhi bentela ngamunye kanye nezindlela eziningi zokusa balalisa intela yamabhizinisi.

src: we are also pushing ahead with farreaching reforms in areas like electricity provision, ports and rail and telecommunications to reduce the cost of doing business.
tgt: siqhubela phambili ngezi nguquko ezifinyelela kude ezindaweni ezifana nokuhli nzekwa ngogesi, amachweba kanye nojantshi nakwezoku xhumana ukunciphisa izindle ko zokwenza ibhizinisi.

src: through the infrastructure fund we aim to mobilise financing from a range of sources to invest in a massive build programme.
tgt: ngokusebenza ngesikhwama sezingqalasizinda sihlose ukuhlanganisa usizomali ezi ndaweni ezehlukene ukuze kutshalwe izimali ezinhle lweni ezinkulu zokwakha.

src: through our industrial strategy and investment drive we are unlocking vital areas of growth.
tgt: ngokusebenza ngamasu ethu ezimboni nomkhankaso wo tshalomali sivula izindawo ezibalulekile zokukhula.

src: we are fixing our public finances to make inclusive growth and job creation possible.
tgt: silungisa izimali zikahulu meni wethu ukwenza uku khula okubandakanya wonke umuntu kanye nokudala ama thuba emisebenzi kwenzeke.

src: such times call for us to be realistic, not dogmatic.
tgt: izikhathi ezinje zifuna ukuba thina sibe neqiniso, singabi nobuqili.

src: they call for cooperation, not conflict.
tgt: zidinga ukusebe nzisana, hhayi ukungqubuza na.

src: compromises and tradeoffs will have to be made.
tgt: ukuyekethisa nokuhweba kumele kwenzeke.

src: patient support crucial for fighting tb dale hes the usaid tuberculosis south africa project is proving to be a perfect example of how government, communities and ngos can partner together to combat tuberculosis (tb) by providing proper support to patients.
tgt: ukwesekwa kweziguli kusemqoka ekulweni nesifo sofuba dale hes ius aid tuberculo sis south africa pro ject ikhombisa ukuba yisibonelo esihle kakhu lu sokuthi uhulumeni, imiphakathi kanye na mango bangabambisa na kanjani ekulweni nesifo sofuba (tb) ngokuhlinzeka ngokwesekwa okufanele ezigulini.

src: south africa has taken a position of leadership in the global fight against tb, and the united states agency for international development (usaid) has stepped in to provide assistance.
tgt: iningizimu afrika isithathe isikhundla sobuholi empini yomhlaba wonke yokulwa netb, futhi iunited states agency for international development (usaid) nayo seyingenelele ngokunikeza usizo.

src: the fiveyear project, which started in 2016, is being carried out in partnership with the national department of health in eight of south africa’s provinces.
tgt: iphrojekthi yeminyaka emihlanu, eqale ukusebenza ngonyaka wezi2016, yenziwa ngokubambisana nomnyango wezempilo kazwelonke ezifundazweni eziyisishiyagalombili zaseningizimu afrika.

src: one of the most important parts of the project is to support communitybased ngos.
tgt: enye yezingxenye ezibaluleke kakhulu zephrojekthi ukwesekwa kwamango agxile emiphakathini.

src: the project provides funding to 21 ngos who have supported more than 3 500 patients, the majority based in rural areas.
tgt: le phrojekthi ihlinzeka ngo sizo lwezimali kumango angama21 aseseke iziguli ezingaphezu kwezi3500, iningi lazo elisezindaweni zasemakhaya.

src: free state progressbased in mangaung, mosamoria is one of the ngos which has received funding from the project.
tgt: imosamaria ese freyistataetholakala emangaung, imosamaria ingenye yamango asethole ukwesekwa ngezimali yile phrojekthi.

src: the organisation has a team of community health workers, a project manager and a data capturer who all work towards ensuring that patients stay on treatment so that they can be cured in a six month period.
tgt: le nhlangano inethimba labasebenzi bezempilo bomphakathi, umphathi wephrojekthi kanye nogcina imininingwane bonke laba basebenzela ukuqinisekisa ukuthi iziguli ziyaqhubeka nohlelo lokwelashwa ukuze zelapheke esikhathini sezinyanga eziyisithupha.

src: "we employ 74 care givers for this project.
tgt: "siqashe abanakekeli abangama74 abasiza kule phrojekthi.

src: initially we worked with 200 patients, then 400 patients, and in our current contract we have 500 patients who we work with on a daily basis.
tgt: ekuqaleni sa sisebenza neziguli ezinga ma200, sabuye saba neziguli ezingama400, kanti njenga manje enkontilekeni yethu sineziguli ezingama500, esisebenza nazo nsuku zonke .

src: the patients are referred to us when they have been diagnosed as having tb from nine different clinics in the mangaung metro," says mosamaria coordinator trudie harrison.
tgt: iziguli zidluliselwa kithi uma kutholakale ukuthi zinesifo sofuba zivela emitholampilo eyahlukene eyisishiyagalolunye yasemangaung metro," kusho umxhumanisi wemosamaria, utrudie harrison.

src: mosamaria conducts monthly doortodoor screening campaigns to find new tb patients and get them on treatment immediately.
tgt: imosamaria yenza imi khankaso yokuhlola iziguli ngokuhamb a ingena ama khaya ngamakhaya njalo ngenyanga ukuze ithole iziguli ezintsha ezinetb futhi izifake ohlelweni lokwelashwa ngokushesha.

src: harrison says that mosamoria’s work has reduced the stigma around tb, built close relationships with the community and also led to much better rates of successful treatment.
tgt: uharrison uthi umsebenzi wemosamaria usukwehlisile ukukhishwa inyumbazane okuhlobene netb, wakhe ubudlelwane obusondelene nomphakathi futhi waholela emazingeni angcono kakhulu ekwelashweni okuphumelelayo.

src: "for example, in 2018, 514 of our patients were cured," harrison says.
tgt: "isibonelo, ngowezi2018, iziguli zethu ezingama514 zelashwa zasinda," kusho uharrison.

src: harrison shares the story of one of mosamaria’s patients.
tgt: uharrison uxoxa udaba ngesinye seziguli zasemosa maria.

src: he was given daily support by a mosamaria caregiver, who ensured that he swallowed his tablets every day and also assisted with maize meal and new clothes.
tgt: wanikezwa ukwesekwa nsuku zonke ngumna kekeli wasemosamaria, owayeqinisekisa ukuthi uyawaphuza amaphilisi akhe nsuku zonke futhi esiza nangokudla okuyimpuphu nezingubo ezintsha.

src: vulekamali empowers south africans more matshediso with a click of a button, people are able to easily get to grips with the country’s budgets, thanks to an online system called vulekamali.
tgt: ivulekamali ihlomisa abantu baseningizimu afrika more matshediso ngokuchofoza nje inkinobho, abantu sebekwazi ukutho la ulwazi ngesabelomali sezwe, ngenxa yohlelo lweinthanethi olubizwa ngevulekamali.

src: the portal was established two years ago by national treasury in collaboration with a number of civil society organisations.
tgt: ingosi yasungulwa eminyakeni emibili eye dlule ngu mgcinimafa kazwelonke ngokubambisana nezinhlangano eziningi zomphakathi.

src: this innovative project won an award during the 17th public sector innovation awards 2019, under the innovations harnessing 4ir solutions category.
tgt: le projekthi entsha ihlo nyuliswe ngomklomelo emcimbini we17th sector innova tion awards 2019, ngaphansi kwesigaba esibizwa ngeinnovations harnessing 4ir solutions.

src: national treasury director andile best, who leads the vulekamali portal initiative, says its main aim is to increase public interest, participation and knowledge of government’s financial programmes.
tgt: umqondisi womgcinimafa kuzwelonke, uandile best, ohola ingosi yevulekamali, uthe inhloso yabo enkulu ukukhulisa intshisekelo emphakathini, uk ubamba iqh aza kanye nokuba nolwazi ngezinhlelo zezimali zikahulume ni.

src: "this is national treasury’s commitment to be more transparent about public finances.
tgt: "lokhu ukuzibophezela komgcinimafa kazwelonke ukubeka obala angafihli lutho malungana nezimali zomphakathi.

src: budgetary information is already published on treasury’s website, but the portal contains easily accessible data in a userfriendly format, to enable more effective information sharing, analyses and research," he explaines.
tgt: imininingwane yesabelomali isivele ishicilelwe kusizindalwazi somgcinimafa, kepha ingosi iqukethe imininingwane ekufinyeleleka kuyona kalula ngendlela okulula ukuyiqonda, ukuze kwenziwe lula ukwabelana ngolwazi, ukuhlaziya nokucwaninga," echaza.

src: according to best, vulekamali supports involvement by civil society and the public in budget processes and enables citizens to have informed discussions about government policies.
tgt: ngokusho kukabest, ivulekamali yeseka ukubanda kanyeka komphakathi ezinhlelweni zesabelomali futhi wenza izakhamuzi zikwazi ukuba nezingxoxo ezinolwazi neziphusile mayelana nezinqubomgomo zikahulumeni.

src: "if we ask the public to participate in budgetary processes and they come from a position of not knowing, they cannot make quality inputs.
tgt: "uma sicela umphakathi uku thi ubambe iqhaza ezinqubweni zesabelomali futhi umphakathi ufika ungenalo ulwazi olunembile, ngeke ukwazi ukuletha imibono ephusile.

src: secondly, we want the public to know how government spends money from the public purse," best says.
tgt: okwesibili, sifuna umphakathi wazi uku thi uhulumeni uyisebenzisa kanjani imali esesikhwameni somphakathi," kusho ubest.

src: for example, civil society organisations often want to know how government renders services, how services are connected to the budget and whether national, provincial or local government is responsible for specific services.
tgt: isibonelo, izinhlangano zomphakathi zivame ukufuna ukwazi ukuthi uhulumeni uhli nzeka kanjani izinsiza, ukuthi izinsiza zixhumene kanjani nesabelomali nokuthi ingabe uhulumeni kazwelonke, we zifundazwe noma wezindawo uyena obhekene nezinsizakalo ezithile.

src: together we can fight the impact of covid 19 vukuzenzele unnamed the world is in the throes of a public health emergency on a scale not witnessed in over a century.
tgt: ngokubambisana singalwisana necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba ubhekene nomunyu wesimo esiphuthumayo sempilo yomphakathi esingakaze silinganiswe eminyakeni elikhulu.

src: the spread of the coronavirus, which causes the disease known as covid19, has been alarmingly swift and widescale, and is now defined as a global pandemic.
tgt: ukusabalala kwegciwane leco rona, okubangela isifo esaziwa ngecovid19, sekudlondlobale ngokushesha okuyisimanga, njengamanje selithathwa njengobhubhane emhlabenijikelele.

src: it knows no geographical or territorial boundaries, has infected both young and old, and is on the rise in developed and developing countries alike.
tgt: lolu bhubhane alukhethe ndawo namngcele, seluhlasele abancane nabadala, lukhuphuka ngamandla emazweni athuthukile nasathuthuka.

src: as screening and testing is scaled up, the number of infections in south africa is expected to rise.
tgt: njengoba sekukhuphuke izinga lokuhlolwa kwaleli gciwane, inani labathelelekile eningizimu afrika kulindeleke ukuthi likhule.

src: i recently declared a national state of disaster, a measure proportionate to the severity of the threat to our people, to our society and to our economy.
tgt: ngisanda kumemezela isimo senhlekelele sikazwelonke, okunguhlelo lokubhekana nenhlekelele oluhambisana nobukhulu betwetwe kubantu bakithi, umphakathi wakithi kanye nasemnothweni wethu.

src: this will enable us to have an integrated and coordinated disaster management mechanism and to set up emergency, rapid and effective response systems.
tgt: lokhu kuzokwenza ukuba sibe nendlela ehlanganisiwe yokulawula inhlekelele nokubeka endaweni izinhlelo eziphuthumayo, ezisheshayo nezisebenzayo zokubhekana nesimo.

src: this virus will be extremely disruptive, and our priority is to safeguard the health and wellbeing of all south africans.
tgt: leli gciwane lizophazamisa kakhulu, okuseqhulwini kuthina ukuvikela impilo nenhlalakahle yabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: we also have to address the inevitable economic fallout.
tgt: kumele futhi sibhekane nokuwa komnotho esingeke sakubalekela.

src: we must expect a decline in exports, a drop in tourist arrivals and a severe impact on production, business viability and job creation and retention.
tgt: kumele silindele ukwehla ezimpahleni ezithunyelwa kwamanye amazwe, ukwehla kwenani lezivakashi kanye nomthelela omkhulu ekukhiqizeni, ekusebenzeni kwamabhizinisi kanye nokusungulwa nokugcinwa kwemisebenzi.

src: cabinet is in the process of finalising a comprehensive package of interventions to mitigate the expected impact of covid19 on our economy.
tgt: ikhabhinethi isizophothula izindlela eziphelele zokungenelela ukwehlisa umthelela olindelekile wecovid19 emnothweni wethu.

src: this is being done in consultation with business, labour and other relevant institutions.
tgt: lokhu kwenziwa ngokubonisana namabhizinisi, abasebenzi kanye nezinye izikhungo ezifanele.

src: it was louis pasteur who said that fortune favours the prepared mind.
tgt: kwakungulouis pasteur owathi umnotho uhambelana nengqondo elungiselelwe.

src: south africa is prepared, and has been so for some time.
tgt: iningizimu afrika isizilungiselele, futhi kudala yazilungiselela.

src: since the outbreak was first reported we have acted to put screening and containment measures in place.
tgt: kusuka kwabikwa okokuqala ngokuqubuka kwalolu bhubhane sesisukumile ukubeka ngomumo izinhlelo zokuhlola kanye nokugcina labo asebethelelekile.

src: our national response has been driven by an interministerial committee (imc) chaired and ably led by the minister of health, dr zweli mkhize.
tgt: ukusukuma kwethu njengezwe kuqhutshwa ikomidi elakhiwe ngongqongqoshe (iimc) eliholwa ngusihlalo walo ungqongqoshe wezempilo, udkt zweli mkhize.

src: the manner in which the imc and the support teams have responded to this emergency has been both exemplary and reassuring, particularly in helping to quell public panic.
tgt: indlela iimc kanye namaqembu asekayo asisukumele ngaso lesi simo senhlekelele kube yisibonelo nokuqinisekisa, ikakhulukazi ekusizeni ukuqeda ukwenyuka kwamaphaphu komphakathi.

src: i will be chairing a national command council to coordinate all aspects of our national response.
tgt: ngizobe ngingusihlalo womkhandlu wokuyala kazwelonke ukuxhumanisa zonke izingxenye zikazwelonke zokubhekana nale nhlekelele.

src: south africa has a positive track record in managing public health emergencies.
tgt: iningizimu afrika inomlando omuhle ekulawuleni izimo eziphuthumayo zempilo yomphakathi.

src: we have the knowledge, the means and the expertise.
tgt: sinolwazi, indlela kanye nobungcweti.

src: our scientists and epidemiologists are worldclass.
tgt: ososayensi bethu kanye nodokotela bezifo basezingeni lomhlaba.

src: we have put a raft of emergency measures in place, and will make funding available to support their implementation.
tgt: sibeke ngomumo izinhleloeziningi zokubhekana nalesi simo esiphuthumayo, futhi sizohlinzeka ngosizomali ukweseka ukuqaliswa kwazo.

src: they include travel bans on visitors from highrisk countries; mandatory testing, selfisolation or quarantine for south african nationals returning from these countries; and strengthening surveillance, screening and testing at ports of entry into the republic.
tgt: zibandakanya ukumiswa kokuvakasha kwezivakashi eziqhamuka emazweni esiwathatha njengayingozi kakhulu; ukuhlolwa okuyimpoqo; ukuzihlukanisa noma ukuhlaliswa bodwana kwabantu baseningizimu afrika ababuya kula mazwe; nokuqinisa ukugada, nokuhlola emachwebeni angenela kuleli zwe.

src: social distancing is critical if we are to contain the spread of covid19.
tgt: ukuziqhelelanisa kubantu emphakathini kubalulekile uma sifuna ukunqanda ukusabalala kwecovid19.

src: gatherings of more than 100 people are prohibited and mass celebrations of national days are cancelled.
tgt: imibuthano yabantu abangaphezu kwe100 ayivumelekile kanye nemigubho yezinkumbi zabantu yezinsuku zikazwelonke isimisiwe.

src: visits to all correctional centres are being suspended for 30 days with immediate effect.
tgt: ukuvakasha kuwo wonke amajele kumisiwe izinsuku ezingama30 kusuka manje.

src: nonessential international travel for government officials has been proscribed and nonessential domestic travel discouraged.
tgt: uhambo lwaphesheya kwezilwandle olungabalulekile lwezikhulu zikahulumeni selumisiwe futhi nohambo lwalapha ekhaya nalo alugqugquzelwa.

src: a total of 35 land ports and two sea ports will be closed, as will schools from the 18th of march until after the easter weekend.
tgt: inani lezintuba ezingama35 namachweba amabili azovalwa, kanjalo nezikole kusuka mhla ziyi18 kundasa kuze kube ngemva kwempelasonto yephasika.

src: we will soon be announcing measures with regards to universities and colleges.
tgt: maduze nje sizomemezela ngezinhlelo mayelana namakolishi namanyuvesi.

src: next month will be easter, a sacred period for a number of faiths and a time in which mass services and gatherings will take place.
tgt: ngenyanga ezayo kuzoba kuyiphasika, isikhathi esingcwele sezinkolo eziningi kanye nesikhathi lapho kuba nezinkonzo zezinkumbi nemibuthano.

src: the faith community should take decisions in this regard in the best interests of the health of their congregants and the country as a whole.
tgt: izinkolo zomphakathi kumele zithathe izinqumo ngalokhu ngokubhekela impilo yamalungu amabandla abo kanye nezwe lilonke.

src: hygiene control should be intensified in all sectors.
tgt: inhlanzeko kumele iqinisekiswe kuyo yonke imikhakha.

src: every citizen should take charge of their own safety by observing measures such as frequent handwashing with soap or handsanitizers and covering their nose or mouth with a tissue or flexed elbow when coughing or sneezing.
tgt: zonke izakhamuzi kumele zibeke ukuphepha kwazo ezandleni zazo ngokulandela izindlela ezifana nokuhlale uhlanza izandla ngamanzi nensipho noma ngesibulalimagciwane sezandla kanye noku vala amakhala nomlomo ngethishu noma ngokugobisa indololwane uma ukhwehlela noma uthimula.

src: as part of our national effort the department of health will continue with an intensive and ongoing campaign to raise awareness about prevention, transmission and infection symptoms.
tgt: njengengxenye yemizamo kazwelonke umnyango wezempilo uzoqhubeka nomkhankaso omkhulu oqhubekayo wokuqwashisa ngokuvikela, ukusatshalaliswa kanye nezimpawu zokutheleleka.

src: i encourage all south africans to acquaint themselves with the relevant preventative material.
tgt: ngigqugquzela bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuzihlomulisa bona ngolwazi olufanele lokuzivikela.

src: these measures are similar to those in other countries, and it is important we all understand that they are not punitive but a matter of public safety.
tgt: lezi zinhlelo ziyafana nalezo zakwamanye amazwe, futhi kubalulekile ukuthi sonke siqonde ukuthi azisiso isijeziso kodwa zibhekele ukuphepha komphakathi.

src: one of the greatest dangers at this time is ignorance and misinformation.
tgt: enye yezingozi ezinkulu kulesi sikhathi ukungazi nokuba nolwazi olungelona iqiniso.

src: we should stop spreading fake and unverified news, especially on social media.
tgt: kumele sipheze ukusabalalisa izindaba ezingelona iqiniso nezingaqinisekisiwe, ikakhulukazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.

src: this can exacerbate an already tense national mood and damage the national effort.
tgt: lokhu kwandisa umuzwa wokuthuka osuvele ukhona ezweni futhi kucekela phansi imizamo yezwe.

src: we must also not give in to the expressions of bigotry that we have seen in other countries directed at nationals of countries from where the outbreak began or the current epicenter in europe.
tgt: akumele futhi sivumele izenzo zokucwasa esizibone zenzeka kwamanye amazwe ebezibhekiswe kubantu bamazwe lapho ukuqubuka kuqale khona noma endaweni emaphakathi eeurope.

src: this is clearly a virus that affects people of all nationalities.
tgt: kuyacaca ukuthi leli igciwane elihlasela abantu balolonke uhlanga.

src: let us lower the wing of compassion to those who are infected, and to those who have returned home from highrisk countries.
tgt: ake sehlise uzwelo kulabo abathelelekile, nalabo abasanda kubuya ekhaya bebuya emazweni esiwathatha njengayingozi kakhulu.

src: let us assist those in need and those more vulnerable, instead of shunning them.
tgt: asisize labo abadinga usizo nalabo ababuthaka, kunokuthi sibaxwaye.

src: we will remain faithful to the values of tolerance and respect that define us as a people.
tgt: sizoqhubeka sithembeke ezimfundisweni zokubekezelelana nokuhlonipha ezichaza thina njengabantu.

src: on behalf of all the people of south africa i thank the team who repatriated our compatriots from wuhan, china, as well as the leadership and people of limpopo who are assisting with the quarantine process.
tgt: egameni labo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika ngibonga iqembu ebelilande abantu bakithi ewuhan, echina, kanjalo nobuholi kanye nabantu baselimpopo abasiza ngohlelo lendawo yokuhlalisa ngabodwana labo abathelelekile.

src: this is a difficult time.
tgt: lesi isikhathi esinzima.

src: and yet it is in times of adversity that our strength is revealed.
tgt: futhi ezikhathini zobunzima lapho kwambulwa khona amandla ethu.

src: we will act decisively, with determination and with purpose.
tgt: sizosukumela phezulu sithathe izinqumo, ngokuzimisela nokuba nenhloso.

src: we will act as a collective, for it is upon the actions of every south african that the success of our efforts depend.
tgt: sizosebenza ngokubambisana, ngoba ukuphumelela kwemizamo yethu kuncike ekusebenzeni kwawo wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika.

src: the thuma mina moment is upon us, perhaps as never before.
tgt: umzuzu kathuma mina ususengamele, mhlawumbe kakhulu kunakuqala.

src: this too shall pass.
tgt: nalokhu kuzodlula.

src: together we can overcome covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed during the first full week of the nationwide lockdown to combat the coronavirus pandemic that is devastating the world, we were grateful for good news that brought us joy and hope at this difficult and uncertain time.
tgt: ngokubambisana singayinqoba icovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed evikini lokuqala lokuvalwa kwezwe ngenhloso yokulwa nobhubhane lwegciwane lwecorona oseludale umonakalo emhlabeni, sizithokozele izindabaezinhle ezisilethele injabulo nethemba kulesi sikhathi esinzima nesindathabuzekayo.

src: the 114 south africans who were evacuated from wuhan in china some weeks ago ended their quarantine and were reunited with their families.
tgt: abantu baseningizimu afrika abayi114 abalandwa ewuhan echina emavikini ambalwa adlule sebesiqedile isikhathi sabo ekuvalelweni ngenhloso yokunqanda ukuthelelana ngegciwane lecorona futhi sebehlanganisiwe nemindeni yabo.

src: they have all tested negative for the virus and are in good health and good spirits.
tgt: emva kokuhlolwa bonke batholakale bengenalo igciwane lecorona futhi baphile kahle ngokwempilo nangokomoya.

src: for months, they had been in lockdown, first in wuhan for some 51 days and then in polokwane for 14 days.
tgt: sekube izinyanga, belokhu bevalelwe, okokuqala bebevalelwe ewuhan izinsukuezingama51 nasepolokwane izinsuku eziyi14.

src: they were unable to be with their loved ones, unable to leave their living quarters and uncertain about when their ordeal would end.
tgt: babengakwa zi ukuba nabathandiweyo babo, bengakwazi ukuhamba lapho behlala khona futhi benganasiqiniseko sokuthi lolu sizi lwabo luzophela nini.

src: when we add the remaining 17 days that south africa will be under lockdown they will have been under lockdown for 82 days.
tgt: uma sengeza lezi zinsuku ezisele eziyi17 zokuvalelwa kweningizimu afrika kubona kuzoba yizinsuku ezingama82 bevalelwe.

src: it was wonderful to spend time with this diverse group of south africans made up of all ages, languages and backgrounds.
tgt: kube yintokozo ukuchitha isikhathi naleli qembu elahlukahlukene labantu baseningizimu afrika elihlanganise yonke iminyaka yobudala, izilimi kanye nemvelaphi.

src: i was impressed by their resilience and courage and by their determination to remain healthy.
tgt: ngamangazwa kakhulu ukubekezela nesibindi kanye nempokophelo yabo yokuzigcina benempilo.

src: they have come from the epicentre of the coronavirus in wuhan in china and have seen the devastating impact this virus is wreaking on human life.
tgt: bebephuma kumnyombo wegciwane lecorona ewuhan echina futhi sebebone nomonakalo osudalwe ubungozi baleli gciwane ezimpilweni zabantu.

src: it is not surprising to hear them say that they are on a mission to safeguard the health of those around them.
tgt: akumangazi ukubezwa bethi bazimisele ukuphephisa impilo yalabo abaseduze nabo.

src: now their patience and fortitude has been rewarded, because they are returning to their families.
tgt: manje isineke sabo nesibindi sabo sekuthole umvuzo, ngoba sebebuyela emindenini yabo.

src: their return home was made possible by a great many people who went to great lengths to make this repatriation operation a success.
tgt: ukubuya kwabo ekhaya kwenzeke ngenxa yabantu abaningi abazinikele ngezindlela eziningi ukwenza ukuthi ukulandwa kwabo kube yimpumelelo.

src: as a nation, we are extremely grateful to the government and the people of china for taking such good care of our citizens, and for their assistance in organising their repatriation.
tgt: njengesizwe, siyabonga kakhulu kuhulumeni nabantu basechina ngokunakekela izakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika, nosizo lwabo ekuhleleni ukulandwa kwabo.

src: it is significant that several of the south africans in wuhan were on study scholarships from the chinese government; an act of generosity that is deeply appreciated.
tgt: kubalulekile ukuthi iningi labantu baseningizimu afrika abasewuhan bebefunda ngemifundaze ephuma kuhulumeni wasechina; okuyisenzo sokupha esisibonga kakhulu.

src: we are grateful too to all the people who were involved in the operation, from the saa flight crew to the medical team to the police and soldiers who brought them home.
tgt: siyabonga futhi kubobonke abantu akade bebandakanyeke kulo msebenzi, kusuka kuthi mba labashayeli bezindiza zakwasaa kuya kuthimba lodokotela kuya kumaphoyisa namasotsha ababuyise ekhaya.

src: each and every one of them stepped forward to take responsibility for the safety and wellbeing of others.
tgt: omunye nomunye wabo uthathe igxathu wazibophezelela ukuphepha nokuphila kahle kwabanye abantu.

src: they were prepared to undertake a difficult and dangerous mission and to subject themselves to quarantine.
tgt: bebezimisele ukuthunywa kulo msebenzi onzima noyingozi nokuzibeka esimweni sokuvalelwa.

src: and now, they all tell me, they are ready for their next mission.
tgt: manje, bonke bangitshela ukuthi, sebekulungele ukuthunywa emsebenzini wabo olandelayo.

src: i wish to thank the staff and management of the ranch hotel in polokwane, who took great care of the returnees.
tgt: ngifisa ukubonga kubasebenzi nabaphathi baseranch hotel epolokwane, ababenakekele labo ababelandiwe.

src: they were prepared to play their part in our national effort to overcome this disease.
tgt: babezimisele ukudlala indima yabo emizamweni yezwe yokunqoba lesi sifo.

src: everyone involved in this operation has done south africa proud.
tgt: wonke umuntu obandakanyeka kulo msebenzi wenze iningizimu afrika yaziqhenya ngaye.

src: the experience of the south africans in wuhan demonstrates the effectiveness – and the necessity – of a state of lockdown.
tgt: isimo abadlule kuso abantu baseningizimu afrika ewuhan sitshengisa ukusebenza – nesidingo – sombuso ukuthi uvale izwe.

src: it was due to the drastic actions that the chinese government took to con tain the disease in the city of wuhan, that all of our people were able to return uninfected and healthy.
tgt: kwakungenxa yezinqumo ezinkulu ezathathwa nguhulumeni wasechina ukunqanda ukusabalala kwesifo edolobheni lasewuhan, okwenza ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika bakwazi ukubuya bengathelelekanga futhi benempilo.

src: wuhan, a city of 11 million people in the province of hubei, had more than 50,000 infections.
tgt: iwuhan, idolobha elihlala abantu abayizigidi eziyi11 esifundazweni sasehubei, libe nabantu abangaphezu kwezi50 000 abasuleleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src: now, after more than two months after stringent lockdown measures were put in place, the province has had fewer than 20 new cases in the past two weeks.
tgt: njengamanje, emva nje kwesikhathi esingaphezu kwezinyanga ezimbili emva kokubekwa kwezindlela ezinzima zokuvalwa kwezwe, lesi sifundazwe sesibe nezigameko ezintsha ezingaphansi kwama20 emavikini amabili adlule.

src: the containment of the disease in wuhan city, in hubei province and in other places across china required a massive and extraordinary effort.
tgt: ukunqanda ukusabalala kwesifo edolobheni iwuhan, esifundazweni ihubei nakwezinye izindawo echina kudinge umzamo omkhulu futhi ongakaze ubonakale phambilini.

src: it involved drastic restrictions on daily life and is having a severe impact on the chinese economy.
tgt: lokhu kufake phakathi imikhawulo emikhulu empilweni yansuku zonke futhi kuba nomthelela omkhulu emnothweni wasechina.

src: other countries that have taken similar measures are having greater success in managing the spread of the disease than countries that have been slower to respond.
tgt: amanye amazwe athatha lesi nqumo esifanayo ayaphumelela kakhulu ekulawuleni ukusabalala kwesifo kunalawo mazwe enza kancane ukubhekana nalesi sifo.

src: as the total number of confirmed covid19 cases worldwide grows to over 700,000 and the number of deaths exceeds 33,000, we can draw lessons from these countries.
tgt: njengoba inani eliphelele lezigameko eziqinisekisiwe zecovid19 emhlabeni jikelele linyuke laya ngaphezu kwezi700 000 nenani lasebeshonile lidlula izi33 000, singafunda isifundo kula mazwe.

src: it is now abundantly clear that the most effective way for a society to contain the spread of the disease is for the population to remain at home and physically isolated from each other for at least several weeks.
tgt: sekucace bha manje ukuthi indlela engasebenza kangcono ukuthi umphakathi unqande ukusabalala kwesifo ukuthi abantu bonke bahlale emakhaya baziqhelelanise kwabanye abantu okungenani amaviki ambalwa.

src: and it is important that this lockdown and all other emergency measures are both strictly adhered to and consistently enforced.
tgt: futhi kubalulekile ukuthi lokhu kuvalwa kwezwe kanye neminye imizamo ephuthumayo kokubili kuyalandelwa futhi kuyaphoqelelwa ngokungaguquki kukho.

src: as the south africans from wuhan can testify, such restrictions on daily life, on movement and on ordinary human contact are extremely difficult to endure.
tgt: njengoba abantu baseningizimu afrika ababuya ewuhan bangafakaza, le mikhawulo empilweni yansukuzonke, ekuhambeni nasekubeni nje nabantu inzima kakhulu ukuyibekezelela.

src: in the south african context, a lockdown brings additional hardship and strain, and we are doing everything within our means to lessen the impact on our people.
tgt: ngokwaseningizimu afrika, ukuvalwa kwezwe kwengeza ubunzima nobulukhuni, futhi senza konke okusemandleni ukwehlisa umonakalo kubantu bakithi.

src: but the lesson from the south africans in wuhan is that a lockdown works.
tgt: kodwa isifundo esisithole kubantu baseningizimu afrika abasewuhan ukuthi ukuvalwa kwezwe kuyasebenza.

src: it shows that if we strictly observe the rules in place to stop the virus spreading, we will be able to bring infection rates down.
tgt: kutshengisa ukuthi uma singaqinisa ekulandeleni imithetho ebekelwe ukunqanda ukusabalala kwegciwane lecorona , sizokwazi ukwehlisa izibalo zokusuleleka.

src: help for our vulnerable citizens vukuzenzele unnamed many countries around the world have imposed coronavirus lockdowns with a view to saving the lives of their citizens.
tgt: ukusizwa kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka vukuzenzele unnamed amazwe amaningi emhlabeni asevale amazwe ngenxa yegciwane lecorona ngokomqondo wokuthi kuzosindisa izimpilo zezakhamuzi zabo.

src: we have done the same in our country, but our lockdown has revealed a very sad fault line in our society that reveals how grinding poverty, inequality and unemployment is tearing the fabric of our communities apart.
tgt: nathi senze okufanayo ezweni lethu, kodwa ukuvalwa kwezwe lethu kwembule iphutha elidabukisayo emphakathini wethu okubeke obala indlela ububha, ukungalingani nokuswelakala kwemisebenzi okuhlukanisa ngayo imiphakathi yethu.

src: there can be no greater anguish than that of a parent whose children cry out to them for food, but they have none to give.
tgt: alukho usizi olwedlula olomzali okhalelwa abantwana befuna ukudla, kodwa benge nalutho abangabanika lona.

src: there can be no greater injustice than a society where some live in comfort and plenty, while others struggle at the margins to survive with little or nothing at all.
tgt: akukho ukungabi nabu lungiswa obedlula umpha kathi lapho abanye baphila ngokunethezeka nokungasweli lutho, ngesikhathi abanye bezabalazela ukuphila ngalokhu okuncane abanakho noma ngalokhu abangenakho nhlobo.

src: yes, these are the residual effects of a fractured and unequal past.
tgt: yebo, lena imiphumela emibi eyasala yesikhathi esedlule ebesinokukhubazeka nokungalingani.

src: but they are also a symp tom of a fundamental failing in our postapartheid society.
tgt: kodwa futhi kuyizimpawu zokwehluleka kwethu emphakathini wasemva kobandlululo.

src: the nationwide lockdown in response to the coronavirus has gravely exarcerbated a longstanding problem.
tgt: ukuvalwa kwezwe kulolonke lakuleli ngenxa yokulwisana negciwane lecorona sekuvele kwabhebhethekisa kakhulu inkinga elokhu yabakhona.

src: over the past few weeks, we have been confronted with distressing images of desperate people clamouring for food parcels at distribution centres and of community protests against food shortages.
tgt: emavikini ambalwa edlule, sesibhekane nezithombe eziletha usizi zabantu abahluphekile bebanga izijumbana zokudla ezikhungweni zokunikezela ngokudla kanye nemibhikisho yemiphakathi ngokuswelakala kokudla.

src: we have also had to contend with allegations both disturbing and disgusting.
tgt: siphinde futhi sabhekana nezi nsolo eziphazamisayo nezihlazayo.

src: a number of provinces have received reports that callous individuals, some of them allegedly government officials, are hoarding or selling food parcels earmarked for the needy and destitute, or diverting them to their friends and families.
tgt: izifundazwe eziningana zithole imibiko yokuthi kunabantu abanonya, abanye babo okusolakala ukuthi izikhulu zikahulumeni, bagweve noma badayisa izijumbana zokudla ezihlinzekelwe abantu abaswele nabahluphekile, noma bakuhambisa kubangani nasemindenini yabo.

src: if there is found to be substance to these allegations we will deal with the individuals concerned harshly.
tgt: uma kuke kwatholakala ukuthi lezi zinsolo ziliqiniso sizobhekana nalabo bantu ngesikhulu isihluku.

src: with the declaration of a national state of disaster and the imposition of a nationwide lockdown we entered uncharted waters.
tgt: ngokumemezela isimo sikazwelonke senhlekelele nokubeka kokuvalwa kwezwe kulolonke lakuleli besizwa amanzi ngobhoko.

src: south africa has never had to deal with a public health emergency of this magnitude.
tgt: iningizimu afrika ayikaze yabhekana nesimo esiphuthumayo esinzima kangaka ngempilo yomphakathi.

src: we had to act quickly to save lives.
tgt: bekumele sisukume ngokushesha ukuze sisindise izimpilo.

src: and we must acknowledge that in the days and weeks that have followed, the provision of support to our country’s most vulnerable citizens has been slower than required, and that lapses have occurred.
tgt: kumele sikuvume ukuthi ezinsukwini nasemavikini alandelile, ukwesekwa kwezakhamuzi zakule lizwe lakithi ezikhungatheke kakhulu kuhambe kancane kunalokho obekudingeka, futhi sekuvuleke igebe.

src: however, the payment of social grants has proceeded relatively smoothly, and after a number of technical challenges, the food distribution system is being streamlined.
tgt: noma kunjalo, ukukhokhwa kwezibonelelo zikahulumeni kuqhubeke ngaphandle kwezithiyo, futhi emva kwezingqinamba eziningana zobuchwepheshe, uhlelo lokuthunyelwa kokudla luyalungiswa.

src: imposing a nationwide lockdown at very short notice presented several challenges.
tgt: ukubeka ukuvalwa kwezwe esikhathini esifushane kakhulu kulethe izinselelo eziningi.

src: we have had to weigh up the proportionality of the national response and the extent of restrictions we would need to impose.
tgt: bekumele siqhathanise ubungako bokuvalwa kwezwe nobukhulu bemikhawulo okuzomelwe ibekwe.

src: we ultimately chose to err on the side of caution.
tgt: sikhethe ukuba sohlangothini lokuqaphela.

src: and as the presentation by the ministry of health indicated recently, enforcing a lockdown at the time we did has slowed down the rate of infection and, more importantly, bought us time to prepare for a probable surge in infections in the coming weeks and months.
tgt: futhi ngokombiko owethulwa ngungqongqoshe wezempilo kungekudala, ukuvalwa kwezwe ngesikhathi esakwenza ngaso kwehlise izinga lokusuleleka, futhi okubaluleke kakhulu, kusinikeze isikhathi sokulungiselela ukubhebhetheka okukhulu ekusulelekeni okungenzeka emavikini nezinyanga ezizayo.

src: we had to consider the impact on an already floundering economy in both the long and short term, and the impact of this substantial disruption on the livelihoods of millions of people.
tgt: bekumele sicabangele nomthelela emnothweni osuvele untengantenga esikhathini eside nesifushane, nomthelela walokhu kuphazamiseka okukhulu ezimpilweni zezigidi zabantu.

src: we had to consider what weeks of confinement to the home would mean for the employed not paid regular salaries, for the unemployed and those seeking work, for those in casual or seasonal employment, for those in the informal sector, for the indigent and for the vulnerable.
tgt: bekumele sicabange ukuthi ukuvaleleka emakhaya amaviki kuzosho ukuthini kubantu abasebenzayo abangezukukhokhelwa amaholo ajwayelekile, kubantu abangasebenzi nakulabo abasafuna umsebenzi, kulabo abatohozayo, kulabo abathengisa emgwaqeni, kulabo abaphofu nalabo ababuthaka.

src: cabinet will finalise a set of measures to respond to the impact of the lockdown on the livelihoods of our people.
tgt: ikhabhinethi izoqedela iqoqo lamaqhingasu azosetshenziswa ukubhekana nomthelela wokuvalwa kwezwe ezimpilweni zabantu bakithi.

src: this has been preceded by a range of engagements with a number of stakeholders including business, labour, religious organisations, civil society and the presidential economic advisory council.
tgt: lokhu kwandulelwe imihlangano ehlukahlukene nalabo abathintekayo kubandakanya amabhizinisi, abasebenzi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, umphakathi kanye nomkhandlu oyala umongameli kwezomnotho.

src: the social partners have put forward a number of proposals on interventions that could address the immediate vulnerability of the poorest of the poor, most of whom rely on social assistance to survive.
tgt: esisebenzisana nabo empha kathini sebelethe izicelo eziningana zokungenelela ezi ngasiza ebuthakathakeni kwalabo abadla imbuya ngothi, iningi labo abaphila ngokusizwa ngumphakathi.

src: we will scale up welfare provision during this period to help households living below the poverty line.
tgt: sizokhuphula izinga lokuhlinzeka ngezenhlalonhle ngalesi sikhathi ukuze sisize amakhaya aphila ngaphansi kwesimo sobubha.

src: even when the nationwide lockdown is lifted, its effects will continue to be felt for some time to come.
tgt: noma sekuphelile ukuvalwa kwezwe, umonakalo wako uzoqhubeka uzwakale kwabanye ngesikhathi esithile esizayo.

src: those fortunate to have a steady income will be able to return to their jobs; but for millions of others this will be a lost month where they would otherwise have found temporary work, done business in the informal sector or saved money earned to meet their family responsibilities.
tgt: labo abanenhlanhla yokuba nemiholo engathikamezeki bazokwazi ukubuyela emisebenzini yabo; kodwa izigidi zabanye abantu bazolahlekelwa inyanga lapho bebengabe bethole umsebenzi wesikhashana, ngabe bazenzele amabhizinisi ngokuthengisa emgwaqeni noma bonge imali ababeyitholile ukuze bahlangabezane nezibophezelo zemindeni yabo.

src: food support is a shortterm emergency measure.
tgt: ukusekwa ngokudla kuyindlela yesikhashana yokubhekana nesimo esiphuthumayo.

src: it will need to be matched by sustainable solutions that help our most vulnerable citizens weather the difficult times that are still to come.
tgt: kuzomele kuhambisane nezisombululo ezimile ezisiza izakhamuzi zakithi ezibuthaka kakhulu ukunqoba izikhathi ezinzima eziseza.

src: i wish to thank the many ngos, religious groups and ordinary citizens who are donating money and volunteer ing to help feed the hungry and destitute.
tgt: ngiﬁ sa ukubonga izinhlangano ezizimele (ngos) eziningi, amaqembu ezenkolo kanye nezakhamuzi zakithi ezinikele imali nokuvolontiya ukusiza ngokudla kwabalambile nabaphofu.

src: alleviating hunger is not an act of charity.
tgt: ukuqeda indlala akusona isenzo sokupha.

src: it is an imperative for any society that is founded on respect for human rights.
tgt: kubalulekile kunoma umuphi umphakathi ophila ngokuhlonipha amalungelo abantu.

src: we are at a point in our battle with the pandemic where complacency could prove disastrous.
tgt: sisesikhathini empini yethu nalolu bhubhane lapho ukuthatha izinto kalula kungaba yingozi enkulu.

src: i call on each and every one to remain vigilant, to continue to abide by the regulations, and to keep safe and keep others safe.
tgt: nginxenxa omunye nomunye wenu ahlale eqaphele, aqhubeke nokulandela imithethonqubo, nokuzigcina uphephile nokuphephisa abanye.

src: small business support during covid19 dale hes the uncertainty and financial strain placed on entrepreneurs and small business owners by the global coronavirus pandemic is being alleviated by a host of public and private support schemes.
tgt: ukwesekwa kwamabhizinisi amancane ngesikhathi secovid19 dale hes ungabazane nobunzima kwezezimali okusemahlombe osomabhizinisi kanye nabanikazi bamabhizinisi amancane obudalwe ubhubhane oluhlasele umhlaba jikelele lwegciwane lecorona ngandlela thile buzokwethulwa ngezinhlelo zokweseka zikahulumeni nezalabo abazimele.

src: small business owners and informal traders are amongst the south africans who are most heavily impacted by the lockdown.
tgt: abanikazi bamabhi zinisi amancane nabathengisa emgwaqeni bayingxenye yabantu baseningizi mu afrika abashayeke kakhulu ngokuvalwa kwezwe.

src: in order to get through this difficult time, these business owners can take advantage of a number of in terventions that govern ment has put in place to assist them.
tgt: ukuze badlule kulesi sikhathi esinzima, labo somabhizinisi bangasebenzisa ithuba ngokusebenzisa izindlela eziningi zokungenelela uhulumeni azibekele uku siza bona.

src: smme debt relief fundfollowing the announce ment of the lockdown, the department of small business development immediately made a debt relief fund available for small businesses negatively affected by the covid19 pandemic.
tgt: isikhwama sosizo lwezikweletu oluqondiswe emabhizinisini amancane kulandela isimemezelo sokuvalwa kwezwe, umnya ngo wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane wavula isikhwama sosizo lwezikweletu oluqondiswe emabhizinisini amancane ashayeke kakhulu ngenxa yobhubhane lwecovid19 .

src: more than r500 million has been made available through the fund, which small and medium enterprises must apply for through an online application process.
tgt: ingaphezu kwezigidi ezingamar500 imali ekhona kulesi sikhwama, okumele amabhizinisi amancane ukuze ayithole afake izicelo ngendlela yeinthanethi.

src: here are the steps that need to be followed:1. your business must be registered on the smme south africa portal.
tgt: nazi izinyathelo okumele zilandelwe uma ufaka isicelo:1. ibhizinisi lakho kumele libhaliswe kwingosi yamabhizinisi amancane yaseningizimu afrika.

src: if you are not yet registered, you need to go to www.
tgt: uma ungakabhalisi, kumele uye ku www.

src: smmesa.
tgt: smmesa.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za to register.
tgt: za ukuze ubhalise.

src: 2. once your registration is complete, you can apply for the covid19 smme debt relief fund.
tgt: 2. uma usuqedile ukubhalisa, usungafaka isicelo esikhwameni sosizo lwe zikweletu oluqondiswe emabhizinisini amancane secovid19 .

src: you can find the application form on the department of small business development’s website.
tgt: ifomu lokufaka isicelo ungalithola kuwebhusaythi yomnyango wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane.

src: 3. if you meet all the criteria (such as your business being tax compliant and 100 percent owned by south africans), relief funding will be paid out to approved applicants within 12 working days.
tgt: 3. uma unayo yonke imininingwane edingekayo futhi ufanelekile (njengokuthi ibhizinisi lakho liyayilandela imigomo yentela futhi liphethwe ngabantu baseningizimu afrika), imali yosizo izokhokhwa kulabo abaphumelele ezicelweni zabo ezinsukwini zokusebenza eziyi12.

src: if you own a microenterprise, then the small enterprise development agency is available to help you to apply to the debt relief scheme.
tgt: uma ungumnikazi webhizinisi elincane, uphiko lokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane lukhona ukuze lukusize ukufaka isicelo ohlelweni lokusizwa ngesikweletu.

src: requests for assistance must be emailed to debtrelief@seda.
tgt: izicelo zokusizwa zingathunyelwa ku: debtrelief@seda.

src: org.
tgt: org.

src: za.
tgt: za.

src: solidarity response fundpresident cyril ramaphosa also announced the launch of the solidarity response fund, which received a r150 million kickstart from government.
tgt: isikhwama sobunye nobumbanoumongameli ucyril ramaphosa uphinde wamemezela ukuvulwa kwesikhwama sobunye nobumbano, esiqalwe ngemali eyizigidi ezir150 ephuma kuhulumeni.

src: the fund allows organisations and individuals to donate to the nationwide effort to support small businesses and covid19 response efforts.
tgt: isikhwama sivumela izinhlangano kanye nabantu ngamunye ngamunye ukunikela emzamweni kazwelonke ukweseka amabhizinisi amancane kanye nemizamo yokusiza ngecovid19 .

src: in the first two weeks of the fund, over r2 billion was donated, which will be channelled into relief efforts.
tgt: emavikini okuqala amabili kuvulwe lesi sikhwama, kwanikelwa imali engaphezu kwamabhiliyoni amabili amarandi, ezosetshenziswa emizamweni yokusiza.

src: support for spaza shopsgovernment has recognised the unique challenges that the pandemic poses to those working in the informal sector.
tgt: ukwesekwa kweziphazauhulumeni uzibonile izingqi namba ezilethwe ubhubhane kulabo somabhizinisi abathengisa emgwaqeni.

src: in this respect, minister for small business development khumbudzo ntshavheni has also released support packages for people working in this sector.
tgt: ngalokho ke, ungqongqoshe wezokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi amancane ukhumbudzo ntshavheni naye usekhiphe izinhlelo zokweseka labo bantu abasebenza kulo mkhakha.

src: this includes a dedicated support scheme for spaza shops.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya uhlelo lokweseka iziphaza.

src: "the spaza shop support will include dedicated networking, purchasing power and bulk purchasing through preselected and preapproved wholesalers," explains the minister.
tgt: "ukwesekwa kweziphaza kuzobandakanya ukuxhumana okubhekiswe ngqo kwiziphaza, amandla okuthenga kanye nokuthenga inqwaba yezimpahla kubathengisi abakhethiwe nabavumelekile," kuchaza ungqongqoshe.

src: this support will allow spaza shops to gain access to goods which they can sell.
tgt: lokhu kwesekwa kuzovumela iziphaza ukuthi zithole izimpahla ezingazithengisa.

src: minister ntshavheni adds that the scheme will also provide credit to spaza shop owners, to allow them to access the money needed to buy stock.
tgt: ungqongqoshe untshavheni wenezele ngokuthi uhlelo lolu luzokwenza ukuthi abanikazi beziphaza bakwazi ukuthenga ngesikweletu, okuzobavumela ukuthi bathole imali edingekayo ukuze bayothenga isitoko abazosithengisa.

src: "this will be followed by a credit facility to enable spaza shop owners to continuously buy, even after the covid19 outbreak is over.
tgt: "lokhu kuzolandelwa ukuthola indawo enikezela ngesikweletu ezokwenza ukuthi abanikazi beziphaza bakwazi ukuqhubeka bathenge, noma sekudlule ukuqubuka kwecovid19 .

src: "the department will also provide advice on how to successfully run their shops.
tgt: "umnyango uzophinde ubacebise ngokuthi bangaziphatha kanjani ngokuyimpumelelo izitolo zabo.

src: "we are also supporting them with business management support because we know that there are problems in spaza shops running their businesses to be profitable," ntshavheni says.
tgt: "siphinde futhi sibaseke ngokubanika ukwesekwa ngokulawulwa kwamabhizinisi ngoba siyazi ukuthi kunezinkinga eziphaza ngokulawulwa kwamabhizinisi abo ukuthi enze inzuzo," kusho untshavheni.

src: helping informal tradersgovernment is also work ing on creating a package that will provide income relief to informal traders who have lost income due to the crisis.
tgt: ukusiza abathengisi abangahleliwe uhulumeni usebenza futhi ohlelweni oluzohlinzeka ngosizo lwemali kosomabhizinisi abathengisa emgwaqeni abalahlekelwe inzuzo ngenxa yale nhlekelele.

src: let us unite in our fight against covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed the entire world is in the unrelenting grip of the coronavirus pandemic, whose spread has been rapid.
tgt: asibumbane ekulweni necovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed umhlaba wonke awuphelile amandla ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , eselibhebhethe kise okomlilo wequbula.

src: a vaccine has yet to be found.
tgt: umgomo walo okusamele utholakale.

src: across the world, over 3.4 million people are known to be infected and more than 240,000 have died.
tgt: emhlabeni jikelele, bangaphezu kwezigidi ezi3.4 abantu ekwaziwa ukuthi basulelekile futhi bangaphezu kwezi240 000 asebeshonile.

src: when the national state of disaster was declared six weeks ago, south africa only had 61 confirmed coronavirus infections.
tgt: ngesikhathi kumenyezelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke emavikini ayisithupha adlule, iningizimu afrika yayinezigameko ezingama61 kuphela eziqinisekisiwe zabasuleleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src: despite the relatively low number, expert opinion and international experience indicated that infec tions would rise exponentially.
tgt: ngaphandle kokubuka inani eliphansi, umbono wongoti kanye nesikubone kwamanye amazwe aphesheya kubonise ukuthi ukusuleleka kusazokhuphuka ngendlela eyisimanga.

src: i said that urgent and drastic measures would need to be taken.
tgt: ngabe sengithi kuzodingeka kuthathwe izinyathelo ezinkulu futhi eziphuthumayo.

src: those measures – which included a nationwide lockdown and the closure of our borders – have proved to be effective in delaying the spread of the disease.
tgt: lezo zinyathelo – okubandakanya ukuvalwa kwezwe jikelele nokuvalwa kwemingcele – okubonise ukuthi kuyasebenza ngempela ukubambezela ukubhebhetheka kwesifo.

src: this has been possible because most south africans have adhered to the lockdown provisions, practising social distancing and wearing face masks.
tgt: lokhu kuyenzeka ngenxa yokuthi abantu abaningi baseningizimu afrika bayilandele imiyalelo yokuvalwa kwezwe, ukuqhelelana nabanye abantu kanye nokugqoka izifonyo zobuso.

src: i applaud you for this and for all the other sacrifices you have made.
tgt: ngiyanibonga kakhulu ngalokhu nangakho konke ukuzinikela esenikwenzile.

src: at this stage in the progress of the pandemic, other countries had far more infections than we do.
tgt: kulesi sigaba sokudlondlobala kobhubhane, amanye amazwe abe nenani labasulelekile eliphezulu ukwedlula thina.

src: as of now – which is 46 days since we recorded our 100th coronavirus case – we have 6,783 confirmed cases.
tgt: njengamanje – okungusuku lwama46 selokhu sabika isigameko se100 segciwane lecorona – sesinezigameko eziqinisekisiwe eziyizi6 783. izwe laseitaly, elinenani labantu elifanayo nelethu, libe nezigameko ezingaphezu kwezi140 000 kanye nemelika ibe nezigameko eziqinisekisiwe ezilinganiselwa ezi700 000 esikhathini sezinsuku ezingama46.

src: but this does not mean that the danger has passed.
tgt: kodwa lokhu akusho ukuthi ubungozi sebudlulile.

src: we have not nearly reached the peak of infections in south africa.
tgt: asikafiki esihlokweni sokusuleleka eningizimu afrika.

src: all the scientific models show that the infection rate will continue to rise at a much faster rate in the next few months.
tgt: lonke ucwaningo lwesayensi lubonisa ukuthi izinga lokusuleleka lisazoqhubeka likhuphuke ngesivinini esikhulu ezinyangeni ezimbalwa ezizayo.

src: however, the speed with which the virus spreads and the number of people who are ultimately infected will be determined by what we do now.
tgt: noma kunjalo, isivinini elibhebhetheka ngaso igciwane nenani labantu abasulelekayo lizolawulwa ukuthi thina senzani manje.

src: that is why the easing of the lockdown needs to be gradual and cautious.
tgt: yingakho ukuxegiswa kokuvalwa kwezwe kudinga kwenziwe kancane kancane nangokucophelela.

src: it is for this reason that many regulations need to remain in place and why it is absolutely essential that people observe them.
tgt: kungalesi sizathu ukuthi imithethonqubo eminingi kumele ihlale ikhona futhi kungani kubalulekile kakhulu ukuthi abantu bayilandele.

src: i know how difficult this is and i understand the concern that many of our compatriots have about how these regulations are interfering and limiting their rights.
tgt: ngiyazi ukuthi kunzima kanjani lokhu futhi ngiyakuqonda ukukhathazeka abantu bakithi abaningi abanako ngokuthi le mithethonqubo igxambukela futhi ibeka imikhawulo kumalungelo abo.

src: our overriding objective is the preservation of life.
tgt: inhlosongqangi yethu ngukugcina impilo.

src: social distancing and proper hygiene are still our best and only defences in this struggle.
tgt: ukuqhelelana nabantu nokuhlanzeka kuseyizona zikhali zethu ezihamba phambili kulo mzabalazo.

src: this is what informs the regulations we have put in place for level 4 of our response.
tgt: ilokhu okulawula imithethonqubo esiyibekile esigabeni sesine sokubhekana negciwane.

src: our considerations are based on empirical evidence, scientific and economic data and international best practice.
tgt: ukucabangela kwethu kususelwa ebufakazini obuqanda ikhanda, ulwazi lwesayensi nomnotho kanye nokusebenza okuhamba phambili kwamazwe ngamazwe.

src: in the 1995 judgment of the constitutional court that outlawed capital punishment, jus tice arthur chaskalson wrote: "the rights to life and dignity are the most important of all human rights and the source of all other personal rights.
tgt: ngesahlulelo sowe1995 senkantolo yomthethosisekelo eyakhipha emthethweni isigwebo sentambo, ujustice arthur chaskalson wabhala wathi: "amalungelo empilo nesithunzi yiwona abaluleke kakhulu kuwowonke amalungelo omuntu futhi angumthombo wawo wonke amalungelo omuntu.

src: by committing ourselves to a society founded on the recognition of human rights we are required to value these two rights above all others.
tgt: ngokuzinikela kwethu emphakathini owakhiwe ngokwamukela amalungelo abantu sidingeka ukuba siwaqhakambise la malungelo amabili okudlula wonke amanye.

src: "the regulations we have put in place are founded on that commitment to life and dignity, and which justify – in these extreme circumstances – temporary restrictions on other rights, like freedom of movement and association.
tgt: "le mithethonqubo esiyibekile ibekelwe phezu kwalokho kuzinikelela empilweni nesithunzi, futhi ezithethelela – kulezi zimo ezibucayi – imikhawulo yesikhashana kwamanye amalungelo, njengokuba nelungelo lokuya lapho uthanda khona nokuba nanoma ubani ofuna ukuba naye.

src: in doing this, south africa is not unlike many other countries.
tgt: ekwenzeni lokhu, iningizimu afrika ayifani namanye amazwe.

src: an estimated onefifth of the world’s population is under quarantine or nationwide lockdown, with this number growing rapidly in response to rising infections.
tgt: inani labantu emhlabeni elilinganiselwa koyedwa kwabahlanu livalelwe ngenxa yesifo noma lisekuvalweni kwezwe, ngaleli nani elikhula ngesivinini ngenxa yokukhula kwenani labasulelekayo.

src: this includes countries with substantially larger populations than ours, like india with its 1.5 billion people.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya amazwe anenani labantu elikhulu kunelethu, njengeindia enabantu abayisigidigidi esi1.5.

src: dozens of countries have imposed curfews such as the one that is now in place here.
tgt: inqwaba yamazwe isibeke izikhathi zokubuya ekhaya njengalesi esisibekile lana.

src: limitations on movement are in place in a number of countries.
tgt: imikhawulo ekuhambeni ibekiwe emazweni amaningi.

src: in the uk and the french capital, paris, public exercise is limited to certain hours and within a certain distance of one’s home.
tgt: euk kanye nakunhlokodolobha yasefrance , eparis , ukuzivocavoca ngaphandle kunemikhawulo yamahora athile ebangeni elithile ukusuka ekhaya lomuntu.

src: containment and prevention measures similar to ours are in place in a number of countries.
tgt: izindlela zokugcina nokugwema ezifanayo nezethu zibekiwe emazweni amaningi.

src: for example, alcohol sales during lockdown have been either restricted or banned in a number of territories and by local governments, including parts of mexico, hong kong and greenland, which last month imposed a ban on alcohol sales during lockdown to limit infection but also ‘to curb violence against women and children.’there has been much public comment on government’s decision to extend the prohibition on the sale of tobacco products into level 4. a decision like this is bound to be controversial, but it is wrong to suggest that there are ministers or a president doing and saying whatever they want on this matter.
tgt: isibonelo, ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe kunemikhawulo ethile noma kumisiwe ezindaweni eziningi ngohulumeni bendawo, kubandakanya imexico , ihong kong kanye negreenland , ngenyanga edlule eyabeka ukuvalwa ukudayiswa kotshwala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe ukunciphisa ukusuleleka kodwa futhi ‘nokwehlisa udlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane nezingane.’sekube nemibono eminingi yomphakathi ngesinqumo sikahulumeni sokwelula ukuvinjelwa kokudayiswa kwemikhiqizo yogwayi esigabeni sesine.

src: on 23 april, i announced that cigarette sales would be permitted during level 4. this was based on the view of the national coronavirus command council (nccc), and which was contained in the draft framework that was published for consulation.
tgt: lokhu kwakususelwa embonweni womkhandlu kazwelonke obhekene negciwane lecorona (nccc), futhi okwakuqukethwe ohlakeni olwalungakaphasiswa olwaluchicilelelwe ukubonisana.

src: after careful consideration and discussion, the nccc reconsidered its position on tobacco.
tgt: emva kokucabangisisa okunzulu nokuxoxisana, inccc yabuye yabuyekeza isinqumo sayo egwayini.

src: as a result, the regulations ratified by cabinet and announced by minister nkosazana dlaminizuma on 29 april extended the prohibition.
tgt: yingakho ke, imithethonqubo eyavunyelwa yikhabhinethi neyamenyezelwa ngungqongqoshe unkosazana dlaminizuma mhla zingama29 kumbasa yelula ukuvalwa kogwayi.

src: this was a collective decision and the public statements by both myself and the minister were done on behalf of, and mandated by, the collective i lead.
tgt: lesi kwaba yisinqumo esathathwa ndawonye nezitatimende ezethulwa emphakathini yimina nongqongqoshe zethulwa simele, sigunyazwe, yithimba engiliholayo.

src: every regulation we have put in place has been carefully considered.
tgt: wonke umthethonqubo esiwubekile ucatshangisiswe kanzulu.

src: along the way there has been consultation with medical experts, various constituencies and different industries.
tgt: ngesikhathi senza lokho kube khona ukubonisana nongoti bezokwelapha, izifunda ezehlukene kanye nezimboni ezehlukene.

src: we have been guided by international bodies and the experience of other countries.
tgt: besiholwa izinhlangano zamazwe ngamazwe kanye nalokho amanye amazwe asedlule kukhona.

src: there is still a great deal about the epidemiology of the virus that is unknown.
tgt: kusekuningi kakhulu okumayelana nalolu bhubhane lwegciwane okungaziwa.

src: it is better to err on the side of caution than to pay the devastating price of a lapse in judgment in future.
tgt: kungcono ukuphambukela ohlangothini lokucophelela kunokuthi kusasa silahlekelwe ngokwahlulelwa.

src: while there are differing views on some of the decisions we have taken – and in some instances these have polarised opinion – government is making every effort to act in a way that advances the rights to life and dignity of all our people.
tgt: ngesikhathi kusenokwehluka kwemibono kwezinye zezinqumo esizithathile – kwesinye isikhathi lokhu kunombono owehlukanisa abantu – uhulumeni wenza yonke imizamo ukukwenza ngendlela ezokwenza ngcono amalungelo empilo nesithunzi sabobonke abantu bakithi.

src: listening to our people and their concerns during this period has been one of the distinguishing features of how we as government have managed this pandemic.
tgt: ekulaleleni abantu bakithi nokukhathazeka kwabo ngalesi sikhathi kube ngeye yezinto ezehlukile esinazo zokuthi uhulumeni ululawule kanjani lolu bhubhane.

src: we continue to listen to the concerns of our people and are prepared to make adjustments that balance people’s concerns about the challenges they face with the need to save lives.
tgt: siyaqhubeka ukulalela ukukhathazeka kwabantu bakithi futhi sizimisele ukwenza izinguquko ezizohambisana nokukhathazeka kwabantu ngezingqinamba abahlangabezana nazo nesidingo sokuphephisa izimpilo.

src: at this difficult time, our collective energies must be focused on ensuring that health and life is preserved, that the delivery of food, water, health care, social security and social support is not disrupted.
tgt: kulesi sikhathi esinzima, amandla ethu sonke kumele siwabhekise ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ezempilo nempilo kuyagcinwa, ukuthi ukuthuthwa kokudla, amanzi, usizo lwezempilo, ukuphepha komphakathi nokwesekwa komphakathi akuphazamiseki.

src: under these extraordinary circumstances, as government, as individuals and as society we will at times make mistakes.
tgt: ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ezingajwayelekile, njengohulumeni, njengomunye nomunye nanjengomphakathi ngesinye isikhathi amaphutha sizowenza.

src: when these occur, we will correct them.
tgt: uma lokho kwenzeka, sizowalungisa.

src: but we must carry on, losing neither our nerve nor our resolve.
tgt: kodwa kumele siqhubekele phambili, singangenwa itwetwe noma singalahlekelwa ukuzimisela.

src: the situation in which we find ourselves demands courage and patience.
tgt: isimo esizithola sikuso sidinga isibindi nokubekezela.

src: step by step guide on using a facemask vukuzenzele unnamed the national department of health recommends that everyone in south africa should wear a cloth facemask (also known as a nonmedical mask) when in public.
tgt: izindlela okumele uzilandele zokusebenzisa isifonyo sobuso vukuzenzele unnamed umnyango wezempilo kazwelonke uncoma ukuthi wonke umuntu waseningi zimu afrika afake isifonyo sobuso ese nziwe ngendwangu (okungesona isifonyo sezokwelapha) uma esemphakathini.

src: commuters travelling in taxis and other forms of public transport, as well as people spending time in spaces where physical distancing is difficult to practice, are mustwear cloth facemasks.
tgt: abagibeli abahamba ngamatekisi nezinye izindlela zezokuthutha zomphakathi, kanye nabantu abachitha isikhathi ezindaweni lapho kunzima khona ukuqhelelana kwabantu, bayaphoqelelwa ukuthi bafake izifonyo zobuso ezenziwe ngendwangu.

src: the main benefit of everyone wearing a facemask is to reduce the amount of coronavirus (covid19) being coughed up by those with the infection thereby reducing its spread through droplets.
tgt: inzuzo enkulu ngokuthi abantu bonke bagqoke izifonyo zobuso ukunciphisa inani legciwane lecorona (covid19) elisatshalaliswa ngokukhwehlela yilabo asebethelelekile ngokunciphisa ukusabalala kwalo ngamathonsana.

src: since some people with the coronavirus may not have symptoms or may not know they are infected, everyone should wear a facemask.
tgt: njengoba abanye abantu asebehaqwe igciwane lecorona kungenzeka bangabi nazimpawu noma bangazazi ukuthi banegciwane, wonke umuntu kufanele afake isifonyo sobuso.

src: cloth facemask respiratory hygienecloth facemasks are recommended as part of respiratory hygiene or etiquette which also includes coughing and sneezing into a bent elbow or a tissue.
tgt: ukugcina isifonyo sobuso sihlanzekile izifonyo zobuso ezenziwe ngendwangu ziyanconywa njengengxenye yomkhuba noma inqubo yenhlanzeko kwezokuphefumula ehlanganisa ukukhwehlelela nokuthimulela endololwaneni efinyeziwe noma ephepheni lokufinya.

src: the facemask must cover the nose and mouth completely.
tgt: isifonyo sobuso kumele semboze ikhala nomlomo ngokuphelele.

src: facemasks should not be lowered when speaking, coughing or sneezing.
tgt: izifonyo zobuso akufanele zehliswe lapho umuntu ekhuluma, ekhwehlela noma ethimula.

src: it is very important that cloth masks are used correctly.
tgt: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izifonyo ezenziwe ngendwangu zisetshenziswe ngendlela efanele.

src: incorrect use might result in users putting themselves at risk of spreading covid19.
tgt: ukusetshenziswa ngendle la engalungile kungahle kuholele ekutheni labo abawafakile bazibekeengcupheni yokusabalalisa icovid19 .

src: even when you are wearing a mask you must still: wash your hands observe social distancing remember to sneeze and cough into your elbow avoid touching your eyes, nose or mouth with unclean hands.
tgt: nalapho ufake isifonyo kufanele: ugeze izandla zakho ulandele umyalelo wokuqhelelana nabantu khumbula ukuthimulela nokukhwehlelela endololwaneni yakho gwema ukuthinta ame hlo akho, ikhala noma umlomo ngezandla ezingcolile.

src: the public should not use surgical (medical) or n95 respirator masks because these are reserved for healthcare workers and other medical first responders.
tgt: umphakathi akumele usebenzise isifonyo sodokotela (sezokwelapha) noma isifonyo in95 ngoba lezo zigcinelwe abasebenzi bezempilo nabanye ababizwa kuqala ezimweni zezempilo.

src: may 2020 edition 2how to handle your cloth mask 1. only use a mask that has been washed and ironed.2.
tgt: vnhlaba 2020 ushicilelo 2 indlela yokunakekela isifonyo sakho sendwangu 1. sebenzisa isifonyo esiwashiwe saayinwa kuphela.2.

src: wash your hands before putting the mask on.3.
tgt: geza izandla zakho ngaphambi kokufaka isifonyo.3.

src: place the mask with the correct side facing your face, and ensure that it covers both your nose and mouth properly.4.
tgt: gqoka isifonyo kahle uhlangothi olufanele lubheke ebusweni bakho, futhi uqiniseke ukuthi semboza ikhala nomlomo wakho kahle.4.

src: tie the strings behind your head, or if you are using elastic bands, make sure these are tight.5.
tgt: bopha izintambo ngemuva kwekhanda lakho, noma uma usebenzisa esinamabhande elastiki, qiniseka ukuthi aboshwe aqina.5.

src: make sure it fits well.
tgt: qiniseka ukuthi sikulingana kahle.

src: move it around to get the best fit.
tgt: sinyakanyakazise ukuze sime kahle.

src: never touch the cloth part.6.
tgt: ungalokothi uthinte ingxenye yendwangu ngesandla.6.

src: once you have put on the mask, do not touch your face again until you take it off.7.
tgt: uma usufake isifonyo, unga lokothi uthinte ubuso bakho futhi kuze kube lapho usikhumula.7.

src: when you take it off, undo the ties, and carefully fold the mask inside out, hold it by the strings/elastic and place the mask in a container reserved for washing the cloth mask.8.
tgt: lapho ususikhumula, qaqa izintambo, bese usonga ngokucophelela isifonyo kusuka ngaphakathi kuya ngaphandle, usibambe ngezintambo /ngelastiki bese usifaka esitsheni esenzelwe ukuwasha isifonyo esenziwe ngendwangu.8.

src: wash your hands thoroughly and dry before do ing anything else.9.
tgt: gezisisa izandla zakho kahle bese uzisula ngaphambi kokwenza enye into.9.

src: you must have at least two cloth masks per person so you will be able to wash one and have a clean one ready for use.10.
tgt: kufanele umuntu ngamunye abe okungenani nezifonyo ezimbili ukuze ukwazi ukuthi uma uwashe esisodwa esinye sibe sihlanzekile sikwazi ukusetshenziswa.10.

src: masks should be washed with soap and hot water, rinsed thoroughly and ironed.
tgt: izifonyo kufanele ziwashwe ngensipho namanzi ashisayo, zihlanjululisiswe futhi ziayinisiswe.

src: the importance of social distancing in the battle against the highly infectious covid19, social distancing is extremely important to help curb the spread of this disease across the country.
tgt: ukubaluleka kokuqhelelana nabanye abantu kule mpi yokulwa negciwane lecovid 19 elihamba ngamandla, ukuqhelelana kwabantu kusemqoka kakhulu ukusiza ukunqanda ukusabalala kwalesi sifo ezweni lonke.

src: social distancing is about keeping a safe distance of about 2 metres from others so that you reduce the transmission of covid19.
tgt: ukuqhelelana kwabantu kuchaza ukuba buqamama ngebanga elingaba amamitha amabili kwabanye abantu ukuze kuncishiswe ukuthelelana ngecovid 19. lo mkhuba ubaluleke kakhulu ngenkathi siphakathi nalolu bhubhane lwegciwane lecorona lapho leli gciwane lisabalala lisuka komunye umuntu liye komunye umuntu ngomuntu othelelekile edlulisa amathonsana alo ngokuthimula, ukukhwehlela noma ukukhuluma.

src: our democracy will help us overcome covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed we often take our healthy and robust democracy for granted.
tgt: intando yeningi yethu izosisiza ukunqoba icovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed sihlale siyithatha kancane intando yeningi yethu enempilo nenamandla.

src: yet it is probably our greatest asset in our momentous struggle to overcome the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt: kodwa ibe kuyiyona nto esinayo kulo mzuzu esikuwo wokuzabalazela ukunqoba ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src: we have among the most politicallyengaged citizenry in the world.
tgt: sinezakhamuzi ezizib andakanyayo kwipolitiki emhlabeni.

src: a poll in 2018 by the pew research center shows south africans are strongly inclined to take political action about issues they feel most strongly about, such as health care, education, freedom of speech and corruption.
tgt: inhlolovo yangowe2018 eyenziwa ipew research center ibonisa ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika bazimisele ukuthatha isinyathelo sezepolitiki ngezindaba ezibaphethe kabi kakhulu, njengosizo lwezempilo, ezemfundo, ukukhuluma ngokukhululeka kanye nenkohlakalo.

src: the poll confirms much that we already know about ourselves.
tgt: inhlolovo iqinisekisa okuningi esesivele sikwazi ngathi.

src: we enjoy nothing more than robust engagement with our government and among ourselves on the burning issues of the day.
tgt: akukho okusithokozisa njengokuzibandakanya nohulumeni wethu naphakathi kwethu ezindabeni ezisematheni zosuku.

src: we have an active civil society ever ready to safeguard our fundamental freedoms and rights.
tgt: sinomphakathi ophapheme ohlezi ume ngomumo ukuvikela inkululeko namalungelo ethu ayisisekelo.

src: one of the triumphs of our democracy is that every south african believes the constitution protects them and that the courts are a fair and impartial arbiter of their interests.
tgt: okunye kokunqoba kwentando yeningi yethu ukuthi wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika uyakholwa ngukuthi umthethosisekelo uyabavikela nokuthi izinkantolo zinobulungiswa futhi zingumahluleli ongathathi icala obhekelele okudingwa yibona.

src: i got thinking on these matters during a recent visit to the eastern cape to assess the province’s coronavirus state of readiness.
tgt: ngicabange ngalezi zindaba ngesikhathi ngivakashele empumalanga kapa maduze nje ukuyohlola ukuzilungiselela kwesifundazwe ukubhekana negciwane lecorona.

src: i was asked by a journalist whether i was concerned at the pending litigation challenging certain provisions of the disaster management act.
tgt: ngabuzwa intatheli ukuthi ngabe ngikhathazekile yini ngombango wamacala okhona okuphosa inselele ekuhlinzekweni komthetho wokulawula kwenhlekelele.

src: this law is the basis for all the regulations promulgated under the national state of disaster we declared to combat coronavirus.
tgt: lo mthetho uyisisekelo sayo yonke imithethonqubo eyamenyezelwa ngaphansi kwesimo senhlekelele sikazwelonke eyethulwa ukulwa negciwane lecorona.

src: since the start of this crisis, a number of people have exercised their right to approach the courts.
tgt: selokhu kwaqala lolu sizi, abantu abaningi basebenzise ilungelo labo lokuya ezinkantolo.

src: the lockdown regulations were challenged in the very first week of the lockdown by a private citizen from mpumalanga who wanted an exemption from the travel prohibition to attend a funeral.
tgt: imithethonqubo yokuvalwa kwezwe yaphoselwa inselele ngeviki lokuqala ngqa lokuvalwa kwezwe yisakhamuzi sasempumalanga esasifuna ukukhululwa ekunqatshelweni ukuhamba ukuze sikwazi ukuhamba siye emngcwabeni.

src: in the seven (7) weeks that have followed, there have been legal challenges from a number of individuals, religious bodies, political parties, ngos and from business organisations against one measure or more of the lockdown provisions they were unhappy with.
tgt: emavikini ayisikhombisa alandela, sekube nezinselele zomthetho ezibuya kubantu abaningi, izinhlangano zezenkolo, amaqembu epolitiki, amangos nasezinhlanganweni zamabhizinisi ezilwisa isinyathelo noma eziningi zokuhlinzekwa kokuvalwa kwezwe abebengathokozile ngazo.

src: some have succeeded in their legal challenges and some have not.
