tgt: abanye baphumelele kulezi zinselelo zabo abanye abaphumelelanga.

src: some had approached the courts on the basis of the urgency of their cases had their urgency arguments dismissed and others have found other avenues for the relief they sought.
tgt: abanye baye ezinkantolo ngokubhekela ukuphuthuma kodaba lwabo lapho abathole impikiswano yabo ephuthumayo isichithwa enkantolo futhi abanye bathola ezinye izindlela zokukhululeka abebekufuna.

src: others have subsequently withdrawn their applications following engagement with government.
tgt: abanye bazihoxise ngokulandelana izicelo zabo kulandela ukubonisana nohulumeni.

src: while we would prefer to avoid the need for any legal action against government, we should accept that citizens who are unhappy with whatever action that government has decided on implementing have a right to approach our courts for any form of relief they seek.
tgt: ngesikhathi singancamela ukugwema isidingo sokuthathela uhulumeni izinyathelo zomthetho, kumele samukele ukuthi izakhamuzi ezingathokozile nanoma yikuphi uhulumeni anqume ukukuqalisa zinelungelo lokuya ezinkantolo ukuthola nanoma yikuphi ukukhululeka ezikufunayo.

src: this is a normal tenet of a constitutional democracy and a perfectly acceptable practice in a country founded on the rule of law.
tgt: lona ngumgomo ojwayelekile wentando yeningi yomthethosisekelo futhi kuyisenzo esamukelekile ezweni elinesisekelo sokubuswa ngomthetho.

src: we have checks and balances in place to ensure that every aspect of governance is able to withstand constitutional scrutiny.
tgt: sibeke ngomumo izinqubo ezizogwema amaphutha ukuqinisekisa ukuthi zonke izinhlaka zikahulumeni ziyakwazi ukumelana nokuhlolisiswa ngokomthethosisekelo.

src: where we are found wanting, we will be held to account by our courts and, above all, by our citizens.
tgt: lapho sitholakala khona sifuna, siyobekwa icala izinkantolo zethu futhi, ngaphezu kwakho konke, yizakhamuzi zakithi.

src: besides our courts, our chapter 9 institutions exist to advance the rights of citizens, as do the bodies tasked with oversight over the law enforcement agencies.
tgt: ngaphandle kwezinkantolo zethu, umvikeli womphakathi kanye nekhomishana eyengamele amalungelo omphakathi waseningizimu afrika bakhona ukubeka phambili amalungelo ezakhamuzi, kanjalo nezinhlangano ezijutshwe ngokubhekelela amaejensi ezomthetho.

src: as i told the journalist, every south african has a right to approach the courts and even i, as president, could never stand in the way of anybody exercising that right.
tgt: njengoba ngatshela intatheli, wonke umuntu waseningizimu afrika unelungelo lokuya ezinkantolo ngisho nami, njengomongameli, angeke ngama endleleni yanoba ubani osebenzisa lelo lungelo.

src: there has been, and will continue to be, robust and strident critique of a number of aspects of our national response to coronavirus, from the data modelling and projections, to the economic effects of the lockdown, to the regulations.
tgt: sekube, futhi kuzoqhubeka kube khona, ukugxekwa okunamandla nokushayisana ngezindlela eziningi zikazwelonke zokubhekana negciwane lecorona, kusuka ekucubunguleni imininingo nokulinganisela, kuya kwimiphumela yomnotho ngenxa yokuvalwa kwezwe, kuya kwimithethonqubo.

src: as government we have neither called for such critique to be tempered or for it to be silenced.
tgt: njengohulumeni asifuni ukuthi lokhu kugxeka kube nentukuthelo noma kuthuliswe.

src: to the contrary, criticism, where it is constructive, helps us to adapt and to move with agility in response to changing circumstances and conditions.
tgt: ngakoluhle uhlangothi, ukugxeka, ngokwakhayo, kusiza thina ukuthi sivumelane futhi siqhubeke masinyane futhi kalula ekubhekaneni nokushintsha izimeko nezimo.

src: it enriches public debate and gives us all a broader understanding of the issues at play.
tgt: kucebisa inkulumompikiswano yomphakathi futhi kusinikeza ukuqonda okusabalele ngezindaba okukhulunywa ngazo.

src: we have consistently maintained that we rely on scientific, economic and empirical data when it comes to making decisions and formulating regulations around our coronavirus response.
tgt: ngokungashintshi silokhu sithembele kulwazi lwezesayensi, lwezomnotho kanye nolwazi esiluthole ngokubona okwenzekayo uma kumele sithathe izinqumo nokusungula imithethonqubo ukuze sibhekane negciwane lecorona.

src: to the greatest extent possible under these challenging circumstances, we aim for consultation and engagement.
tgt: okukhulu kakhulu esingakwenza ngaphansi kwalezi zimo ezinzima, sihlose ukubonisana nokuxoxisana.

src: we want all south africans to be part of this national effort.
tgt: sifuna bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika babe yingxenye yalo mzamo kazwelonke.

src: the voices of ordinary citizens must continue to be heard at a time as critical as this.
tgt: imibono yezakhamuzi zakithi kumele iqhubeke ilalelwe ngesikhathi esinzima njengalesi.

src: the coronavirus pandemic and the measures we have taken to combat it have taken a heavy toll on our people.
tgt: ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona kanye nezinyathelo esizithathile ukulwa nalo sekulethe umthwalo kubantu bakithi.

src: it has caused huge disruption and hardship.
tgt: sekudale ukuphazamiseka okukhulu nobunzima.

src: although we can point to the progress we have made in delaying the transmission of the virus, there is still a long way to go.
tgt: yize singayikhomba inqubekelaphambili esesiyenzile ekubambezeleni ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane, iseyinde indlela esisazoyihamba.

src: the weeks and months ahead will be difficult and will demand much more from our people.
tgt: amaviki nezinyanga ezizayo zizoba nzima futhi zizofuna okukhulu ebantwini bakithi.

src: the pandemic will therefore continue to place an enormous strain on our society and our institutions.
tgt: ubhubhane luzoqhubeka lubeke ubunzima obukhulu emphakathini wakithi nasezikhungweni zethu.

src: even as we gradually open up the economy, the impact on people’s material conditions will be severe.
tgt: noma sivula kancane kancane umnotho, umthelela ezimweni zezinto zabantu uzoba mkhulu.

src: for as long as this is the case, the potential for conflict, discord and dissatisfaction will remain.
tgt: uma kuzobe kusasenjalo, amathuba okungqubuzana, ukungezwani nokungagculiseki kuzohlale kukhona.

src: as we navigate these turbu lent waters, our constitution is our most important guide and our most valued protection.
tgt: njengoba sisesizibeni esimanzonzo, umthethosisekelo wethu yiwona nkombandlela yethu ebalulekile futhi neyigugu lethu lokuzivikela.

src: our robust democracy provides the strength and the resilience we need to overcome this deep crisis.
tgt: intando yeningi yethu enamandla ihlinzeka amandla kanye nokuqina esikudingayo ukunqoba lolu sizi olungaka.

src: just as government appreciates that most court appli cants are motivated by the common good, so too should we recognise that the decisions taken by government are made in good faith and are meant to advance, and not to harm, the interests of south africans.
tgt: njengoba uhulumeni ekubonga ukuthi izicelo eziningi zenkantolo zigqugquzelwa okuhle okufanayo, ngakhoke nathi kumele sibone ukuthi izinqumo ezithathwa nguhulumeni zenziwa ngesihle futhi zenzelwe ukwenza ngcono, hhayi ukulimaza, izidingo zabantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: our foremost priority remains to save lives.
tgt: okuseqhulwini kunakho konke kusalokhu kungukusindisa izimpilo.

src: our every decision is informed by the need to advance the rights to life and dignity as set out in our constitution.
tgt: zonke izinqumo zethu ziholwa isidingo sokwenza ngcono amalungelo empilo nesithunzi njengoba kubekiwe kumthethosisekelo wethu.

src: we will continue to welcome different – even dissenting – viewpoints around our national coronavirus response.
tgt: sizoqhubeka samukele imibono eyehlukile ngisho nephikisayo mayelana ngendlela kazwelonke esibhekana ngayo negciwane lecorona.

src: all viewpoints aid us and help us to work better and smarter.
tgt: yonke imibono ilusizo futhi iyasisiza ukusebenza kangcono nangobuchule.

src: cigarette ban will save lives silusapho nyanda smokers who con tract the corona virus (covid19) are at risk of suffering more severe symptoms.
tgt: ukuvalwa kokuthengiswa kukagwayi kuzovikela impilo yabantu abaningi silusapho nyanda abantu ababhemayo asebesuleleke ngegciwane lecorona (icovid19) basengcupheni yokuhlaselwa izimpawu zaleli gciwane ezinobungozi kakhulu.

src: covid19 is a respiratory virus.
tgt: icovid19 iyigciwane elihambisana nenkinga yokuvaleka kokuphefumula.

src: as such, smokers are twice as likely to suffer more serious symptoms than people who have never smoked, says dr catherine egbe, a specialist scientist at the south african medical research council’s alcohol, tobacco and other drug research unit.
tgt: ngakhoke, abantu ababhemayo bangaba sengozini ephindaphindekile yezimpawu ezibucayi ukwedlula abantu abangabhemi, ngokusho kukadkt.

src: dr egbe says that smoking is known to cause many of the underlying medical conditions that have been linked to severe symptoms of covid19.
tgt: ucatherine egbe, oyinjulabuchopho kumkhandlu waseningizimu afrika wocwaningo kwezokwelashwa kophuzo oludakayo, ugwayi kanye nezinye izidakamizwa.

src: "even if smoking does not directly cause a smoker to die from covid19, it could cause this indirectly because smokers are more likely to have the diseases that could make a person die of the virus," she says.
tgt: uegbe uthi ukubhema kwaziwa njengenye yezinto ezidala izifo eziyimbelesela kanti ezinye zazo zithintana ngqo nezimpawu zecovid19.

src: in addition to this, cigarette smoking harms nearly every organ of the body and generally reduces the body’s ability to fight diseases.
tgt: okubandakanya: isifo somdlavuza isifo senhliziyo nesifo sohlangothi isifuba somoya isifo sikashukela.

src: dr egbe says that tobacco smoking produces more than 7 000 chemicals; 250 of these chemicals have been confirmed to be toxic to the human body.
tgt: "nakuba ukubhema ugwayi kungeke kube yiyona ndlela ngqo engenza lowo obhemayo ukuthi abulawe icovid19, kodwa ingadala izindlela eziseceleni njengoba ababhemayo bevame ukuba nezifo ezigcina zenza ukuthi umuntu osesuleleke ngaleli gciwane ashone," kusho yena.

src: out of these 250 chemicals, 69 are known to cause cancer.
tgt: ukwengeza kulokhu, ukubhema ugwayi kubulala inqwaba yezitho zomzimba wakho futhi ngokuvamile uma sezifile umzimba awubi namandla anele ukulwa nezifo.

src: there is no study that has been published showing tb patients’ risk but the world health organisation has warned that it is not unlikely that persons with tb will have poor treatment outcomes if they contract covid19.
tgt: uthe iziguli ezinesifo sofuba kanye neasthma zisengozini enkulu yokuthi zithole lolu bhubhane lwecovid19.

src: dr egbe says apart from the direct health implications of smoking, cigarettes are often shared among friends which can lead to faster community transmission of covid19.
tgt: "njengamanje, sekunobufakazi obuveza ukuthi abantu abanesifuba somoya basengozini yokuhlaselwa yizimpawu ezibucayi kakhulu okungabalwa ngisho nokufa uma bengasuleleka ngalolu bhubhane lwecovid19.

src: in a country with a high prevalence of hiv/aids, tb, substance abuse and alcoholism, among others, dr egbe believes that government made the right call.
tgt: uegbe uthi ngaphandle kobungozi obuza ngqo nokubhema, ugwayi uvame ukwatshelwana phakathi kwabangani kanti lokho kubhebhethekisa ukuthelelana komphakathi ngaleli gciwane.

src: sa moves to alert level 3 vukuzenzele unnamed president cyril rama phosa has announced that south africa has moved to level 3 with effect from 1 june with more sectors of the economy opening and the removal of a number of restrictions on the movement of people.
tgt: iningizimu afrika iya esigabeni sokuqapha sesithathu vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli ucyril ramaphosa uye wamemezela enku lumweni yakhe ukuthi ini ngizimu afrika seyedlulele esigabeni sesithathu ma nje nokuqale ukusebenza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangulana nemikhakha eminingi eyehlukene ivulile ukusebenza nokuxegiswa kwemikhawulo yokuhamba kwabantu.

src: addressing the nation re cently on the developments in south africa’s riskadjusted strategy to manage the spread of the coronavirus (covid19), the president says the country will have a differentiated approach to deal with areas that have far higher levels of infection and transmission.
tgt: echaza enkulumweni yakhe yakamuva mayelana nenqu bekelaphambili emaswini ange nabungozi ahleliwe okubhe kana nobhubhane lwecorona (icovid19), umongameli uthe izwe selizoba nendlela ehlukile yokubhekana ngqo nalezo zindawo ezinamazinga aphezulu okwesuleleka kanye nokusabalala kwalolu bhu bhane.

src: covid19 hotspotsthese areas have been de clared as coronavirus disease hotspots.
tgt: izindawo eziyizizinda zecovid19lezi zindawo zimenyezelwe njengezizinda zegciwane lecorona.

src: they include the following metros: city of tshwane city of johannesburg ekurhuleni ethekwini nelson mandela bay buffalo city cape town.
tgt: lezi zindawo zibandakanya la madolobha: etshwane egoli ekurhuleni ethekwini enelson mandela bay ebuffalo city ekapa.

src: other areas that have been identified as hotspots are the west coast, overberg and cape winelands district municipalities in the western cape, chris hani district in the eastern cape and ilembe district in kwazulunatal.
tgt: ezinye zezindawo ezikhonjwe njengezizinda kusewest coast, eoverberg kanye nasecape winelands nekusifunda somasipala wasesifundazweni sasentshonalanga kapa, isifunda ichris hani esi ngaphansi kwempumalanga kapa, kanye nesifunda ilembe esingaphansi kwesifundazwe sakwazulunatali.

src: a hotspot is defined as an area that has more than five infected people per every 100 000 people or where new infections are increasing at a fast pace.
tgt: indawo eyisizinda ichazwa njengendawo enabantu abathelelekile abangaphezulu kwabahlanu kubantu abayizi100 000 noma kube yileyo ndawo enezinga lokusuleleka okusha okukhuphuka ngesi vinini esikhulu.

src: to deal with the virus in these areas, government will implement intensive interventions aimed at decreasing the number of new infections.
tgt: ukuze sikwazi ukulwa naleli gciwane kulezi zindawo, uhulumeni uzoqalisa ukungenelela ngamandla nahlose ngakho ukwehlisa isibalo esisha sabantu abesulelekayo.

src: "we are putting in place enhanced measures of surveillance, infection control and management.
tgt: "sizothatha izinyathelo ezithe thuthu zokubhekisisa lezi zindawo ezinobungozi, ukulawula ukusuleleka kanye nokulandelelwa kwakho.

src: we will assign a fulltime team of experienced personnel to each hotspot," the president says.
tgt: sizothumela iqembu lochwephe she kuleso naleso sizinda," kusho umongameli.

src: this team will include epidemiologists, family practition ers, nurses, community health workers, public health experts and emergency medical services, to be supported by cuban experts.
tgt: le liqembu lizobandakanya odokotela bokwelashwa kwezifo, odokotela bezo kwelashwa komndeni, abahle ngikazi, onompilo, ongoti bezokuphathwa kwezimpilo zomphakathi kanye nabophiko lokwelashwa okuphuthumayo, elizosekwa ngongoti basecuba.

src: "we will link each hotspot to testing services, isolation facilities, quarantine facilities, treatment, hospital beds and contact tracing.
tgt: "sizoxhumanisa isizinda segciwane ngasinye nezinsizakalo zokuhlolela leli gciwane, izindawo zokuhlala wedwana, izindawo zokugonqa zalabo asebehaqekile, ukwelashwa, imibhede yasesibhedlela kanye nokuthungatha labo abake bahlangana nalowo ogulayo.

src: "should it be necessary, any part of the country could be returned to alert levels 4 or 5 if the spread of infection is not contained despite our interventions and there is a risk of our health facilities being overwhelmed," he says.
tgt: "uma ngabe kunesidingo kungenzeka ukuthi, noma yiyiphi ingxenye yezwe ibuyele esigabeni sokuqapha sesine noma sesihlanu uma ngabe ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane kungathibeki ngisho sekunge nelelwa futhi kunobungozi bokukhungatheka kwezi khungo zethu zezempilo," kusho yena.

src: the list of hotspot areas will be reviewed every two weeks depending on the progression of the virus.
tgt: uhlu lwezindawo eziyizizi nda zegciwane luzobuyekezwa njalo emva kwamaviki amabili ngokuzoya ngokubhebhetheka kwegciwane.

src: opening the economythe implementation of alert level 3 which started at the beginning of june, involved the return to operation of most sectors of the econo my, subject to observance of strict health protocols and social distancing rules.
tgt: ukuvulwa komnothoukuqaliswa ngokusemthe thweni kwesigaba sokuqapha sesithathu, nesiqale ekuqaleni kukanhlangulana, kufake phakathi ukubuyiselwa kokusebenza ngokujwayelekile kwemikhakha emini ngi yomnotho, ngokulandela imithetho eqinile yezempilo nokuziqhelelanisa nabantu.

src: more public servants have also returned to work in accordance with provisions of the occupational health and safety act and as guided by the department of public service and administration, working together with all other departments in government.
tgt: abasebenzi bakahulumeni a baningi babuyelile emsebenzini ngokuhambisana nemibande la ehambisana nokusebenza komthetho wezempilo kanye nokuphepha emsebenzini, nangokuholwa ngumnyango wezemisebenzi kahulumeni kanye nokuphathwa kwayo ngokusebenzisana neminye iminyango kahulumeni.

src: protocols and workplace plansas more sectors of the econ omy open, government will rely on social compacts with all key role players to address the key risk factors at the workplace and in the interface between employees and the public.
tgt: imithetho kanye nezinhlelo ezindaweni zokusebenzanjengoba imikhakha eminingi yomnotho ivula, uhulumeni uzothembe la kakhulu ezenzweni za bantu bomphakathi naba bambiqhaza ababalulekile ukubhekana nobungozi ezindaweni zokusebenza kanye nalapho abasebenzi behlangana nomphakathi.

src: "we will therefore be finalising a number of sector protocols and will require every company to develop a workplace plan before they reopen," he says.
tgt: "ngakhoke sizophothula imithetho eminingi yakulo mkhakha futhi sizodinga ukuba zonke izinkampani zakhe izinhlelo mayelana nokusebenza kwazo ngaphambi kokuvulwa," kusho yena.

src: according to these plans, companies will need to put in place sanitary and social distancing measures and facilities; they will need to screen workers on arrival each day, quarantine those who may be infected and make arrangements for them to be tested.
tgt: ngokwalezi zinhlelo, izinkampani kufanele zihlinzeke izibulalimagciwane kanye nokuziqhele lanisa nabantu; kumele zixilonge abasebenzi nsuku zonke uma befika, zigo nqise labo asebesulelekile ngaleli gciwane futhi zenze izinhlelo zokuba bahlolwe.

src: "they also need to assist with contact tracing if employees test positive.
tgt: "kumele ziphinde zisize ngokuthungatha labo asebehlangane nalowo osehaqwe yileli gciwane.

src: because of their vulnerability, all staff who are older than 60 years of age and those who suffer from underlying conditions such as heart disease, diabetes, chronic respiratory disease and cancer should ideally stay at home," the president says.
tgt: ngenxa yobuthakathaka babo, bonke abasebenzi abaneminyaka engaphezulu kwengama60 ubudala futhi abanezifo eziyimbelesela okunga ba isifo senhliziyo, isifo sikashukela, izifo eziphathelene nokuphefumula kanye nomdlavuza kumele bahlale ekhaya," kusho umongameli.

src: employees who can work from home should be allowed to do so.
tgt: abasebenzi abakwaziyo ukusebenzela emakhaya kumele bavunyelwe ukwenza kanjalo.

src: subject to these measures, all manufacturing, mining, construction, financial services, professional and business services, information technology, com munications, government services and media services, reopened from 1 june.
tgt: ukulandela lezi zinyathe lo, zonke izimboni ezikhi qizayo, izimayini, abakhi, abezezimali, imisebenzi ekhokhelwayo namabhi zinisi, ubuchwepheshe bamakhompyutha, abe zokuxhumana, imisebenzi kahulumeni kanye nabezindaba, baqalile ukuse benza ngokusemthethweni mhla lulunye kunhlangu lana.

src: the appropriate restart and phasing in arrangements will need to be put in place for every workplace.
tgt: amalungiselelo okuqala kahle ukusebenza ngokwezigaba kanye nokufakwa kwezinhlelo kuzokwenziwa kuzo zonke izindawo zokusebenzela.

src: "wholesale and retail trade will be fully opened, including stores, spaza shops and informal traders.
tgt: "abathengisi kanye nohwebo lwezitolo kuzovulwa ngokuphelele nakho, okubandakanya izitolo, iziphaza kanye nabathengisi basemgwaqeni.

src: ecommerce will continue to remain open.
tgt: ukuthenga ngeinthanethi kuzoqhubeka kusebenze.

src: other sectors that opened previous ly, such as agriculture and forestry, utilities, medical services, food production and manufacture of hygiene products, will remain fully opened," he says.
tgt: eminye imikhakha eyayi vele seyivuliwe, njengezoli mo kanye nezamahlathi, izinsiza ezibalulekile, usizo lokwelapha, ukukhiqizwa kokudla kanye nokukhiqizwa kwemikhiqizo ye nhlanzeko, izoqhubeka nayo isebenze," kusho yena.

src: highrisk economic activities prohibitedhighrisk economic activi ties will remain prohibited.
tgt: imisebenzi yomnotho enobungozi obuphezulu ayivumelekileimisebenzi enobungozi obuphezulu izoqhubeka nokungavumeleki.

src: these include: restaurants, bars and taverns, except for delivery or collection of food.
tgt: le mi sebenzi ibandakanya: izindawo zokuhlala phansi udle, izindawo ezithengisa nezokuphuzela utshwala, ngapha ndle uma kuhanjiswa noma kulandwe ukudla.

src: accommodation and domestic air travel, except for business travel, which will be phased in on dates to be announced.
tgt: izindawo zokuhlala kanye nezindawo zokuhamba ngezindiza zalapha ekhaya, ngaphandle uma uhamba ngomsebenzi, okuzo vunyelwa ngezinsuku ezisazomenyezelwa ngokusemthethweni.

src: conferences, events, entertainment and sporting activities.
tgt: izingqungquthela, imi cimbi, ukuzijabulisa kanye nemidlalo.

src: personal care services, including hairdressing and beauty services.
tgt: ukuzicwala, okubandakanya ukulungiswa kwezinwele kanye nemisebenzi nokuziphaqu la.

src: movement of people and sale of alcoholpeople will be able to exer cise at any time during the day, provided this is not done in groups.
tgt: ukuhamba kwabantu kanye nokuthengiswa kotshwalaabantu bazovunyelwa ukuba bakwazi ukuzivocavoca noma nini ngezikhathi zasemini, kuye ngokuthi lokho abakwenzi ngamaqembu.

src: the curfew on the movement of people will be lifted.
tgt: umthetho we washi ovimbela ukuhamba kwabantu uzosuswa.

src: "alcohol may be sold for home consumption only under strict conditions, on specified days and for limited hours.
tgt: "utshwala bungathengi swa ukuphuzelwa ekhaya ngaphansi kwemigomo eqinileyo, ngezinsuku ezithile futhi ngamahora athile.

src: announcements in this regard will be made once we have concluded discussions with the sector on the various conditions," the president says.
tgt: izimemezelo ezihambisana nalokhu zizo kwethulwa uma sekupho thulwe izingxoxo kuleyo mikhakha eyahlukene," kusho umongameli.

src: the sale of tobacco products will remain prohibited in alert level 3, due to the health risks associated with smoking.
tgt: ukuthengiswa kuka gwayi kuzoqhubeka nokungavunyelwa kulesi sigaba sokuqapha sesithathu, ngenxa yobu ngozi bempilo yabantu obuhambisana nokubhema.

src: "all gatherings will remain prohibited, except for funerals with no more than 50 people or meetings in the workplace for work purposes," he says.
tgt: "yonke imibuthano yomphakathi ayivunyelwe, ngaphandle kwemingcwabo enabantu abangadluli kuma50 noma imihlangano ezindaweni zokusebenza ngezinhloso zemisebenzi," kusho yena.

src: expect rise in infectionspresident ramaphosa says, in preparation for the expected increase in covid19 infections in the country, around 20 000 hospital beds have been, and are being, repurposed for covid19 cases, and 27 field hospitals are being built around the country.
tgt: ukulindela ukwe nyuka kwesibalo so kwesuleleka nge gciwaneumongameli uramapho sa uthi, ukulungiselela u kwenyuka kwesiba lo sabantu abaphe thwe igciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezweni, kunemibhede yasezi bhedlela eyizi20 000, futhi, ihlelelwe izigameko zeco vid19, kanye nezibhedlela zesikhashana ezingama27 esezakhiwe ezweni jikelele.

src: "a number of these hospitals are ready to receive coronavirus patients."
tgt: "ezinye zalezi zibhedlela seziqalile ukwamukela iziguli ezinegciwane lecorona."

src: the president says government appreciates the work that continues to be done by public servants, especially those in the front line in the fight against covid19.
tgt: umongameli uthi uhulumeni uyawubonga umsebenzi wezisebenzi zikahulumeni, ikakhulukazi labo abaphambili empini yokulwa nobhubhane lwecorona (icovid19).

src: "the safety of all workers, including public servants, is a matter of concern to us.
tgt: "ukuphepha kwabo bonke abasebenzi, kubandakanya izisebenzi zikahulumeni, kuyingxe nye yokukhathazeka kwethu sonke.

src: we will continue to make all efforts for the adequate provision of personal protection equipment to ensure safety for everyone while at work.
tgt: sizoqhubeka nokwenza imizamo ukuhlinzeka ngezinsiza zokuzivikela ezanele ukuze siqinisekise ukuphepha kwawo wonke umuntu ngesikhathi esemsebenzini .

src: "our priority is to reduce the opportunities for the transmission of the virus and create a safe environment for everyone," he says.
tgt: "esikubeke eqhulwini uku qala ukwehlisa amathuba okusabalala kwegciwane lecorona kanye nokwenza indawo ephephile yawo wo nke umuntu," kusho yena.

src: tips to follow to avoid being infected by the coronavirus disease.
tgt: amasu okumele uwalandele ukuze ugweme ukwesuleleka ngegciwane lecorona .

src: »stay at home as much as you can.
tgt: »hlala ekhaya ngayo yonke indlela.

src: wash the back of your hands, between the fingers and under the nails.
tgt: geza izandla zakho macala onke, phakathi neminwe kanye naphansi kwezinzipho.

src: always wash your hands with soap before you eat and after being out in public.
tgt: hlanza izandla zakho njalo ngensipho ngaphambi kokudla nasemva kokuba nabantu.

src: »cover your mouth with a tissue paper when you cough and sneeze.
tgt: »vala umlomo wakho ngethishu uma ukhwehlela futhi uthimula.

src: avoid touching your face with dirty hands at all times.
tgt: gwema ukuzithintathinta ubuso ngezandla ezingcolile ngaso sonke isikhathi.

src: »seek medical help if you feel unwell.
tgt: »thola ukwelashwa uma ungaphilanga kahle.

src: typical symptoms of covid19 include coughing, runny nose, fever and shortness of breath.
tgt: izimpawu ezijwayelekile zecovid 19 emzimbeni zibandakanya ukukhwehlela, ikhala eligxazayo, imfiva kanye nokuvaleka ukuphefumula.

src: if you are experiencing any of these symptoms, seek medical attention promptly.
tgt: uma ngabe uhlaselwa ngezinye zalezi zimpawu, thola usizo lokwelashwa ngokuphazima kweso.

src: for more information, call the national institute of communicable diseases’ 24hour hotline at 0800 029 999 or visit www.
tgt: ngeminye imininingwane ethe thuthu shayela isikhungo sezifo ezithelelanayo kuzwelonke kule nombolo esebenza ubusuku nemini ethi: 0800 029 999 noma ungene ku: www.

src: health.
tgt: health.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: let us protect and support our children vukuzenzele unnamed the international day for protection of children, which is commemorated globally on 03 june, draws attention to children's rights around the world and welfare.
tgt: asivikele siphinde sesekele abantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed usuku lomhlaba wonke lokuvike lwa kwabantwana, olugujwa emhlabeni jikelele mhla zi3 kunhlangu lana, ukuze kunakwe ama lungelo abantwana emhla beni jikelele nenhlalakahle.

src: fittingly, it is also the un global day of parents on the same day, honouring the commitment of parents and caregivers to the wellbeing of children.
tgt: ngokuqondana, kuphinde futhi ngosuku olufanayo kwaba lusuku lomhlaba lwezizwe ezihlangene lwabazali, lapho kuhloni shwa ukuzinikela kwaba zali nabanakekeli benhla lonhle yabantwana.

src: i want to thank the millions of parents, grandparents and caregivers around south africa who continue to play an important role in the formative years in the lives of our youngest citizens.
tgt: ngifuna ukubonga izigidi zabazali, ogogo nomkhulu kanye nabanakekeli kulo lonke elaseningizimu afrika abaqhubeka nokudlala indi ma ebalulekile eminyakeni yokukhula kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezisencane.

src: the encouragement, sup port and protection children receive from their parents and caregivers is essential for their future happiness and success.
tgt: inkutha zo, ukwesekwa nokuvi keleka abantwana abaku thola kubazali babo kanye nakubanakekeli kubaluleke kakhulu enjabulweni nase mpumelelweni yabo yaku sasa.

src: on 01 june the country started a new phase in its fight against the coronavirus.
tgt: mhla lu1 kunhlangulana izwe liqale isigaba esisha eku lweni negciwane lecorona.

src: many economic and social activities restarted, including a phased resumption of schooling.
tgt: imisebenzi eminingi yomnotho neyomphakathi iqalile futhi ukusebenza, okubandakanya ukuvulwa kwezikole ngokwezigaba ngezigaba.

src: we have said that we are taking a gradual approach, guided by the advice of our scientists and led by the realities on the ground and consultations with stakeholders.
tgt: sithe sizokwenza izinto ka ncane kancane, ngokuholwa umyalo wososayensi bakithi futhi siholwa ngamaqiniso esiwathola emphakathini nokubonisana nababambiqhaza.

src: in the last few weeks, as we have prepared to return to school, we have had extensive and detailed discussions with all roleplayers in the education sphere.
tgt: emavikini ambalwa adlulile, njengoba besilungiselele ukubuyela esikoleni, sibe nezingxoxo ezibanzi nezijulile nabo bonke ababambiqhaza emkhakheni wezemfundo.

src: these have guided our approach to this complex and challenging task.
tgt: lokhu kube umhlahlandlela wokuthi sizobhekana kanjani nalo msebenzi oyindida futhi ophoselana inselele.

src: several of these stakeholders – including teachers and parents – have expressed concern about the state of readiness in many schools.
tgt: iningi lalaba babambiqhaza okubandakanya othisha nabazali badlulise ukukhathazeka kwabo ngesimo sokulungela ukuvulwa kwezikole ezikoleni eziningi.

src: we have heard them, we welcome their contributions and are taking steps to address their concerns as well as proposals.
tgt: sibazwile, siyaya mukela imibono yabo futhi sithatha izinyathelo ukubhe kana nokukhathazeka kwabo kanjalo neziphakamiso zabo.

src: it is understandable that many parents and caregivers have mixed emotions at this time about the reopening of schools.
tgt: siyakuqonda ukuthi abazali nabanakekeli abaningi abazi kufanele bazizwe kanjani kulesi sikhathi ngokuvulwa kwezikole.

src: there is relief that children will be able to resume their education after a prolonged absence from classrooms and lecture halls.
tgt: kunokukhululeka ukuthi abantwana bazokwazi ukuphinde baqalise ngokufunda emva kokungabibikho isikhathi eside emagumbini nasemahholo okufunda.

src: young people are eager to be in school again and to see friends and teachers.
tgt: aba ntwana bamagange ukuba sesikoleni futhi baphinde babone abangani nothisha.

src: but there is also apprehension on the part of parents, edu cators and learners themselves.
tgt: kodwa futhi kunetwetwe kubazali, othisha nakubafundi uqobo.

src: parents want reassurance that the necessary precautions should be in place to adequately protect learners.
tgt: abazali bafuna isiqiniseko sokuthi izindlela zokuvikela ezidingekayo zizoba khona ukuze zivikele ngokwanele abafundi.

src: the safety of our youngest citizens from a health and physical perspective is not negotiable.
tgt: ukuphepha kwezakhamuzi zakithi ezisencane ngokwezempilo nangokwe siqu into engeke kuphikiswa ne ngayo.

src: as we prepare for the gradual reopening of our schools and places of higher learning, education authorities have been hard at work putting the necessary health and safety measures in place.
tgt: njengoba silungiselela ukuvulwa kancane kancane kwezikole zethu nezikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, izi phathimandla zezemfundo bezilokhu zisebenza kanzima zibeka ngomumo izinyathelo zezempilo nezokuphepha.

src: that documentation regarding standard operating procedures have been provided to all schools.
tgt: usomqulu omayelana nenqu bo yokusebenza usuhlinzekwe kuzo zonke izikole.

src: these standard operating procedures cover issues like train ing and orientation of screen ers, timetable realignment and configuring classrooms to meet social distancing requirements.
tgt: le nqubo yokusebenza ikhuluma ngokuqeqeshwa nokufundiswa kwabaxilongi, ukuhlelwa kabusha kwezikhathi zokufu nda kanye nokumiswa kabu sha kwamagumbi okufundela ukuze avumelane nezidingo zokuqhelelana.

src: we are continuing with the process of delivering personal protective equipment and ensuring the availability of water and sanitation services.
tgt: siyaqhubeka nomsebenzi wokuhambisa izinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela nokuqini sekisa ukuba khona kwamanzi nezindlu zangasese.

src: learning, once it commences, will take place under strict conditions with a correctly limited number of learners and students.
tgt: ukufu nda, uma sekuqalile, kuzokwe nzeka ngaphansi kwezimo eziqinile nenani elinomkha wulo labafundi.

src: as parents, teachers, governing bodies and government, we are in agreement that no school should reopen until all the necessary precautions are in place.
tgt: njengabazali, othisha, ama bhodi alawula ukusebenza kwezikole kanye nohulumeni, sisesivunyelwaneni sokuthi asikho isikole esizovulwa kuze kube zonke izinyathelo zokuvikela zime ngomumo.

src: there needs to be transparency about the level of preparedness of each of the schools.
tgt: kumele kungafihlwa lutho mayelana nezinga lokulungela ukuvulwa kwezikole ngasinye ngasinye.

src: everyone who is a key role player, be they a parent, a school governing body member, a teacher or a government official should be able to have the correct information about the state of preparedness of each school.
tgt: wonke umuntu obambe iqhaza, kungaba umzali, ilungu le bhodi elilawula ukusebenza kwesikole, uthisha noma u msebenzi kahulumeni kumele akwazi ukuba nolwazi oluyilo mayelana nesimo sokulungela ukuvulwa kwesikole ngasi nye.

src: it is our collective responsibility to ensure that the learning environment is safe.
tgt: kuyisibopho sethu sonke ukuqinisekisa ukuthi indawo yokufunda iphephile.

src: i want to salute parents and caregivers, in particular, for the role they have played over the last two months.
tgt: ngifuna ukubonga abazali nabanakekeli, ikakhulukazi, ngendima abayidlalile ezinya ngeni ezimbili ezedlule.

src: with schools closed, they have had to take greater daily responsibility for the education and development of their children.
tgt: nje ngoba izikole bezivalile, be kumele bazibophezele nsuku zonke emfundweni naseku thuthukisweni kwabantwana babo.

src: many parents and caregivers have had to assist learners with their schoolwork at home, no doubt gaining a keen appreciation of the hard work being done by our teachers every day.
tgt: abazali abaningi nabanakekeli bekumele basize abafundi ngomsebenzi wabo wesikole ekhaya, ngoku ngangabazi nokubonga umse benzi onzima owenziwa ngo thisha bethu nsuku zonke.

src: once the lockdown is lifted and more learners return to school, we parents should continue to play a more active role in the education of our children, whether it is through joining school governing bodies, volunteering our services at schools or other forms of assistance.
tgt: uma izwe selivuliwe nabafundi abaningi sebebuyele esikoleni, thina njengabazali kumele siqhubeke nokudlala indima ebonakalayo emfu ndweni yabantwana bethu, kungaba ngokuba ilungu lebhodi elilawula ukusebenza kwesikole, ngokuvolontiya ngemisebenzi yethu ezikoleni noma ngabe nguluphi olunye usizo.

src: parents can join in volunteering to clean schools, establishing vegetable gardens or being part of neighbourhood school safety committees.
tgt: abazali bangavolontiya ukuhlanza izikole, basungule izivande zezitshalo noma babe ingxenye yekomidi lezokuphepha kwesikole emphakathini.

src: this can turn the schools into real, meaningful "community schools".
tgt: lokhu kungaguqula izikole zibe "yizikole zomphakathi" ngempela, na ngokweqiniso.

src: though we may feel anxious and fearful as our sons and daughters leave our care, we must draw courage from the fact that every effort is being made to protect them.
tgt: noma singazizwa sikhathazekile futhi sinokwesaba nje ngoba amadodana namadoda kazi ethu ephuma ngaphansi kwesethu isandla, kumele sibe nesibindi ngokwazi ukuthi yonke imizamo yenziwa ukuze ivikele bona.

src: as parents, you have entrusted us with the welfare and safety of your children.
tgt: njengabazali, nisithembile ngenhlalakahle nokuphepha kwabantwana benu.

src: it is a responsibility we do not take lightly.
tgt: lokhu kuyisibophezelo esingasithathi kancane.

src: in the days and weeks to come, we will be closely monitoring the return to school.
tgt: kulezi zinsuku namaviki azayo, sizobe siqa phe ngokucophelela okukhulu ukuvulwa kwezikole.

src: if we follow the protocols and maintain all precautions – as parents, educators, communities and learners – we will effectively minimise the risk posed by the coronavirus.
tgt: uma silandela imithetho futhi sigcina izindlela zokuzivikela njengabazali, othisha, imiphakathi kanye nabafundi sizobehlisa ngempumele lo ubungozi begciwane lecorona.

src: sa youth are a source of inspiration and hope vukuzenzele unnamed the words of frantz fanon that ‘each generation must discover its mission’ come to mind every time i have an opportunity to speak with young south africans.
tgt: intsha yaseningizimu afrika ingumthombo wogqozi nethemba vukuzenzele unnamed amazwi kafrantz fanon athi 'isizukulwane ngasinye kumele sithole impokophelo yaso' ayangifikela njalo uma nginethuba lokukhuluma nabantu baseningizimu afrika abasebasha.

src: no matter where they live and no matter what they do, they each have a burning desire to change the world.
tgt: noma ngabe bahlala kuphi futhi noma ngabe benzani, bonke ngamunye banentshisekelo yokushintsha umhlaba.

src: while they certainly want to improve their own lives, they also want to achieve a better society and a better world.
tgt: ngesikhathi befuna ngokungangabazeki ukuthuthukisa izimpilo zabo, bafuna futhi ukuba nomphakathi ongcono kanye nomhlaba ongcono.

src: they see themselves as agents for fundamental transformation.
tgt: bazibona bengamanxusa enguquko eyisisekelo.

src: throughout history young people have been a driving force for change.
tgt: emlandweni abantu abasha bebelokhu behola ukuletha uguquko.

src: in just the last few decades, young people have waged numerous struggles against injustice, from the 1968 student uprising in paris, to the antiwar movement in the united states in the 1960s, to the anticolonial struggle in many african and asian countries, to the fight against apartheid, to the arab spring.
tgt: emashumini eminyaka embalwa edlulile, abantu abasha sebelwe izimpi eziningi zomzabalazo belwela ukungabikho kobulungiswa, kusuka ngowe1968 kumbhikisho wabafundi eparis, kuya kumkhankaso ophikisana nempi emelika ngowe1960, kuya kumzabalazo ophikisana nobuqonela emazweni amaningi aseafrika naseasia, kuya ekulweni nobandlululo, kuya kumibhikisho yokulwela inkululeko yamaarab iarab spring.

src: most recently, young people have been at the forefront of the #blacklivesmatter movement that has gained global support in the wake of the killing of george floyd in the united states.
tgt: kungekudala nje, abantu abasha bebephambili kumkhankaso we #blacklivesmatter ozuze ukwesekwa umhlaba jikelele emva kokubulawa kukageorge floyd emelika.

src: over the past few weeks, activists around the world have also been demanding the removal of symbols that glorify the barbarity and violence of the slave trade and colonialism.
tgt: emavikini ambalwa adlule, izishoshovu emhlabeni jikelele bezilokhu zifuna kususwe imifanekiso etusa ubulwane nodlame lokuhweba ngezigqila kanye nobuqonela.

src: at an oxford university demonstration recently a protestor carried a placard with the words ‘rhodes must fall’, the rallying cry of students in our own country five years ago.
tgt: embhikishweni wasenyuvesi yaseoxford muva nje umbhikishi wayephethe uqwembe olunamagama athi 'rhodes must fall", ukukhala okuhlangene kwabafundi ezweni lethu eminyakeni emihlanu eyedlule.

src: young people across the world have found common cause.
tgt: abantu abasha emhlabeni jikelele bathole isisusa esisodwa.

src: they are tearing down statues and symbols of racism, demanding the decolonisation of educational curricula, and calling for institutions to address racism and social exclusion.
tgt: babhidliza izithombe ezibaziwe nemifanekiso ecwasa ngokobuhlanga, bafuna kukhululwe ezemfundo, futhi bafuna zonke izikhungo zibhekane nokucwaswa ngokobuhlanga nangokwenhlalo.

src: and so, as we paid tribute to the generation of 1976 on 16 june 2020, we also salute the youth of postapartheid south africa, the worthy inheritors of this noble legacy.
tgt: manje, njengoba sihlonipha isizukulwane sangowe1976 mhla ziyi16 nhlangulana 2020, sithulela isigqoko intsha yaseningizimu afrika yangasemva kobandlululo, izindlalifa ezifanelwe yileli lifa elihle kangaka.

src: the mission of 1976 generation was to dismantle bantu education; that of today’s youth is to take forward the project of national reconciliation and transformation.
tgt: umsebenzi wesizukulwane sangowe1976 kwakungukushabalalisa imfundo yobandlululo; okumele intsha yanamuhla iqhubele phambili umsebenzi wokubuyisana nokwenza izinguquko ezweni.

src: in time to come it will be said that this year, 2020, marked the start of a new epoch in human history.
tgt: esikhathini esizayo kuzothiwa lo nyaka, wezi2020, kwakungukuqala kwesikhathi esisha emlandweni wabantu.

src: not only has coronavirus had a momentous impact on people’s lives and livelihoods, it has also shaken up the global social order.
tgt: igciwane lecorona aligcinanga nje ngokuthinta kanzima izimpilo zabantu kanye nokuphila, liphinde lanyakazisa ukuphila emhlabeni jikelele.

src: the manner in which the pandemic has taken hold has been a reminder of the interconnectedness of the human race and of the deep inequalities that exist between countries and within countries.
tgt: indlela ubhubhane olube yiyona lusikhumbuze ukuxhumana kwezinhlanga zabantu kanye nokungalingani okujulile okukhona phakathi kwamazwe naphakathi emazweni.

src: the pandemic presents an opportunity to ‘reset’ a world that is characterised by crass materialism, selfishness and selfabsorption not just on the part of individuals but whole societies.
tgt: lolu bhubhane lusinika ithuba 'lokulungisa kabusha' umhlaba esiwubona ngobulima bokuqhakambisa izinto ngokweqile, ubugovu kanye nokuzithiba hhayi nje kwicala lomuntu ngamunye kodwa emiphakathini yonke.

src: young people are telling us that the essential values of integrity, compassion and solidarity must be the hallmarks of the new society that will emerge, and that they are determined to be the champions of this new, better world.
tgt: abantu abasha basitshela ukuthi amagugu abalulekile obuqotho, isihawu kanye nobumbano kumele kube izimpawu zomphumela womphakathi omusha, nokuthi bazimisele ukuba ngamaqhawe alo mhlaba omusha, ongcono.

src: in the discussions i have had with young people i have said that we should never underestimate the power of an idea, because ideas can and have changed the world.
tgt: ezingxoxweni engibe nazo nabantu abasha ngithe akumele sibukele phansi amandla ombono, ngoba imibono ingashintsha futhi isishintshe umhlaba.

src: ideas have spurred human progress and they are what will enable us to chart a new path in the postcoronavirus era.
tgt: imibono isikhuthaze inqubekelaphambili yabantu futhi iyona ezokwenza sikwazi ukuphendla indlela entsha esikhathini sangemva kwegciwane lecorona.

src: these young people have turned their ideas into action.
tgt: laba bantu abasha baguqule imibono yabo yaba izenzo.

src: they have not let a lack of resources hinder them.
tgt: abavumelanga ukuntuleka kwezinsiza kubaphazamise.

src: they have carved a niche for themselves in a number of sectors from hightech to environmental sustainability.
tgt: bazitholele intuba emikhakheni eminingi kusuka ebuchwephesheni obuphezulu kuya ekugcinweni kwemvelo.

src: now more than ever we will look to the innovative and pioneering spirit of our youth to come up with solutions to the unemployment crisis that benefit them, their communities and society.
tgt: manje ukudlula ekuqaleni sizobheka umfutho wentshayakithi wokusungula nokuqamba izinto ukuza nezisombululo zosizi lokuswelakala kwemisebenzi ezizosiza bona, nemiphakathi yabo.

src: at the same time, i challenge our country’s youth to craft and design programmes that will enable us to meet our developmental goals.
tgt: ngesikhathi esifanayo, ngiphosela inselele intsha yezwe lakithi ukusungula nokuqamba izinhlelo ezizosisiza ukufezekisa amaphupho ethu okuthuthuka.

src: in 1961, revolutionary cuba sent legions of young student volunteers into the mountains and villages to construct schools, teach literacy and train new educators.
tgt: ngowe1961, icuba eguqukileyo yathumela ibutho labafundi abangamavolontiya abasebasha ezintabeni nasezigodini ukuyokwakha izikole, bafundise ukufunda nokubhala nokuqeqesha othisha abasha.

src: it is still held up as one of the most successful literacy campaigns in modern history.
tgt: namanje usathathwa njengomkhankaso oyimpumelelo kakhulu kunayo yonke emlandweni wesimanje.

src: our young people must develop social upliftment initiatives and they must lead them.
tgt: abantu bakithi abasha kumele basungule imizamo yokuthuthukiswa komphakathi futhi kumele kube yibona abayiholayo.

src: just as they took up the struggle for equality in higher education, the considerable energies of our youth must also be brought to bear to fight for equitable access to health care, for the transformation of land ownership and, most importantly, for gender justice.
tgt: njengoba benza emzabalazweni wokulwela ukulingana emfundweni ephakeme, umfutho omkhulu wentsha yakithi kumele usetshenziswe ukulwela ukufinyelela okulinganayo ekunakekelweni ngokwezempilo, ekuguquleni nakubunikazi bomhlaba futhi, okubaluleke kakhulu, ubulungiswa ngokobulili.

src: like all south africans, i have been deeply disturbed by a surge in the murder of young women at the hands of men.
tgt: njengabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika, ngiphazamiseke kakhulu ukwenyuka kwezinga lokubulawa kwabesifazane abasebancane bebulawa ngamadoda.

src: these are shocking acts of inhumanity that have no place in our society.
tgt: lezi izenzo ezithusayo zobulwane ezingenandawo emphakathini wakithi.

src: youthled civic activism, awareness raising and peer counselling are vital tools in our efforts to eradicate genderbased violence from society.
tgt: ubushoshovu obuholwa yintsha, ukuqwashisa kanye nokwelulekana kwentsha yizona zikhali zethu emizamweni yethu yokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile emphakathini.

src: at the same time, we must strengthen our justice system, ensuring that perpetrators are brought to book, bail and parole conditions are tightened and that those sentenced to life spend the rest of their lives behind bars.
tgt: ngaso lesi sikhathi, kumele siqinise uhlelo lwethu lobulungiswa, siqinisekise ukuthi izigilamkhuba ziyajeziswa, kuqiniswe imithetho yebheyili noshwele nokuthi labo asebegwetshwe udilikajele babhadla ejele impilo yabo yonke.

src: while this needs societywide action, i call on young men in particular to take up the struggle against genderbased violence.
tgt: ngesikhathi lokhu kudingaumsebenzi womphakathi wonke, ngicela amadoda ikakhulukazi asemancane ukuqala umzabalazo wokulwa nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile.

src: unless we end the war that is being waged against south african women, the dream of a new society will remain elusive.
tgt: uma singaqeda impi ebhekiswe kwabesifazane baseningizimu afrika, iphupho lomphakathi omusha lizolokhu liyize leze.

src: those of us who were part of student movements during the apartheid era are often asked what we think of the young people of today.
tgt: labo bethu ababeyingxenye yombhikisho wabafundi ngesikhathi sobandlululo sihlezi sibuzwa ukuthi sicabangani ngentsha yanamuhla.

src: there is a temptation to retreat into nostalgia about ‘the glory days’ of student politics and youth struggle, never to be replicated.
tgt: kunokulingeka okukhona kokuﬁ sa ukubuyela emuva 'ezinsukwini ezimnandi' zepolitiki yabafundi nomzabalazo wentsha, okungeke kuphinde kube khona.

src: but just as the youth of yesteryear defined their mission, today’s youth have defined theirs.
tgt: kodwa ngendlela intsha yangonyaka odlule echaze ngayo umsebenzi wayo, intsha yanamuhla iwuchazile owayo.

src: south african youth of 2020 more than meet the high standard set by their predecessors.
tgt: intsha yaseningizimu afrika yangowezi2020 iyaﬁ ka ebangeni eliphezulu elabekwa abangaphambili.

src: they are optimistic, resilient and courageous, often in the face of the harshest of circumstances.
tgt: banethemba, bayabekezela futhi banesibindi, ikakhulukazi uma bebhekene nesimo esinzima kakhulu.

src: mom with comorbidity beats covid19 silusapho nyanda insaaf mohammed says it is very important for south africans, especially those with comorbidities, to take responsibility for their health.
tgt: umama onesifo esiyimbelesela unqobe icovid19 silusapho nyanda uinsaaf mohammed uthi kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abantu baseningizimu afrika ikakhulukazi labo abanezifo eziyimbelesela bazibophezele empilweni yabo.

src: people with comorbidities – such as asthma, hypertension, chronic kidney disease and diabetes – could experi ence more severe coro navirus (covid19) symptoms, and may even die as a result of the strain the virus puts on their bodies.
tgt: abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela – njengesifuba somoya, umfutho wegazi ophakeme, izifo eziyimbelesela ezihambisana nezinso kanye nesifo sikashukela – bangahlangabezana nezimpawu zegciwane lecorona (icovid19) ezibucayi kakhulu, futhi bangafa nokufa ngenxa yengcindezi elethwa yileli gciwane emzimbeni yabo.

src: fortunately, when cape townbased occupational therapist and mother of three insaaf mohammed (40) tested positive for covid19 while ill with asthma, she was able to manage both conditions and did not become seriously ill. mohammed contracted covid19 from her husband, who works at the groote schuur hospital’s laboratory.
tgt: ngenhlanhla enkulu, ngesikhathi udokotela osebenza ekapa futhi ongumama wabantwana abathathu uinsaaf mohammed (oneminyaka engama40) uye wahlonzwa njengonegciwane lecorona (icovid19) kwelinye icala eguliswa yisifuba somoya, nokwazile ukulawula lezi zimo futhi ngaphandle kokugula okutheni.

src: mohammed’s sevenyearold son also tested positive.
tgt: umohammed usuleleke ngecovid19 eyithola kumkhwenyana wakhe, osebenza elebhu yesibhedlela igroote schuur.

src: after testing positive, all three selfisolated at home.
tgt: emva kokuhlonzwa njengezisulu zegciwane lecorona, bobathathu babe sebehlala ngabodwana khona ekhaya labo.

src: "we selfisolated in our bedroom, while my motherinlaw – who has diabetes and hypertension and thankfully didn’t contract the virus – took care of our other two children," says mohammed.
tgt: "besihleli ngasodwana emagunjini ethu okulala, ngesikhathi umamezala wami onesifo sikashukela kanye nomfutho wegazi ophakeme kuyabongeka ukuthi yena akazange wesuleleka ngaleli gciwane – unakekele laba bantwana abanye ababili," kusho umohammed.

src: according to the western cape department of health, people with hypertension, diabetes and chronic kidney disease are among the most common comorbidity sufferers of covid19.
tgt: ngokomnyango wezempilo wasentshonalanga kapa, abantu abanesifo somfutho wegazi, isifo sikashukela kanye nesifo esiyimbelesela sezinso bangabanye babantu abalinyazwa kakhulu yicovid19.

src: as of 25 may, people with the following comorbidities showed serious symptoms of covid19; hypertension, 58 percent diabetes, 56 percent chronic kidney disease, 17 percent hiv , 16 percent asthma or chronic respiratory disease, 15 percent cardiac disease, 11 percent obesity, 13 percent tb, 13 percent cancer, two percent other chronic illnesses, 16 percent.
tgt: mhla zingama25 kunhlaba, abantu abanalezi zifo ezilandelayo batshengise izimpawu ezibucayi kakhulu: isifo somfutho wegazi, amaphesenti angama58 isifo sikashukela, amaphesenti angama56 isifo esiyimbelesela sezinso, amaphesenti ayi17 isandulela ngculazi, amaphesenti ayi16 isifuba somoya noma izifo eziyimbelelsela zokuphefumula, amaphesenti ayi15 isifo senhliziyo, amaphesenti ayi11 ukukhuluphala ngokweqile, amaphesenti ayi13 isifo sofuba, amaphesenti ayi13 isifo somdlavuza, amaphesenti amabili okunye ukugula okuyimbelesela, amaphesenti ayi16.

src: mohammed says her worst fear was experiencing serious respiratory complications from covid19.
tgt: umohammed uthi ukwesaba kwakhe okukhulu kwakulele ekuhlangabezaneni nezimo ezinzima zokuphefumula ngenxa yecovid19.

src: "i experienced tiredness, coughing and tightness of the chest, which my asthma pump resolved.
tgt: "ngihlangabezane nokuhlala ngikhathele, ukukhwehlela kanye nokucinana kwesifuba, nokuye kwaxazululwa yisifutho sami sesifuba somoya.

src: my symptoms were not as severe as my husband’s, who had body aches, nausea, a tight chest, shortness of breath, blocked sinuses, thick phlegm on his chest and a fever.
tgt: izimpawu zokugula kwami bezingebucayi njengezomkhwenyana wami, obenezinhlungu umzimba wonke, ucanucanu, ukucinana kwesifuba, ukuphefumula kanzima, ukuvaleka kwamakhala, izikhwehlela esifubeni kanye nemfiva.

src: my son had a fever for three days, but recovered quite fast once he overcame his symptoms," she says.
tgt: indodana yami yabanjwa imfiva izinsuku ezintathu, kodwa iye yalulama ngokuphuthuma emva kokunqoba lezi zimpawu zakhe," kusho yena.

src: mohammed’s family had been following protocols at work and home, to avoid contracting the virus.
tgt: umndeni kamohammed ubuyilandela ngendlela yonke imithetho yenhlanzeko emsebenzini kanye nasekhaya, ukugwema ukwesulelana ngaleli gciwane.

src: "my family was understanding, caring and supportive, and brought us supper every evening, but sometimes your community can be uncaring and the harm caused on social media is scary," says mohammed.
tgt: "umndeni wami ubuqonda, uzinakekela futhi wesekana, futhi ubusilethela ukudla kwakusihlwa, kodwa kwesinye isikhathi umphakathi wakho ungekhombise ukunakekela futhi nobuhlungu obenziwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana kuyethusa," kusho umohammed.

src: the western cape department of health says that keeping hydrated and monitoring your blood glucose, blood pressure and temperature are key to managing covid19, especially for patients with comorbidities.
tgt: umnyango wezempilo wasentshonalanga kapa uthi ukuphuza amanzi ngokwanele kanye nokubheka izinga likashukela wakho egazini, umfutho wegazi kanye nokubheka izinga lokushisa iyona ndlela yokulawula icovid19, ikakhulukazi kubantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela.

src: in addition, the department advises people with comorbidities to: take medication correct ly, as prescribed by your healthcare practitioner.
tgt: ukwengeza, umnyango weluleka abantu abanezifo eziyimbelesela ukuthi: badle imithi yabo yokwelashwa ngendlela eyiyo, njengoba kusho ungoti wezokunakekelwa kwempilo.

src: wash your hands with soap and water for at least 20 seconds, before you touch any medication.
tgt: bahlanze izandla zabo ngensipho namanzi okungenani imizuzwana engama20, ngaphambi kokuba bathinte imithi.

src: do not stop taking medication unless a healthcare practitioner tells you to and never share medication with anyone.
tgt: bangalinge bayeke ukudla imithi yokwelashwa ngaphandle uma kusho ungoti wezokunakekelwa kwempilo futhi bangabelani namuntu imithi yabo.

src: try to do physical exercise for 30 minutes a day.
tgt: bazame ukuvocavoca umzimba imizuzu engama30 ngosuku.

src: the department says that people with diabetes face a higher chance of experiencing serious complications from covid19, but the risk of getting very sick is lower if one’s diabetes is well managed.
tgt: umnyango uthi abantu abanesifo sikashukela banamathuba aphezulu okuhlangabezana nezimo zokugula okuqhamuka necovid19, kodwa ubungozi bokuthi lowo muntu angagcina egula kakhulu buncane uma nje izinga lakhe likashukela lilawuleka ngendlela eyiyo.

src: "in general, people with diabetes are more likely to experience severe symptoms and complications when infected with a virus.
tgt: "ngokuvamile, abantu abanesifo sikashukela yibona abasemathubeni amaningi okuthi bahlangabezane nezimpawu ezibucayi kanye nobunzima uma besuleleke ngegciwane lecorona.

src: as diabetic individuals are at increased risk of severe covid19, ongoing social or physical distancing is recommended where possible.
tgt: njengoba abantu abanesifo sikashukela besengcupheni enkulu yezimpawu ezibucayi zecovid19, ukuziqhelelanisa kubantu kuyagqugquzelwa lapho kungenzeka khona.

src: being overweight is also a risk factor for severe covid19.
tgt: ukukhuluphala ngokweqile nakho kunobungozi bezimpawu ezibucayi zecovid19.

src: weight loss, if possible, is therefore recommended.
tgt: ukwehla emzimbeni, lapho kungenzeka khona, kuyagqugquzelwa.

src: "clean bill of healthafter being in isolation for 14 days, mohammed returned to work.
tgt: "ukuba ngumqemaneemva kokuba ehlaliswe yedwana izinsuku ezi14, umohammed wabuyela emsebenzini.

src: she says recovering from the virus changed her thought processes and perspective on life.
tgt: uthi ukwelulama kuleli gciwane kushintshe indlela acabanga ngayo futhi abona ngayo impilo.

src: "you appreciate your family and the small things in life even more.
tgt: "uwubonga kakhulu umndeni wakho kanye nezinto ezincane empilweni.

src: i want people in any working environment to take responsibility for their health and to educate their families and children, especially now that kids are back at school.
tgt: ngiyafisa sengathi abantu kunoma yiyiphi indawo yokusebenza bengathatha isibopho ngempilo yabo futhi bafundise imindeni yabo kanye nabantwana, ikakhulukazi njengoba abantwana sebebuyele esikoleni.

src: "help your child find creative ways to show affection to their friends, without going close and touching each other.
tgt: "siza umntwana wakho ukuthi athole izindlela ezintsha zokutshengisa uthando ebanganini babo, ngaphandle kokusondelana kanye nokuthintana nabo.

src: government prepares for covid19 spike allison cooper preparations for a possible increase in covid19 cases are underway with the government and the private sector building field hospitals, purchasing personal protective equipment and ensuring that south africa manufactures ventilators.
tgt: uhulumeni ulungiselela ukudlondlobala ngamandla kwecovid19 allison cooper ukulungiselela ukudlondlobala okungenzeka kwezigameko zecovid19 kuyaqhubeka njengoba uhulumeni kanye nomkhakha ozimele bakha izibhedlela zesikhashana, bethenga nezinsiza zokuzivikela futhi beqinisekisa ukuthi iningizimu afrika ikhiqiza imishini yokuphefumula.

src: south africa’s coro navirus disease (covid19) cases are expected to increase in the coming weeks and government is working hard to ensure the health sector is ready.
tgt: izigameko zesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid 19) kulindeleke ukuthi zenyuke kulamaviki ezayo futhi uhulumeni umatasa usebenza engaphumuli ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umkhakha wezempilo usesimweni esilulungele lolu bhubhane.

src: "we have been buying personal protective equipment from across the world and supporting local companies to produce them here," confirmed president cyril ramaphosa.
tgt: "besilokhu sithenga izinsiza zokuzivikela (amappe) emhlabeni jikelele futhi siqhubeka nokweseka izinkampani zalapha ekhaya ukuba nazo zikwazi ukukhiqiza lezi zinsiza zokuzivikela," kuqinisekisa umongameli ucyril ramaphosa.

src: "we have been improving the infrastructure in hospitals, setting up temporary hospitals and finding more beds for covid19 patients," he added.
tgt: "besilokhu sikhuphula izinga lengqalasizinda ezibhedlela, sihlela kahle nezibhedlela zesikhashana futhi sithola imibhede ukwengeza imibhede yeziguli esezihaqwe igciwane lecovid19 ," engeza.

src: by the beginning of june, over 27 000 public hospital beds were put aside for covid19 patients.
tgt: ekuqaleni kwenyanga kanhlangulana, ingaphezulu kwezi27 000 imibhede yezibhedlela zomphakathi esibekelwe iziguliesezihaqwe icovid19 .

src: quarantine sites and field hospitalspublic works and infrastructure minister patricia de lille said: 1 751 facilities have been marked for as proposed isolation sites, representing over 129 600 beds nationally, in all 44 districts and eight metros.
tgt: uma ngabe sekuphelile, izibhedlela zesikhashana zizoba nemibhede eyizi13 000. izindawo zokugonqa kanye nezibhedlela zesikhashanaungqongqoshe wemisebenzi yomphakathi kanye nengqalasizinda upatricia de lille uthe: izindawo eziyi1 751 ziqokelwe njengezindawo zokugcina ngabodwana labo asebehaqwe igciwane, ezizoba nemibhede engaphezulu kwezi129 600 kuzwelonke, kuzo zonke izifunda ezingama44 kanye namadolobha ayisishiyagalombili.

src: 358 facilities have been identified in the western cape, repre senting over 27 500 beds.
tgt: izindawo ezingama358 ziqokelwe isifundazwe sasentshonalanga kapa, ezizoba nemibhede engaphezulu kwezi27 500.

src: 395 facilities have been assessed by the department of health, representing 35 759 beds.
tgt: izindawo ezingama395 ziye zahlolwa ngumnyango wezempilo, ezizoba nemibhede eyizi35 759.

src: 32 hospitals in the eastern cape, 19 in kwazulunatal and 10 in mpumalanga have been identified for renewal and repair as field hospitals.
tgt: izibhedlela ezingama32 empumalanga kapa, eziyi19 kwazulunatali kanye nezili10 empumalanga sezikhonjwe njengezizovuselelwa futhi zilungiswe kabusha njengezibhedlela zesikhashana.

src: the cape town international convention centre, the biggest field hospital in the country, has 862 beds.
tgt: isikhungo icape town international convention centre, nokuyisibhedlela esikhulukazi sesikhashana ezweni, sinemibhede engama862.

src: a special tribute to our healthcare vukuzenzele unnamed the number of deaths from coronavirus recently passed the 2000 mark.
tgt: amazwi okuhlonipha abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo vukuzenzele unnamed isibalo sakamuva sabantu asebedlulile emhla beni ngenxa yegciwane lecorona sesevile kuzi2000.

src: among those who have lost their lives are healthcare workers, consummate professionals who cared for the ill, and were a support and comfort to those in hospital isolated from their families.
tgt: phakathi kwalabo abadlulile emhlabeni kubalwa nabasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo, ongoti ababenakekela abagulayo, futhi ababeseka baphinde beduduze labo abasezibhedlela beqhelelanisiwe nemindeni yabo.

src: that the men and women carrying out this most noble and sacred of duties are themselves falling ill and dying is a devastating blow.
tgt: ukugula nokudlula emhla beni kwamadoda nabantu besifazane abenza lo msebenzi ohloniphekile noyigugu kangaka kusigqeme inkamba beyibuza.

src: they are on the frontline of fighting this pandemic.
tgt: yibo abahamba phambili ekulweni nalolu bhubhane.

src: they are working under great pressure and must carry the psychological strain of knowing they are at risk of contracting the virus.
tgt: basebenza ngaphansi kwezimo ezinencindezi enkulu futhi bathwala umthwalo owukhathaza kakhulu umqondo ngokwazi ukuthi nabo basengcupheni yokutheleleka ngaleli gciwane.

src: they are the true heroes and heroines of our battle against coronavirus.
tgt: bangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi eqiniso kule mpi yethu yokulwa negciwane lecorona .

src: we salute these brave south africans who leave their homes, families and loved ones to report without fail for duty every day in clinics, hospitals and other health facilities.
tgt: sizethulela isigqoko lezi zakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezidela imizi yazo, imi ndeni kanye nabathandiweyo ziye emitholampilo, ezibhedlela nakwezinye izikhungo zezempilo mihla namalanga.

src: there they provide medical care, administrative support and other services like cleaning and catering.
tgt: lapho ezifika zihlinzeke ngemisebenzi yokunakekela ngokwezempilo, ezokusekwa ukuphathwa kwemisebenzi kanye neminye imisebenzi njengokuhlanza nokuhlinzeka ngokudla.

src: just as they perform what is their professional duty, we too have a duty to them and to their families.
tgt: njengoba zenza imisebenzi yazo ngobungcweti, nathi kumele sizitshathe kanye nemindeni yazo emahlombe ethu.

src: their health and their safety must be paramount.
tgt: impilo nokuphepha kwazo kumele kube seqhulwini.

src: we honour them and uphold them as the men and women who have demonstrated they are prepared to risk their lives so that we may live.
tgt: siyazihlonipha futhi sizihlo ma uphaphe legwalagwala njengamadoda nabantu besifazane ababonakalisa ukuthi bazimisele ukubeka impilo yabo engcupheni ukuze thina sikwazi ukuphila.

src: for them to do their herculean work they need our support as well as protection through the provision of personal protective equipment (ppe).
tgt: ukuze benze umsebenzi wabo wobuqhawe nobuqhawekazi badinga ukuthi sibeseke futhi sibavikele ngokubahlinzeka ngezinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela (amappe).

src: with the support of the solidarity fund and donations from many individual south africans, businesses, foundations and other governments, we have been able to procure personal protective equipment for these brave frontline workers.
tgt: ngokwesekwa yisikhwama sobunye nobumbano noxhaso oluvela kwizakhamuzi zaseningizimu afrika ezingabantu ngabodwana, amabhizinisi, izinhlangano kanye nabanye ohulumeni, sikwazile ukuthenga izinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela zalaba basebenzi abangamaqhawe namaqhawekazi abahamba phambili kule mpi.

src: where there have been shortages of ppe our hospitals are urgently attending to ensuring that they are available.
tgt: lapho okube nokusho da kwamappe, izibhedlela zethu ziyalulungisa lolo daba ngokuphazima kweso ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi ziyatholakala.

src: we know that access to ppe is not the only challenge our healthcare workers face.
tgt: siyazi ukuthi ukutholakala kwamappe abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo akusiyo kuphela inselele abasebenzi ababhekene nayo.

src: across the country clinics and hospitals are facing staff shortages.
tgt: ezweni lonke imitholampilo nezibhedlela zibhekene nokushoda kwabasebenzi.

src: this problem is being attended to.
tgt: le nkinga siyayilungisa.

src: to support the work that our frontline workers are performing around the country we are deploying ministers and deputy ministers to each of the districts in the country to get a line of sight of specific challenges in these districts and to work with provincial health authorities.
tgt: ukweseka umsebenzi owenziwa ngabasebenzi bethu abahamba phambili kule mpi ezweni lonke, sithume ongqongqoshe namaphini ongqongqoshe esifundeni ngasinye ezweni ukuze baye kobona izingqinamba zakulezi zifunda nokusebenzisana nezikhulu zezempilo zasezifundazweni.

src: we need to work together to safeguard the health of not just our frontline workers but the entire workforce.
tgt: sidinga ukusebenzisana uku ze sivikele ezempilo zabasebenzi abahamba phambili empini kanye nabasebenzi bonkana.

src: there has already been sterling work done by unions in educating members around infection control and prevention and hygiene.
tgt: sekunomsebenzi omkhu lu owenziwe izinyunyana ngokufundisa abasebenzi ngezindlela zokulawula ukuthelelana nokuvikela kanye nezenhlanzeko.

src: they are also supporting the work of the department of employment and labour in conducting workplace inspections to ensure health and safety protocols are in place for returning workers.
tgt: baphinde beseke nomsebenzi womnyango wezabasebenzi nezemisebenzi ekwenzeni umsebenzi wokuhlola ezindaweni zokusebenze la ukuze kuqinisekiswe ukuthi zimisiwe izinhlelo zezempilo nezokuphepha zabasebenzi ababuyela emsebenzini.

src: many of our trade unions are also providing coronavirus information to their members and employers are running awareness campaigns.
tgt: iningi lezinyunyana zethu lihlinzeka ngolwazi ngegciwane lecorona kumalungu azo futhi abase benzi baqhuba imikhankaso yokuqwashisa.

src: one of the challenges that has emerged in our country is the stigmatisation of people who have proven positive with coronavirus.
tgt: enye yezinselele eziqubuke ezweni lethu wukubekwa isihlava kwabantu abatholakale benegciwane lecorona .

src: as a society, we have a collective responsibility to stamp out the stig matisation of people infected with the coronavirus.
tgt: njengomphakathi, sisonke sinomthwalo wokuqeda isihlava esinamekwe abantu abathe leleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src: there have been disturbing reports of individuals being ostracised from their communities and of communities protesting against coronavirus patients being admitted to local hospitals and clinics.
tgt: kube nemibiko ephazamisayo ngabantu abahlukumezekile emiphakathini yabo kanye nemiphakathi ebeyibhikisha ilwa nokungeniswa kweziguli ezinegciwane lecorona ezibhedlela nasemitholampilo yasezindaweni abahlala kuzo.

src: just as we came together to promote acceptance of people living with hiv and stood firm against victimisation, we must show understanding, tolerance, kindness, empathy and compassion for those who are infected with this virus and for their families.
tgt: njengoba sahlangana sakhuthaza ukwamukelwa kwabantu abaphila nehiv futhi samelana nokuhlukunyezwa kwabo, kumele sibonakalise ukuqonda, ukwamukela, ukuba nesihawu, ukukhalisana nokuzwelana nalabo abatheleleke ngaleli gciwane kanye nemindeni yabo.

src: it is said that this stigmatisation is driven by fear of con tracting the disease and lack of understanding.
tgt: kuthiwa lokhu kunameka ngesihlava kudalwa wukwesaba ukutheleleka ngegciwane nokungaqondi.

src: the best way to overcome our instinctive fear of illness and contagion is to observe the hygiene protocols that are in place.
tgt: indlela ephuma phambili yokunqoba ukwesaba kwethu ukugula nokutheleleka wukulandela imithetho yezenhlanzeko emisiwe.

src: the fear of infection is wellfounded and real.
tgt: ukwesaba ukutheleleka kuyazwakala futhi kuyinto ekhona.

src: at the same time, we know what we have to do to protect ourselves and others.
tgt: khona manjalo, siyazi ukuthi kumele senzeni ukuze sizivikele thina uqobo kanye nabanye.

src: we know what causes the virus and what we can do to protect ourselves from becoming infected.
tgt: siyazi ukuthi yini edala igci wane nokuthi singenzani uku ze sizivikele ekuthelelekeni.

src: we know we have to maintain social distancing, to selfisolate if we have come into contact with those infected and to present to a hospital if we have symptoms.
tgt: siyazi ukuthi kumele siziqhelelani se, sigonqe uma sihlanga bezane nalabo abathelelekile nokuthi siye esibhedlela uma sinezimpawu zokugula.

src: we must continue to be guided by facts and not rumours.
tgt: kumele siqhubeke nokulandela amaqiniso hhayi okungamahlebezi.

src: the time when anyone could say they do not know anyone who is infected or affected by coronavirus has long passed.
tgt: sesadlula isikhathi lapho sasingathi akekho umuntu esimaziyo otheleleke ngegciwane lecorona .

src: now, more than ever, our friends, families, colleagues and neighbours need our empathy and support.
tgt: manje abangani bethu, nemindeni, ozakwethu kanye nomakhelwane bethu badinga ukuhawukelwa nokuthi sibazwele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we will at times find ourselves despondent and fearful as we see the numbers of people infected and dying continue to rise.
tgt: ezinsukwini, emasontweni nasezinyangeni eziseza, kuzoba nezikhathi esizozithola sixakekile futhi sesaba njengoba sibona isibalo sabantu abathelelekile nabashonayo sinyuka.

src: it may be that things have gotten worse, but we are certain that they will get better.
tgt: kungenzeka ukuthi izinto sezonakele kakhulu, kodwa sinesiqiniseko sokuthi zizoba ngcono.

src: our scientists and medical advisers told us that the rate of infections will go up as we move towards our peak.
tgt: ososayensi bethu kanye nabeluleki bezempilo basitshela ukuthi isibalo sabantu abathelelekayo sizonyuka njengoba siya esicongweni sesibalo sabathelelekayo.

src: but it will certainly come down.
tgt: kodwa sizokwehla nakanjani.

src: we pay tribute to the healthcare workers who lost their lives caring for the sick.
tgt: sihlonipha bonke abasebenzi basemkhakheni wezempilo abadlule emhlabeni ngenxa yokunakekela abagulayo.

src: young farmer receives covid19 support vukuzenzele unnamed nomagcinandile suduka (27) is growing her family’s legacy and wealth by investing in agriculture.
tgt: umlimi omncane uthola uxhaso lwecovid19 silusapho nyanda umlimi osafufusa wasempumalanga kapa ungomunye wabahlomule kuxhasomali lukahulumeni lwegciwane lecorona.

src: the o wner of 4 u and 4 me primary cooperative in mooiplaas village received support from the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development’s coronavirus (covid19) relief fund for her egg, livestock and vegetable farm.
tgt: unomagcinandile suduka (one minyaka enga ma27) okhulisa ifa lomnde ni wakhe kanye nomcebo ngokutshala izimali zakhe kwezolimo.

src: the department has awarded r1.2 billion worth of vouchers to farmers in need.
tgt: umnyango usukhiphe isi gidigidi esir1.2 samavawu sha kubalimi abawadingayo.

src: suduka says her vouchers will help her grow the egg producing side of her business.
tgt: usuduka uthi amavawusha akhe azomsiza ukukhulisa umkhiqizo wakhe wamaqanda ebhizinisini lakhe.

src: "i received three vouchers totalling r19 000. a voucher for r12 000 to buy layer egg chickens, a voucher for r6 500 to buy feed and a r500 voucher to buy medicines.
tgt: "ngithole amavawusha amathathu ayisamba esiyizir19 000. ivawusha yezir12 000 yokuthenga izinkukhu zamaqanda eziyi100, ivawusha yezir6 500 yokuthenga ukudla kwezi nkukhu kanye nevawusha yamar500 yokuthenga imithi.

src: "she started her egg production farm by feeding her family’s traditional chickens with layer grower feed, which enables them to produce eggs without mating.
tgt: "waqala ipulazi lokukhiqiza amaqanda ngokuphakela izinkukhu zomndeni wakhe ukudla kokukhulisa izinkukhu, okwenza ukuthi zikhiqize amaqanda ngaphandle kokukhwelana.

src: her chickens now produce 50 eggs a day, which she sells weekly.
tgt: izinkukhu zakhe ezingama50 manje sezikhiqiza amaqanda angama50 ngosuku, akawadayisa njalo ngeviki.

src: suduka, who also farms with 73 goats, 25 sheep and 25 cows, started farming in 2015 after obtaining a public management n6 certificate from ikhala training and vocational education and training college.
tgt: usuduka, ophinde afuye izimbuzi ezingama73, izimvu ezingama25 nezinkomo ezingama25, waqala ukuba umlimi ngonyaka wezi2015 emva kokuthola isitifiketi sezifundo zepublic manage ment sakwan6 esikhungweni semfundo ephakeme eikhala training and vocational edu cation and training college .

src: after realising that there were not a lot of job opportunities out there, she decided to take over the family’s then subsistence farm and turn it into a profitable business.
tgt: emva kokubona ukuthi awekho amathuba amaningi omsebenzi, wanquma ukutha tha ipulazi elalihlala umndeni wakhe ngaleso sikhathi waliguqula laba ibhizinisi elingenisa imali.

src: suduka says: "we grew up practising farming, so after graduating i decided to farm rather than look for a job."
tgt: usuduka uthi: "sikhule silima, ngakhoke emva kokuthola iziqu nganquma ukuthi ngilime kunokufuna umsebenzi."

src: this proved to be an inspired decision, as she has grown the number of goats and cows.
tgt: lokhu kutshengisa ukuba isinqumo esihle kakhulu, njengoba esekhulise izimbuzi nezinkomo eziningi.

src: suduka’s sixhectare vegetable farm produces maize, potatoes, peas and beans.
tgt: ipulazi likasuduka elinga mahektha ayisithupha lezitshalo likhiqiza ummbila, amazambane, uphizi nobh ontshisi.

src: building a better life vukuzenzele unnamed from humble begin nings in kwanon goma village, kwa zulunatal, 23yearold silondiwe magwaza has conquered many obstacles to reach her dream of becoming a construction manager.
tgt: ukwakha impilo engcono vukuzenzele unnamed kusukela esahlupheka esigodini sakwanongoma, kwazulu natali, usilondiwe magwaza oneminyaka engama23 ubudala osenqobe izingqinamba eziningi ukuze afezekise iphupho lakhe lokuphatha kwezokwakha.

src: growing up surrounded by poor infrastructure motivated magwaza to explore new ways to uplift her community.
tgt: ukukhula ezungezwe ingqalasizinda ebhedayo kwagqugquzela umagwaza ukuhlola izindlela ezintsha zokufukula umphakathi wakhe.

src: she is now the first member of her family to obtain a degree.
tgt: njengamanje uyilungu lokuqala ngqa emndenini wakhe elineziqu.

src: magwaza qualified at the university of the witwatersrand in 2019, obtaining an undergraduate degree in construction studies.
tgt: umagwaza ugogode enyu vesi yasewitwatersrand ngowezi2019, wathola iziqu ezifundweni zokwakha.

src: looking at all the challenges faced by my hometown, i was encouraged to do something relating to construction so that i can be one of the people to change the current state," she says.
tgt: ngokubuka zonke izingqinamba ezazibhekene nedolobha lakithi, ngagqugquzeleka ukwenza utho oluhlobene nezokwakha ukuze ngibe ngomunye wabantu abaguqula isimo leso," ubeke kanjalo.

src: obtaining her qualification was no easy feat.
tgt: ukuthola iziqu zakhe kwakungelula neze.

src: magwaza says she found it difficult to concentrate due to her constant worry about funding.
tgt: umagwaza uthi wakuthola kunzima kakhulu ukubhekana ngqo nezifundo zakhe ngenxa yokukhathazeka kwakhe ngoxhasomali lokufunda.

src: then, the municipal infrastructure support agent (misa) stepped in to assist.
tgt: kwabe, sekungenelela omele ukwesekwa ngengqalasizinda kumasipala (imisa) ukuze afake isandla.

src: "i used to stress a lot about funding as i come from a disadvantaged background.
tgt: "ngangihleli ngikhathazekile kakhulu ngoxhaso mali njengoba ngiphuma ekhaya elintulayo.

src: that was until 2018, when i received a bursary from misa.
tgt: kwaze kwaba ngunyaka wezi2018, ngesikhathi ngitholaumfundaze ophuma kumisa.

src: this helped me to complete my degree without any more stress.
tgt: lokhu kwangisiza ukuphothula iziqu zami ngaphandle kokukhathazeka okunye.

src: i had everything paid for, all i had to do was focus on my studies," she says.
tgt: yonke into yayikhokheliwe, okwakumele nje ngikwenze kwakungukubhekana ngqo nezifundo zami," ubeke kanjalo.

src: magwaza is one of hundreds of students who pass through misa’s youth development programmes each year.
tgt: umagwaza ungomunye wabafundi abangamakhulu abedlula ezinhlelweni zokuthuthukiswa kwentsha minya ka yonke.

src: the programmes provide funding and support and help students find job placements once qualified.
tgt: izinhlelo zihlinzeka ngoxhasomali nokusekela futhi lusiza abafundi ukuthi bathole imisebenzi uma sebegogodile.

src: "i was really looking forward to our graduation ceremony.
tgt: "bengiwulinde ngamehlo abomvu umgubho wethu wokuthwala iziqu.

src: it would have meant a lot considering that i was going to be the first graduate in my family.
tgt: bewuzosho lukhulu ngenxa yokuthi bengizoba ngowokuqala ngqa othwala iziqu emndenini wami.
