src: i am still hoping that we have our graduation ceremony, but this might not be possible given the coronavirus pandemic," she says.
tgt: ngisenethemba lokuthi sizoba nomcimbi wokuthwala iziqu, kodwa lokhu kungenzeka kungenzeki ngenxa yobhu bhane lwegciwane lecorona ," ubeke kanjalo.

src: the construction industry mainly consists of men.
tgt: imboni yezokwakha igcwele kakhulu amadoda.

src: "at times, women are made to feel small because their ability to bring about change is doubted.
tgt: "esikhathini esiningi, abantu besifazane benziwa bazizwe bengelutho ngenxa yokuthi ikhono labo lokuletha uguquko luyangatshazwa.

src: sometimes their voices are not heard.
tgt: ngezinye izikhathi bashaywa indiva uma bekhuluma.

src: "i still chose construction management because i believe that i have the power to change the industry and improve it where there is a need.
tgt: "ngaqhubeka ngakhetha ezokuphatha kwezokwakha ngenxa yokuthi ngikholwa ukuthi nginamandla oku guqula imboni futhi ngiyenze ngcono lapho kunesidingo.

src: i have seen women in this industry making it to top positions and having influence.
tgt: sengibone abesifazane kule mboni bekhuphukela ezikhundleni eziphezulu futhi beba nomthelela.

src: i believe that i too can make it," she says.
tgt: nami ngiyakholwa ukuthi ngingaphumelela," ubeke kanjalo.

src: misa bursaries are advertised on www.
tgt: imifundaze yakwamisa ikhangiswa ku www.

src: south africa acts to address ventilator shortage silusapho nyanda a locally developed ventilator will help patients with mild covid19 symptoms to breathe easier.
tgt: iningizimu afrika yenza umnyakazo wokubhekana nokuntuleka kwemishini yokuphefumula silusapho nyanda impi yokulwa nesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) eningizimu afrika seyiqinisiwe njengoba sibona umshini wokuphefumula wokuqala owenziwe kuleli.

src: the fight against the coronavirus disease (covid19) in south africa has been boosted with the production of the first ventilator made in the country.
tgt: umshini wokuphefumula ebizwa ngecontinuous positive airway pressure (icpap) usiza iziguli ezinezimpawu zecovid19 ezilingene zikwazi ukuphefumula kalula ngokuzihlinzeka ngomfutho olingene womoyampilo ozosiza ukugcina imigudu yomoya ivulekile.

src: the continuous positive airway pressure (cpap) ventilator helps patients with mild symptoms of covid19 to breathe easier by providing a mild level of oxygenated air pressure to keep their airways open.
tgt: umshini wokuphefumula wakhiwe ngokubambisana ngumkhandlu wocwaningo lwezesayensi nezimboni (icsir) nabalingani abaningana esebenzisana nabo kulo mkhakha futhi izosatshalaliswa ezweni lonke ezigulini ezikhombisa ukuba nengcindezi yokuphefumula esigabeni sokuqala sokutheleleka ngecovid19.

src: "the air a person normally breaths has a 23 percent concentration of oxygen.
tgt: ngokuvamile umoya ophefumulwa umuntu unamaphesenti angama23 omoya ohlanzekile.

src: the cpap ventilator can pump a higher amount of oxygen, helping a person breathe.
tgt: umshini wokuphefumula wecpap ukwazi ukumpompa izinga elingaphezulu kwalokho lomoyampilo, nokusiza umuntu akwazi imishini yokuphefumula ekhiqizwe kuleli izosiza iziguli zecovid19 ezingenamandla zikwazi ukuphefumula kangconywana.

src: the cpap pumps continuous concentrated oxygen.
tgt: ophampu becpap bampompa umoyampilo ngokuqhubekayo.

src: you can increase or decrease the amount of oxygen one is breathing in," says executive manager of csir future production: manufacturing martin sanne.
tgt: linganyuswa noma lehliswe inani lomoyampilo umuntu awuphefumulayo," kusho isikhulu esingumphathi omkhulu ecsir future production: manufacturing, umartin sanne.

src: patients using the ventilator are connected via a face mask.
tgt: iziguli ezisebenzisa umshini wokuphefumula uxhunywe kusetshenziswa isimfonyo sobuso.

src: oxygen is drawn from an oxygen gas tank and is mixed with natural air in the ventilator, from where it is transmitted to the mask and breathed in by the patient.
tgt: umoyampilo udonswa ethangini lomoyampilo oxutshwe nomoya wemvelo kumshini wokuphefumula lapho uthunyelwa khona kusimfonyo bese uphefumulwa yisiguli.

src: sanne says that in addition to pumping oxygenated air, the cpap also helps patients exhale.
tgt: usanne uthi phezu kokumpontshwa komoya onomoyampilo, icpap iphinde ilekelele iziguli zikwazi nokuwukhipha umoya.

src: the cpap device can be used in both hightech clinical environments and temporary settings, such as field hospitals and quarantine facilities.
tgt: icpap iyinsiza engasetshenziswa ezindaweni zobuchwepheshe obuseqophelweni eliphezulu iphinde ikwazi nokusetshenziswa ezikhungweni eziyizibhedlela zesikhashana nalapho kuhluswe khona abantu.

src: sanne says the csir will have produced 10 000 ventilators by the end of august.
tgt: usanne uthi icsir izobe seyikhiqize imishini yokuphefumula eyizi10 000 ekupheleni kukancwaba.

src: working with siemens, simera, akacia, gabler, umoya and the university of cape town, the csir produced the cpap according to world health organisation standards.
tgt: ngokusebenzisana nesiemens, isimera, iakacia, igabler, iumoya nenyuvesi yasekapa, icsir ikhiqize icpap ngokwamazinga abekwe yinhlangano yezempilo yomhlaba.

src: the first batch of ventilators will be given to state hospitals experiencing pressure due to the unavailability of equipment to deal with covid19.
tgt: iqoqo lokuqala lemishini yokuphefumula lizonikezwa izibhedlela zikahulumeni ezibhekene nengcindezi ngenxa yokuntuleka kwezinsizakusebenza nemishini ekwazi ukulwa necovid19.

src: the csir started working on the cpap after the world began experiencing an extreme shortage in ventilators.
tgt: icsir yaqala ukwakha icpap emuva kokuba umhlaba uqale ukubhekana nokuntuleka okukhulu kwemishini yokuphefumula.

src: help stop the spread of covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed our nation is con fronted by the gravest crisis in the history of our democracy.
tgt: siza ukunqanda ukusabalala kwecovid19 vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu libhekene nensambatheka engakaze ibonwe emlandweni wethu wonke wentandoyeningi labantu.

src: for more than 120 days, we have succeeded in delaying the spread of a virus that is causing devastation across the globe.
tgt: ezinsukwini ezingaphezu kweziyi120, sesiphumelele ukukulibazisa nokho ukudlondlobala kwaleli gciwane eselidale umonakalo omkhulu emhlabenijikelele.

src: but now, the surge in infections that we had been advised by our medical experts would come, has arrived.
tgt: kodwa manje, ukudlondlobala kwesibalo sabantu abanegciwane esasitshelwe ngako yizazi zezempilo, sekuphezu kwethu.

src: more than a quarter of a million south africans have been infected with coronavirus, and we know that many more infections have gone undetected.
tgt: abantu baseningizimu afrika abangaphezu kwekota lesigidi sebetheleleke ngegciwane lecorona, futhi siyazi ukuthi baningi abanye abatheleleke ngalo leli gciwane kodwa abangabonakali.

src: we are now recording over 12,000 new cases every day.
tgt: njengamanje njalo ngosuku sithola abantu abangaphezu kwezi12,000 abanaleli gciwane.

src: since the start of the outbreak in march, at least 4,079 people have died from covid19.
tgt: kusukela ekuqaleni kwalo mbhedukazwe ngondasa, okungenani abantu abayizi4,079 sebebulewe yigciwane lecovid19.

src: like the massive cold fronts that sweep into our country from the south atlantic at this time of year, there are few parts of the country that will remain untouched by the coronavirus.
tgt: njengoba izingxenye ezithile zezwe lethu zihlaselwe isimo sezulu esiletha amakhaza ashubisa umnkantsha eqhamuka ngasolwandle lweantilathikhi kulesi sikhathi sonyaka, kunezinye izingxenye ezimbalwa zezwe ezingeke zichaphazelwe yileli gciwane lecorona.

src: the coronavirus storm is far fiercer and more destructive than any we have known before.
tgt: isichotho secorona sinamandla amakhulu futhi senza umonakalo ongaphezu kweminye esake sayibona ngaphambilini.

src: it is stretching our resources and our resolve to their limits.
tgt: lokhu kuyaziqeda izinsizakalo zethu kanjalo namandla ethu okuphikelela aya ngokuya esiphelela.

src: the surge of infections that our experts and scientists predicted over 3 months ago has now arrived.
tgt: ukudlondlobala kwamanani abantu abatheleleke ngegciwane ososayensi ababesixwayise ngako esikhathini sezinyanga ezingaphezu kwezi3 ezidlule sekusificile.

src: it started in the western cape and is now underway in the eastern cape and gauteng.
tgt: kwaqala entshonalanga kapa kanti kuyaqhubeka empumalanga kapa nasegauteng.

src: yet, while infections rise exponentially, it is important to note that our case fatality rate of 1.5 percent is among the lowest in the world.
tgt: yize noma, izibalo zabantu abatheleleke ngegciwane zikhula ngamandla, kusemqoka ukuqaphela ukuthi izinga lokudlula kwabantu emhlabeni eliyiphesenti eyi1.5 lingelinye laphansi kakhulu emhlabeni.

src: this is compared to a global average case fatality rate of 4.4 percent.
tgt: lokhu kuqhathaniswa nezinga lokudlula kwabantu emhlabeni elingamaphesenti ayi4.4.

src: we owe the relatively low number of deaths in our country to the experience and dedication of our health professionals and the urgent measures we have taken to build the capacity of our health system.
tgt: ukuba kwethu nezibalo eziphansi zabantu abadlulayo emhlabeni kungenxa yesipiliyoni nokuzinikela kwabasebenzi bethu bezempilo kanjalo nezinyathelo ezathathwa ngokushesha esasisophe ngazo ukulungiselela umkhakha wethu wezempilo uma sekwehla le nhlekelele futhi sizihlomise ngezinsiza esizidingayo.

src: even as most of our people have taken action to prevent the spread of the virus, there are others who have not.
tgt: nakuba abantu bethu abaningi benze imizamo yokuvikela igciwane, bakhona abanye abangazange bazihluphe.

src: there are some among us who ignore the regulations that have been passed to combat the disease.
tgt: bakhona abanye phakathi kwethu abangazigqizi qakala izimiso nemithetho ebekiwe ukuze sizame ukuqeda lesi sifo.

src: in the midst of such a pandemic, getting into a taxi without a face mask, gathering to meet friends, attending parties or even visiting family, can too easily spread the virus and cost lives.
tgt: phakathi kwalolu bhubhane olunje, ukugibela nje itekisi ngaphandle kwesimfonyo sobuso ukuhlangana njengabangani, ukuhamba imicimbi yobumnandi noma ukuvakashela umndeni, kungasabalalisa igciwane kalula kusimuke izimpilo zabantu.

src: this may be a disease that is caused by a virus, but it is spread by human conduct and behaviour.
tgt: lesi kungaba yisifo esibangwa yigciwane, kodwa sisatshalaliswa yindlela abantu abaziphatha nabaphila ngayo.

src: through our own actions – as individuals, as families, as communities – we can and we must change the course of this pandemic in our country.
tgt: ngezenzo zethu – njengabantu ngabodwana, njengemindeni, nemiphakathi – singakwazi futhi kumele siguqule isivinini ohamba ngaso lo mbulalazwe ezweni lethu.

src: we need to wear a cloth mask that covers our nose and mouth whenever we leave home.
tgt: kufanele sifake isimfonyo sobuso sendwangu esimboza ikhala nomlomo njalo lapho siphuma emakhaya ethu.

src: we must continue to regularly wash our hands with soap and water or sanitiser.
tgt: kufanele siqhubeke nokugeza izandla zethu njalonjalo ngensipho namanzi noma ngesibulalimagciwane.

src: we must continue to clean and sanitise all surfaces in all public spaces.
tgt: kufanele siqhubeke nokuhlanza zonke izindawo ezisobala ezindaweni ezisetshenziswa abantu abaningi.

src: most importantly, we must keep a safe distance – of at least 2 metres – from other people.
tgt: okubaluleke kakhulu, kufanele sigcine kunegebe eliphephile phakathi kwethu nabanye abantu – okungenani ibanga elingamamitha amabili – kwabanye abantu.

src: there is now emerging evidence that the virus may also be carried in tiny particles in the air in places that are crowded, closed or have poor air circulation.
tgt: manje sekunobufakazi obuvelayo bokuthi leli gciwane lingase futhi lisabalale nangezinhlayiya ezincane ezihamba emoyeni ezindaweni ezinezixuku zabantu, ezivalekile noma ezingakhiphi umoya ngendlela efanele.

src: for this reason we must immediately improve the indoor environment of public places where the risk of infection is greatest.
tgt: ngenxa yalesi sizathu kufanele siphangise ukuphucula isimo sangaphakathi sezindawo ezisetshenziswa umphakathi lapho ubungozi bokutheleleka bubukhulu kakhulu khona.

src: our decision to declare a nationwide lockdown prevented a massive early surge of infections when our health services were less prepared, which would have resulted in a far greater loss of lives.
tgt: isinqumo sethu sokumemezela ukuvalwa kwezwe lonke savikela ukuqubuka ngamandla kwesifo ngenkathi umkhakha wethu wezempilo ungakalungiselelwa, nobekungaholela ekudluleni kwabantu abaningi emhlabeni.

src: in the time that we had, we have taken important measures to strengthen our health response.
tgt: ngesikhathi ebesinaso, sithathe izinyathelo ezibalulekile zokuhlomisa umkhakha wethu wezempilo ukuze ukwazi ukubhekana nalolu bhubhane.

src: we have conducted more than two million coronavirus tests and community health workers have done more than 20 million screenings.
tgt: sesenze ukuhlolwa kwegciwane lecorona okungaphezu kwezigidi ezimbili kanti abasebenzi bezempilo bomphakathi sebenze ukuhlungwa kweziguli okungaphezu kwezigidi ezingama20.

src: we have made available almost 28,000 hospital beds for covid19 patients and have constructed functional field hospitals across the country.
tgt: sithole imibhede yezibhedlela ebalelwa kweziyi28,000 yeziguli zecovid19 futhi sesakhe ngempumelelo izibhedlela zesikhashana ezweni lonkana.

src: we now have over 37,000 quarantine beds in private and public facilities across the country, ready to isolate those who cannot do so at home.
tgt: njengamanje sinemibhede engaphezu kweziyi37,000 ezikhungweni zokugonqisa abantu embonini yezempilo ezimele neyomphakathi, elungele ukwamukela abantu abangakwazi ukuhlala ngabodwana emakhaya.

src: we have procured and delivered millions of items of personal protective equipment to hospitals, clinics and schools across the country to protect our frontline workers.
tgt: sithole futhi sathumela izimpahla eziyizigidi eziyizinsiza zokuzivikela ezibhedlela, emitholampilo nasezikoleni ezweni lonke ukuze sivikele abasebenzi bethu abangamabutho ayibambe ophondweni.

src: we have recruited and continue to recruit additional nurses, doctors and emergency health personnel.
tgt: siqashe futhi siyaqhubeka nokuqasha abahlengikazi abengeziwe, odokotela nabasebenzi abasebenza ophikweni lwezimo eziphuthumayo.

src: we continue to make progress in our efforts to deal with covid 19, but our greatest challenge still lies ahead.
tgt: siyaqhubeka nokwenza inqubekelaphambili emizamweni yethu yokubhekana necovid19, kepha inselele yethu enkulu isasimele ngaphambili.

src: across all provinces, we are working to further increase the number of general ward and critical beds available for covid19 patients.
tgt: kuzo zonke izifundazwe, sisebenzela ukwandisa isibalo samagumbi ezimo ezijwayelekile kanye nemibhede yeziguli zecovid19 ezisesimweni esibucayi.

src: ward capacity is being freed up in a number of hospitals by delaying nonurgent care, the conversion of some areas of hospitals into additional ward space and the erection or expansion of field hospitals.
tgt: umthamo omumathwa yigumbi lasesibhedlela uyandiswa ezibhedlela eziningi ngokubambezela ukunakekelwa kweziguli ezingadingi usizo oluphuthumayo, ukuguqulwa kwezinye izindawo zasezibhedlela zibe amawadi engeziwe kanjalo nokwakhiwa noma ukunwetshwa kwezibhedlela zesikhashana.

src: we are working to increase supplies of oxygen, ventilators and other equipment for those who will need critical care, including by diverting the supply of oxygen from other purposes.
tgt: sisebenzela ukwandisa izinsiza zokuhlinzeka ngomoyampilo, imishini yokuphefumula neminye imishini kulabo abadinga ukunakekelwa okubucayi, kubandakanya ukuphambukisa usizo ngomoyampilo kwezinye izindawo ubhekiswe ezigulini zecovid19.

src: we are deploying digital technologies to strengthen the identification, tracing and isolation of contacts, and to provide support to those who test positive.
tgt: sisebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bedijithali ukuqinisa ukuhlonzwa, ukuthungathwa kanye nokuhlaliswa ngabodwana kwabantu abake bahlangana nabantu abanegciwane, kanjalo nokuhlinzeka ngokwesekwa kulabo abathola imiphumela ebika ukuthi banalo igciwane.

src: as we now approach the peak of infections, we need to take extra precautions and tighten existing measures to slow down the rate of transmission.
tgt: njengoba manje sesisondele kuvuthondaba lokutheleleka kwabantu ngaleli gciwane, sidinga ukucophelela kakhulu ekulandeleni izinyathelo zokuphepha futhi siqinise izinyathelo ezikhona ukuze sehlisa izinga lokuthelelana ngegciwane.

src: regulations on the wearing of masks will be strengthened.
tgt: izimiso ezibekiwe mayelana nokufakwa kwezimfonyo zizoqiniswa.

src: employers, shop owners and managers, public transport operators, and managers and owners of any other public building are now legally obliged to ensure that anyone entering their premises or vehicle must be wearing a mask.
tgt: abaqashi, abaninizitolo nabaphathi, abasebenza ngezithuthi zomphakathi, nabaphathi kanye nabanikazi banoma yisiphi isakhiwo somphakathi manje baphoqelekile ngokomthetho ukuthi baqinisekise ukuthi noma ngubani ongena emagcekeni abo noma ezimotweni zabo ungena efake isimfonyo.

src: taxis undertaking local trips will now be permitted to increase their capacity to 100 percent, while long distance taxis will not be allowed to exceed 70 percent occupancy, on condition that new risk mitigation protocols related to masks, vehicle sanitising and open windows are followed.
tgt: amatekisi athatha uhambo endaweni manje azovunyelwa ukuthi enyuse isibalo sabagibeli bagcwale itekisi, kanti lapho abathatha uhambo lwamabanga amade ngeke bavunyelwe ukuthatha isibalo esevile kumaphesenti angama70, futhi inqobo uma kulandelwe imigomo emisha yokunciphisa ubungozi ehlobene nezimfonyo, ukuhlanzwa kwetekisi ngezibulalimagciwane kanye nokuvulwa kwamafasitela.

src: there is now clear evidence that the resumption of alcohol sales has resulted in substantial pressure being put on hospitals, including trauma and icu units, due to motor vehicle accidents, violence and related trauma.
tgt: sekunobufakazi obucacile bokuthi ukuvulwa kabusha kokuthengiswa kotshwala kulethe ingcindezi enkulu ezibhedlela, kubandakanya amayunithi ezinhlekelele nalawo abagula kakhulu, ngenxa yezingozi zezimoto, udlame kanye nokulimala okuhlobene notshwala.

src: we have therefore decided that in order to conserve hospital capacity, the sale, dispensing and distribution of alcohol will be suspended with immediate effect.
tgt: ngakhoke sinqume ukuthi ukuze sigcine isibalo sabangeniswa ezibhedlela silawuleka, ukudayiswa, ukukhishwa nokusatshalaliswa kotshwala kuzomiswa kusuka manje.

src: as an additional measure to reduce the pressure on hospitals, a curfew will be put in place between the hours of 9pm and 4am.
tgt: njengesinyathelo esengeziwe sokunciphisa ingcindezi ezibhedlela, kuzobekwa umnqamulajuqu wesikhathi okuvunyelwe ngaso ukuba ngaphandle kwamakhaya phakathi kwehora lesi9 ebusuku nehora lesi4 ekuseni.

src: we are taking these measures fully aware that they impose unwelcome restrictions on people’s lives.
tgt: sithatha lezi zinyathelo sazi kamhlophe ukuthi zibeka imingcele engathandeki ezimpilweni zabantu.

src: they are, however, necessary to see us through the peak of the disease.
tgt: kodwake, ziyadingeka, ukuze sikwazi ukuphepha kulesi sikhathi esiwuvuthondaba lwalolu bhubhane.

src: there is no way that we can avoid the coronavirus storm.
tgt: asikwazi ukusigwema lesi sivunguvungu segciwane lecorona.

src: but we can limit the damage that it can cause to our lives.
tgt: kodwa singawubeka umkhawulo esingawudala ezimpilweni zethu.

src: as a nation we have come together to support each other, to provide comfort to those who are ill and to promote acceptance of people living with the virus.
tgt: njengesizwe sihlangane ndawonye ukuze selekelelane, siduduze labo abagulayo futhi sikhuthaze ukwamukelwa kwabantu abaphila naleli gciwane.

src: now, more than ever, we are responsible for the lives of those around us.
tgt: manje kakhulu kunakuqala, kusezandleni zethu ukusindisa izimpilo zalabo esiphila nabo.

src: crew juliet firefighter shares her story dale hes young firefighter vuyiseka arendse (26) is part of crew juliet, south africa’s first allfemale wildland firefighting team.
tgt: ilunga lethimba lezicishamlilo icrew juliet lisixoxela udaba lwalo dale hes abesifazane kufanele babe ngamavulandlela, kusho isicishamlilo uvuyiseka arendse oyisicishamlilo esisesincane (26) uyingxenye yecrew juliet, ithimba lokuqala lezicishamlilo zasendle ezingabesifazane zonke.

src: her strength and determination to make a name for herself in the maledominated world of firefighting is a true inspiration to all women.
tgt: amandla nokuzimisela kwakhe ukuba azakhele igama emkhakheni wezicishamlilo, ngokuvamile obuswa abesilisa, kumenza abe yisibonelo esihle kubo bonke abesifazane.

src: arendse grew up in the small western cape town of beaufort west.
tgt: uarendse wakhulela edolobhaneni lasentshonalanga kapa elincanyana ibeaufort west.

src: after school, she tried studying at a college in oudtshoorn, but decided to move back home to support her family.
tgt: emuva kokuphothula esikoleni, wazama ukuqeqeshwa ekolishi laseoudtshoorn, kodwa wabuye wanquma ukubuyela ekhaya ukuze akwazi ukweseka umndeni wakhe.

src: she worked at a supermarket for a while, but then firefighting caught her eye.
tgt: wake wasebenza esuphamakethe yendawo isikhashana, kodwa umsebenzi wokuba yisicishamlilo wamkhanga.

src: "i saw the firefighters in their uniforms and the big red trucks.
tgt: "ngabona izicishamlilo zidlubhe umfaniswano wazo, zihamba ngamaloli akhona abomvu namakhulukazi.

src: i immediately became interested and wanted to find out more," says arendse.
tgt: ngaleso sikhathi ngaqala ukuba nentshisekelo futhi ngafuna ukwazi kabanzi ngalo msebenzi," kusho uarendse.

src: arendse was one of the graduates of the western cape government’s chrysalis academy youth development programme in 2016. after the programme, she worked at the fire station in beaufort west, earning only r1 900 per month.
tgt: uarendse wayengomunye wababephothule izifundo zabo esikhungweni sikahulumeni wasentshonalanga kapa sohlelo lokuthuthukisa intsha, ichrysalis academy ngowezi2016.

src: but then she came across an opportunity offered by ncc environmental services last year.
tgt: kodwa wazithela phezu kwethuba elalihlinzekwa yincc environmental services ngonyaka ofile.

src: "i was at chrysalis academy as a facilitator when ncc came to talk to the students about the opportunity to apply for training for the first allfemale wildland firefighting team.
tgt: "ngangisasebenza echrysalis academy njengomdidiyeli ngenkathi abakwancc befika esikhungweni bezotshela abafundi ngethuba lokufaka isicelo sokuqeqeshelwa ukuba sethimbeni lokuqala ngqa lezicishamlilo zesifazane zodwa zokucishwa kwemililo yasendle.

src: even though i was not one of the students, i was very interested and applied for the training, and i was accepted," arendse says.
tgt: yize noma ngangingesona isitshudeni, nganginentshisekelo enkulu ngakho ngafaka isicelo sokuqeqeshwa, isicelo sami semukelwa," kuqhuba uarendse.

src: arendse went through the training, which combined theory and practical aspects of firefighting.
tgt: uarendse wathola ukuqeqeshwa, okwakudidiyele ithiyori yokucishwa komlilo kanjalo nokwenziwa komsebenzi wokucishwa komlilo ngqo.

src: "i learnt so much.
tgt: "ngafunda okuningi kakhulu.

src: for one, i didn’t know that there were firefighters tasked with putting out wildfires.
tgt: okokuqala nje, ngangingazi ukuthi kunezicishamlilo omsebenzi wazo ukubhekana namaqubula omlilo wasendle nje kuphela.

src: i had previously thought they only worked in towns to put out fires in buildings," she says.
tgt: ngangicabanga ukuthi zazisebenza ukucisha imililo emadolobheni ukuze zicishe imililo emabhilidini ashayo," kusho yena.

src: arendse adds that it was an amazing feeling to pass the training and become part of the first allfemale firefighting team of its kind.
tgt: uarendse wengeze ngokuthi kwakuwumuzwa omnandi kakhulu ukuphumelela ukuqeqeshwa kwakhe, waba yingxenye yethimba lokuqala ngqa lezicishamlilo ezingabesifazane bodwa.

src: "i felt very excited, especially because when i had told people i wanted to be a firefighter, many of them said i could not do it because i am a woman and would not cope with the job.
tgt: "nganginentokozo enkulu, ikakhulukazi ngoba ngangithi uma ngixoxela abantu ukuthi ngifuna ukuba yisicishamlilo, iningi labo lingitshele ukuthi ngeke kwenzeke lokho ngoba njengomuntu wesifazane ngangingeke ngikwazi ukumelana nalo msebenzi.

src: this pushed me to show them that i can actually do it, not only for myself but for the rest of the women in south africa.
tgt: lokhu kwanginika umfutho omkhulu ukuze ngibakhombise ukuthi ngempela ngangikwazi ukukwenza lokhu, ngingazenzeli mina nje kuphela kodwa ngenzele nabo bonke abanye besifazane eningizimu afrika.

src: "arendse says that fighting her first major fire in noordhoek was a challenging but highly rewarding experience.
tgt: "uarendse uthi umsebenzi wakhe omkhulu wokuqala wokucisha umlilo enoordhoek wawuyinselele enkulu kodwa ekugcineni uwubala njengowawuyinzuzo nomklomelo omkhulu.

src: "it was my first full 24hour shift and the first time we were working with all the other male firefighters.
tgt: "kwakuyishifti yami yokuqala ephelele yamahora angama24 futhi kwakuyisikhathi sokuqala lapho sasisebenza njengethimba lezicishamlilo kanye namadoda.

src: it was tiring and very hot in our protective gear but we finished the job and the feeling afterwards was very rewarding.
tgt: kwakukhathaza futhi kushisa kakhulu njengoba sasifake izimpahla zethu zokuzivikela kodwa sakwazi ukuwuqeda umsebenzi futhi nomuzwa owalandela lapho wawumnandi kakhulu unjengomhlomulo wokunqoba.

src: "arendse encourages the women of south africa to never underestimate themselves.
tgt: "uarendse ukhuthaza abesifazane baseningizimu afrika ukuba bangalokothi bazibukele phansi.

src: "don’t be defined by what people say you can and can’t do."
tgt: "ungatshelwa abantu ukuthi yini onamandla okuyenza naleyo ongenamandla okuyenza."

src: celebrating women through economic inclusion vukuzenzele unnamed in august south africa celebrates women’s month.
tgt: ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ukubungazwa kwabesifazane ngokubabandakanya kwezomnothongokubabandakanya kwezomnotho vukuzenzele unnamed ngoncwaba iningizi mu afrika ibungaza inyanga yabesifazane.

src: this occasion marks the anniversary of the day in 1956 when 20,000 women marched to the union buildings – a great sea of womankind speaking many languages, from different places and of all races.
tgt: lo mgubho uyisikhumbuzo sosuku enyakeni we1956 lapho abesifazane abayizi20 000 bamashela ezindlini zombuso – isixuku sabesifazane abakhuluma izilimi eziningi, abaphuma ezindaweni ezehlukene futhi babobonke ubuhlanga.

src: they were united in their demand for an end to the dreaded pass laws and for their right to live in freedom.
tgt: babebumbene ezimfunweni zabo zokuqedwa nya kwemithetho emibi yokuphathwa kwamapasi kanye nelungelo labo lokuphila ngenkululeko.

src: the status and position of women in south africa today is vastly different to that faced by our mothers and grandmothers in 1956. we have come a long way in realising a south africa that is nonracial, nonsexist, democratic, prosperous and free.
tgt: isimo nalapho abesifazane eni ngizimu afrika abakhona namuhla sehluke kakhulu kunaleso esasibhekene nomama kanye nogogo bethu ngowe1956.

src: there has been real progress in improving the lives of south african women in the economy, in the political sphere and in public life.
tgt: sesibuya kude kakhulu ukuze sifinyelele kwiningizimu afrika engenabuhlanga, engenabulili, yentando yeningi, ephumelelayo futhi ekhululekile.

src: at the same time, we know there is so much further we still have to go.
tgt: ngaso leso sikhathi, siyazi ukuthi kusekuningi okusamele sikwenze.

src: women still face discrimination, harassment and violence, and bear the greatest brunt of poverty.
tgt: abesifazane basabhekana nokucwaswa, ukuhlukunyezwa kanye nodlame, futhi babhekane ngqo nobumpofu.

src: if we are to truly realise the promise of our constitution we have to tackle the economic and financial exclusion that makes women more vulnerable to abuse and violence.
tgt: uma sizosifeza ngempela isithembiso somthethosisekelo wethu kumele sibhekane nokubekwa eceleni kwezomnotho nasezimalini okwenza abesifazane babe buthaka kakhulu ekuhlukunyezweni nasodlameni.

src: we have joined a groundbreaking campaign that links us to global efforts to achieve gender equality by 2030. generation equality is an ambitious and transformative agenda to end discrimination and violence against women and for their equal participation in political, social and economic life.
tgt: sesihlanganyele emkhankasweni oyingqophamlando osihla nganisa nemizamo yomhlaba jikelele ukuzuza ukulingana ngokobulili ngonyaka wezi2030.

src: as part of this campaign, we have joined two ‘action coalitions’, one for economic justice and rights and another against genderbased violence.
tgt: ukulingana kwesizukulwana kuluhlelo olunezifiso nezinguquko oluzoqeda ukucwaswa nodlame olubhekiswe kwabesifazane kanye nokubandakanywa kwabo okulinganayo empilweni yezepolitiki, yezenhlalo kanye nomnotho.

src: both of these themes are critical to our own national agenda.
tgt: zombili lezi zingqikithi zibaluleke kakhulu ohlelweni lwethu lukazwelonke.

src: eleven months since the emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide was implemented we have made progress in expanding support and care to survivors, and progress is being made in legal reforms to afford them greater protection.
tgt: ezinyangeni ezilishumi nanye kusuka uhlelo oluphuthumayo lomabizwasabele lokuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane lwaqalwa sekube nenqubekelaphambili ekusabalaliseni ukweseka nokunakekela labo abasindile, inqubekelaphambili iyabonakala kwezomthetho ukubanika ukuvikeleka okuthe xaxa.

src: during the month of august, we begin the implementation of the national strategic plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide.
tgt: ngenyanga kancwaba, siqalisa ukusebenza kohlelo lwamasu kazwelonke ukulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane.

src: a key aspect of the plan is on ensuring greater women’s financial inclusion.
tgt: okubaluleke kakhulu kulolu hlelo kusekuqinisekiseni ukubandakanyeka okukhulu kwabe sifazane kwezezimali.

src: this is because economic inequality and social inequality are interconnected.
tgt: lokhu kungenxa yokuthi ukungalingani kwezomnotho nokungalingani kwezenhlalo kuyahambisana.

src: the economic status of women in south africa makes them more vulnerable to abuse.
tgt: isimo sabesifazane kwezomnotho eningizimu afrika kubenza babe buthaka kakhulu ekuhlukunyezweni.

src: we must therefore scale up support for women to enable them to become financially independent.
tgt: ngakhoke kumele sikhuphule ukwesekwa kwabesifazane ukuze bakwazi ukuzimela bona ngokwezimali.

src: we have made a number of commitments under generation equality that will be given effect to through the national strategic plan.
tgt: sesenze ukuzinikela okuningi ngaphansi kokulingana kwesizukulwana okuzoba yimpumelelo ngohlelo lwamasu kazwelonke.

src: firstly, we are going to drive women’s economic inclusion through public procurement.
tgt: okokuqala, sizoqhuba ukubandakanyeka kwabesifazane kwezomnotho ngentengiso kahulumeni.

src: we have set the target of ensuring that at least 40 percent of goods and services procured by public entities are sourced from womenowned businesses.
tgt: sibeke ukuthi sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi okungenani izimpahla ezingamaphesenti angama40 nezinsiza ezithengwa nguhulumeni zithengwa emabhizinisini aphethwe ngabesifazane.

src: secondly, we are going to scale up support for womenowned smmes and for women who work in the informal sector or are unemployed.
tgt: okwesibili, sizokhuphulaukwesekwa kwamasmme aphethwe ngabesifazane kanye nabesifazane abasebenza imisebenzi engahlelekile noma abangasebenzi.

src: this will include engagement with the financial sector to make financial services accessible and affordable for women.
tgt: lokhu kuzobandakanya ukuxoxisana nomkhakha wezezimali ukwenza ukuthi izinsiza zezimali abesifazane bafinyelele kuzona futhi zingabizi.

src: thirdly, we want to ensure more women have access to productive assets such as land.
tgt: okwesithathu, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane abaningi bayafinyelela ezimpahleni zokukhiqiza ezifana nomhlaba.

src: it is essential that women are beneficiaries of the accelerate land reform programme.
tgt: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi abesifazane babe ngabazuzi bohlelo lokubuyiswa komhlaba.

src: it is significant that of the r75 million in covid19 relief earmarked for farming input vouchers 53 percent of the beneficiaries will be rural women.
tgt: kubaluleke kakhulu ukuthi izigidi ezingama75 zamarandi zoxha so lwecovid19 ezibekelwe amavawusha ezolimo amaphesenti angama53 kwabazozuza kuzoba ngabesifazane basemakhaya.

src: we must ensure that women subsistence and smallscale farmers continue to receive support beyond the pandemic.
tgt: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abatshali bokudla besifazane kanye nabalimi abancane bayaqhubeka ukuthola ukwesekwa nangale kobhubhane.

src: fourthly, we want to ensure that women are protected from genderbased violence in the workplace.
tgt: okwesine, sifuna ukuqinisekisa ukuthi abesifazane bayavikelwa kudlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile ezindaweni zokusebenza.

src: in this regard, we will be working at a national and regional level towards the ratification of the ilo convention on violence and harassment in the workplace.
tgt: ngalokhuke, sizobe sise benza ezingeni likazwelonke nelesifunda ukuvumelana nengqungquthela yenhlangano yabasebenzi yamazwe ngamazwe ngodlame nokuhlukunyezwa emsebenzini.

src: it is said that freedom is not given, but taken.
tgt: kuyashiwo ukuthi inkululeko ayikhangezwa, kodwa iyathathwa.

src: the emancipation of women is only words on paper unless it is matched by commitment from all sectors of society.
tgt: ukukhululwa kwabesifazane kungamagama abhalwe phansi nje kuphela ngaphandle uma ehambisana nokuzinikela kwemikhakha yonke yomphakathi.

src: as we prepare for the reconstruction of our economy in the wake of the coronavirus pandemic, we have said that we cannot simply return to where we were before the outbreak of the virus.
tgt: njengoba silungiselela ukuphinde sifukule umnotho wethu emva kobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona , sithe ngeke nje sivele sibuyele lapho kade sikhona ngaphambi kokuqubuka kwegciwane.

src: we must build a fundamentally different economy which, among other things, substantially improves the material position of women.
tgt: kumele sakhe isisekelo somnotho owehlukile, phakathi kwezinye zezinto, ozothuthukisa isimo sabesifazane.

src: this means that our investment in infrastructure must support not only the development of local industry, but also womenowned businesses.
tgt: lokhu kusho ukuthi utshalomali lwethu kwingqalasizinda akumele lweseke kuphela ukuthuthukiswa kwezimboni zasekhaya, kodwa namabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane.

src: it must deliberately create employment opportunities for women in all stages of planning, financing, building and maintaining infrastructure.
tgt: kumele ludale amathuba emisebenzi yabesifazane kuzozonke izigaba zoku hlela, ezezimali, ezokwakha kanye nokunakekelwa kwezingqalasizinda.

src: by the same measures, as we scale up our public employment programmes, we must ensure that young women in particular are identified as participants.
tgt: ngendlela efanayo, njengoba sikhuphula izinhlelo zemisebenzi yomphakathi, kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abesifazane abasebasha ikakhulukazi babamba iqhaza.

src: in addition to an income, these programmes will provide them with an opportunity to acquire some of the skills and experience necessary to enter the mainstream economy.
tgt: ekwengezeni kumalingeniso, lezi zinhlelo zizobahlinzeka ngethuba lokufunda amakhono kanye nesipiliyoni esidingekayo ukungena kumnotho ohlukahlukene.

src: as much as it is government’s responsibility to provide economic opportunities for women and create an enabling framework for advancing gender equality, everyone in society needs to play their part.
tgt: noma kuyisibopho sikahulumeni ukuhlinzeka abesifazane ngamathuba omnotho futhi akhe uhlaka oluvumela ukuphucula ukulingana ngokobulili, wonke umuntu emphakathini kudingeka ukuthi adlale indima yakhe.

src: businesses must support womenowned enterprises in the procurement of goods and services.
tgt: amabhizinisi kumele asekele amabhizinisi aphethwe ngabesifazane ekuthengeni izimpahla nezinsiza.

src: they should employ more women and appoint more women to management positions.
tgt: kumele baqashe abesifazane kakhulu futhi babeke abesifazane abaningi ezikhundleni zokuphatha.

src: this is all the more important considering that the private sector’s record on genderrepresentation at management level lags behind that of the public sector.
tgt: lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu uma ubheka ukuthi ucwaningo lomkhakha ozimele mayelana nokumelwa kobulili ezingeni loku phatha lubonisa ukuba semuva kunalolo lomkhakha kahulumeni.

src: this is an issue that is repeatedly raised in engagements i have had with a number of women’s business organisations.
tgt: lena inkinga ehlale ivela ezingxoxweni engibe nazo nezinhlangano zamabhizinisi abesifazane eziningi.

src: by equal measure, we must eliminate gender disparities in pay for men and women, and give effect to the principle of equal pay for equal work contained in the employment equity act.
tgt: ngokulinganayo, kumele siqede ukungafani emiholweni yabesilisa nabesifazane, bese silandela isimiso somholo olinganayo oqukethwe kumthetho wokuqashwa ngokulingana.

src: women must also be protected from harassment and discrimination in the workplace.
tgt: abesifazane kumele bavikelwe ekuhlukumezweni nasekubandlululweni endaweni yokusebenza.

src: it is up to transport operators, university administrators, school governing bodies and religious organisations to create conditions for women and girls to travel, study and worship in safety.
tgt: kusemahlombe abashayeli bezithuthi, abaphathi bamanyuvesi, ibhodi elilawula ukuphathwa kwesikole kanye nezinhlangano zezenkolo ukwenza izimo abesifazane namantombazane abazo hamba, bafunde futhi bakhonze kuzo bephephile.

src: we must forge ahead with our efforts to eradicate chauvinism, sexism and patriarchy.
tgt: kumele siphokophele phambili ngemizamo yethu yokuqeda ukuthi abesilisa bakhulu kunabesifazane, ukucwasana ngokobulili kanye nokunikeza amandla abesilisa.

src: it is these attitudes that enable the oppression of women.
tgt: yiyo le ndlela yokucabanga edala ukucindezelwa kwabesifazane.

src: it is up to us – both men and women – to affirm that a woman’s value, position and opinions are no less than that of a man.
tgt: kusezandleni zethu – sonke abesilisa nabesifazane – ukugcizelela ukuthi ubugugu, isikhundla kanye nombono womuntu wesifazane awukho mncane kunalowo wowesilisa.

src: it is up to us as parents and grandparents to treat and raise our sons and our daughters the same.
tgt: kusezandleni zethu njengabazali kanye nogogo nomkhulu ukuphatha nokukhulisa amadodana namadodakazi ethu ngokufana.

src: it is up to us as men to reject and speak out against genderbased violence wherever we see it, even if it is against our friends, fathers or brothers.
tgt: kusezandleni zethu madoda ukwala nokuphumela obala silwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile noma ikuphi lapho silubona, noma ngabe lwenziwa ngumngani wethu, obaba noma abafowethu.

src: let us be the generation that ends the oppression of women in all its forms, in our lifetime.
tgt: ake sibe isizukulwana esiqeda ukucindezelwa kwabesifazane ngezindlela zonke, esikhathini sethu sokuphila.

src: back to work after covid19 a full guide allison cooper when can you return to work if you have tested positive for the coronavirus (covid19)?
tgt: ukubuyela emsebenzini emva kokululama kwicovid19 allison cooper ungabuyela nini emsebenzini uma ngabe uke watholakala ukuthi wesuleleke ngegciwane lecorona (icovid19)?

src: the national institute for communicable diseases has the answers you need.
tgt: isikhungo se zifo ezithathelanayo kuzwelonke sinezimpendulo ozidingayo.

src: when i test positive for covid19, how long do i have to stay in isolation?
tgt: uma ngabe ngihlonzwa njengonecovid19 , kumele ngi hlale isikhathi esingakanani endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana?

src: people who test positive for covid19, but don’t have any symptoms, must remain in isolation at home or in a government isolation facility for 10 days, from the day they receive their positive test result.
tgt: abantu abahlonzwe njengabanecovid19 , kepha abangena zo izimpawu, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana ekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana sikahulumeni izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka ngosuku othole ngalo imiphumela ethi unaleli gciwane.

src: those who have mild symptoms must remain in isolation at home or in a government isolation facility for 10 days, from the day their symptoms start.
tgt: labo abanezimpawu ezincane kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana ekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana sikahulumeni izinsuku eziyi10, uku suka ngosuku okwaqala ngalo izimpawu zaleli gciwane.

src: those who have severe disease, who have to go to hospital, must remain in isolation for 10 days, from when they are stable and don’t need oxygen anymore.
tgt: labo abanezifo ezibucayi, okumele baye esibhedlela, kumele baqhubeke bahlale endaweni yokuhlala ngawedwana izinsuku eziyi10, ukusuka sebezizwa ngconywana futhi bengasayidingi ioksijini.

src: how can a covid19 positive people transfer the disease to others?
tgt: abantu abanecovid19 bangasidlulisela kanjani lesi sifo kwabanye?

src: according to health minister zweli mkhize, most people who have a mild infection can spread the virus for between seven to 12 days.
tgt: ngokuka ngqongqoshe wezempilo uzweli mkhize, abantu abaningi abanalokhu kugula okungabonakali bangalibhebhethekisa leli gciwane phakathi kwezinsuku eziyisikhombisa kuya kweziyi12.

src: however, people who become very sick could be infectious and be able to transmit the virus to others for a longer period of time.
tgt: noma kunjalo, abantu abagula kakhulu bangaba nobungozi obukhulu futhi bange sulela abanye ngaleli gciwane isikhathi eside.

src: do i have to have another covid19 test, proving that i am negative, before i return to work?
tgt: ngakube kufanele yini na ukuba ngiphinde ngihlolelwe icovid19 , ukufakazela ukuthi angi senalo leli gciwane, ngaphambi kokuba ngibuyele emsebenzini?

src: no.
tgt: cha.

src: retesting people who have experienced mild illness and have recovered is not recommended.
tgt: ukuphinda uhlole abantu abahlangabezana nokugula okungabonakali futhi asebeluleme akunconywa.

src: a person is considered safe to return to work and come out of isolation if they are no longer infectious.
tgt: umuntu uthathwa njengosephephile ukuba abuyele emsebenzini futhi angaphuma endaweni yokuhlala ngayedwana uma engeke esakwazi ukwesulela abanye ngaleli gciwane.

src: this means they developed their first symptoms more than 10 days ago and have not had any symptoms for at least three days.
tgt: lokhu kuchaza ukuthi baba nezimpawu zabo zokuqala ezinsukwini ezingaphezu kwezi10 ezedlule futhi abakabi nazimpawu okungenani izinsuku ezintathu.

src: in most cases, employees can return to work without testing again if: they have completed 10 days of mandatory quarantine or selfisolation.
tgt: ngokuvamile, abasebenzi banga buyela emsebenzini ngaphandle kokuhlola futhi uma: beqede izinsuku eziyi10 eziyimpoqo ukuthi uzihlale endaweni yokugonqa noma yokuhlala ngawedwana.

src: those who had moderate or severe symptoms undergo a medical evaluation.
tgt: labo ababenezimpawu ezimaphakathi noma lezo ezibucayi behlolwa kokwezempi lo.

src: they continue to practice personal hygiene and social distancing.
tgt: beqhubeka nokulandela imi khuba yenhlanzeko yomuntu kanye nokuziqhelelanisa kubantu.

src: the employer monitors the worker to ensure they do not regress.
tgt: umqashi egada umsebenzi ukuqinisekisa ukuthi akaphindi asuleleke futhi.

src: they wear a mask, from the date of diagnosis for at least 21 days.
tgt: begqoka izimfonyo, kusuka ngosuku lokuhlonzwa okungenani izinsuku ezingama21.

src: i have tested negative but i still have symptoms.
tgt: ngihlolwe ngatholakala ngingenalo leli gciwane kephangisenezimpawu.

src: what now?
tgt: kwenzakalani manje?

src: it is possible to get a false negative test result.
tgt: kuyenzeka uthole imiphumela okungesiyo.

src: this means that your first test could be negative, but you could test positive at a later stage.
tgt: lokhu kungachaza ukuthi le miphumela yokuhlolwa kokuqala ingathi awunalo leli gciwane, kepha ungahlonzwa njengonalo leli gciwane ekuhambeni kwesikhathi.

src: if you continue to have covid19 symptoms contact your healthcare professional.
tgt: uma usaqhubeka uba nezimpawu zecovid19 kumele uthintane nezazi zezempilo.

src: what if i am still showing symptoms after 10 days?
tgt: kwenzakalani uma ngisaqhubeka ngikhombisa izimpawu emvakwezinsuku eziyi10?

src: it is common for patients to continue to have symptoms for longer than 10 days.
tgt: kuvamile ukuba iziguli ziqhu beke nokuba nezimpawu ukwedlula izinsuku eziyi10.

src: full recovery may take several weeks.
tgt: ukwelulama ngokuphelele kungathatha amaviki ambalwa.

src: if you still have symptoms, seek advice from your healthcare professional.
tgt: uma ngabe usenezimpawu, thola iseluleko kumnakekeli wakho wezempilo.

src: for more information about covid19, visit the national institute for communicable diseases’ website at www.
tgt: ngolwazi oluthe thuthu ngecovid19 , vakashela iwebhusayithi yesikhungo sezifo ezithathelanayo kuzwelonke ethi: www.

src: nicd.
tgt: nicd.

src: managing covid19: at home and at a dedicated facility allison cooper if you are not able to selfisolate, call the national coronavirus hotline at 0800 029 999 for more information about your closest isolation or quarantine facility.
tgt: ukulawulwa kwecovid19 : ekhaya kanye nasezindaweni zokunakekela allison cooper kubaluleke kakhulu ukuba kakhulu ukuba uziqhelelanise nabanye abantu, noma ngabe uziqhelelanise nabanye abantu, noma ngabe usekhaya noma usekhaya noma esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana samahhala, uma ngabe sewuhlonzwe njengoseneesikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana samahhala, uma ngabe sewuhlonzwe njengosenecovid19covid19 .. abantu abaningi base ningizimu afrika asebehlonzwe njengabanegciwane lecorona (icovid19) baye bakuthole kunzima futhi kungenzeki ukuhlala ngabodwana ngoba amakhaya abo mancane ukuthi umuntu angahlala futhi alale egunjini lokulala ngaphandle kokuthi alisebenzise nomunye.

src: it’s extremely important to separate yourself from others, either at home or at a free isolation facility, if you have tested positive for covid19.
tgt: uhulumeni useqinisekisile ukuthi zikhona izikhungo zokuhlala ngawedwana neziqokelwe abantu asebesuleleke ngaleli gciwane, kanti futhi zikhona nezindawo zokugonqa labo abasalindele imiphumela yabo yokuhlolela leli gciwane.

src: both services are free.
tgt: zombili lezi zinsizakalo zimahhala.

src: according to dr marlin mccay, a general practitioner based in florida on the west rand, the first thing you need to do when diagnosed with covid19 is to limit the spread of the infection.
tgt: umarlin mccay, ongudokotela ogxile eflorida esewest rand, uthi uma usuhlonzwe njengonecovid19 into yokuqa la okufanele uyenze ukuthi wehlise amathuba okuthiibhebhetheke.

src: "you want to protect your family," he says.
tgt: "ufuna ukuvikela umndeni wakho," kusho yena.

src: to do this, you need to go into isolation – either at home or at an isolation facility.
tgt: ukuze wenze lokhu, kumele uye lapho kuhlalwa khona ngawedwana – kungaba sekhaya noma esikhungweni esiqokelwe ukuhlala ngawedwana.

src: "if you are selfisolating it means you have to find a part of the house where you are totally cut off from the rest of the family.
tgt: "uma uqoka ukuzihlalela ngawedwana lokho kuchaza ukuthi kufanele uthole indlu lapho uzozisusa ngokuphelele kuwo wonke amalungu omndeni.

src: no one should come within three metres of you.
tgt: akekho namunye okufanele ukuba asondele kuwe ukwedlula amamitha amathathu.

src: you must eat on your own; use your own cutlery and crockery; use your own bathroom, if possible; and make sure there’s no contact with anyone else in the family.
tgt: kumele udle wedwa; usebenzise izinto zakho zokudla kanye nezitsha; usebenzise igumbi lokugezela lakho wedwa, lapho kungenzeka khona; futhi uqinisekise ukuthi akekho othintana naye emndenini.

src: "your doctor or primary care giver should help you with certain basic medications to ease most of the symptoms, especially things like body aches and pains, headache and fever.
tgt: "udokotela noma umnakekeli wakho wezempilo kumele akusize ngezinye izinto eziyisisekelo zokwelapha ukudambisa izimpawu zaleli gciwane, ikakhulukazi izinto ezifana nokuqaqamba kanye nobuhlungu bomzimba, ikhanda kanye nemfiva.

src: there are also some good vitamins one can use to stay healthy," he says.
tgt: kunezinye izakhamzimba noma ubani angazisebenzisa ukuze ahlale engumqemane," kusho yena.

src: it’s also important to get enough rest and drink enough water or clear fluids to make sure that your urine stays a pale clear colour.
tgt: kubalulekile futhi ukuthi uphumule ngokwanele kanye nokuphuza amanzi anele noma yiluphi uketshezi oluhlanzekile ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umchamo wakho uhlala umhlophe ngokufanelekile.

src: most people with mild illness will start feeling better within a week of the first symptoms, but it’s important to monitor your symptoms carefully.
tgt: abantu abaningi abanokugula okuncane bayaye bazithole beqala ukuzizwa kangconywana emva kweviki lezi zimpawu zokuqala, kodwa kubalulekile ukuthi uqaphelisise izimpawu zakho.

src: if you develop any emergency warning signs, such as trouble breathing, chest pain or pressure in your chest that does not go away, coughing up blood, becoming confused, severe sleepi ness or blue lips or face you must call an ambulance or go to hospital immediately.
tgt: uma ngabe kuba khona nanoma yiziphi izinkomba ezingaba isexwayiso esiphuthumayo, njengezinkinga zokuphefumula, ubuhlungu esifubeni noma ingcindezi esifubeni sakho engedluli, ukukhwehlela igazi, ukuhlala kunqwabelene imicabango, ukuhlala wozela noma ukuba nezindebe noma ubuso obuluhlaza okwesibhakabhaka kumele ubize imoto yeziguli noma uziyele wena esibhedlela ngokuphuthuma.

src: for those who are not able to keep themselves away from others living in the home, government has setup free quarantine facilities around the country to keep you and your loved ones safe.
tgt: izikhungo zokugonqaizikhungo zokugonqalabo abangakwazi ukuziqheli sa kwabanye uma behleli ekhaya, uhulumeni wenze izikhungo zokugonqa ezweni jikelele ukugcina wena kanye nabathandiweyo bakho niphephile.

src: the western cape government recently published some comments from patients about its isolation facilities.
tgt: uhulumeni wasentshonalanga kapa usanda kushicilela ukuphawula okuqhamuka ezigulini mayelana nezikhungo zazo zokuhlala ngawedwana.

src: marie jantjies from witzenberg decided to follow healthcare workers’ advice and go to the isolation facility because her 97yearold mother lives with her and her children and she wanted to protect them.
tgt: umarie jantjies oqhamuka ewitzenberg uye waqoka ukulandela iseluleko sabasebenzi bezempilo futhi waya esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana ngoba umama wakhe oneminyaka engama97 ubudala ebehlala naye nezingane zakhe futhi ubefuna ukubavikela.

src: "i was treated very well.
tgt: "ngaphatheka kahle kakhulu.

src: the food was nice – even nicer than at home.
tgt: ukudla kwabe kwehla esiphundu – kumnandi ukwedlula ngishookwasekhaya.

src: i realised i just had to stay positive.
tgt: ngabona ukuthi kumele ngihlale ethembeni.

src: i was anxious, but i prayed and tried to relax," she said.
tgt: ngangihlala ngokukhathazeka, kepha ngathandaza futhi ngazama ukwehlisa amaphaphu," kusho yena.

src: "that place can save lives!
tgt: "leya ndawo iyazisindisa izimpilo!

src: it really is the best," said john arnoldus, who recovered from covid19 at an isolation facility in drakenstein.
tgt: ihamba phambili ngempela," kusho ujohn arnoldus, owelulama kwicovid19 esikhungweni soku hlala ngawedwana edrakenstein.

src: "one of my friends was in quarantine at home and he struggled to recover on his own.
tgt: "omunye wabangani bami ubegonqele ekhaya futhi akuzange kube lulaukwelulama ngokwakhe.

src: i told him to contact the people who cared for me – that is the way to get better.
tgt: ngiye ngamtshela ukuthi athinte laba bantu ababenginakekela – yiyona ndlela yokuthi ululame.

src: the support of the medical staff and the manager there – that pulls you through," he said.
tgt: ukwesekwa okuqhamu ka kubasebenzi bezokwelapha kanye nabaphathi bakhona – yikho okukuvusa qingqo," kusho yena.

src: arnoldus was initially hesitant to go to the isolation facility because of the wrong perception that if you go to a facility like this you will get sicker and die.
tgt: ekuqaleni uarnoldus wayemanqikanqika ukuya esikhungweni sokuhlala ngawedwana ngoba wayenomcabango ongekho woku thi uma uya kulesiya sikhungo uzofike ugule kakhulu futhi ushone.

src: "i expected the worst, but i was received so well.
tgt: "ngangilindele okubi kakhulu, kepha ngemukeleka kahle kakhulu.

src: let’s keep each other safe vukuzenzele unnamed our country has moved to alert level 2 in our response to the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt: masigcinane siphephile vukuzenzele unnamed izwe lethu lehlele esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha ekulweni kwethu nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona .

src: this has come as a relief to all south africans who have had to live under stringent restrictions for the last five months.
tgt: lokhu kube njengokukhu luleka kubobonke abantu baseningizimu afrika abesebephila ngaphansi kwemikhawulo enzima izi nyanga eziyisihlanu eze dlule.

src: it is a sign of the progress we are making in reducing new infections and demand on our health facilities.
tgt: kuluphawu lwenqubeke laphambili esiyenzayo uku nciphisa ukusuleleka okusha kanye nomthamo ezikhu ngweni zethu zezempilo.

src: it is also a very important development as we strive to restart our economy.
tgt: futhi kungukuthuthuka okubalulekile kakhulu njengoba siphokophelele ekuqaleni umnotho wethu kabusha.

src: but it is too soon to celebrate.
tgt: kodwake kusesekuseni kakhulu ukuthi singajabula.

src: we are still very much in the middle of a deadly pandemic that has taken over 11,000 lives in south africa alone.
tgt: sisaphila phakathi kwalo mashayabhuqe wobhubhane osuthathe izimpilo zabantu abayizi11 000 eningizimu afrika kuphela nje.

src: at more than half a million confirmed cases, we still have the fifth highest number of infections in the world.
tgt: ezi gamekweni eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwesigamu sesigidi, sisahleli esibalweni sesihlanu samanani aphe zulu kakhulu okwesuleleka emhlabeni.

src: and there is always a chance of a resurgence of the disease.
tgt: futhi kuhlale kunethuba lokuphinde si bheduke isifo.

src: if we ever need a stark reminder of the need for vigilance, we should look to recent events thousands of kilometres away in new zealand.
tgt: uma kwenzeka sidinga into ezosikhumbuza isidingo sokuthi siqaphelisise, kumele sibheke izigameko zaka muva ezenzeke endaweni engamakhilomitha ayizinku lungwane enew zealand.

src: three months since the country was declared coronavirusfree, new zealand is once again under lockdown.
tgt: ezinyangeni ezintathu emva kokumemezela izwe njenge lingasenalo igciwane lecorona, inew zealand isiphinde yaba ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwezwe.

src: although the latest outbreak was of relatively few cases, the government swiftly reimposed lockdown restrictions.
tgt: yize ukuqubuka kwegciwane kwakamuva kwaba nezigameko ezimba lwa, uhulumeni waphinde wabeka imikhawulo yoku valwa kwezwe ngokupha zima kweso.

src: similar restrictions have had to be reimposed in several parts of europe as they experience a ‘second wave’ of infections.
tgt: imikhawulo efanayo kumele ukuthi iphinde ibekwe ezingxenyeni ezini ngi zaseyurophu njengo ba bebhekane ‘nehlandla lesibili’ lokusuleleka.

src: these experiences show just how swiftly things can change when it comes to covid19.
tgt: lezi zigameko zibonisa ukuthi izinto zingaguquka kanjani ngokuphazima nje kweso ngenxa yecovid19 .

src: it is a wakeup call to any among us who may harbour illusions that we are even close to seeing the end of this grave public health emergency.
tgt: kuyisixwayiso kunoma ngubani phakathi kwethu ongaphupha emini ukuthi selidumela emansumpeni ekuboneni isiphetho saloku kufa kwempilo yomphakathi ephuthumayo.

src: certainly, there are signs of hope.
tgt: nomakanjani, ikhona inhla nsi yethemba elokozayo.

src: the number of new confirmed cases in south africa continues to decline.
tgt: inani lezigameko ezintsha eziqinisekisiwe eningizimu afrika liyaqhubeka nokwe hla.

src: at the peak of the disease just one month ago, we were recording around 12,000 new cases a day.
tgt: esicongweni sesifo enya ngeni eyodwa eyedlule, inani lezigameko eziqinise kisiwe ezintsha beliyizi12 000 ngosuku.

src: this has dropped to an average of around 5,000 a day over the past week.
tgt: lokhu sekwe hle kwaya esilinganisweni esiphakathi esiyizi5 000 ngosuku evikini eledlule.

src: our recovery rate stands at 80 percent.
tgt: izinga lethu lokululama lime kumaphesenti angama80.

src: as the country moves to alert level 2, many restrictions on social and economic activity have been lifted.
tgt: njengoba izwe lehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuqapha, imikhawulo eminingi kwe zenhlalo nakwezomnotho isi susiwe.

src: with this comes increased risk of transmission.
tgt: lokhu kuza nobungo zi obukhulu bokusuleleka.

src: we now need to manage this risk and ensure the gains we have made thus far in containing the pandemic’s spread are not reversed.
tgt: manje sekumele silawule ubungozi futhi siqinisekise ukuthi esesikuzuzile kuze kube manje ekubambeze leni ukubhebhetheka kobhu bhane akubuyeli emuva.

src: the greatest threat to the health of nation right now is complacency.
tgt: ubungozi obulengele impilo yesizwe njengamanje ukwe qiwa injabulo bese sikhohlwa ubungozi.

src: it may be that we are now permitted to meet friends and family, to visit entertainment venues, to travel for leisure and to consume alcohol in restaurants, bars and taverns.
tgt: kungenzeka ukuthi manje sesivumelekile ukuhlangana nabangani nomndeni, ukuvakashela izindawo zokuzijabulisa, ukuthatha uhambo kuyonce belekwa nokuphuza utshwa la ezindaweni zokudlela, ezindaweni zokuphuzela utshwala nasemathaveni.

src: but as the old adage goes, just because you can, doesn’t mean you should.
tgt: kodwa njengesisho saku dala esithi, ukuthi unga kwazi ukwenza into, lokho akusho ukuthi kumele uye nze.

src: many people who have the coronavirus do not have symptoms and may not even know they are infected.
tgt: abantu abaningi abahaqwe igciwane lecorona abanazo izimpawu futhi kungenzeka bangazi nakwazi ukuthi ba sulelekile.

src: this is a sobering reality because it means that any of us could be infected right now and could unwittingly infect others.
tgt: leli iqiniso eli hlasimulisa umzimba ngoba lokhu kusho ukuthi noma ngubani kithina kungenzeka usulelekile njengamanje futhi kungenzeka usulele abanye ngokungenhloso.

src: this is particular the case when visiting relatives, especially the elderly and those with preexisting medical conditions that render them vulnerable to infection.
tgt: kuzoba njalo uma ku vakashelwa izihlobo, ikakhu lukazi abantu asebekhulile kanye nalabo abanezifo ezi ngamahlalakhona ezibenza babe buthakathaka ekwe sulelekeni.

src: it is also true for attending religious services or cultural activities.
tgt: futhi kuliqiniso uma kuthanyelwa izinkonzo noma imicimbi yamasiko.

src: the ‘second wave’ of infections that several other countries have experienced is an everpresent possibility for us too.
tgt: ‘ihlandla lesibili’ lokwe suleleka amanye amazwe amaningi abhekene nalo into ehlezi ingenzeka na kuthina.

src: although many restrictions have been lifted, it does not mean they will not return should we experience a significant rise in infections.
tgt: yize imikhawulo eminingi seyisusiwe, lokhu akusho ukuthi ngeke iphinde ibuyiswe uma kungenzeka sibhekane nokukhuphuka kokusuleleka.

src: this pandemic is a matter of life and death.
tgt: lolu bhu bhane luyisimo sokufa noku phila.

src: we need to adapt and we need to be vigilant.
tgt: kumele sivumelane nesimo futhi sidinga ukuthi siqaphelisise.

src: in the days, weeks and months that lie ahead, we must urgently focus our efforts on recovery.
tgt: ezinsukwini, emavikini nasezinyangeni ezizayo, kumele ngokuphuthumayo sibhekane nemizamo yethu yokululama.

src: our economy and our society has suffered a great deal.
tgt: umnotho wethu nomphakathi wethu bakhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src: as we return to economic activity across almost all industries – and work to repair the damage done – we have a responsibility to not let our guard down as individuals, employers, communities, families, professionals, workers and citizens.
tgt: njengoba sesibuyela emse benzini cishe kuzozonke izimboni – futhi sisebenza ukulungisa umonakalo owenzekile – sinesibophe zelo sokungayekeli uku hlale siqaphile njengomunye nomunye, njengabaqashi, njengomphakathi, njenge mindeni, njengochwephe she, njengabasebenzi kanye nezakhamuzi.

src: none of us wants a return to the early days of extreme lockdown restrictions.
tgt: akekho kuthina ofuna ukubuyela ezinsukwini ezi dlule zemikhawulo eqinile yokuvalwa kwezwe.

src: we want to move on with our lives.
tgt: sifuna ukuqhubeka nezimpilo zethu.

src: we want our friends and loved ones to remain healthy and safe.
tgt: sifuna abangani bethu nabathandiweyo bethu bahlale benempilo futhi be phephile.

src: as a nation, let us continue to work together to ensure that we progress.
tgt: njengesizwe, asiqhubeke sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi siqhubekela phambili.

src: the move to alert level 2 of the lockdown is not a ‘free for all.’ the rules on social distancing, mask wearing, social gatherings and international travel remain.
tgt: ukwehlela esigabeni sesi2 sokuvalwa kwezwe akuyona nje ‘inkululeko kawonkewonke.’ imithetho yokuqhelelana, ukugqokwa kwezifonyo, imibuthano yomphakathi kanye noku vakashela amanye amazwe isamile.

src: our success rests on our ability to abide by these regulations and to ensure that we each behave carefully and responsibly.
tgt: impumelelo yethu ilele ekuthobeleni kwethu le mithethonqubo futhi noku qinisekisa ukuthi omunye nomunye uziphatha ngoku zinakekela nangokuzibo phezela.

src: every time we are considering any form of nonessen tial activity, we should ask: what is the risk of infection to ourselves and to others?
tgt: ngaso sonke isikhathi uma sicabanga nanoma isiphi isenzo esingabalulekile, kumele sibuze ukuthi: ibu phi ubungozi bokusuleleka kuthina nakwabanye?

src: where there is a risk, even a slight one, it is better not to do it.
tgt: lapho kukhona khona ubungozi, noma ngabe buncane kanga kanani, kungcono ninga kwenzi.

src: let us proceed, as ever, with caution.
tgt: asiphokophele phambili, njengakuqala, ngokuqa phela.

src: nsfas powered my dreams more matshediso the national student financial aid scheme (nsfas) has bridged the financial gap between karabo mashego (21) and his plan to further his studies.
tgt: insfas ifeze amaphu pho ami more matshediso isikhwama soxhaso mali lwabafundi lu kazwelonke (insfas) seluye lavala igebe lezezi mali phakathi kukakara bo mashego (21) nohlelo lwakhe lokuqhuba izifu ndo zakhe.

src: mashego of sebokeng in gauteng’s vaal area says he would not have managed to afford tuition fees and the other expenses that come with postmatric education had he not received a bursary from nsfas.
tgt: umashego odabuka esebokeng lapha endaweni yasegauteng evaal uthi ubengeke akwazi ukuzi khokhela imali yokufunda kanye nezinye izindleko ezi za nokufunda emfundweni ephakeme uma ubengezange wathola uxhasomali lomfu ndaze wensfas.

src: "in addition, the monthly allowance i receive from nsfas enables me to sleep and study on a full stomach," he says.
tgt: "ukwengeza kulokhu, imali yokuphila yenyanga nenya nga engiyithola kunsfas ingenza ngikwazi ukufunda futhi ukulala ngidlile," kusho yena.

src: mashego is a thirdyear student studying towards a degree in civil engineering at the university of pretoria.
tgt: umashego ungumfundi owenza unyaka wesithathu eziqwini zakhe zobunjiniyela kwezokwakha imigwaqo namabhuloho icivil engi neering enyuvesi yasepitoli.

src: "tuition fees are very expensive.
tgt: "imali yokufunda ibiza ngokwedlulele.

src: for the course that i have chosen, i really could not afford to pay for a semester, never mind a single academic year," he explains.
tgt: ngokomkha kha engiwukhethile, bengi ngeke ngikwazi ukukhokhela ngisho imali yokufunda izi nyanga eziyisithupha, ngi ngasakubali okonyaka owo dwake nje lowo," kuchaza yena.

src: mashego matriculated in 2016 and was a top learner in his class, but had no means to pay for his studies.
tgt: umashego uphothule umatikuletsheni wakhe ngonyaka wezi2016 futhi wabashaya bonke emakha nda abafundi ayefunda nabo ekilasini lakhe, kodwa wabe enganakho okungamusiza ukuthi akhokhele izifundo zakhe.

src: he successfully applied for funding from nsfas for the 2018 academic year.
tgt: waye wafaka ngempu melelo isicelo soxhasomali lukansfas ukuze axhaseke ngonyaka wokufunda wezi2018.

src: "this gave me the opportunity to make my dream of studying engineering come true.
tgt: "lokhu kwanginika ithuba lokuba ngikwazi ukuthi ngenze amaphupho ami okufundela izifundo zobunjiniyela afezeke.

src: education plays a huge role in my personal development and it helps me to progress in all that i intend to achieve.
tgt: imfu ndo idlala enkulu indima le ekuthuthukeni kwami futhi mina ingisize ukuthi ngiphumelele kukho konke ebekade ngifisa ukuku feza.

src: moreover, it empowers me to empower other people in my community and thus contribute to the economy of our country," mashego explains.
tgt: ngaphezu kwalokho, inginike amandla ukuze ngikwazi ukunika abanye amandla ngokubakhuthaza emphakathini wakithi kanye nokuthi lokho kuzofaka isandla ekufukuleni umnotho wezwe lethu," kuchaza umashego.

src: "i urge young people to apply for nsfas funding because following your dream is not a free exercise, it needs funding, and nsfas will bridge that gap for you," he says.
tgt: "nginxenxa yonke intsha yakithi ukuthi ifake izicelo zoxhasomali lukansfas ngokuba ukulandela ama phupho akho akusiyo into ongayenza mahhala nje, kudi nga uxhasomali, kanti futhi unsfas ungakuvalela igebe lezezimali," kusho yena.

src: the minister of higher education, science and innovation, dr blade nzimande, has opened the nsfas 2021 application cycle for a period of four months, from 3 august to 30 november 2020. students from disadvan taged and workingclass backgrounds who wish to further their studies at any public technical and vocational education and training (tvet) college or university may apply.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wezemfu ndo ephakeme, ezesayensi nokuqanjwa kabusha kwezi nto, udkt.

src: to be eligible for nsfas funding, an applicant must be a south african citizen and come from a family with a combined annual household income of not more than r350 000. the household annual income for students with a disability should not be more than r600 000.
tgt: blade nzimande, usezivulele izicelo zikansfas zonyaka wezi2021 isikhathi esingangezinyanga ezine, ukusuka mhla ziyi3 kuncwaba kuya mhla zinga ma30 kulwezi kowezi2020.

src: "in the current academic year, nsfas has funded over 700 000 students, 248 242 at tvet colleges and 481 339 at universities (students with registrations data).
tgt: abafundi abaqhamuka emakhaya antulayo kanye nalabo abasebenza imise benzi eholela kancane labo abafisa ukuyoqhuba izifundo zabo kunoma yimaphi ama kolishi namatvet noma enyuvesi bangaqala bafake izicelo.

src: nsfas accounts for 40 percent of the undergraduate population at universi ties and 70 percent at tvet colleges.
tgt: "kulo nyaka wokufunda esikuwo, unsfas usuxhase abafundi abangaphezulu kwezi700 000, abayizi248 242 babo basemakolishi angamatvet kanti abanye abayizi481 339 abasemanyu vesi (abafundi abaneminini ngwane yokuthi babhalisile).

src: v applicants must visit www.
tgt: vusifaka kanjani isicelo abafakizicelo kumele bavakashele ku: www.

src: nsfas.
tgt: nsfas.

src: org.
tgt: org.

src: za and click on mynsfas.
tgt: za bese becindezela ku mynsfas .

src: they must create a mynsfas account, click the apply tab, answer the questions on screen and upload the required documents.
tgt: kumele bavule iakhawunti yemynsfas , cindezela lapho kubhalwe khona ukuthi apply, phendula yonke imi buzo ebuziwe bese futhi ufaka wonke lawo maphepha adingakalayo.

src: after clicking submit, the application reference number will appear on the screen.
tgt: uma usumcindezele usubmit, inombolo ewubufakazi bokuthi usifakile isicelo izovezwa.

src: the reference number will also be sent to the cellphone number and email address that the applicant provided.
tgt: inombolo ewubufakazi bokuthi usifakile isicelo izophinde ithunyelwe ezinombolweni zikamakhalekhukhwini kanye neimeyili enikezwe ngumfakisicelo.

src: applicants can use a cellphone, tablet or computer to apply.
tgt: umfakisicelo angasebenzisa umakhale khukhwini, ithebhulethi noma ikhompyu tha ukufaka isicelo.

src: the nsfas portal has undergone minor changes to make it easier to use and more secure.
tgt: iwebhusayithi yakwansfas seyithe ukushintsha kancane ukwenza ukuthi kube lula ukuyisebenzisa kanye nangokuphepha.

src: new applicants need a copy of their id or birth certificate to register and create a profile on the mynsfas portal.
tgt: kubafakizicelo abaqalayo kudingeka umazisi noma isitifiketi sokuzalwa ukuze ubhalise futhi ukhande imininingwane yakho kwiwebhusayithi yemynsfas .

src: applicants with existing accounts need to log into their accounts – remember, only one profile per applicant is allowed.
tgt: kanti abafakizicelo asebenawo amaakhawunti badinga ukungena kuwo kuphela – khumbula, kuvumeleke ukwenza imininingwane yakho kanye nje vo.

src: the applicant must give consent for their personal information to be checked by a third party and if they do not agree to this, they will not be allowed to continue with the application process.
tgt: umfakisicelo kumele anike umuntu wesithathu imvume yokuba abheke imininingwane yakhe kanti uma benga vumelani ngalokhu, ngeke bavunyelwe ukuba baqhubeke nokufaka isicelo.

src: as a result of the coronavirus pandemic, applicants will not be required to submit or upload the consent form.
tgt: ngenxa yesizathu sobhubhane lwegci wane lecorona, abafakizicelo ngeke kudingeke ukuba bathumele noma bafake incwadi yemvume.

src: instead, they will be asked to accept the conditions on the electronic consent form, along with the terms and conditions for funding.
tgt: ukunalokho, bazocelwa ukuba bamukele imigomo ne mibandela kwifomu lemvume ngezobu chwepheshe, okuhambisana nemigomo nemibandela yoxhasomali.

src: students must still submit their supporting documents (own id copy, parent/guardian proof of income, parent/guardian id copies, and/or annexure a for applicants with disability).
tgt: abafundi kusafanele bathumele amaphepha aseka izicelo zabo (umazisi womfundi, incwadi engubufakazi bema lingeniso kamzali/ umnakekeli womfundi, umazisi kamzali/ umnakekeli womfundi, nefomu a labafakizicelo abakhubaze kile.

src: protect our women and children vukuzenzele unnamed a year ago, almost to the day, thousands of wom en, men and children marched to parliament to protest against a spate of rapes and killings of women and girls.
tgt: masivikele abesifazane nabantwana bethu vukuzenzele unnamed onyakeni owedlule, osukwini oluseduze nje, izinku lungwane zabesifazane, amadoda kanye nabantwana bamashela ephalamende ukuyobhikishela ukulwisana nesihlava sokudlwengulwa kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane namantombazane.

src: at the time, the nation was reeling from the murders of uyinene mrwetyana, leighandre jegels, jesse hess and a number of other women who had lost their lives at the hands of brutal men.
tgt: ngaleso sikhathi, isizwe sasi sakhungathwe ukubulawa kukauyinene mrwetyana, uleighandre jegels, ujesse hess kanye nabanye abesifazane abaningi abalahlekelwa izimpilo zabo ngezandla zamadoda anesihluku.

src: from all social backgrounds, young and old, students and working women, the peaceful protesters held aloft placards that read ‘enough is enough’ and ‘am i next?’.
tgt: kusuka kuyoyonke indawo, omnca ne nomdala, abafundi nabesifazane abasebenzayo, ababhikishi ababebhikisha ngokuthula babephakamise izingqwembe ezazibhalwe ukuthi 'enough is enough ' nokuthi ' am i next?'.

src: the anguish and the anger was palpable that day.
tgt: usizi nentukuthelo kwakubhalwe emehlweni ngalolo suku.

src: as i received their clearly articulated demands, it was clear to me that we needed to act urgently and with determination.
tgt: ngesikhathi ngamukela izimfuno zabo ezazibekwe zacaca bha, kwacaca kumina ukuthi kudingeka sisukume ngokushesha futhi nangokuzimisela.

src: it was important to me that i did not respond with hollow words and empty promises.
tgt: kwakubalulekile kumina ukuthi ngingaphenduli ngamagama ayize leze futhi nangezithembiso zamanga.

src: a few days later, i called a joint sitting of parliament, where we announced a r1.6 billion emergency response action plan to combat genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf).
tgt: ezinsukwini ezimbalwa ezalandela, ngabiza umhlangano wokuhlala ngokuhlanganyela kwezindlu zombili zephalamende, lapho samemezela isamba esingur1.6 wesigidigidi sohlelo lwezinyathelo eziphuthumayo zokulwisananodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf).

src: over the six months of its implementation, public spending in various government departments was reprioritised to support interventions for care and support for survivors, for awareness and prevention campaigns, to improve laws and policies, to promote the economic empowerment of women, and to strengthen the criminal justice system.
tgt: ezinyangeni eziyisithupha selokhu sethulwa, ukusetshenziswa kwemali eminyangweni ehlukene kahulumeni kwabuye kwahlelwa kwabusha ngokubeka phambili ukunakekelwa nokwesekwa kwabasindile, ukuqwashisa kanye nemikhankaso yoku vikela, ukwenza ngcono imithetho nezinqubomigomo, ukuthuthukisa ukwesekwa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho, kanye nokuqinisa uhlelo lobulungiswa kwezobugebengu.

src: and now we are on the cusp of the most farreaching legislative overhaul in the fight against gbvf.
tgt: futhi njengamanje sisesikhathini lapho ingalo ende yomthetho isiguqulwe kabusha ukuze kuliwe negbvf .

src: three key bills relating to gbvf have been introduced in parliament recently.
tgt: imithethosivivinywa emithathu ebalulekile ehlobene negbvf yethulwe ephalamende muva nje.

src: through the introduction of these bills, we are honouring the promise we made to the protestors last year and to all the women of this country.
tgt: ngokwethulwa kwale mithethosivivinywa, sigcina isethembiso esasenza kubabhikishi ngonyaka odlule nakubobonke abesifazane bakuleli lizwe.

src: the three amendment bills are designed to fill the gaps that allow some perpetrators of these crimes to evade justice and to give full effect to the rights of our country’s women and children.
tgt: imithethosivivinywa echitshiyelwe emithathu yenzelwe ukuvala igebe elivumela izaphulamthetho ukubalekela ubulungiswa futhi inika ngokugcwele abesifazane nabantwana bezwe lethu amalungelo.

src: these bills, once finalised, will help to restore the confidence of our country’s women that the law is indeed there to protect them.
tgt: le mithethosivivinywa, uma isiphasisiwe yaba imithetho, izosiza ukubuyisa ukuzethemba kwabesifazane bezwe lethu njengoba umthetho ukhona ukuze ubavikele.

src: the first is the bill to amend the criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act.
tgt: owokuqala umthethosivivinywa ochibiyela umthetho wokuchibiyela wamacala ezobugebengu (amacala ezocansi nahambisana nawo).

src: this creates a new offence of sexual intimidation, extends the ambit of the offence of incest, and extends the reporting duty of persons who suspect a sexual offence has been committed against a child.
tgt: lokhu kwethula amacala amasha okusatshiswa ngokocansi, amacala okulalana kwezihlobo, kanye nomsebenzi wabantu wokubika uma besola ukuthi kukhona ukuhlukunyezwa ngokocansi okwenzekile emntwaneni.

src: it expands the scope of the national register for sex offenders (nrso) to include the particulars of all sex offenders.
tgt: iphinde yelula ukuthi irejista kazwelonke yamacala ezocansi (inrso) ifake lonke uhla lwabaphulimthetho kwezocansi.

src: until now, it has only applied to sex offenders convicted of sex crimes perpetrated against children or persons with mental disabilities.
tgt: kuze kube manje, isafake kuphela abaphulimthetho kwezocansi abalahlwe ngamacala ezocansi kubantwana noma kubantu abaphila nokukhubazeka ngokwengqondo.

src: the time an offender’s particulars must remain on the register has been increased, and those listed on the register will have to disclose this when they submit applications to work with vulnerable persons.
tgt: isikhathi sokugcinwa kohla lwesaphulimthetho sikhushuliwe, futhi labo abafakwe kurejista kuzomele bakudalule lokho uma befaka izicelo zokusebenza nabantu ababuthakathaka.

src: the bill also provides for the names of persons on the nrso to be publicly available.
tgt: umthethosivivinywauphinde uhlinzekele ukuthi amagama abantu akunrso umphakathi uyakwazi ukuwathola.

src: the criminal and related matters amendment bill tightens, among others, the granting of bail to perpetrators of gbvf, and expands the offences for which minimum sentences must be imposed.
tgt: isichibiyelo somthethosivivinywa wamacala obugebengu kanye nahambisana nawo sizoqinisa, phakathi kokunye, ukunikezwa kwebheyili kwezaphulamthetho zegbvf , futhi sichaze kabanzi ngamacala azothola izigwebo ezincane.

src: the amendments impose new obligations on lawenforcement officials and on our courts.
tgt: izichibiyelo zibeka izibopho ezintsha phezu kwezikhulu zomthetho kanye nezinkantolo zethu.

src: when a prosecutor does not oppose bail in cases of gbv, they have to place their reasons on record.
tgt: uma umshushisi engasiphikisi isicelo sebheyili emacaleni egbv , kumele abhale izizathu zakhe phansi.

src: unless a person accused of gbv can provide exceptional circumstances why they should be released on bail, the court must order their detention until the criminal proceedings are concluded.
tgt: ngaphandle uma umsolwa wecala legbv angabeka izimo ezinqala ukuthi kungani kumele akhululwe ngebheyili, inkantolo kumele inqume ukuthi bavalelwe kuze kuphele ukuthethwa kwecala.
