src: in reaching a decision on a bail application, the courts are compelled to take a number of considerations into account.
tgt: ekuthatheni isinqumo esicelweni sebheyili, izinkantolo ziphoqelekile ukucabangisisa ngezinto eziningi.

src: they include pretrial reports on the desirability of releasing an accused on bail, threats of violence made against a survivor, and the view of the survivor regarding his or her safety.
tgt: okubandakanya imibiko yaphambi kokuthethwa kwecala, ukwesatshiswa okunodlame kosindile, kanye nombono wosindile mayelana nokuphepha kwakhe.

src: when it comes to parole, a complainant or a relative of a deceased victim must be able to make representation to the parole board.
tgt: mayelana noshwele, ummangali noma isihlobo sesisulu esashona kumele bakwazi ukuyozimela kwibhodi likashwele.

src: given the unacceptably high levels of intimate partner violence in our country, we have tightened the provisions of the domestic violence act.
tgt: ngokubuka amazinga angamukeleki neze odlame kubalingani abasebudlelwaneni ezweni lethu, sesiqinise ukuhlinzekwa komthetho wodlame lwasekhaya.

src: domestic violence is now defined to cover those in engagements, dating, in customary relationships, and actual or perceived romantic, intimate or sexual relationships of any duration.
tgt: udlame lwasekhaya manje seluchazwa ukuze luvikele labo abathembisene umshado, abajolayo, ubudlelwano bamasiko, abathandanayo, ubudlelwano bocansi osebuqhubeke noma isikhathi esingakanani.

src: the bill also extends the definition of ‘domestic violence’ to include the protection of older persons against abuse by family members.
tgt: umthethosivivinywauphinde welule ukuchazwa'kodlame lwasekhaya' ukuze ufake ukuvikelwa kwabantu abadala ekuhlukunyezweni ngamalungu omndeni.

src: complainants will be able to apply for a protection order online.
tgt: abamangali bazokwazi ukufaka izicelo zomyalo wokuvikelwa ngeinthanethi.

src: to prevent a scenario where perpetrators can hide past histories of domestic violence, an integrated repository of protection orders will be established.
tgt: ukugwema isimo lapho izaphulamthetho zingafihla imilando yodlame lwasekhaya, kuzosungulwa inqolobane yemiyalo yokuvikelwa.

src: the proposed amendments also oblige the departments of social development, basic education, higher education and health to provide certain services to survivors where needed and to refer them for sheltering and medical care.
tgt: izichibiyelo ezethuliwe ziphinde ziphoqe iminyango yokuthuthukiswa komphakathi, owemfundo eyisisekelo, owemfundo ephakeme kanye nowezempilo ukuthi ihlinzeke ngezinsiza ezithile kwabasindile uma kudingeka nokubathumela ukuze bathole ukukhosela nokunakekelwa kokwelashwa.

src: the circumstances under which a prosecutor can refuse to institute a prosecution when offences have been committed under the amended act or to withdraw charges when it involves the infliction of bodily harm or where a weapon was used to threaten a complainant have been limited.
tgt: izimo lapho umshushisi anganqaba ukushushisa uma amacala enziwe ngaphansi komthetho ochitshiyelwe noma ukusula icala uma kufaka phakathi ukulimala noma lapho kukhona isikhali esasetshenziswa ukusabisa ummangali.

src: in perhaps the most groundbreaking proposed amendment to the act, if someone has knowledge, reasonable belief or suspicion that an act of domestic violence has been committed against a child, a person with disability or an older person and fails to report it to a social worker or police officer they can be fined and even imprisoned.
tgt: uma mhlawumbe ukuchitshiyelwa okuqinile okwethuliwe komthetho, uma umuntu othile enolwazi,ekholelwa noma enezinsolo zokuthi isenzo sodlame lwasekhaya lwenzekile emntwaneni, kumuntu ophila nokukhubazeka noma kumuntu omdala futhi ahluleke ukubika kusonhlalakahle noma ephoyiseni angahlawuliswa noma aboshwe.

src: similarly, failure by a member of the saps to comply with their obligations under the act will be regarded as misconduct and must be reported to the civilian secretariat for police service.
tgt: ngokufanayo, ukuhluleka kwelungu lesaps ukulandela isibopho ngaphansi komthetho kuzothathwa njengokuphula umthetho futhi kumele libikwe kumabhalane wophiko lwamaphoyisa.

src: woza matrics launched dale hes this year’s ma triculants have to faced considerable challenges because of the coronavirus disease (covid19).
tgt: kwethulwe ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lwewoza matrics dale hes uhlelo lwewoza matrics kuhloswe ngalo ukusiza bonke abafundi bebanga lesi12 ukuthi bakwazi ukuphumelela izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src: the department of basic education (dbe) has ensured that the safe reopening of schools is one of its top priorities, along with supporting learners with various programmes to help them successfully complete the academic year.
tgt: abafundi bakama tikuletsheni bakulonyaka kumele babhekane nezingqinamba eziningi ngenxa yesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) .

src: one of these is the woza matrics programme, which was launched on 1 september in collaboration with a number of broadcasting partners and educational experts.
tgt: umnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe) ukuqinisekisile ukuthi ukuvulwa kabusha kwezikole ngendlela ephephile kungenye yezinto eziseqhulwini, ngokuhambisana nezinhlelo ezehlukene zokweseka abafundi ukuze basizakale ekutheni baqede ngempumelelo lo nyaka wokufunda.

src: as part of the programme, catchup lessons on six key matric subjects are being aired on sabc, dstv and openview (channel 122) every day for 12 weeks, from 8am to 10am and 1pm to 3pm.
tgt: olunye lwezinhlelo uhlelo lwewoza matrics , olwethulwa ngokusemthethweni mhla lulu1 kumandulo ngokusebenzisana nabahlanganyeli bezokusa kaza abaningi kanye nongcweti bezemfundo.

src: the goal is to help learners to prepare for their final exams.
tgt: inhloso ukusiza abafundi balungiselele izivivinyo zabo zokuphela konyaka.

src: the platform also provides live lessons, during which learners can ask teachers questions.
tgt: lesi sizindalwazi sohlelo siphinde sihlinzeke ngezifundo bukhoma, laphoke abafundi bezokwazi khona ukuba nethuba lokubuza imibuzo kothisha.

src: exam tips are also provided.
tgt: sizophinde sihlinzeke ngamasu azosiza abafundi.

src: woza matrics recognises that while all learners have lost school time, grade 12s have been the most severely affected, as their marks are extremely important for their career and university acceptance.
tgt: iwoza matrics iye yakubona ukuthi ngesikhathi bonke abafundi belahlekelwe isikhathi sokufunda, ibanga lesi12 lona likhahlamezeke ngokudlulele, njengoba amamaki abo ebaluleke kakhulu kulokho abafisa ukuba yikho kusasa kanye nokuthi izicelo zabo zokufunda enyuvesi zamukelwe.

src: basic education minister angie motshekga says the programme is vital, considering the disruption to learn ing caused by covid19.
tgt: ungqongqoshe wemfundo eyisisekelo uangie motshekga uthi lolu hlelo lubaluleke kakhulu, ikakhulukazi uma ubheka umonakalo omkhulu odalwe yicovid19 .

src: "matric is always stressful, but 2020 has been filled with unusual stresses.
tgt: "umatikuletsheni uhlezi uza nobunzima, kodwa unyaka wezi2020 ubugcwele ubunzima obungajwayelekile.

src: i want to congratulate all our grade 12 learners and their families for their perseverance and determination.
tgt: ngifuna ukuhalalisela bonke abafundi bethu bebanga lesi12 kanye nemindeni yabo ngesineke kanye nokuzinikela kwabo.

src: it is abundantly clear that additional support is required for learners and we will continue to provide this.
tgt: sekucace kwathi bha manje ukuthi ukwesekwa ngokwengeziwe kuyadingeka kulaba bafundi futhi sizoqhubeka sikuhlinzeke lokho.

src: there are a few months left before the end of the year and woza matrics will give learners the support they need to prepare for the final exams," she says.
tgt: zincane kakhulu izinyanga ezisele manje ngaphambi kokuba kuphele lo nyaka futhi iwoza matrics izonika abafundi ukwesekwa abakudingayo ukuze balungiselele ukuvivinywa kwabo kokuphela konyaka," kusho yena.

src: the programme is unique in that it targets the majority of grade 12s in the country who do not have regular access to the internet and connected digital devices.
tgt: lolu hlelo lwehlukile ngokuthi lubheke ikakhulu iningi lalabo bafundi bebanga lesi12 ezweni abangakwazi ukungena kuinthanethi manje namanje kanye nemishini yokuxhumana ngezobuchwepheshe bedijithali.

src: broadcasts will be available to view by most of the 1.2 million learners who are writing matric exams in november.
tgt: izinhlelo zokusakaza zizotholakala ukuze zibukelwe yizigidi eziyi1.2 zabafundi ababhalela izivivinyo zabo zikamatikuletsheni ngolwezi.

src: the council of education ministers has urged all learners and parents to make use of the platform.
tgt: umkhandlu wongqongqoshe bezemfundo unxenxa bonke abafundi kanye nabazali ukuba basisebenzise lesi sizindalwazi.

src: sabc ceo madoda mxakwe says the broadcaster is proud to be part of the initiative.
tgt: umphathi oyinhloko kwasabc umadoda mxakwe uthi umsakazo uyaziqhenya ngokuba yingxenye yalolu hlelo.

src: "we are pleased to be one of the key roleplayers in saving the 2020 matric year.
tgt: "kuyasithokozisa ukuba yingxenye yababambiqhaza ababalulekile ekuvikeleni ukulahleka konyaka kamatikuletsheni wonyaka wezi2020.

src: as a public service broadcaster, we are dutyb ound to ensure that our content includes a significant number of educational programmes, particularly during a period when it is most needed.
tgt: njengomsakazo osiza umphakathi, sizibophezele emsebenzini ukuqinisekisa ukuthi okuqukethwe ngumsakazo kubandakanya izinto ezibalulekile ezinhlelweni zokufundisa, ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi lapho kudingeka khona.

src: "your questions answeredwhat subjects will be covered?
tgt: "imibuzo yakho iphenduliweyiziphi izifundo ezizotholakala?

src: maths geography life sciences physical sciences accounting maths literacy.
tgt: imaths igeography ilife sciences iphysical sciences iaccounting imaths literacy.

src: why were these time slots chosen, because learners could be at school?
tgt: kungani kuqokwe lezi zikhathi, ngoba abafundi kungenzeka babe sesikoleni?

src: school attendance times vary across districts and provinces, due to social distancing measures.
tgt: izikhathi zokuya esikoleni ziyashiyana emikhandlwini kanye nasezifundazweni, ngenxa yokulandela izinyathelo zokuziqhelelanisa kubantu.

src: many matrics will be at home at the time of broadcasting.
tgt: baningi abafundi bakamatiku letsheni abazobe besemakhaya ngesikhathi sokusakaza.

src: a small percentage of learners are also being homeschooled.
tgt: lincane futhi iphesenti labafundi abafundela emakhaya.

src: the main broadcasts will be repeated after 4pm on openview and are available on dstv catchup.
tgt: ukusakazwa kwempela kuzophindwa emva kwehora lesi 4 ntambama kwiopenview futhi kuzophinde kutholakale kudstv catchup .

src: why only matrics?
tgt: kungani kuqokwe umatikuletsheni kuphela?

src: matrics are under the most pressure to plan their postschool lives.
tgt: umatikuletsheni ungaphansi kwengcindezi yokuhlelela impilo yawo emva kokuqeda isikole.

src: matrics have faced more significant disruption to their schooling since march 2020 because their curriculum was not shortened.
tgt: umatikuletsheni uye wabhekana nokuphazamiseka kakhulu ekufundeni kwawo ukusuka ngondasa kowezi2020 ngenxa yokuthi uhlelo lokufunda kwawo aluzange lwafinyezwa.

src: where can i find the viewing schedule?
tgt: ngingazithola kuphi izikhathi zokubuka?

src: the viewing schedule is available in tv guides and on the woza matrics website at wozamatrics.co.za.
tgt: izikhathi zokubuka ziyatholakala kwimihlahlandlela kamabonakude kanye nakuwebhusayithi yewoza matrics ethi: wozamatrics.co.za .

src: repeat broadcasts will be available.
tgt: izinhlelo zokusakaza eziphindayo zizotholakala.

src: is support being provided to parents and teach ers?
tgt: ngakube lokhu kwesekwa kuhlinzekelwe abazali kanye nothisha?

src: yes.
tgt: yebo.

src: the broadcast schedule will have some sessions on tips for parents on ways to support their matric children.
tgt: lezi zikhathi zokusakaza zizoba nesikhathi lapho kunikwa khona abazali amasu ngezindlela zokuthi abazali bangamuseka kanjani umntwana owenza umatikuletsheni.

src: some sessions will focus on teachers and the dbe's teacher connect whatsapp platform will communicate key messages to teachers.
tgt: ezinye zalezi zikhathi zokusakaza zizogxila kothisha futhi inkundla yokuxhumana iwhatsapp yothisha bomnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo izothumela imilayezo ebalulekile kothisha.

src: will there be a focus on dealing with the stresses faced by matrics?
tgt: ngakube kuzokwenzeka yini ukuthi kugxilwe ekub hekaneni nobunzima obubhekene nomatikuletsheni?

src: yes.
tgt: yebo.

src: there will be several sessions focused on providing tips for student wellbeing, coping with stress and managing anxiety.
tgt: kuzoba khona izikhathi zokusakaza lapho kuzogxilwa khona ekuhlinzekeni ngamasu okubhekana nempilo yomfundi, ukumelana nobunzima kanye nokulawula ixhala.

src: court support for gbv victims more matshediso if you have suffered genderbased violence (gbv) and are in need of support at court, the national prosecuting authority (npa) has a specialised service to assist you.
tgt: inkantolo yeseka izisulu zegbv more matshediso uma ngabe uke wakhahlanyezwa ngudlame olubhe kiswe kubulili obuthile (igbv) futhi udinga ukwesekwa enkantolo, uphiko lwezokushushisa lukazwelonke (inpa) lunezinsiza ezikhethekileyo ukukusiza.

src: the ke bona lesedi court preparation programme is available at most sexual offences courts and other courts that deal with gbv.
tgt: uhlelo lwenkantolo ike bona lesedi luyatholakala ezinkanto lo eziningi ezisebenza ngezenzo zokuphula umthetho wezocansi kanye nezinye izinkantolo ezisebenza ngamacala ahlobene negbv .

src: ke bona lesedi means ‘i see the light’ when translated from setswana.
tgt: umusho othi ke bona lesedi uhunyushelwe ususelwa olimini lwesetswana nochaza ukuthi ‘ngiyakubona ukukhanya’.

src: a gbv victim can submit a request to the npa for assistance.
tgt: isisulu segbv singafaka isicelo sosizo kwinpa ukuze sitholeukusizakala.

src: the senior public prosecutor or court preparation manager will then identify an appropriate court preparation officer to assist.
tgt: umshushisiomkhulu womphakathi noma umphathi wenkantolo uzoqoka isikhulu senkantolo ukuze sikusize.

src: "the service does not promise a particular outcome in the case and each individual’s experience is unique.
tgt: "lo msebenzi awuthembisi imiphumela ethile okwamanje futhi udaba lomunye nomunye lwehlukile.

src: nonetheless, it assists with empowerment and restoring the victim’s dignity," says a statement from the npa.
tgt: noma kunjalo, usiza kakhulu ekunikeni amandla futhi ubuyise isithunzi saleso sisulu," kusho isitatimende senpa.

src: there are 161 court preparation officers at various courts across the country.
tgt: kunezikhulu zenkantoloezingama161 ezinkantolo ezahlukene ezweni jikelele.

src: the service is one of various initiatives introduced by government to deal with the scourge of gbv.
tgt: lo msebenzi ungezinye zezinyathelo eziza nohulumeni ukubhekana nesihlava esihambisana negbv .

src: according to the npa, the complainant, victim, survivor or witness will be contacted by a court preparation officer from the court where she or he will testify.
tgt: ngokusho kwenpa, onesikhalazo, isisulu, osindile noma ufakazi bazothintwa yizikhulu zenkantolo zalapho ezothula khona ubufakazi bakhe khona.

src: the court preparation officer will be available to support the complainant at court and throughout the trial.
tgt: isikhulu senkantolo sizoba khona ukuzokweseka lowo onesikhalazo enkantolo futhi kuze kube kuphela ukuqulwa kwecala.

src: specialised tools and techniques are used to visually show the victim that she or he is heard, protected and respected.
tgt: izinsizakusebenza ezikhethekileyo kanye namasu kuzosetshenziswa ukutshengisa isisulu ukuthi siyazwakala, sivikelekile kanye nokuthi sihlonipheke.

src: complainants can speak in their own language and the court preparation officer will ensure that the victim is referred for counselling or therapy, to complete their healing journey.
tgt: lowo onesikhalazo angakhuluma ngolimi lwakhe lwebele futhi isikhulu senkantolo sizoqinisekisa ukuthi isisulu sithunyelwa kwabezokwelulekwa noma ukwelashwa ngengqondo, ukuze baphothule indlela yabo yokupholisa amanxeba.

src: many women and children who have suffered gbv, for example, rape, are anxious about going to court to testify and relate intimate details of events in front of strangers.
tgt: abesifazane abaningi nezingane ezikhahlanyezwe igbv , isibonelo, ukudlwengulwa, ziba nexhala lokuyokwethula ubufakazi phambi kwenkantolo futhi ziveze imininingwane yezehlakalo phambi kwabantu ezingabazi.

src: this service will help them feel more at ease.
tgt: lo msebenzi uzokwenza ukuthi zikhululeke.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: sa media is a key pillar of our democracy vukuzenzele unnamed in many countries around the world, the coronavirus pandemic has required the limita tion of many civil liberties and put social cohesion to the test.
tgt: abezindaba baseningizimu afrika bayinsika yentando yeningi labantu vukuzenzele unnamed emazweni amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, ubhubhane lwegci wane lecorona lunciphise inkululeko yomphakathi lwaphinde lwalinga ubu mbano lomphakathi.

src: but countries with strong institutions, vigilant judicial systems and a robust media have been able to prevent human rights from being undermined and the authority of the state being abused.
tgt: kodwa amazwe anezikhu ngo eziqinile, izinhlelo zobu lungiswa eziqaphile kanye nabezindaba abanamandla akwazile ukugwema ukuthi amalungelo abantu abukelwe phansi nokuhlukunyezwa kweziphathimandla zo mbuso.

src: it has been six months since the national state of disaster was proclaimed.
tgt: sekube yizinyanga ezi yisithupha selokhu kwame nyezelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke.

src: despite the unprecedented nature of the disease and the immense challenge of placing a country of 58 million people under lockdown, we have fared well.
tgt: ngaphezu kwesimo esingakaze sibonwe sesifo kanye nezingqinamba zokubeka izwe elinabantu abayizigidi ezingama58 ngaphansi kokuvalwa kwe zwe, senze kahle kakhulu.

src: we have managed to contain the spread of the disease primarily because of the cooperation and vigilance of all citizens.
tgt: sikwazile ukunqanda uku bhebhetheka kwegciwane ikakhulukazi ngenxa yokuse benza ngokubambisana nokuqaphela kwazo zonke izakhamuzi.

src: this is in no small part due to the sterling work of our media.
tgt: lokhu akuyona into enca ne ngenxa yokusebenza ngokuzikhandla kwa bezindaba bakithi.

src: we owe a debt of gratitude to south africa’s hardworking and tenacious journalists.
tgt: kumele sizibonge kakhulu izintatheli ezisebenza kanzi ma nangokuzimelela zase ningizimu afrika.

src: they have kept our people informed by disseminating key health messages about social distancing and hygiene.
tgt: bezilokhu zinikeza abantu bakithi ulwa zi ngokusabalalisa imiyalezo yezempilo yokuqhelelana kubantu kanye nenhlanzeko.

src: they have done so under extremely trying conditions, often with limited resources.
tgt: zikwenze lokho ngaphansi kwezimo ezinzima, esikha thini esiningi nezinsizakuse benza zinganele.

src: they have told the stories of the effects of lockdown on the lives of people and their businesses.
tgt: zisitshele ngezindaba zemiphumela yokuvalwa kwezwe ezimpilweni zabantu kanye nasemabhizinisini abo.

src: they have been out in the villages, towns and cities, bringing stories of ordinary people and drawing national attention to problems being experienced in hospitals and clinics, prompting government action.
tgt: beziphumile ziye emakhaya, emadolobheni nasemado lobhenikazi, ziletha izindaba zabantu abajwayelekile futhi zidonsa amehlo esizwe ezinkingeni okubhekenwe nazo ezibhedlela nasemitho lampilo, zigqugquzela ukuthi uhulumeni asukume.

src: our media have also shone a light on excesses that perhaps would not have ordinarily come to light.
tgt: abezindaba bakithi basikha nyisele indlela ebesingeke siyibone nje.

src: they have fulfilled their watchdog role by unearthing acts of corruption and maladministration, sparking a massive national debate and leading to a number of highprofile investigations.
tgt: bayifezile indi ma yabo emphakathini ngokuvundulula izenzo zenkohlakalo nokunga phathi ngendlela, basusa inkulumompikiswano enku lu kuzwelonke ekuphenywe ni kwamacala asezingeni eliphezulu.

src: through this reporting they have earned people’s trust.
tgt: ngalokhu kubika kwabo sebezuze ukwethe njwa ngabantu.

src: a free press is not an end in itself.
tgt: inkululeko yabezindaba ayi yona isiphetho.

src: it is a means by which democracy is secured and upheld.
tgt: ingukugcina nokuphakamisa intando yeningi labantu.

src: during this pandemic, our media has played not just its traditional watchdog role, but exercised its civic duty in supporting the national effort to contain the coronavirus.
tgt: ngesikhathi salolu bhubhane, abezindaba bakithi abadlalanga nje indima yabo emphakathini eyaziwayo, kodwa benze umsebenzi womphakathi ekwesekeni umzamo ka zwelonke wokunqanda igci wane lecorona .

src: given the importance of the media to the health of our democracy, it is a great concern that like all other sectors of the economy, the coronavirus crisis has hit our media houses hard.
tgt: ngenxa yokubaluleka kwabezindaba ekuphileni kwentando yeningi yethu, kukhathaza kakhulu ukuthi njengayo yonke eminye imikhakha yomnotho, inkinga yegciwane lecorona ihlasele kanzima abezindaba.

src: some publications lost as much as 60 percent of their income in the early days of the lockdown.
tgt: ezinye izinkampani ezishicilelayo zilahlekelwe ingenisomali engamaphesenti angama60 ezinsukwini zokuqala zoku valwa kwezwe.

src: a number of companies have had to implement salary cuts, reduce staff numbers or reduce hours worked.
tgt: izinkampani eziningi kwamele zinciphise amaholo, zinciphise inani labasebenzi noma zinciphise amahora asetshenzwayo.

src: regrettably, some publications have even been forced to close, among them some of south africa’s most established and wellknown magazine titles.
tgt: okubuhlungu, ezinye izinkampani ezishicilelayo ziphoqeleke ukuthi zivalwe, phakathi kwazo nga maphephabhuku asungulwa kudala futhi aziwa kakhulu eningizimu afrika.

src: the job losses that have resulted from the lockdowns have exacerbated a crisis for media companies already facing challenges like loss of advertising revenues, falling circulation and market share being taken by mobilefirst news and other technologies.
tgt: ukulahleka kwemisebenzi okubangelwe ukuvalwa kwezwe sekwandise inkinga yezinkampani zabezindaba ezivele zibhekene nezi nselele ezifana nezimali zokukhangisa, ukusatsha laliswa kwephephandaba kanye nesabelo semakethe esesihlwithwe izindaba ezikhishwa ngomakhale khukhwini nangobunye ubuchwepheshe.

src: these financial difficulties are being faced across the board, from online titles to traditional broadsheets to the public broadcaster.
tgt: lezi zingqi namba zemali zihlasele yonke indawo, kusuka kuzindaba zakuinthanethi kuya kulwa zi olubhalwe ephepheni kuya kubasakazi.

src: this was one of the issues that was raised sharply during my engagement with the south african national editors’ forum recently.
tgt: lolu olunye lodaba olwa phakanyiswa ngesikhathi sezingxoxo zami zakamuva nje nenkundla kazwelonke yaseningizimu afrika yabahleli isouth african national editors’ forum.

src: instead of lamenting their fate, however, the media industry is working hard to refine business models, to drive innovation and to retain staff as much as possible.
tgt: esikhundleni sokubalisa ngekusasa labo, kunalokho, imboni yabezindaba isebenza kanzima ukuhlela kabusha ibhizinisi, ukuza nezindlela ezintsha kanye nokugcina abasebenzi ngayo yonke indlela.

src: at the same time, the media is a unique entity in any society because its practitioners fulfil a role that is so essential to our democratic order.
tgt: ngaso leso sikhathi, abezindaba bayibhizinisi elehlukile kunoma imuphi umphakathi ngenxa yokuthi abasebenza kulona bafezekisa indima ebaluleke kakhulu kwintando yeningi labantu.

src: they work to keep the public informed and to keep power in check.
tgt: basebenza ukugcina umpha kathi unolwazi nokugcina abaphethe emgqeni.

src: we need more journalists, not less.
tgt: sidinga izintatheli eziningi, hhayi ezimbalwa.

src: that is why the loss of even a single journalist is not just a loss to the industry but to the country.
tgt: yingakho nje ukulahlekelwa ngisho yi ntatheli eyodwa kungalahle kelwa imboni kuphela kodwa silahlekelwa njengezwe.

src: we need our media veterans, who bring with them vast experience and institutional memory, and are able to offer critical reportage and informed analysis.
tgt: sidinga omakadebona bezintatheli bakithi, aba zoletha isipiliyoni kanye nezikhumbuzo zabezindaba, futhi abazokwazi ukuletha imibiko ebucayi nenolwazi.

src: at the same time we need more young journalists in the profession who are techsavvy, abreast with new trends in storytelling and in touch with the concerns of a youthful population.
tgt: ngaso leso sikhathi sidinga izintatheli eziningi ezisenca ne ezazi ezobuchwepheshe, ezihambisana nezindlela ezintsha zokuxoxa izindaba futhi ezixhumene nezinkinga ezibhekene nentsha.

src: as a society we owe the media our full support.
tgt: njengomphakathi kumele seseke ngokuphelele abezindaba.

src: whether it is electing to pay for content, supporting crowdfunded journalism, paying our sabc license fees or simply buying a newspaper, we can all play our part to support this industry in crisis.
tgt: noma ngabe kumele sikhethe ukuthi si khokhele okuqukethwe izindaba, ukusekela izinta theli ezixhaswe ngeminikelo yomphakathi, ukukhokhela amalayisensi akwasabc noma nje ngokuthenga iphe phandaba, sonke singadlala indima yethu ukwesekela le mboni esenkingeni.

src: as government, despite the gloomy economic climate we will continue to extend advertising spend to publications and broadcasters, especially community media.
tgt: njengo hulumeni, ngaphezu kwesimo somnotho ontengantengayo sizoqhubeka nokukhangisa kulabo abashicilelayo na basakazayo, ikakhulukazi abezindaba basemphakathini.

src: the private sector must also continue to support the industry through advertising and working with media houses in the production of innovative content in line with global media trends.
tgt: umkhakha ozimele kumele nawo uqhubeke nokweseka le mboni ngokukhangisa kanye nokusebenzisana nabezinda ba ekukhiqizeni izindaba ezi ntsha ezisezingeni lomhlaba.

src: local philanthropic and donor organisations should also come on board and support public interest journalism ventures, as is the case in many democracies.
tgt: labo abanesihe balapha ekhaya kanye nezinhlangano ezinikelayo kumele nabo bangenelele basekele amabhi zinisi abezindaba, njengoba kunjalo kwintando yeningi labantu.

src: the proliferation of fake news during the pandemic, primarily on social media platforms, has added to the urgency for more news that is accurate, fair and impartial.
tgt: ukwanda kwezindaba ezi ngelona iqiniso ngesikhathi sobhubhane, ikakhulukazi ezinkundleni zokuxhumana, kwengeze isidingo esiphuthu mayo sezindaba eziningi ezinembayo, ezilungile futhi ezingathathi cala.

src: during this time our people have relied on our established media houses for information, once again underscoring their importance as pillars of our democracy.
tgt: ngalesi sikhathi abantu bakithi bathembele kwabezindaba ngolwazi, futhi sibukela phansi ukubaluleka kwabo njengezinsika zentando yeningi labantu.

src: as we begin the great task of rebuilding our economy in the aftermath of the pandemic, the media industry will need our support more than ever.
tgt: njengoba siqala umsebenzi omkhulu wokwakha kabu sha umnotho wethu emva kwemiphumela yobhubhane, imboni yabezindaba izodinga ukuthi siyisekele kakhulu kunakuqala.

src: the free press was once described as ‘the unsleeping guardian of every other right that free men and women prize’.
tgt: inkululeko ya bezindaba yake yachazwa 'njengomnakekeli ongalali walolonke ilungelo elikhulula amadoda nabesifazane'.

src: cge provides access to justice dale hes victims of gen derbased vio lence (gbv) who struggle to find the help and support they need are urged to contact the commission for gender equality (cge).
tgt: icge ihlinzeka ngentuba yokufinyelela kwezobulungiswa dale hes izisulu zodlame olu bhekiswe kubulili obuthile (igbv) ezi sokolayo ukuthola usizo kanye nokwesekwa ezi kudingayo ziyanxenxwa ukuthi zixhumane nekho mishana yokulingana ngobulili (icge).

src: the commission can assist with child maintenance, sexual harassment, gender discrimination and gbv , and offers free legal advice and services to victims.
tgt: icge ingasiza mayelana nemali yesondlo somntwana, ukunukubezwa kwezocansi, ukubandlululwa ngokobulili kanye negbv , futhi inikezela ngokwelulekwa kwamahha la kwezomthetho kanye nezi nsiza kwizisulu.

src: the commission’s mofihli teleki says one of the cge’s roles is to help victims open court cases.
tgt: owalekhomishana umo fihli teleki uthi indima edla lwa yicge wukuthi isize izisulu ukuba zivule amacala enkantolo.

src: "the legal department accompanies complainants to magistrates courts to open domestic violence cases and assists with the completion of necessary forms.
tgt: "umnyango we zomthetho uphelezela lowo onesikhalo ukuya enkantolo kamantshi ukuyovula ama cala odlame lwasekhaya futhi usize ukugcwalisa wonke amafomu okufanele agcwali swe.

src: the commission also plays a monitoring role in cases, including rape and sexual offences, sexual harassment and femicide."
tgt: icge iphinde idlale indima ekuqapheni amacala, abandakanya ukudlwengu lwa kanye nokuphulwa komthetho wezocansi, uku nukubezwa ngokwezocansi kanye nokubulawa kwabesi fazane."

src: the commission can also help a victim to obtain a protection order and often works with the national prosecuting authority to ensure that the victim gets a fair trial.
tgt: icge iphinde isize isisulu ukuthi sithole incwadi yomya lo wenkantolo yokuzivikela kanti futhi isebenzisana nophiko lwezokushushisa lukazwelonke ukuqinise kisa ukuthi izisulu zithola ukugculiseka ngamacala.

src: "in this case, the commission conducts a watching brief and performs its monitoring function over gbv cases and examines key issues, such as insensitive conduct by presiding officers, secondary victimisation of survivors and in sensitive cross examination processes," teleki explains.
tgt: "kulesi simo, icge ila ndela ukubhekwa kafushane kwecala iwatching brief futhi ibhekisise nomsebenzi owe nziwa ngamacala egbv kanti futhi iphinde ihlaziye izingqinamba ezingumgo godla, ezifana nokungabi nazwelo kuziphathimandla eziphethe icala, ukuphinde kuhlukumezeke kabili kwa labo abasindile kanye noku ngabi nazwelo uma ku phoswa imibuzo," kuchaza uteleki.

src: when victims struggle to gain access to justice in domestic violence courts, the commission can act on their behalf, providing legal representation.
tgt: umangabe izisulu ziyaku sokolela ukuthola ubulungi swa ezinkantolo ezibheke lele udlame lwasekhaya, icge ingakwazi ukuzikhu lumela, ngokuhlinzeka ngo kumelwa kwezomthetho.

src: it is also able to refer victims for psychological support.
tgt: iphinde futhi ikwazi ukudlu lisela izisulu ukuze zithole ukwesekwa ngokwengqo ndo.

src: an essential servicethe commission has been functioning throughout lockdown as an essential service.
tgt: insiza ebalulekileicge beyiqhubeka nokuse benza njengenye yensiza ebalulekile nangesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe.

src: transforming the agricultural sector vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the department of agriculture, land reform and rural development (dalrrd) announced that members of the public will be able to apply to lease 700 000 hectares of underutilised or vacant state land in seven of the provinces.
tgt: ukuguqula umkhakha wezolimo vukuzenzele unnamed kamuva nje, umnyango wezolimo, ukuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwezindawo zasemakhaya (idlrd) wamemezela ukuthi amalungu omphakathi azokwazi ukufaka izicelo zokuqasha umhlaba wombuso ongamahe ktha ayizi700 000 ongasetshenziswa noma ohleli nje ezifundazweni eziyisikhombisa.

src: agricultural land is the mainstay of our natural resource base.
tgt: ezolimo ziyinsika yesisekelo sokumbiwa phansi kwe mvelo.

src: the availability and sustainable use of farmland to grow crops and for animal husbandry is key to our very survival.
tgt: ukuba khona nokuse tshenziswa okusimeme kwendawo yokulima izitshalo nokufuya izilwane sizonqoba ngakho.

src: south africa has vast tracts of land suitable for agricultural production, with 37,9% of our total land area currently being used for commercial agriculture.
tgt: iningizimu afrika inomhlaba omningi kakhulu olungele umkhiqizo wezolimo, ama37.9% omhlaba wethu wonke njengamanje usetshenziselwa ezolimo ukuze kuthengiswe.

src: like many other countries, our arable land is under threat from land degradation, water scarcity and urban encroachment.
tgt: njengamanye amazwe, umhlaba wethu ovundile usengcupheni yokuncipha kokuvunda, ukungabi namanzi ngokwanele kanye nokusetshenziswa komhlaba ukwakha kuwona.

src: we are also losing prime agricultural land through landuse changes.
tgt: siphinde silahlekelwe umhlaba wokulima omkhulu kakhulu ngenxa yezinguquko ekusetshe nzisweni komhlaba.

src: given our history, broadening access to agricultural land for commercial production and subsistence farming is a national priority.
tgt: uma sibheka umlando wethu, ukunweba ukufinyelela emhlabeni wokulima imikhiqizo ezothengiswa nokulimela ukuziphilisa kuyinto eseqhulwini kuzwelonke.

src: although the post1994 land reform process has resulted in more land being restored and restituted to black south africans, the pernicious effects of the 1913 natives land act continue to be in patterns of farmland ownership.
tgt: yize uhlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba lwangasemva kowe1994 luholele ekubu yisweni komhlaba omningi wabuyiselwa kubantu aba nsundu baseningizimu afrika, umphumela oyingozi womthetho wangowe1913 womhlaba wabomdabu uyaqhubeka nokubonakala ebunikazini bomhlaba wokulima.

src: the act went far beyond dispossessing millions of people of their ancestral land.
tgt: lo mthetho waqhubeka na ngaphezu kokuphuca izigidi zabantu umhlaba wokhokho babo.

src: with land ownership still concentrated in the hands of the few, and agriculture primary production and value chains mainly owned by white commercial farmers, the effects of our past remain with us today.
tgt: njengoba ubunikazi bomhlaba busesezandleni zabayidlanzana, nokukhiqizwa kwezolimo okukhulu nemisebenzi ehambisana nokukhiqizwa iphethwe ngabalimi abamhlo phe, imiphumela ye sikhathi sethu esedlule isalokhu inathi namuhla.

src: the continued monopolization of a key means of production like land is not just an obstacle to advancing a more egalitarian society; it is also a recipe for social unrest.
tgt: ukuqhubeka nokubusa wedwa emikhiqizweni eba lulekile njengomhlaba akusiso nje isithikamezo ekwenzeni ngcono umphakathi oli nganayo; kuzodala inxu shunxushu emphakathini.

src: the hunger for land to farm is growing, especially amongst the rural poor.
tgt: ukulambela umhlaba wokulima kuyakhula, ikakhulukazi kulabo abadla imbuya ngothi emakhaya.

src: and for a number of reasons, the pace of land reform in this particular sector has been slow and unsatisfactory.
tgt: ngezizathu eziningi, ukuguqulwa ko mhlaba kulo mkhakha ku hamba ngonyawo lonwabu futhi akugculisi.

src: transforming patterns of agricultural land ownership is vital not just to address the historical injustices of the past, but to safeguard our nation’s food security.
tgt: ukuguqula ukuphathwa kobunikazi bomhlaba wokulima kubaluleke kakhulu hhayi nje ukuze kubhekanwe no mlando ongenabulungiswa, kodwa ukuze sivikele ukuphepha kokudla kwesizwe sethu.

src: as noted in the 2019 report of the presidential advisory panel on land reform and agriculture, "whilst we export food, back home 41% of people in rural areas and 59,4% in urban areas have severely inadequate access to food."
tgt: njengoba kubekiwe embi kweni wangowezi2019 wesi gungu eseluleka umongameli ngokuguqulwa komhlaba kanye nezolimo, "ngesikhathi thina sithumela ukudla kwamanye amazwe, emuva ekhaya abantu abangama41% ezindaweni zasemakhaya kanye nabangama59.4% emadolobheni abafinyeleli ngokwanele ekudleni."

src: agrarian reform has been a priority of successive administrations since democracy.
tgt: ukuguqulwa kwezolimo bekulokhu kuseqhulwini kubaphathi abalandelanayo kusukela kwintando yeningi labantu.

src: between 1994 and march 2018 the state has delivered 8,4 million hectares of land to previously disadvantaged individuals under the land reform programme.
tgt: phakathi kowe1994 nondasa kowezi2018 uhulu meni unikeze amahektha omhlaba ayizigidi eziyisi8.4 kubantu abebencishwe amathuba ngaphansi kohlelo lokuguqulwa komhlaba.

src: but this progress amounts to less than 10% of all commercial farmland.
tgt: kodwa le nqubekelapha mbili ilingana nokungaphansi kwe10% komhlaba ophelele wokulima.

src: in my state of the nation address earlier this year i committed that stateowned agricultural land would soon be released for farming.
tgt: enkulumweni yami yesimo sezwe ekuqaleni kwalo nyaka ngazibophezela ukuthi umhlaba wokulima ongapha nsi kukahulumeni uzodede lwa maduze ukuze kulinywe.

src: this is a major milestone in the agrarian reform process, and gives effect to the promise of the freedom charter that the land shall be shared among those who work it.
tgt: lokhu kuyingqophamla ndo ohlelweni lokuguqulwa kwezolimo, futhi lugcina isithembiso esikusomqulu wenkululeko esithi umhlaba kuzokwabelwana ngawo kulabo abasebenza kuwona.

src: our redistributive vision aims to strike a balance between social justice and redress, and enhancing agricultural output by bringing more black farmers into the mainstream of the economy.
tgt: umbono wethu wokuphi nde kwabiwe umhlaba uhlose ukulinganisa phakathi kobulungiswa kwezenhlalo noku lungisa, nokukhulisa imi khiqizo yezolimo ngokuletha abalimi abansundu abaningi emnothweni omkhulu.

src: land is a productive asset that generates profit and can be used for collateral to secure other assets.
tgt: umhlaba uyifa eliletha inzuzo futhi ungasetshenzi swa njengesibambiso ukuzu za elinye ifa.

src: we have to ensure that land acquired for farming purposes is productively used.
tgt: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi umhlaba odingekayo ukuze kulinywe usetshenziswa ngendlela enenzuzo.

src: to safeguard the allocated state land for farming purposes, the lease is not transferrable.
tgt: ukuze siqaphe umhlaba onikeziwe kahulumeni ukuze kuli nywe kuwona, isivumelwano sokuwuqasha asidluliseleki komunye umuntu.

src: beneficiaries will sign a lease agreement with the state and pay a rental fee consistent with the land value.
tgt: abazu zile bazosayina isivumelwano sokuqasha nohulumeni bese bekhokha imali yokuqasha elingana nenani lomhlaba.

src: we must also ensure that farmers are supported along the road to sustainability and profitability.
tgt: kumele futhi siqinisekise ukuthi abalimi bayasekelwa baze basimame futhi benze inzuzo.

src: as part of this programme, beneficiaries will be trained in financial management and enterprise development.
tgt: njengengxenye yalolu hlelo, abazuzile bazoqeqeshwa ngokulawula izimali kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwamabhizinisi.

src: experience has shown that emerging and smallscale farmers often lack the financial skills to exploit market opportunities and integrate with value chains.
tgt: isikhathi esidlule sibonise ukuthi abalimi abasafufusa nabasebancane ba jwayele ukuswela amakhono kwezezimali ukubhekana namathuba ezimakethe kanye nokuzihlanganisa nokwenziwa kwemikhiqizo.

src: we are prioritizing women, youth and persons with disabilities as beneficiaries.
tgt: sibeke eqhulwini abesifazane, intsha kanye nabantu abaphila nokukhubazeka njengabantu abazozuza.

src: there has been demonstrable success with empowering women farmers under the existing proactive land acquisition strategy.
tgt: sekube nempumelelo ebonakalayo ngokuhlomisa abalimi besifazane ngaphansi kwesu lokutholwa komhlaba ipro active land acquisition strategy (iplas).

src: in a number of provinces, women who have been allocated farms by the dalrrd have been able to run them successfully and even move into commercial production.
tgt: ezifundazweni eziningi, abesifazane asebenikwe amapulazi yidlrd bakwazile ukuwaqhuba ngempumelelo futhi sebedlulele ekukhiqizeni imikhiqizo ethengiswayo.

src: in addition to the land acquisition itself, the department continues to invest in infrastructure, equipment and machinery to enable these entrepreneurs to run successful businesses.
tgt: ukwengeza ekutholweni komhlaba ngokwawo, u mnyango uyaqhubeka no kutshala izimali kwingqala sizinda, izinsizakusebenza nemishini ukuze labo somabhizinisi abancane bezokwazi ukuqhuba amabhizinisi aphumelelayo.

src: broadening access to land and opportunities for farming will support job creation and enterprise development, and improve the market for food, agricultural goods and services.
tgt: ukusabalalisa ukufinyelela emhlabeni nasemathubeni okulima kuzosekela ukusu ngulwa kwemisebenzi kanye nokuthuthukiswa kwama bhizinisi, futhi kuthuthukisa imakethe yokudla, izimpahla zolimo kanye nezinsiza.

src: the ultimate goal of releasing these land parcels is to transform the agricultural landscape by growing a new generation of farmers.
tgt: inhloso enkulu yokudedela lezi ziqephu zomhlaba ngukuguqula isimo sezolimo ngokukhulisa isizukulwane esisha sabalimi.

src: leasing land under such favourable conditions must spur them to think big; to not just grow their own businesses but to advance shared wealth and prosperity in the communities in which they farm.
tgt: ukuqasha umhlaba ngaphansi kwezimo ezivunayo kumele kubenze bacabange okukhulu; hhayi nje ukukhulisa amabhizinisi abo kodwa ukwenza ngcono ingcebo okwabelwana ngayo kanye nokuchuma emiphakathini abalima kuyona.

src: how to prevent teenage pregnancy vukuzenzele unnamed there are various ways to prevent teenage pregnancy, including choosing not to have sex until you are married or ready to have children.
tgt: kungavikelwa kanjani ukukhule lwa kwabesifazane abasebancane vukuzenzele unnamed ziningi izindle la zokuvikela ukuthi abesifazane abasebancane bangakhulelwa, lokhu kubandakanya uku khetha ukungazibanda kanyi ocansini kuze kube uyashada noma usukulungele ukuba nezingane.

src: some people think that abstinence (choosing to not have sex until you are married) is oldfashioned, while others think it is morally the best thing to do.
tgt: abanye abantu bacabanga ukuthi ukuzilwa kocansi (ngokukhetha ukungazibandakanyi ocansini kuze kube uyashada) isidala leso, ngenkathi abanye becabanga ukuthi kuyiyonanto elungile ukuthi yenziwe.

src: teenagers, however, need to decide for themselves.
tgt: abesifazane abasebancane, noma kunjalo, kumele bazithathele bona izinqumo ngokwabo.

src: many people do not want to wait until they are married before having sex.
tgt: abantu abaningi abafuni ukulinda kuze kube bayashada ukuze benze ucansi.

src: they also do not want to rush into anything and make costly mistakes.
tgt: abafuni futhi ngokunjalo ukujaha izinto kanye nokwenza amaphutha anzima.

src: they often decide that delaying having sex until they are older, more responsible, in a stable relationship with one partner and have a job, is the best thing to do.
tgt: bavama ukunquma ukuzibambezela ekwenzeni ucansi kuze kushaye isikhathi sokuthi babe badala ngokwanele, bakwazi ukulandela izibophezelo, babe sebudlelwaneni obumileyo nomuntu oyedwa kanye nokuthi basebenze, kuyiyonanto elungile ukuyenza.

src: if you choose abstinence or delaying sex, there are other things you can do to protect yourself: choose your friends care fully.
tgt: uma ukhetha ukungazibandakanyi noma ukuzibambezela kwezocansi, zikhona ezinye izinto ongazenza ukuzivikela: khetha abangani bakho ngokucophelela.

src: friends should want what is best for you and should respect your decision not to have sex.
tgt: aba ngani abazokufunela oku hle futhi abazosihlonipha isinqumo sakho soku ngazibandakanyi ocansini.

src: beware of situations that could be unsafe, like friends drinking or taking drugs, that could lead to unsafe sex.
tgt: qaphela izimo oku ngenzeka ukuthi zinga bi nokuphepha, njenga bangani abaphuza noma abadla izidakamizwa, ezingakuholela ocansini olungaphephile.

src: beware of partners who claim that you will sleep with them if you love them.
tgt: qaphela abantu othandana nabo abathi uzolala nabo uma ubathanda.

src: listen to and learn from those who have gone through teenage pregnancy.
tgt: lalela futhi ufunde kulabo besifazane abasebancane abake bakhulelwa.

src: they know the mistakes and disadvantages.
tgt: bayazi ngalawo maphutha kanye nobubi bakhona.

src: listen to and learn from your parents about their life experiences.
tgt: lalela futhi ufunde kubazali bakho ngezimo aba bhekane nazo empilweni.

src: if you decide that abstinence and delaying sex are not the best decisions for you and you would rather not wait, take the time to learn about protection, including contraception, which is using a method (mechanical or chemical) to prevent pregnancy.
tgt: uma unquma ukuthi ukungazibandakanyi kanye nokuzibambezela kwezocansi izinqumo ezi ngakulungele futhi angeke ukwazi ukulinda, zinike isikhathi ufunde ngoku zivikela, okubandakanya ukuvikela ukukhulelwa, lokhu okusebenzisa indlela (yomshini noma yezithako zamakhemikhali) zokuvikela ukukhulelwa.

src: there are various contraceptives that work in different ways, but they are all designed to prevent pregnancy.
tgt: kunenqwaba yezindlela zokuvikela ukukhulelwa ezisebenza ngezindlela ezehlukene, kodwa zonke zakhiwelwe ukuvikela ukukhulelwa.

src: they include oral contraception, known as ‘the pill’; injectable contraception; and male and female condoms.
tgt: zibandakanya izinto zokuvikela ukukhulelwa eziphuzwa ngowesifazane, ezaziwa ‘njengephilisi eliyisivikela kukhulelwa’; umjovo wokuvikela ukukhulelwa; kanye namakhondomu abesilisa nabesifazane.

src: what can i do if i’m pregnant?
tgt: yini engingayenza uma ngikhulelwe?

src: if you think you might be pregnant, take someone you trust with you to your nearest clinic to have a pregnancy test.
tgt: uma kwenzeka ucabanga ukuthi ukhulelwe, hamba nomuntu omethembayo niye emtholampilo oseduzane uyohlolelwa ukukhulelwa.

src: antenatal care (taking care of the unborn baby) is important and usually starts at eight weeks.
tgt: unakekelo lokhulelwe (lunakekela umntwana engakazalwa) kanti lubalulekile kakhulu futhi luqala uma lowo okhulelwe esenamaviki ayisishiyagalombili okukhulelwa.

src: your local clinic can help you with antenatal care and a healthcare worker will assist you to develop a plan that is suitable for you and your baby.
tgt: umtholampilo wangakini uzokusiza ngonakekelo lokhulelwe futhi umsebenzi wezempilo uzokusiza ukuthi uthuthukise uhlelo olulungele wena kanye nomntwana wakho.

src: building a society that works vukuzenzele unnamed the launch of the presidential employment stimulus last week marks a fundamental shift in our ap proach to tackling unem ployment.
tgt: sivuselela umnotho osebenzayo vukuzenzele unnamed ukwethulwa komzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi ngesonto eledlule kuwuphawu lomnyakazo oyisisekelo ekubhe kaneni kwethu noku swelakala kwemisebe nzi.

src: we are undertaking a farreaching and ambitious public investment in human capital, with the state as both a creator and an enabler of jobs.
tgt: sithatha igxathu elifinyelela kude nelivelele lokutshala izimali zikahulumeni kuba ntu, ngokuthi uhulumeni abe ngumsunguli futhi abe ngumhlinzeki wemisebe nzi.

src: the presidential employment stimulus is unprecedented in its scale and breadth, involving a public investment of r100 billion over the next three years.
tgt: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi uyingqayizivele ngobubanzi bawo, ubandakanya utshalomali lukahulumeni oluyizigi digidi eziyir100 eminyakeni emithathu ezayo.

src: we will protect and create directlyfunded jobs and livelihood support interventions while the labour market recovers from the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt: sizovikela futhi sisungule imisebenzi exhaswe ngqo kanye nokungenelela ekwesekeni izindlela zokuziphi lisa ngesikhathi imakethe yezabasebenzi isalulama kubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src: each of these is ready for implementation, and is additional to existing commitments.
tgt: konke lokhu sekume ngomumo ukuthi kuqale ukusebenza, futhi kwengeza ezibophezelweni ezikhona.

src: while some of the interventions build on the strengths of existing programmes, the stimulus also includes new and innovative approaches.
tgt: ngesikhathi ezinye izi ndlela zokungenelela za khela phezu kwamandla ezinhlelo ezivele zikhona, lo mzamo nawo ubandakanya izindlela ezintsha nezisu ngulwe kabusha.

src: this includes a focus on what we have termed ‘social employment’.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya ukugxila kwesikubiza 'ngokuqashwa komphakathi'.

src: we are working from the premise that there is no shortage of work to be done to address the many social problems in our society.
tgt: sisebenzela phezu kokuthi awukho umsebenzi ongenziwa ukubhekana nezinkinga zenhlalo eziningi emphakathini wethu.

src: the aim is to support the considerable creativity, initiative and institutional capabilities that exist in the wider society to engage people in work that serves the common good.
tgt: inhloso ngukuseka amakho no okudala, okusungula ka nye nawezikhungo akhona emphakathini ngobubanzi ukusebenzisana nabantu abenza umsebenzi ofanayo omuhle.

src: this work cuts across a range of themes, including food security, ending genderbased violence, informal settlement upgrading and much more.
tgt: lo msebenzi ugamanxa ezinhlakeni ezihlukahlukene, kubandaka nya ukuvikeleka kokudla, ukuqeda udlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile, ukuthuthukiswa kwemijo ndolo nokunye.

src: this will supplement the efforts of the public sector, allowing for greater scale and social impact as well as new forms of partnership with diverse social actors.
tgt: lokhu kuzohambisana nemizamo yomkhakha kahulumeni, okuzovumela ubukhulu nokuthinteka kwenhlalo kanjalo nokwakheka kobudlelwano obusha nababambiqhaza abehlukene emphakathini.

src: the stimulus includes a new national programme to employ teaching and school assistants in schools.
tgt: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi ubandakanya uhlelo olusha lukazwelonke lokuqasha abasizi bothisha nabezikole ezikoleni.

src: schools are making these appointments right now, delivering new opportunities in every community across the length and breadth of the country.
tgt: izikole kuyimanje ziyaqasha, zethula amathuba amasha kuyo yonke imiphakathi kulolonke izwe.

src: public employment is not just for unskilled work.
tgt: ukuqashwa komphakathi akuwona nje umsebenzi ongenakhono.

src: there is a crosscutting focus on graduates, with opportunities for nurses, science graduates, artisans and others.
tgt: kugxilwe kakhulu kulabo abaneziqu, abanamathuba obuhlengikazi, abaneziqu zesayensi, abanamakhono omsebenzi wezandla kanye nabanye.

src: the stimulus will also protect jobs in vulnerable sectors that have been hit hard by the pandemic.
tgt: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi uzophinde uvikele imisebenzi emikha kheni entekenteke eshayeke kanzima ngubhubhane.

src: support will be provided to early childhood development practitioners, mainly selfemployed women.
tgt: ukwesekwa kuzohli nzekelwa abasebenzi bo kuthuthukisa ukukhuliswa kwabantwana, ikakhulukazi abesifazane abaziqashe bona.

src: over 74,000 small farmers will also receive production input grants.
tgt: abalimi abancane abanga phezu kwezi74 000 nabo bazohlomula ezibonelelweni zomkhiqizo.

src: as a nation, we need arts and culture to lift our spirits once more – the stimulus provides new funding to help the sector back onto its feet, including support to digital contentcreation and expansion of ecommerce platforms.
tgt: njengesizwe, sidinga ubuciko nesiko ukuphakamisa umoya wethu futhi umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi uhlinzeka ngoxhasomali olusha oluzosiza ukuthi umkhakha ubuyele uzimele, kubandakanya ukweseka ukusungulwa kolwazi ngedijithali kanye nokwandisa izinkundla zokuthengiselana ngeinthanethi.

src: this will enable artists to adapt to the new market conditions that the pandemic has imposed on us all and to seize new opportunities for growth.
tgt: lokhu kuzovumela amaciko ukuthi ashintshele kuzimo ezintsha zemakethe ezilethwe ngubhubhane kithina nokubamba amathuba amasha ukuze akhule.

src: a critical enabler for wider job creation, made more important by the pandemic, is connectivity.
tgt: umsunguli obucayi wemisebenzi eminingi, owenziwe wabaluleka kakhulu ngenxa yobhubhane, ukuxhumana.

src: to overcome the digital divide, the stimulus will provide affordable, highspeed broadband to lowincome households through innovative connection subsidies and the expansion of free public wifi.
tgt: ukunqoba ukwahlukana kwezedijithali, lo mzamo uzohlinzeka ngesivinini sokusebenza kweinthanethi, esingabizi kakhulu kuma khaya anemalingeniso enca ne ngokusebenzisa uxhaso olusha lwezokuxhumana nokufakwa kwewifi yamahhala emphakathini.

src: as our country recovers from the devastation of the coronavirus pandemic, we are in no doubt as to the size of the task before us.
tgt: njengoba izwe lethu lilulama kubhubhane olubi lwe gciwane lecorona, asingabazi neze ngomsebenzi omkhulu osasimele phambi kwethu.

src: we have to achieve an economic recovery that is swift and inclusive.
tgt: kumele sizuze ukuvusele lwa komnotho okusheshayo futhi okubandakanya wo nke umuntu.

src: we have to get as many of our people as possible working again.
tgt: kumele senze ukuthi abantu bakithi abaningi baqalise ukusebenza futhi.

src: we also have to regain lost ground in the provision of basic services and critical infrastructure, addressing social challenges and transforming townships and rural communities too.
tgt: kumele futhi sizithole ukuthi simephi mayelana nokuhlinzekwa kwezinsiza eziyisisekelo nengqalasizinda ebucayi, ukubhekana nezinselele zenhlalo kanye nokuguqulwa kwamalokishi nemiphakathi yasemakhaya.

src: public employment is an instrument that can do all of the above: creating jobs at scale in the short term while markets recover, and creating social value in the process.
tgt: ukuqashwa komphakathi kungakwenza konke lokhu okungenhla: ukusungula imisebenzi yesikhathi esifu shane ngesikhathi izimakethe zisalulama, kanye nokusu ngula ubugugu bomphakathi sikhathi sinye.

src: the example is often cited of the massive public works programme undertaken by the united states after the great depression in the 1930s.
tgt: isibonelo sihlale sishiwo ohlelweni olukhulu lo msebenzi womphakathi owenziwa imelika emva kwesehlakalo esinzima sokuwa komnotho igreat depression ngeminyaka ye1930.

src: this was not just a stimulus, but also promoted social participation and inclusion.
tgt: lokhu kwakungewona nje umzamo, kodwa kwagqugquzela ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi nokuzibandakanya.

src: there are several examples of innovative public employment programmes in the developing world, including in india, ethiopia and here in south africa.
tgt: ziningi izibonelo zezi nhlelo ezintsha zemisebenzi yomphakathi emhlabeni othuthukayo, kubandakanya iindia, iethopia kanye nalapha eningizimu afrika.

src: these programmes make a direct investment in local economies, reaching poorer areas first, supporting local small enterprises and trickling up into the wider economy from there.
tgt: lezi zinhlelo zitshala ngqo izimali eminothweni yase khaya, zifinyelela ezindawe ni ezihlwempu kuqala, ze seka amabhizinisi asekhaya amancane bese ziqhubeke njalo ukusuka lapho ngobubanzi bomnotho.

src: they also promote social participation and inclusion, providing communities with the means to change their lives as they undertake new forms of work.
tgt: ziphinde zigqugquzele ukubamba iqhaza komphakathi nokuzibandakanya, ngokuhlinzeka imiphakathi ngezindlela zokushintsha izimpilo zayo ngokuthatha umsebenzi omusha.

src: in doing so, they contribute to transformation both at a local level and within broader society.
tgt: ngokwenza njalo, zifaka isandla ekwenzeni izinguquko ezi ngeni lasekhaya kanye na semphakathini ngobubanzi.

src: direct public investment to support employment and create economic opportunities that generate social value does more than just tackle the unemployment crisis.
tgt: ukutshala ngqo izimali emphakathini ukuze kwesekwe imisebenzi noku sungula amathuba omnotho azokhiqiza ubugugu bo mphakathi kwenza oku ngaphezu nje kokubhekana nesimo esinzima sokuswe lakala kwemisebenzi.

src: it is responsive, because it uses the state’s resources to respond to local community needs, be it for greener spaces, food security, more early childhood development centres, or for better and more accessible roads.
tgt: kuyaphenduleka, ngoba kusetshenziswa izinsiza zikahulumeni ukubhekana nezidingo zomphakathi, ku ngaba amathafa, ukuvikelwa kokudla, ezinye izikhungo zokuthuthukiswa koku khula kwabantwana, noma ukwenza ngcono imigwaqo futhi ifinyeleleke kalula.

src: it is progressive, because it offers social protection and income security to those who face destitution because they are unable to find work.
tgt: kuyinqubekelaphambili, ngoba kuhlinzeka ngokuvikelwa komphakathi nemalingeniso evikelekile kulabo ababhekene nenhlu pheko ngenxa yokungakwa zi ukuthola umsebenzi.

src: it is an investment in the future, in that it supports the broader economic recovery agenda by urgently getting our people to work on improving our national and municipal infrastructure.
tgt: lokhu kungukubekelela ikusasa, ngenxa yokuthi kusekela uhlelo lokuvuse lelwa komnotho ngokuthola ngokuphuthuma okukhulu ukuthi abantu bethu basebenze ukwenza ngcono ingqalasizinda yethu kuzwelonke nakomasipala.

src: through the interventions in the stimulus, we are creating work for those who need it, while leaving a lasting impact on entire communities.
tgt: ngokungenelela emizameni, sisungula imisebenzi kulabo abayidingayo, ngesikhathi sishiya umphumela oyohlezi ukhona njalo emi phakathini yonke.

src: like public employment programmes across the world, this employment stimulus supports and complements the critical role of the private sector in creating jobs.
tgt: njengezinye izinhlelo zomsebenzi womphakathi emhlabeni jikelele, lo mzamo wamathuba emisebenzi usekela futhi ugcwalisa iqhaza elibalulekile lomkhakha ozimele ekusunguleni imisebenzi.

src: it is countercyclical, in that as the recovery advances, the scale of public employment will decline.
tgt: kuyaphambanake, ukuthi uma ukuvuselelwa komnotho kukhuphuka, izinga lemisebenzi emphakathini lizokwehla.

src: the work experience and skills acquired by beneficiaries of the presidential employment stimulus will improve their prospects of securing formal employment.
tgt: isipiliyoni somsebenzi namakhono azotholwa ngaba zuze kumzamo kamongame li wokusungula imisebenzi kuzovuselela amathemba okuqashwa ngokusemthe thweni.

src: the experience gained is also a pathway to entrepreneurial activity.
tgt: isipiliyoni esitholiwe futhi siyindlela eholela ekuziqa leleni ibhizinisi lakho.

src: participants will improve their skills and capabilities to start their own businesses, and can use the steady income provided by public employment to branch out into other incomegenerating activities.
tgt: aba bambe iqhaza bazothuthu kisa amakhono abo kanye nolwazi lwabo ukuze baqale awabo amabhizinisi, futhi bangasebenzisa imalingeniso ehlinzekwe ngemisebenzi yomphakathi ukuziqalela eminye imisebenzi engabe nzela imali.

src: i have consistently affirmed that the covid19 crisis is also a window of opportunity to build back better.
tgt: ngiqinisekisile ngoku ngaguquki ukuthi isimo esibi secovid19 siyintuba yethuba lokuphinde sakhe kangcono.

src: at this time of great upheaval, we would be doing ourselves no favours by making unrealistic promises that raise expectations, only to come short when they are not met.
tgt: kulesi sikhathi sesiphithiphithi, siyobe asizenzeli kahle uma senza izithembiso ezingeke zifezeke ezinyusa amathemba, bese siya phoxeka uma zingafezeki.

src: this is why each of the jobs and livelihood support interventions is fully funded, with a clear implementation plan.
tgt: yingakho omunye nomunye wemisebenzi nokungenelela kokusekela indlela yokuziphilisa kuxhaswe ngoku gcwele, nohlelo olucace bha lokuqalisa ukusebenza.

src: the employment stimulus is not about vague commitments for some time in the future, but about jobs being created right here and now.
tgt: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi awusikho nje ukuzibophezela okufi phele kwesikhathi esithile esikhathini esizayo, kodwa umayelana nokusungulwa kwemisebenzi lapha futhi njengamanje.

src: the stimulus is the result of extensive consultation with national departments, provinces and metros to rapidly design employment pro grammes that can be rolled out or expanded within six months.
tgt: umzamo wokusungula imisebenzi ungumphumela wokubonisana okujulile neminyango kazwelonke, yezi fundazwe kanye nomasipala ukuze kwakhiwe ngokushe sha izinhlelo zomsebenzi ezizoqala ukusebenza noma zisatshalaliswe ezinyangeni eziyisithupha.

src: the implementing departments and other stakeholders were rigorously assessed on their capacity to implement.
tgt: iminyango ezoqalisa imisebenzi kanye nabanye ababambiqhaza bahlolisiswa ukuthi bazokwazi yini ukuqalisa le misebenzi.

src: in every one of the programmes that fall under the stimulus, opportunities will be widely advertised and recruitment will be fair, open and transparent.
tgt: kuzozonke izinhlelo ezingaphansi komzamo wokusungula imisebenzi, amathuba emisebenzi azo khangiswa futhi nokuqa shwa kuzoba neqiniso, kuvu leleke futhi kube sobala.

src: the goals we have set ourselves are realistic, measura ble and achievable, and draw lessons from past experience and international best prac tice.
tgt: imigomo esizibekele yona eyangempela, iyisilinganiso esilungile futhi iyafezeka, futhi inezifundo kwesidlule kukhona kanye nemisebenzi emihle yomhlaba.

src: our people are ready and willing to work.
tgt: abantu bakithi bame ngomumo futhi bazimisele ngo kusebenza.

src: this vast potential must be harnessed, and our collective skills and capabilities brought to bear in rebuilding our country in the wake of the coronavirus.
tgt: la mandla ama khulu kumele aboshelwe, namakhono nolwazi lwethu oluhlangene sikusebenzise ukwakha kabusha izwe lethu emva kwegciwane lecorona.

src: the presidential employment stimulus provides a respite for families who have endured a long hard winter with greatly reduced income, and for individuals who have spent many years without work.
tgt: umzamo kamongameli wokusungula imisebenzi wethula umthwalo emindenini ebibekezelele ubusika obude obunzima ngemali ngeniso eyehliswe kakhulu, nalabo bantu asebephile iminyaka eminingi bengasebenzi.

src: real, decent work is the right of every human being.
tgt: ngempela, umsebenzi ohloniphekile uyilungelo lawowonke umuntu.

src: avoid becoming a human trafficking victim silusapho nyanda as the number of human trafficking cases being reported increases, it is important that you take steps to ensure your safety.
tgt: gwema ukuba yisisulu sokushushumbiswa kwabantu silusapho nyanda njengoba isibalo sezigameko ezibikiwe zoku shushumbiswa kwaba ntu senyuka, kuba luleke kakhulu ukuthi uthathe izinyathelo zokuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwakho.

src: to avoid becoming a victim of trafficking, you should avoid travelling alone at night or on deserted streets.
tgt: ukuze ugweme ukuba yi sisulu sokushushumbiswa kwabantu kumele ugweme ukuhamba wedwa, ebusuku, noma emigwaqeni engenabantu.

src: it is important that you are aware of your surroundings at all times.
tgt: kubalulekile ukuthi wazi ukuthi kwenzakalani endaweni okuyo ngazo zonke izikhathi.

src: being alert will help spot something that is out of place.
tgt: ukuhlala uqaphile kuzokusiza ukuthi ukwazi ukubona uma kukhona okungekho esimeni.

src: if you notice a person or a car following you, find a crowded place and contact the police or someone you trust immediately.
tgt: uma ubona umuntu noma imoto ekulandelayo, thola indawo ephithizelayo futhi zama ukuxhumana namaphoyisa noma nomuntu omethembayo ngokuphuthuma.

src: traffickers often use the promise of a job to kidnap their victims and will approach potential victims offering them a job or some kind of opportunity.
tgt: laba abashushumbisa abantu bayaye bathembise umsebenzi ukuze bezokwazi ukuthumba izisulu futhi bayaye bazisondeze kwizisulu ngokuzithe mbisa ukuzinika umsebe nzi noma yiliphi elinye nje ithuba.

src: this form of trafficking can happen anywhere – even on social media, at school, in the mall and outside your house.
tgt: lolu hlobo loku shushumbiswa kwabantu lungenzeka noma yikuphi – ngisho nasezinkundleni zokuxhumana, esikoleni, enxanxatheleni yezitolo kanye nangaphandle kwekhaya lakho.

src: make sure you conduct thorough research on potential employers before going to meet them in person for interviews.
tgt: qinisekisa ukuthi we nza ucwaningo olunzulu ngabaqashi ngaphambi kokuba uyohlangana nabo kwinhlololwazi.

src: this can be done by verifying that the company really exists by checking with the companies and intellectual property commission.
tgt: lokhu kungenzeka ngokuthi uqinisekise ukuthi leyo nkampani ikhona nge mpela yini ngokuxhumana nekhomishana yokubhalisa izinkampani nempahla yokuzakhela icompanies and intellectual property commission.

src: you should also tell some one you trust when you are going to an interview and arrange for them to call you after a certain amount of time.
tgt: kumele futhi utshele umuntu omethembayo uma uya kwinhlololwazi futhi ubahlelele ukuthi bakushayele ucingo emva kwesikhathi esithile.

src: if possible, have someone go with you.
tgt: uma kungenzeka, thola umuntu ozohamba naye.

src: be careful when using social media, especially when a stranger offers to help, offers money, a place to stay or a job opportunity in response to something you posted.
tgt: qaphela uma usebenzisa izinkundla zokuxhumana, ikakhulukazi uma umuntu ongamazi efuna ukukunika usizo, ukukunika imali, indawo yokuhlala noma ithuba lomsebenzi ephe ndula kulokho wena ozobe ukubhalile enkundleni yokuxhumana.

src: if you are going out to meet someone new, do so at a public place and let someone you trust know where you are.
tgt: uma uyohlangana nomuntu ongamazi, kwenze lokho ezindaweni zomphakathi futhi tshela umuntu omethembayo lapho ukhona.

src: when going out with children, keep them close and make sure you can see them at all times.
tgt: uma usashaywa wumoya nezingane, zigcine eduze kwakho futhi qinisekisa ukuthi uyazibona ngazo zonke izikhathi.

src: you should never send a child on an errand without a trusted adult to watch over them.
tgt: ungalinge uthume ingane yodwa kungekho mu ntu omdala othembakele ozoyiqapha.

src: recovery on the horizon for sa vukuzenzele unnamed the jacaranda trees are in full bloom across the nation’s capital, heralding the start of summer.
tgt: sekuqala ukuntwela ezansi eningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed izihlahla zejacaranda ziqhakazile kwinhlo kodolobha yesizwe, zenanela ukungena kwehlobo.

src: after a long and difficult winter, the beginning of a new season should fill us with optimism.
tgt: emva kobusika obude futhi obunzima, ukuqala kwesikhathi so nyaka esisha kumele ku gcwalise amathemba.

src: when the national state of disaster was declared in march, our immediate priority was to contain the spread of the virus and provide emergency relief to citizens, communities, workers and businesses.
tgt: ngesikhathi kumenye zelwa isimo senhlekelele kazwelonke ngondasa, okwaba seqhulwini kuthi na kwakungukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegci wane nokuhlinzeka ngosizo oluphuthumayo kwizakha muzi, imiphakathi, abase benzi kanye namabhizinisi.

src: over the course of eight months and with the support of our social partners, we rolled out a comprehensive set of measures to limit the social and economic impact of the pandemic.
tgt: esikhathini sezinyanga eziyisishiyagalombili futhi nangokusekelwa ngesiba mbisene nabo emphakathini, sathatha izinyathelo ezinzulu ukuze sinciphise umthelela ongemuhle kwezenhlalo kanye nomnotho owalethwa ubhubhane.

src: we massively expanded social protection on a scale that has never been attempted before in this country.
tgt: saletha ukuvikelwa ko mphakathi ngezinga elinga kaze libonwe phambilini kuleli lizwe.

src: we are one of the few countries in the world where the right of access to social security is enshrined in the constitution, and we can be proud that during this grave crisis we gave practical expression to this right in many ways.
tgt: singelinye la mazwe ambalwa emhlabeni lapho ilungelo lokuthola ukuvikeleka kwezenhlalo lishicilelwe kumthethosi sekelo, futhi singazishaya isifuba ukuthi ngesikhathi salolu sizi olungaka sibonisile ukunikezela ngaleli lungelo ngezindlela eziningi.

src: in addition to our existing social grants, which reach more than 17 million people every month, we toppedup the old age, disability and child support grants.
tgt: ukwengeza ezibonelelweni zethu ezikhona, ezitholwa ngabantu abangaphezu kwe zigidi eziyi17 nyanga zonke, sengeze izibonelelo zabantu abadala, ezabantu abaphi la nokukhubazeka kanye nesibonelelo sabantwa na.

src: we rolled out a special coronavirus disease (covid19) social relief of distress grant, which has reached some six million people to date.
tgt: saqalisa isibonelelo sokusiza esiyisipesheli secovid19 , esesitholwe ngabantu abayizigidi eziyi sithupha kuze kube manje.

src: this was done within weeks of the national state of disaster being declared.
tgt: lokhu kwenzeka emavikini okumenyezelwa kwesimo senhlekelele kazwelonke.

src: the scale of such an undertaking cannot be understated.
tgt: umsebenzi ongaka angeke wabukelwa phansi neze.

src: to bring this system online there was extensive collaboration between the south african social security agency, south african revenue service, home affairs and many others.
tgt: ukuze lolu hlelo lusebenze kwaba nokusebenza ngo kubambisana phakathi kwenhlangano yezimpe sheni nezibonelelo zikahu lumeni eningizimu afrika, umnyango wokuqoqwa kwentela eningizimu afri ka, umnyango wezasekhaya kanye neminye eminingi.

src: we set up a fully automated application and disbursement process, and integrated multiple databases, including the national population register and the unemployment insurance fund (uif) database.
tgt: senza uhlelo lokuzifakela izicelo nokukhokheleka, futhi lwahambisana nemini ningwane eyehlukene, oku bandakanya uhlu lwenani labantu eningizimu afrika kanye nemininingwane ye sikhwama somshwalense wabantu abalahlekelwe umsebenzi (iuif).

src: we set up new application channels like whatsapp and ussd, and created systems with the commercial banks to enable banking detail verification.
tgt: sabeka izindlela ezintsha zokufaka izicelo njengakuwhatsapp kanye neussd, sasungula nohlelo lokusebenzisana namabhange ukuze sikwazi ukuqinisekisa imininingwa ne yasebhange.

src: this is a remarkable achievement in a very short space of time.
tgt: lena yimpu melelo eyisimanga esikha thini esifushane kangaka.

src: alongside the measures we took to protect and sustain livelihoods, we also supported ailing businesses.
tgt: ezinye izinyathelo esizi thathile ukuvikela nokugci na izindlela zokuphila kwabantu, siphinde sasekela amabhizinisi awayo.

src: we provided relief to small businesses in the form of debt relief, finance, tax payment deferrals and other instruments.
tgt: sihli nzeke ngosizo kumabhizinisi amancane olufana nokusizwa ngezikweledu, ukuxhaswa ngezimali, ukuhlehliswa kokukhokhela intela kanye nezinye izinsizakusebenza.

src: we implemented a covid19 loan guarantee scheme to enable businesses to meet their operational expenses during the lockdown, and are currently looking at how this scheme can reach more companies in need.
tgt: saqalisa uhlelo lwecovid19 lokuqinise kiswa kwemalimboleko ukuze amabhizinisi akwazi ukubhekana nezindlela zawo zokuqhuba amabhizinisi nge sikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe, futhi sisabheka ukuthi lolu hlelo lungafinyelela kanjani ezinkampanini eziningi ezi ludingayo.

src: we provided income protection to workers and relief to business owners through the temporary employer relief scheme administered by the uif.
tgt: sahlinzeka ngokuvikelwa kwemalingeniso kubasebenzi kanye noxhaso kubanikazi bamabhizinisi ngohlelo lwe sikhashana loxhaso lwa baqashi oluphethwe iuif.

src: these were all in direct response to an emergency and were by nature temporary.
tgt: konke lokhu kwakuyindle la yokubhekana ngqo ne simo esiphuthumayo futhi kwakungokwesikhashana.

src: some are now coming to an end, while others have been extended as the labour market recovers.
tgt: okunye sekuyaphela manje, ngesikhathi okunye kwelu liwe njengoba imisebenzi ivuselelwa.

src: the measures we implemented went a long way towards protecting our society from the harsh winds of covid19.
tgt: izinyathelo esazithatha zasiza kakhulu ekuvike leni umphakathi wakithi kwimimoya enamandla yecovid19 .

src: the additional grants helped to prevent millions of people from falling below the food poverty line.
tgt: izibonelelo ezengeziwe zasiza ukugwe ma ukuthi izigidi zabantu zikhahlamezwe ububha.

src: had we not intervened to secure livelihoods and save businesses, the living conditions of our people and the circumstances of thousands of businesses would have been considerably worse.
tgt: ukube asingenelelanga ukuvikela indlela yoku phila kwabantu futhi sisindi se amabhizinisi, izimo zo kuphila zabantu bakithi nezimo zezinkulungwane zamabhizinisi ngabe zaba nzima kakhulu.

src: now we are in a transition from relief to recovery.
tgt: manje sesikwinguquko sisuka kusizo siya ekulula meni.

src: the emergency measures we put in place have laid a firm foundation on which to rebuild our economy.
tgt: izinyathelo eziphuthumayo esizibekile zibe yisisekelo esiqinile esingakhela kusona umnotho wethu.

src: as our focus now shifts to the implementation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, our priority will be to stimulate growth and create jobs.
tgt: njengoba ukugxila kwethu sekubheke ekuqalisweni kokusebenza kohlelo lokwakha kabusha nokuvuselela umnotho, okuseqhulwini kuzoba uku khuthaza ukukhula nokusu ngula imisebenzi.

src: there has already been progress in a number of areas.
tgt: sekube nenqubekelapha mbili ezindaweni eziningi.

src: we are seeing new funding commitments for infrastructure development following an infrastructure project roundtable last week.
tgt: sithola iminikelo embalwa yoxhaso lokuthuthukiswa kwengqalasizinda kula ndela umhlangano wangevi ki eledlule owawumayelana nomsebenzi wengqalasizi nda.

src: a number of employment programmes under the presidential employment stimulus have started.
tgt: izinhlelo eziningi zemi sebenzi ngaphansi kohlelo lukamongameli lokusu ngula imisebenzi seziqalile.

src: we are pushing ahead with economic reforms in areas such as energy and telecommunications.
tgt: siqhubekela phambili nge zinguquko zomnotho ezi ndaweni ezifana nezamandla kanye nezokuxhumana.

src: plans are being converted to action and commitments are being reflected in jobs and opportunities.
tgt: izinhlelo ziguqulwa zibe izenzo kanye nokuzinikela kuyabonakala emisebenzini nasemathubeni.

src: it is all the more critical at this time, more so with the festive season approaching, that we do not become the architects of our own undoing.
tgt: konke kubalulekile kulesi sikhathi, ikakhulukazi ngoba kusondela isikhathi samaho lide, ukuthi kungabi yithina esisonga izandla.

src: the greatest vigilance is required from us all to keep the virus at bay.
tgt: ukuqaphelisisa okukhulu kuyadingeka kithina sonke ukugcina igciwane liphansi.

src: a resurgence at any scale will not just dramatically reverse our health gains.
tgt: ukukhuphuka kwegci wane kuye kunoma iliphi izinga angeke nje kuhlehlise esesikuzuzile kwezempilo.

src: it will choke the green shoots of economic recovery that have emerged, and take us back from spring to winter.
tgt: kuzodicilela phansi imizamo esebenzayo yokuvuselela umnotho ebisikhona, futhi kusibuyisele emuva sisuka kwintwasahlobo siye ebu sika.

src: to prevent a second wave of covid19 infections, we must observe the public health guidelines that remain in place.
tgt: ukugwema ihlandla lesibili lokusuleleka ngecovid19 , kumele silandele imihla hlandlela yezempilo yompha kathi elokhu ikhona.

src: when we fail to wear a mask at a social gathering, when we attend crowded events, we are not only putting ourselves and others at risk.
tgt: uma sihluleka ukugqoka isifonyo uma sihlangene emphakathini, uma sithamele imicimbi enabantu abaningi, asibeki thina nabanye ku phela engozini.

src: we are also putting our economic recovery in jeopardy.
tgt: sibeka futhi nokuvuseleleka komnotho wethu engcupheni.

src: let us all continue to play our part.
tgt: masiqhubeke sidlale indima yethu.

src: the positive actions of wearing a mask, of maintaining social distancing and of regular hand washing helped us overcome the worst effects of the pandemic.
tgt: izenzo zethu ezilungi le zokugqoka isifonyo, zokuqhelelana kanye no kuhlanza izandla njalo kusisizile ukudlula ebungo zini bobhubhane.

src: healthdrink water to avoid dehydration allison cooper severe heat and not drinking enough fluids can lead to dehydration and heatstroke, which can be fatal.
tgt: phuza amanzi ukuze ugweme ukuphela kwamanzi emzimbeni allison cooper ukushisa kakhulu kanye nokungaphuzi izinto eziwuketshezi ngokwanele kungaholela ekupheleni kwamanzi emzimbeni kanye nesifo esidalwa ukushisa kwelanga, lokho okungaholela ekutheni ushone.

src: according to the western cape department of health, the summer heat brings with it a high risk of dehydration, which is a harmful loss of water in the body.
tgt: ngokusho komnyango wezempilo wasentshonalanga kapa, ukushisa kwasehlobo kuza nobungozi bokuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni, lokho okungaba nobungozi bokulahlekelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni.

src: dehydration is usually caused by not drinking enough liquids to replenish the water lost by sweating.
tgt: ukuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni kujwayele ukudalwa ukungaphuzi okusaketshezi ngokwanele ukuze ubuyisele amanzi asuke ephume uma ujuluka.

src: it can also be caused by an illness, that causes vomiting or diarrhoea; and by sweating from a fever.
tgt: kungenzeka kudalwe ukugula, okwenza ukuthi uhlanze futhi/noma ukhishwe isisu; kanye nokuthi ujuluke ngenxa yemfiva.

src: the loss of body fluids does not only occur during hard physical activities, but can also result from walking, gardening or riding a bike, especially in hot or humid conditions.
tgt: umzimba awulahlekelwa uketshezi uma usebenza ngokukhandla umzimba kuphela, kodwa kungenzeka uma uhamba nje, wenza umsebenzi wasengadini noma ugibela ibhayisikili, ikakhulukazi ezimweni lapho kushisa noma kunomswakama.

src: when you are dehydrated, your body cannot function as usual.
tgt: uma usuphelelwe ngamanzi emzimbeni, umzimba wakho awube usasebenza ngendlela ejwayelekile.

src: children younger than five, the elderly and people working outdoors are especially vulnerable to dehydration and heatstroke (a condition caused when your body overheats).
