tgt: izingane ezineminyaka engaphansi kwemihlanu ubudala, abantu abadala kanye nabantu abasebenzela ngaphandle basengcupheni yokuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni kanye nesifo esidalwa ukushisa kwelanga (lokhu ukugula okudalwa ukushisa komzimba ngokweqile).

src: heatstroke is a medical emergency.
tgt: isifo esidalwa ukushisa kwelanga siyisifo esidinga ukwelashwa okuphuthumayo.

src: seek medical help immediately for any of these symptoms: feeling confused or your speech starts to become slow and unclear.
tgt: uma ngabe unalezi zimpawu thola usizo lokwelashwa ngokuphuthuma: ukuzizwa uphithene noma inkulumo yakho iqala ukunensa futhi ingacaci.

src: nausea and vomiting.
tgt: ucanucanu kanye nokuhlanza.

src: rapid, shallow breathing.
tgt: ukuphefumula ngokushesha, okuphansi.

src: heart starts to race.
tgt: inhliziyo iqale ukushaya ngamandla.

src: a throbbing headache.
tgt: ukuqaqamba kwekhanda okungehli.

src: dehydration warning signssome of the early warning signs of dehydration include: feeling thirsty and lightheaded.
tgt: izinkomba ezixwayisa ngokuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeniezinye zezinkomba ezisheshe zivele ezixwayisa ngokuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni zibandakanya: ukuzizwa wonyiwe kanye nesiyezi.

src: a dry mouth.
tgt: umlomo owomile.

src: tiredness.
tgt: ukuhlala ukhathele.

src: having dark coloured, strongsmelling urine.
tgt: umchamo ongcolile, futhi onuka kabi.

src: passing urine less often than usual.
tgt: ukuchama izikhathi ezimbalwa kunalezo ezijwa yelekile.

src: to stay hydrated and avoid heatstroke you should: drink more water than you usually do on hot days.
tgt: ukuhlala unamanzi awenele emzimbeni futhi ugweme isifo esidalwa ukushisa kwelanga yenza lokhu: phuza kakhulu amanzi ukwedlula indlela oyijwayele ngezinsuku lapho kushisa khona.

src: stay inside or in shaded areas.
tgt: hlala ngaphakathi endlini noma endaweni enethunzi.

src: wear a wide rim hat or use an umbrella.
tgt: gqoka isigqoko esiwumhelane noma usebenzise isambulela.

src: always carry a bottle of water with you and drink regularly.
tgt: hlala uphethe ibhodlela lakho lamanzi futhi uwaphuze njalo.

src: take regular breaks from the sun if you work outside.
tgt: thatha amakhefu njalo nje usuke elangeni uma usebenza ngaphandle.

src: cool yourself down by using a spray bottle.
tgt: zipholise ngokuthi usebenzise amabhodlela okuzifutha.

src: babies and childrenparents and caregivers should pay extra attention to children and babies, to make sure they are hydrated.
tgt: izinsana kanye nezinganeabazali kanye nabanakekeli bezingane kumele baqaphe ngeso lokhozi izingane kanye nezinsana, ukuze baqinisekise ukuthi zihlala zinamanzi awenele emzimbeni.

src: breastfeeding moms should feed their babies more frequently when it is very hot.
tgt: omama abasancelisa kufanele ukuthi bancelise izinsana zabo kaningana uma kushisa kakhulu.

src: keep children indoors or in the shade, dress them in light clothing and wipe them down with a damp cloth to help them stay cool.
tgt: gcina izingane zakho ngaphakathi endlini noma emthunzini, zigqokise izingubo ezilula futhi uzesule ngendwangu emanzi ukuze zihlale zipholile.

src: remember to apply sunscreen when they go outdoors.
tgt: khumbula ukuthi uzigcobe ngesigcobo esivikela ukushiswa ilanga uma ziphumela ngaphandle.

src: if children younger than five have watery stools, keep vomiting and are tired, seek medical help immediately.
tgt: uma izingane ezingaphansi kweminyaka emihlanu zikhipha indle emanzi, zihlanza futhi zihlala zikhathele, thola usizo lokwelashwa ngokuphuthuma.

src: also seek immediate medical care if your baby is unable to breastfeed or has sunken eyes and a sunken soft spot (fontanelle) on its head.
tgt: phinda futhi uthole ukunakekelwa kokwelashwa okuphuthumayo uma usana lwakho lungakwazi ukuncela noma amehlo eshone phakathi kanye nendawo ethambile eshone phakathi okhakhayini (ifokothi).

src: in children, other dehydration warning signs include: a dry or sticky mouth.
tgt: ezinganeni, ezinye izinkomba ezixwayisa ngokuphelelwa ngamanzi emzimbeni zibandakanya lezi: umlomo owomile noma onamfukayo.

src: few or no tears when crying.
tgt: izinyembezi ezincane noma zingabibikho uma zikhala.

src: urinating less or fewer wet nappies than usual.
tgt: ukuchama kancane noma amanabukeni amanzi amancane kunokujwayelekile.

src: dry, cool skin.
tgt: isikhumba esomile, esibandayo.

src: irritability.
tgt: ukucasuka.

src: sa overcoming hiv and aids vukuzenzele unnamed as we continue our efforts to manage the devastating coronavirus pandemic, we cannot ignore the other public health challenges that our country faces.
tgt: iningizimu afrika inqoba isandulela ngculazi (ihiv) kanye nengculazi (iaids) vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba siqhubeka nezinyathelo zethu zokulawula ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona olukhahlamezayo, singeze neze sazishaya indiva ezinye izingqinamba zempilo yomphakathi ezibhekene nezwe lethu.

src: for more than three dec ades, our country has been engaged in an ongoing struggle against hiv and aids, which has cost many lives and caused great hardship and suffering.
tgt: sekungaphezu kweminyaka engamashumi amathathu, izwe lethu lazibandakanya emzukuzukwini oqhubekayo wokulwa nehiv kanye neaids, osekudlule nemiphefumulo yabantu abaningi futhi kwadala ubunzima ezimpilweni zabantu kanye nokuhlupheka.

src: since the outbreak of cov id19 in the country, with the nationwide lockdown and the pressure on our health facilities, many hiv , aids and tuberculosis services have suffered.
tgt: selokhu kwabheduka icovid19 ezweni, okwaba nokuvalwa kwezwe jikelele kanye nengcindezi kwizinsiza zethu zezempilo, ziningi izinsiza zehiv , zeaids kanye nesifo sofuba ezikhinyabezekile.

src: this has posed a challenge for people testing and starting antiretroviral treatment.
tgt: lokhu kuphose inselele kubantu abahlolayo kanye nabaqala imishanguzo yokudambisa igciwane.

src: many people found it difficult to collect their medicines and fewer people accessed other services, such as voluntary male medical circumcision.
tgt: baningi abantu abakuthola kunzima kakhulu ukuyolanda imithi yabo futhi bancane abantu aba kwazi ukufinyelela kwezinye izinsiza nje, ezifana nokusokwa kwabesilisa ngokuzithandela.

src: at the same time, there are many lessons that have been learnt from our public health response to the coronavirus pandemic that can strengthen our fight against hiv and tb.
tgt: ngesikhathi esifanayo, ziningi izifundo esizifunde ngezempilo yomphakathi wethu ekubhekaneni nobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona nokungasiqinisa amandla empini yokubhekana nehiv kanye nesifo sofuba.

src: south africa continues to have the largest number of people living with hiv in the world.
tgt: iningizimu afrika isalokhu iqhubeka nokuhamba phambili ngokuba nesibalo esiphezulu sabantu abaphila nehivemhlabeni jikelele.

src: it is encouraging, however, that over the last decade we made progress in reducing the number of new hiv infections in the population by nearly 60%.
tgt: noma kunjalo, kuyakhuthaza, ukuthi eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule sikwazile ukuba nenqubekelaphambili yokwehlisa izinga lokwesuleleka okusha ngegciwane lehiv emphakathini onenanibantu elilinganiselwa kuma60%.

src: it is also encouraging that hiv infections in adolescent girls and young women have significantly declined in the last decade.
tgt: kuyakhuthaza futhi ukuthi ukwesuleleka ngehiv kwamantombazane asethombile kanye nabesifazane abasebancane kwehle ngamalengiso eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule.

src: this is a crucial group because they are much more likely to be at risk of getting hiv .
tgt: leli yiqembu elibalulekile ngoba liyaye libe sengcupheni enkulu yokuthi lisuleleke ngehiv .

src: our treatment programme has contributed to a reduction in the number of deaths due to aids by 60%.
tgt: uhlelo lwethu lokwelapha selufake isandla ekwehliseniinani labantu ababulawa yiaids ngamaphesenti angama60.

src: there has been a greater reduction in hivrelated deaths among young people.
tgt: sekube nokwehla ngamalengiso ukushona kwabantu abasha okuhlobene nehiv .

src: it was possible to reduce the number of deaths because we, together with our partners, have rolled out an extensive antiretroviral programme reaching millions of people living with the disease.
tgt: kube lula ukwehlisa inani labashonayo ngoba, sisebenzisana nalabo ababambe iqhaza, siqalise ngohlelo lwemishanguzo eﬁ nyelela kubantu abayizigidi abaphila nalesi sifo.

src: at the beginning of the decade, our programme to prevent mother to child transmission (pmtct) of hiv had very low coverage.
tgt: ekuqaleni kweminyaka eyishumi, uhlelo lwethu lokuvikela ukwesuleleka ngesandulela ngculazi okuqhamuka kumama kuya enganeni (ipmtct) kube kuncane kakhulu.

src: now we have one of the highest rates of coverage of pmtct in southern africa, which has substantially reduced rates of infection among children.
tgt: njengamanje sesinezinga eliphezulu kakhulu lepmtct ngaseningizimu neafrika, osekuphinde kwehlisa kakhulu izinga lokwesuleleka ezinganeni.

src: while we have reduced deaths and new infections, we still are far from reaching the goal we committed ourselves in 2016 of achieving a 75% reduction in hiv infections by 2020. if we succeed in doing so, we are likely to end aids as a public health threat by 2030. unfortunately, we are not there yet.
tgt: nakuba sikwehlisile ukushona kanye nokwesuleleka okusha, sisekude kakhulu ekufezeni umgomo wethu esawubekangonyaka wezi2016 wokufinyelela ngempumelelo ekunciphiseni ukwesuleleka ngehiv ngamaphesenti angama75 ngonyaka wezi2020.

src: we have to do far more to ensure that young people are empowered to prevent infections, including through changing behaviour, accessing condoms and testing regularly.
tgt: uma singaphumelela ekwenzeni lokho, hleze singakwazi ukuqeda iaids njengenye yezinsongo zesihlava esibi kwezempilo yomphakathi ngonyaka wezi2030.

src: we need to work harder on hiv prevention among key populations, including sex workers, men who have sex with men, and people who inject drugs.
tgt: kusamele sikhuphule amasokisi ukuze siqi nisekise ukuthi abantu abasha bayakhuthazwa ukuthi banqande ukwesuleleka, kubandakanyaukushintsha indlela yokuziphatha, ukufinyelela kumakhondomu kanye nokuhlala ngokuhlolela leli gciwane.

src: we must end the stigma and discrimination towards these populations.
tgt: kufanele siqinisekise ukuthi noma ngubani osehaqwe yileli gciwane uyakwazi ukuﬁ nyelela ekwelashweni kanye nasekunakekelweni.

src: we cannot hope to end hiv if we ignore the needs, concerns and rights of any part of our population.
tgt: kufanele ukuthi sisebenze ngokuzikhandla ekunqandeni ihiv phakathi kwabantu abahamba phambili ekwesulelekeni, okubandakanya abadayisa ngomzimba, abesilisa abazibandakanya ocansini nabanye besilisa, kanye nabantu abazijova ngezidakamizwa.

src: south africa needs to increase efforts to medically circumcise young men to reduce their risk of acquiring hiv .
tgt: iningizimu afrika kufanele ukuthi ikhuphule amasokisi ezinyathelweni zayo zokuthi kusokwe abesilisa abasha ukuze kuncishiswe ubungozi bokuthi bathole ihiv .

src: unsafe circumcision should not leave young men with lifelong health problems, and no one should die from circumcision.
tgt: ukusokwa okungaphephile akumele neze kugcine kunika abesilisa abasha izinkinga zempilo zangunaphakade, futhi akukho namunye okufanele ukuthi abulawe ukusokwa.

src: we must make sure that young men have safe circumcision.
tgt: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi abesilisa abasebasha basokwa ngendlela ephephile.

src: we are encouraged by findings of a recent study on preexposure prophylaxis (prep).
tgt: sigqugquzelwa yimiphumela yocwaningo lwakamuva olumayelana nezindlela zokuvikelwa kwesandulela ngculazi ipreexposure prophylaxis( iprep).

src: unlike antiretroviral treatment that is given to people who are hiv positive, prep involves the regular use of antiretroviral drugs by hiv negative people to prevention infection.
tgt: alufani nemishanguzo yokwelapha yona enikwa abantu asebevele behaqwe yihiv , iprep ihlanganisa phakathiukusetshenziswa njalo kwezidakamizwa zemishanguzo ngabantu abangakahaqwa yihiv ukuze kunqandwe ukwesuleleka.

src: the study, conducted by scientists from the hiv prevention trials network, found that longacting injections once every eight weeks was better than the daily tablet used for hiv prevention.
tgt: ucwaningo, olwenziwe ngososayensi bethimba lehiv prevention trials network, luthole ukuthi ukuthola imijovo esebenza isikhathi eside kanye emva kwamaviki ayisishiyagalombili yayingcono kakhulu ukwedlula amaphilisi asetshenziselwa ukunqanda ihiv .

src: these findings have the potential to significantly strengthen our response to the epidemic.
tgt: le miphumela inamandla kakhulu ekuqiniseni amandla ethu okubhekana nalo mqedazwe.

src: if we are to succeed in ending aids as a public health threat within the next decade, we need to combine these medical breakthroughs with fundamental changes in behaviour.
tgt: uma sifuna ukuqeda ngempumelelo iaids njengensongo yesihlava sezempilo yomphakathi eminyakeni eyishumi ezayo, kufanele ukuthi sihlanganise le ntuthuko yokwelapha ngokwenza izinguquko ezibalulekile ekuziphatheni.

src: we also need to tackle the economic and social conditions that contrib ute to high rates of infection.
tgt: kufanele futhi ukuthi sibhekane nomnotho kanye nezimo zenhlalo nokuyizona ezinesandla emazingeni aphezulu okwesuleleka.

src: one of our central tasks is to empower adolescent girls and young women, educationally, economically and socially.
tgt: omunye wemisebenzi yethu obaluleke kakhulu ukunika amandla amantombazane asethombile kanye nabesifazane abasha, ngemfundo, ngomnotho kanye nangenhlalo.

src: they need to be able to make their own decisions about every aspect of their lives, including their sexuality and sexual behaviour.
tgt: kufanele ukuthi bakwazi ukuthathaizinqumo ngazo zonke izindlela ngempilo yabo, kubandakanya ububili babo kanye nendlela yokuziphatha ehambiselana nezocansi.

src: ultimately, we will achieve the end of aids through the empowerment of young people, women and other people at risk.
tgt: ekugcineni, sizophumelela ekuqedeni iaids ngokunika abantu abasha amandla, abesifazane kanye nabanye abantu abasengcupheni.

src: this includes empowerment through access to information, advice and support.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya ukunikwa amandla ngokukwazi ukufinyelela kulwazi, iseluleko kanye nokusekela.

src: it includes access to education and economic opportunities, especially for young women.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya ukukwazi ukufinyelela kwimfundo kanye namathubaomnotho, ikakhulukazi abesifazane abasebasha.

src: empowerment also means that every person must have access to testing, treatment and other health services.
tgt: lokhu kunikwa amandla kuphinde kuchaze ukuthi wonke umuntu kumele akwazi ukufinyelela ekuhlolweni, ukwelashwa kanye nezinye izinsiza zezempilo.

src: another chance to get your matric cathy grosvenor it is never too late to get your matric or to achieve the results you want, is the message behind the department of basic edu cation’s (dbe) second chance matric support programme.
tgt: ithuba lesibili lokuthi uzitholele umatikuletsheni wakho cathy grosvenor asikapheli isikhathi sokuthi ungazitholela umatikuletsheni wakho noma uthole imiphumela oyifunayo, lona ngumlayezo wakamuva nje wohlelo lomnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe) lwethuba lesibili lokwesekela umatiku letsheni.

src: director of the programme, dr sandy malapile, says a matric qualification is an absolute necessity because without it, many doors of opportunity remain closed.
tgt: umqondisi wohlelo, udkt usandy malapile, uthi isitifiketi sikamatikuletsheni sibaluleke ngendlela eyisimanga ngoba ngaphandle kwaso,iminyango yamathuba eminingi ihlala ivalekile.

src: "sector training and education authorities (setas), tasked with upskilling the nation through skills programmes and apprenticeships, also require that candidates have a matric," says dr malapile.
tgt: "inhlangano yomkhakha wokuqeqesha kanye neziphathimandla zemfundo (isetas), izinikele emsebenzini wokukhuphula izinga lamakhono esizwe ngezi nhlelo zamakhono kanye nokuqeqeshelwa ukufundela umsebenzi, kanti konke lokho kudinga ukuthi abafundi babe nomatikuletsheni," kusho udkt malapile.

src: launched in january 2016, the second chance programme supports anyone – of any age – who wants to achieve or improve a matric qualification, subjectbysubject and on a parttime basis.
tgt: lwethulwa ngokusemthethweni ngomasingana kowezi2016, lolu hlelo lwethuba lesibili lwesekela wonke umuntu – wanoma yimuphi unyaka wobudala – ofuna ukuthola noma enze ngcono imiphumela yesitifiketi sikamatikuletsheni, isifundo ngesifundo kanti futhi lokhu kwenzeka ngokufunda ngezikhathi ezithile.

src: there are no costs involved.
tgt: konke lokhu kumahhala.

src: people who want to im prove their matric results, whether they wrote matric recently or even decades ago.
tgt: ngabantu abafuna ukwenza ngcono imiphumela yabo kamatikuletsheni, okungaba yilabo abasanda kubhala noma labo ababhala eminyakeni eyishumi eyedlule.

src: dr malapile explains that a person wanting to obtain an engineering qualification, for in stance, might need to im prove their mathematics mark to qualify for the course.
tgt: udkt malapile uyachaza ukuthi umuntu ofuna ukuthola isiqu sobunjiniyela, njengesibonelo nje, kumele ukuthi anyuse amamaki akhe ezibalo ukuze afaneleke ukwenza lolo hlelo lomkhakha wezifundo.

src: people who failed matric and want a second chance at passing.
tgt: abantu abangazange baphumelela umatikuletsheni wabo futhi abafuna ithuba lesibili ukuze baphase.

src: people who left school after passing grade 9 (then standard 7), are 21 or older, and wish to obtain their matric.
tgt: abantu abashiya phansi isikole emva kokuphasa ibanga lesishiyagalolunye (owawubizwa ngostanda rd 7 phambilini), abaneminyaka engama21 noma ngaphezulu, futhi abafisa ukuthola umatikuletsheni wabo.

src: how to get startedregister at one of the 75 dis trict education offices across the country or online at this website: www.
tgt: uqala kanjani kulolu hlelobhalisa kwelilodwa lamahhovisi ezemfundo ezifundeni ezingama75 ezweni jikelele noma ubhalise ngeinthanethi kule webhusayithi ethi: www.

src: eservices.
tgt: eservices.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: za.
tgt: za .

src: registration opened on 1 october and will close in february 2021. learners either study on their own or at one of the 133 second chance centres where facetoface learning takes place afterhours and on weekends.
tgt: ukubhalisa kwavulwa mhla lu1 kumfumfu kanti futhi kuzovalwa ngonhlolanja kowezi2021.

src: dr malapile says only the top performing teachers in each district are employed at these centres.
tgt: abafundi abazifundela ngokwabo noma kwe sisodwa sezikhungo zethuba lesibili ezingama133 lapho ukufunda kwenzeka khona emakilasini nsuku zonke ngezikhathi zamantambama kanye nangezimpelasonto.

src: the centres are not available in every town and village, but are located in areas where the greatest number of people have registered, which means their location could change each year.
tgt: lezi zikhungo azitholakali kuwo wonke amadolobha kanye namakhaya, kodwa zitholakala ezindaweni lapho kunesibalo esiningi kakhulu sabantu ababhalisile kanti lokho kuchaza ukuthi ukubekwa kwesikhungo endaweni kungashintshashintsha unyaka nonyaka.

src: both facetoface learners and learners who study at home have access to a full range of study support services, from lessons broadcast on radio and television at specific times; to downloadable online material; and, for those without access to computers, printers and the inter net−printed study material is sent to them by the dbe.
tgt: womabili amaqembu abafundi laba abazofundela emakilasini nsuku zonke kanye nalabo abazofundela emakhaya banethuba lokuthi bafinyelele kunoma yiluphi uhlobo lwezinsiza ezikhona zokwesekela ukufunda, kusuka ezifundweni ezethulwa ngezinhlelo zokusakaza emsakazweni kanye nakumabonakude ngezikhathi ezithile; izinsizakufunda ezifakwayo nezitholakala ngeinthanethi; futhi, labo abangakwazi ukufinyelela kumakhompyutha, amaprinta kanye neinthanethi izinsizakufunda eziprintiwe zithunyelwa yidbe kubona.

src: people with a computer but no internet or data, may request a cd with all the study material, which will be mailed to them.
tgt: abantu abanawo amakhompyutha kodwa abanganayo iinthanethi noma amadatha, bengacela icd enazo zonke izinsizakufunda, nezothunyelwa kubona ngeposi.

src: "many adult learners may not have lots of time to devote to their studies.
tgt: "baningi abafundi asebebadala abangeke besakwazi ukunikela isikhathi sabo sonke ezifundweni zabo.

src: luck ily, they may decide how many subjects they want to do a year because they do not have to complete their matric within a set time.
tgt: ngenhlanhla enkulu, bangazikhethe la ukuthi bafuna ukwenza izifundo ezingaki ngonyaka ngoba abaphoqelekile ukuthi baqede umatikuletsheni wabo ngesikhathi esinqunyiwe."

src: "once registered, the dbe will help each older learner choose the subjects they want to do and explain which ones are compulsory.
tgt: uma sebebhalisile, idbe izosiza abafundi asebebadala ukuthi bakhethe izifundo abafuna ukuzenza futhi ibachazele ukuthi yiziphi okuyimpoqo ukuthi bazenze.

src: on qualifying, people who left school after 2008 receive a national senior certificate and those who left school earlier, receive an amended senior certificate.
tgt: mayelana nokufaneleka yilolu hlelo, abantu abayeke isikole emva konyaka wezi2008 bathola isitifiketi sikamatikuletsheni sikazwelonke kanti futhi labo abayeke isikole ngaphambi kwalokho, bathola isitifiketi sikamatikuletsheni esichitshiyelwe.

src: however, dr malapile says both qualifications carry the same weight and, depending on the subjects taken and marks achieved, can be used to apply to universities and colleges.
tgt: noma kunjalo, udkt malapile uthi zombili lezi zitifiketi zinomthamo wesisindo olinganayo fu thi, kuya ngohlobo lwezifundo olukhethile kanye namamaki owatholile, zingasetshenziswa ukufaka izicelo zokufunda emanyuvesi kanye nasemakolishi.

src: giving second chancesthe dbe holds community roadshows to encourage people to enrol for the second chance programme.
tgt: ukunikwa amathuba esibiliidbe isingatha imikhankaso yasemgwaqeni kuzwelonke ukuze ikhuthaze abantu ukuthi babhalisele uhlelo lwethuba lesibili.

src: tertiary education institutions and setas are invited to provide as much information as possible to interested people.
tgt: izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme kanye namaseta ziyamenywa ukuthi zihlinzeke ngolwazi olwanele kubantu abanentshisekelo lapho kungenzeka khona.

src: at many of these roadshows, minister angie mot shekga was asked by youth to introduce programmes that could assist young people to be more employable, says dr malapile.
tgt: kweminingi yale mikhankaso yasemgwaqeni kuzwelonke, ungqongqoshe uangie motshekga wacelwa yintsha ukuthi ethule izinhlelo ezizosiza abantu abasha ukuthi bakwazi ukuqasheka, kusho udkt malapile.

src: in response, the dbe is launching a skills development programme this year that will target about 3.4 million young people who are not in employment, education or training.
tgt: impendulo kulokho, idbe izobeka ngokusemthethweni uhlelo lokuthuthukiswa kwamakhono kulo nyaka noluzoheha abantu ababalelwa kwizigidi eziyi3.4 zabantu abasha abangasebenzi, abangafundi noma abangekho ngaphansi kokuqeqeshwa.

src: courses will range from life skills – covering topics such as how to write a cv and what to do at a job interview; to basic skills courses, such as shoe repair, basic itc and literacy.
tgt: izifundo zizoqala kumakhono empilo – okuzoqukatha izihloko ezifana nokuthiibhalwa kanjani imininingwane yakho yesicelo somsebenzi (icv) kanye nokuthi yini okulindeleke ukuthi uyenze kwinhlololwazi yomsebenzi; izifundo zamakhono eziyisisekelo, njengokulungisa izicathulo, isifundo sokuqeqeshelwa ikhompyutha (iict) kanye nekhono lokufunda kanye nokubhala.

src: did you know?
tgt: vbewazi ukuthi?

src: regardless of whether you left school in the 60s or recently, you have to study the current curriculum.
tgt: akukhathaleki uku thi isikole usiyeke ngeminyaka yama60 noma kamuva nje, kumele ufunde ngohlelo lwezifundo lwamanje.

src: a better 2021 for all south africans the first weeks of the year have been difficult for all south africans.
tgt: unyaka wezi2021 ongcono kubantu baseningizimu afrika amaviki okuqala onyaka abe nzima kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: vukuzenzele unnamed the coronavirus pandemic has gotten worse, with new infections increasing far faster and far higher than before.
tgt: vukuzenzele unnamed ubhubhane lwegciwane lecorona luye lwaba nzima kakhulu, nokusuleleka okusha kwakhuphuka ngesivinini esikhulu futhi kwaya phezulu kakhulu kunakuqala.

src: hospitals have been under great strain as more people have needed medical attention.
tgt: izibhedlela zibe ngaphansi kwengcindezi enkulu njengoba abantu abaningi bebedinga ukulashwa.

src: while most economic sectors have been able to operate again for several months, it will take some time for the economy to recover and for lost jobs to be restored.
tgt: ngesikhathi imikhakha yezomnotho eminingi ikwazile ukusebenza futhi izinyanga eziningana, kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi umnotho uphinde usimame nokubuyiselwa kwemisebenzi elahlekile.

src: as the new year starts, many families are still feeling the effects of the pandemic on their lives and livelihoods.
tgt: njengoba unyaka omusha uqala, imindeni eminingi isakhahlamezekile ngenxa yobhubhane ezimpilweni zabo nasendleleni yabo yokuphila.

src: the world is now entering the second year of the coronavirus pandemic.
tgt: umhlaba usungena onyakeni wesibili wobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona.

src: for south africa, as for most countries around the world, the year 2021 will be extremely challenging.
tgt: iningizimu afrika, njengamanye amazwe amaningi emhlabeni jikelele, unyaka wezi2021 uzoba nenselele kakhulu.

src: the second wave of covid19 infections may well be followed by further waves, which will threaten both the health of our people and the recovery of our economy.
tgt: ihlandla lesibili lokusuleleka ngecovid19 lingalandelwa ngezinye izigaba zokwesuleleka, okuzobeka engcupheni impilo yabantu bakithi kanye nokuvuselelwa komnotho wethu.

src: difficult as this year will be, i am certain that we will overcome the pandemic and set our country firmly on the path to recovery.
tgt: noma ngabe lo nyaka uzoba nzima kangakanani, ngiqinisekile ukuthi sizolunqoba lolu bhubhane sibeke izwe lethu endleleni eya ekululameni.

src: my confidence comes from the south african people.
tgt: ukuzithemba kwami kuvela kubantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: if i look at how south africans responded to this crisis from the moment the virus arrived on our shores, i have no doubt that we have the resilience, discipline and ability to defeat this disease.
tgt: uma ngibheka indlela abantu baseningizimu afrika ababhekane ngayo nalolu sizi kusuka kwaqubuka igciwane ezweni lakithi, anginalo ungabazane ukuthi siqinile, sineziyalo futhi singakwazi ukunqoba lesi sifo.

src: certainly there were exceptions, but the vast majority of south africans understood the need for restrictions on their movement and activities, and complied with the regulations that we had to put in place.
tgt: yebo kukhona abebehlukile, kodwa iningi labantu baseningizimu afrika lasiqonda isidingo semikhawulo ekuhambahambeni kanye nasekwenzeni imisebenzi ethile, futhi bayithobela imithethonqubo okwakufanele ibekwe.

src: even more important than compliance, most south africans took responsibility for themselves and for others, following advice on issues like social distancing, wearing a mask and hand washing.
tgt: futhi okubaluleke ukudlula ukuthobela imithethonqubo, abantu abaningi baseningizimu afrika bazibophezela bona kanye nabanye, ngokulandela iseluleko odabeni olufana nokuqhelelana, ukugqoka isifonyo kanye nokuhlanza izandla.

src: and where we fell short, we have, sadly, seen the consequences.
tgt: futhi lapho esingenzanga kahle khona, sikwazile, ngebhadi, sikubonile ukushayeka.

src: we now know about the risks of closed spaces and crowded gatherings, of not wearing masks and not keeping our distance from others.
tgt: manje sesiyazi ngobungozi bezindawo ezivalekile nemibuthano enesiminyaminya, bokungagqoki izifonyo nokungaqhelelani kwabanye.

src: this bodes well for the year ahead.
tgt: lokhu kuluphawu oluhle onyakeni esiya kuwo.

src: we now know much more about the disease and how to prevent its spread.
tgt: manje sesazi okuningi ngalesi sifo nokuthi singakugwema kanjani ukubhebhetheka kwaso.

src: and despite what one could call ‘pandemic fatigue’, we are no less determined as south africans to do what needs to be done.
tgt: naphezu kokuba omunye angakubiza ngokuthi 'ukukhathaliswa ngubhubhane', ukuzimisela kwethu akwehlile neze njengabantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi senze lokho okumele sikwenze.

src: as we adhere even more rigorously to the basic prevention measures, we will also be rolling out a mass vaccination campaign.
tgt: njengoba sithobela kakhulu kunakuqala izinyathelo zokugwema ukusuleleka ngegciwane, sizophinde siqalise umkhankaso omkhulu wokugoma.

src: as more and more people are vaccinated, we will both save lives and progressively reduce the risk of infection across the population.
tgt: uma abantu abaningi begonywa, sizosindisa izimpilo futhi siqhubeke nokunciphisa ubungozi bokusuleleka kubantu.

src: getting enough vaccines as quickly as possible – and making sure that they reach the people who need them – will be one of the biggest tasks of the year.
tgt: ukuthola imigomo eyanele ngokushesha okukhulu nokuqinisekisa ukuthi ifikelela kubantu abayidingayo kuzoba omunye wemisebenzi emikhulu yonyaka.

src: this will be particularly challenging as every country in the world is clamouring to secure a limited supply of vaccines.
tgt: lokhu kuzoba yinselele enkulu njengoba wonke amazwe emhlabeni aphuthumela ukuthola imigomo enqunyelwe ekhona.

src: but we are hard at work with partners in business, labour and civil society to make this happen.
tgt: kodwa sisebenza kanzima nesibambisene nabo ebhizinisini, kwezabasebenzi kanye nomphakathi ukwenza lokhu.

src: we are working on several fronts to get vaccines, including through the global covax facility, the african union initiative and through our own engagements with vaccine manufacturers.
tgt: sisebenza ngezindlela ezehlukene ukuthola imigomo, okubandakanya ukusebenza nesikhungo somhlaba icovax, uhlelo lobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika kanye nangezingxoxo zethu nabakhiqizi bemigomo.

src: as we act together to overcome the pandemic, we will need to work together to rebuild and transform our economy.
tgt: njengoba sibambisene ukunqoba ubhubhane, kuzodingeka ukuthi sisebenze ngokubambisana ukwakha kabusha nokuguqula umnotho wethu.

src: we have both the ability and the will to stimulate economic activity, grow our economy and create jobs.
tgt: sinalo ikhono kanye nentshisekelo yokusungula imisebenzi yezomnotho, sikhulise umnotho wethu futhi sakhe imisebenzi.

src: and to do so in the midst of a pandemic.
tgt: futhi senze njalo phakathi nalo ubhubhane.

src: public finances are under extreme strain, now even more so because of the cost of our health response to covid19 and the social and economic relief measures we put in place to assist businesses and poor households.
tgt: izimali zikahulumeni ziphansi kwenkulu ingcindezi, manje kakhulu ngenxa yokubiza kakhulu kwezinsiza zezempilo zokubhekana necovid19 kanye nezinhlelo zokuxhasa ngokwenhlalo nangokomnotho esazibeka ukuze kusizwe amabhizinisi namakhaya antulayo.

src: the contraction of the economy also meant that tax revenue has declined significantly.
tgt: ukuphazamiseka komnotho futhi kuchaza ukuthi imali yentela yehle ngokubonakalayo.

src: there are some parts of the economy that will take longer to recover due to lower global demand generally and restrictions on international travel.
tgt: kunezingxenye zomnotho ezizothatha isikhathi eside ukuphinde zivuke futhi ngenxa yokwehla kwesidingo sawo emhlabeni nemikhawulo ebekwe ekuvakasheleni amazwe angaphandle.

src: that is why we need to be innovative and focused in our plans to rebuild the economy.
tgt: yingakho kumele siqhamuke nezinto ezintsha futhi sigxile ezinhlelweni zethu zokwakha kabusha umnotho.

src: significantly, the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we announced in october last year is based on broad consensus among all social part ners on the actions needed to rebuild the economy.
tgt: uhlelo lokwakha kabusha nokuvuselelwa komnotho esalumemezela ngomfumfu ngonyaka owedlule lusekelwe esivumelwaneni phakathi kwabobonke ababambiqhaza emphakathini ezinyathelweni ezidingekayo ukuze kwakhiwe kabusha umnotho.

src: this lays a firm basis for effective cooperation that draws on the resources, capabilities and energies of all sections of society.
tgt: lokhu kuyisisekelo esiqinile sokusebenzisana ngempumelelo okuholela ezinsizeni, emakhonweni kanye nomdlandla wazo zonke izingxenye zomphakathi.

src: we are seeing this in various practical ways.
tgt: lokhu sikubona ngezindlela eziningi ezibonakalayo.

src: for example, we have been working closely with private funders and multilateral development institutions to prepare infrastructure projects in areas like transport, human settlements, water and telecommunications.
tgt: isibonelo, besisebenza ngokusondelana nabaxhasimali abazimele kanye nezikhungo zokuthuthukisa ezahlukahlukene ukulungiselela imisebenzi yezingqalasizinda ezindaweni ezifana nezokuthutha, izindawo zokuhlala abantu, amanzi kanye nezokuxhumana.

src: using the infrastructure fund as one of the vehicles, we are developing funding models for these projects that draw on several sources in both the public and private sectors.
tgt: ngokusebenzisa uxhasomali lwengqalasizinda ukusa phambili, sisungule izindlela zokuxhasa ngemali le misebenzi edonsa ezindaweni eziningi emikhakheni kahulumeni kanye nezimele.

src: this is particularly important at a time when public finances are limited.
tgt: lokhu kubaluleke kakhulu esikhathini lapho izimali zikahulumeni zingekho.

src: the presidential employment stimulus is another example of partnership in action.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi ngesinye sezibonelo sokusebenzisana osekuqalile.

src: understanding that it will take time for economic growth to translate into private sector employment, we have launched the employment stimulus to start creat ing work opportunities now.
tgt: ukuqonda ukuthi kuzothatha isikhathi ukuthi ukukhula komnotho kuchazwe njengokusungulwa kwemisebenzi emkhakheni ozimele, sethule uhlelo lokusungula imisebenzi ukuze siqale sakhe amathuba emisebenzi manje.

src: this programme is being coordinated from the presiden cy, but is being implemented by a range of government departments and different spheres.
tgt: lolu hlelo luhlelwe ehhovisi likamongameli, kodwa luqaliswa ukusebenza iminyango kahulumeni eyehlukene nemikhakha eyehlukene.

src: through this programme, tens of thousands of unemployed people are able to both earn and learn as they provide valuable social services.
tgt: ngalolu hlelo, amashumi ezinkulungwane zabantu abangasebenzi bayakwazi ukuthola imali nokufunda njengoba behlinzeka ngemisebenzi ebalulekile yomphakathi.

src: in time, this programme will include a ‘social employment’ part, where we will partner with other social actors to employ people in a variety of activities – from improving food security, to tackling genderbased violence to upgrading informal settlements – that all contribute to the common good.
tgt: ngokuhamba kwesikhathi, lolu hlelo luzobandakanya ingxenye 'yemisebenzi yomphakathi', lapho sizosebenza ngokubambisana nabanye abasebenzi bomphakathi ukuthi baqashe abantu emisebenzini eyehlukene kusuka ekuqinisekiseni ukuthi ukudla kuyatholakala, kuya ekulweni nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kuya ekwenzeni ngcono imijondolo konke lokhu kunegalelo ekwenzeni into eyodwa enhle.

src: all this work is being reinforced by an aggressive focus on those economic reforms that will have the greatest focus on growth.
tgt: wonke lo msebenzi uqiniswa ngokugxila okukhulu kuzinguquko zomnotho ezizoba nokugxila okukhulu ekukhuleni.

src: these include the expansion of electricity generation capacity, making our ports more efficient and competitive, improving access to affordable broadband, and improving turnaround times for water, mining and other licenses.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya ukunwetshwa komthamo wesiphehlimandla sikagesi, ukwenza amachweba ethu asebenze ngokufanele futhi abe sezingeni lokuncintisana, ukuthuthukisa ukufinyelela kuzinsiza zeinthanethi ethengekayo, nokuthuthukisa isikhathi sokuthola izimvume zamanzi, zezimayini kanye nezinye.

src: these efforts are being coordinated and monitored jointly by my office and national treasury.
tgt: le mizamo ihlelwe futhi ibekwe iso ngokuhlanganyela yihhovisi lami kanye nomgcinimafa kazwelonke.

src: parenting a child with epilepsy allison cooper while it may be a shock for a family to learn that a child has epilepsy, you can build an understanding, loving and accepting environment in which your child can grow and believe in their ability to succeed.
tgt: ukukhulisa ingane enesithuthwane allison cooper nakuba kungenzeka ukuthi kuwethuse umndeni ukuthola ukuthi ingane inesithuthwane, ungakwazi ukwakha ikhaya eliqondisisayo, elinothando futhi elamukelayo lapho ingane yakho izokwazi ukuthi ikhule futhi inokukholelwa ekhonweni layo lokuphumelela.

src: according to epilepsy south africa, parents could be concerned about their child’s future and find epilepsy difficult to accept or talk about.
tgt: ngokwenhlangano yesithuthwane eningizimu afrika iepilepsy south africa, abazali bangakhathazeka ngekusasa lengane yabo futhi bakuthole kunzima ukwamukela isithuthwane noma ukukhuluma ngaso.

src: you may feel angry, depressed, inadequate and guilty, but you can overcome these feelings and your anxiety by educating yourself about the condition.
tgt: kungenzeka uzizwe uthukuthele ugane unwabu, ukhathazekile, unganelisekile futhi uzizwe unecala, kodwa ungakwazi ukunqoba le mizwa kanye nexhala ngokuzifundisa ngale simo.

src: epilepsy is the tendency to have recurrent seizures, which occur when there is an abnormal electrical discharge in the brain.
tgt: isithuthwane ukujwayela ukuba nokudlikiza komzimba okuphindelelayo, lokho okwenzeka uma kube khona ukubanika kwemithambo okungajwayelekile ebuchosheni.

src: why my child?
tgt: kungani kumele kwenzeke enganeni yami?

src: understanding epilepsy and why seizures occur doesn’t explain why this happened to your child.
tgt: ukuqondisisa isithuthwane kanye nokuthi kungani ukudlikiza komzimba kwenzeka kungekuchazele ukuthi kungani lokhu kwenzeka enganeni yakho.

src: in approximately 66% of cases, the underlying cause of epilepsy is unknown.
tgt: ezigamekweni ezicishe zisondele kuma66%, imbangela eyisisusa sesithuthwane ayaziwa.

src: this is referred to as idiopathic epilepsy.
tgt: lokhu kubizwa ngokuthi iidiopathic epilepsy.

src: in the remaining cases the underlying causes can be identified, which is known as symptomatic epilepsy.
tgt: ezigamekweni ezisele imbangela eyisisusa ingatholakala, lokhu kwaziwa ngokuthi isymptomatic epilepsy.

src: there can be a variety of underlying causes such as a head injury, that can occur at any age; a birth injury, such as a lack of oxygen during birth; fever convulsions, encephalitis, meningitis or childhood measles; and metabolic or biochemical disturbances or imbalances.
tgt: kungaba nembangela eyisisusa ehlukahlukene njengokulimala ekhanda, okungenzeka kunoma yisiphi isigaba sobudala; ukulimala ngesikhathi ubelethwa, okufana nokuswelakala kweoksijini eyanele ngenkathi ubelethwa; ukubophana kwamamasela okudalwa imfiva, ukuvuvukala kobuchopho, isifo solwembu lobuchopho noma isimungumungwana sobungane; kanye nokuphazamiseka noma ukungalingani komzimba noma kwamakhemikhali emzimbeni.

src: a doctor will prescribe medication based on the age, physical condition and type of seizures your child has.
tgt: udokotela uzokunika umuthi ozohambiselana nobudala, isimo sobunjalo bomzimba kanye nohlobo lokudlikiza ingane yakho enakho.

src: remember, anticonvulsant medication does not cure epilepsy but, in most cases, will reduce the frequency and severity of seizures.
tgt: khumbula, ukuthi umuthi wokulwa nokudlikiza komzimba awuselaphi isithuthwane kodwa, ezigamekweni eziningi, uzokwehlisa ukwenzeka kaningi kanye nobunzima bokudlikiza.

src: some tips on parenting a child with epilepsy: make your child aware of the condition.
tgt: amathiphu okukhulisa ingane enesithuthwane: yenza imizamo yokuthi ingane yakho yazi ngalesi simo.

src: children as young as three can understand that the brain controls the body.
tgt: izingane ezincane kusuka eminyakeni emithathu zingakuqondisisa ukuthi umqondo ulawula umzimba.

src: older children should be given a more comprehensive explanation.
tgt: izingane esezindala kumele zinikwe incazelo ebanzi.

src: inform close relatives and your child’s friends, teachers and other responsible school officials.
tgt: yazisa izihlobo kanye nabangani bengane yakho abaseduze, othisha kanye nabanye abasebenzi abaqotho besikolo.

src: ensure your child receives a comprehensive medical assessment by a qualified professional, ideally a neurologist.
tgt: qinisekisa ukuthi ingane yakho ithola ukuhlolwa kokwelashwa okubanzi kungcweti ofanelekile, okungcono kungaba udokotela wezinzwa.

src: emphasise your child’s abilities and any activity that will improve their selfacceptance, selfworth and selfconfidence.
tgt: gcizelela amakhono engane yakho kanye nanoma yimuphi omunye umsebenzi ongasiza ukuthuthukisa ukuzamukela kwayo, ukubona ukubaluleka kwayo kanye nokuzethemba kwayo.

src: ensure adult supervision for some activities, such as swimming.
tgt: qinisekisa ukuthi umuntu omdala uyayiqapha eminye imisebenzi, njengokubhukuda.

src: ensure medication is administered and taken reg ularly as prescribed.
tgt: qinisekisa ukuthi umuthi uphathwa ngendlela eyiyo futhi uphuzwa njengoba uyaleliwe.

src: an honour to lead the african union vukuzenzele unnamed south africa’s term as chair of the african union has come to an end.
tgt: kusho lukhulu ukuhola ubumbano lwamazwe aseafrika (iau) vukuzenzele unnamed isikhathi seni ngizimu afrika njengosihlalo wobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika (iau) sesi phelile.

src: as we reflect on our year in this position, i am reminded of the old saying that ‘in crisis lies opportunity’.
tgt: njengoba sibhe ka onyakeni wethu sise sikhundleni, ngikhu mbula isisho sakudala esithi ‘kuba mnyama kakhulu uma sekuzosa’.

src: ours was a baptism of fire, having assumed the chairship in the same month the first case of coronavirus was reported on the continent.
tgt: kowethu unyaka besibhabhadiswa ngomlilo, ukungena esikhundleni sokuba usihlalo ngenyanga eyodwa lapho kwabikwa khona isigameko sokuqala ngqa segciwane lecorona ezwenikazi.

src: the priorities we outlined for our term, among them furthering peace and security, the economic empowerment of women and deepening economic integration, had to be immediately and dramatically reoriented to deal with the pandemic.
tgt: esasikubeke eqhulwini ngesikhathi sethu, phakathi kwakho ukuqhubekisela phambili ukuthula nokuvikeleka, ukuthuthukiswa kwabesifazane ngokomnotho kanye nokuqinisa ukuhlanganyela kwezomnotho, kwamele ukuthi kuguqulwe ngokuphazima kweso nangokubonakalayo ukuze kubhekanwe nobhubhane.

src: our most pressing task was to steer the focus of the african union to addressing the worst global emergency in over a century.
tgt: umsebenzi wethu omkhulu kwakungukuthi iau igxile ekubhekaneni nesimo esibi esiphuthumayo somhlaba esesibe khona kwikhulumnyaka.

src: covid19 has affected all the countries on the continent.
tgt: icovid19 isikhahlameze wonke amazwe ezwenikazi.

src: to date there are more than 3.5 million confirmed cases in africa, and more than 88,000 people have died.
tgt: kuze kube manje kunezigameko eziqinisekisiwe ezingaphezu kwezigidi ezi3.5 eafrika, futhi bangaphezu kwezi88 000 abantu asebedlule emhlabeni.

src: it has been a health, humanitarian, social and economic crisis for african countries, most of whom are inadequately resourced to manage a health emergency of this size.
tgt: kube usizi lwezempilo, lokusiza, lwenhlalo kanye nomnotho emazweni aseafrika, amaningi awo angenazo izinsiza zokulawula izimo eziphuthumayo zempilo ezinkulu ngalolu hlobo.

src: and yet, as unprecedented as the nature of the pandemic has been, so too has been the manner in which african countries have come together to fight it.
tgt: futhi nokho, njengento engakaze ibonwe njengemvelaphi yobhubhane, kanjalo nendlela amazwe aseafrika abumbane ngayo ukulwa nalo.

src: in doing so we have drawn principally on the continent’s own expertise, capabilities and institutions such as the africa centres for disease control and prevention (africa cdc).
tgt: ngokwenza njalo siveze ubukhulu bobuchwepheshe bezwekazi, amakhono kanye nezikhungo ezifana nezikhungo zaseafrika zokulawula nokuvikelwa kwezifo (iafrica cdc).

src: africa did not sit by passively as the true extent and danger of the pandemic unfurled.
tgt: iafrika ayigoqanga nje izandla uma ubunjalo nobungozi bobhubhane buvuleka.

src: from the earliest days of the pandemic and led by the au, we swiftly developed a continental response strategy, driven by the africa cdc and regional task forces.
tgt: kusukela ezinsukwini zokuqala zobhubhane futhi ngokuholwa iau, sasungula ngokushesha iqhingasu lezwekazi lokubhekana nobhubhane, elaliholwa iafrica cdc kanye namathimba ezifunda.

src: we realised that every country on the continent would be severely affected by the pandemic.
tgt: sabona ukuthi wonke amazwe ezwenikazi azokhahlamezeka kakhulu ngubhubhane.

src: most would not have the resources needed to meet the public health challenge or to protect their economies.
tgt: amazwe amaningi angeke abe nazo izinsiza ezidingekayo ukumelana nenselele yezempilo yomphakathi noma ukuvikela iminotho yawo.

src: we therefore agreed as african countries to appoint several prominent africans as special envoys, who would engage with international funders and multilateral institutions to make the case for financial support and debt relief on africa’s behalf.
tgt: ngakhoke sabe sesivumelana njengamazwe aseafrika ukuqoka abantu baseafrika abaningana abaqavile njengezithunywa ezikhethekile, ezizoxoxisana nabaxhasi bamazwe ngamazwe kanye nezikhungo ezahlukahlukene ukuze bezoyokhulumela iafrika ukuze ithole ukwesekwa ngezimali nokusizwa ngezikweletu.

src: in this way, working as a one continent, we were able to achieve debt relief for many countries and financial assistance towards our covid response and economic recovery.
tgt: ngale ndlela, ukusebenza njengezwekazi elilodwa, sikwazile ukutholela amazwe amaningi usizo ngezikweletu kanye nosizo lwezezimali zokubhekana necovid19 kanye nokuvuselelwa komnotho.

src: but much as african countries went to the international community for support, we first helped ourselves – establishing and capitalising a continental covid19 response fund.
tgt: kodwa yize amazwe aseafrika aya kumazwe aphesheya kwezilwandle ukuyofuna ukwesekwa, saqala sazisiza thina – ngokusungula nokwenza imali yesikhwama sokubhekana necovid19 sezwekazi.

src: for every partnership forged with betterresourced nations and the international donor community, we set up our own innovative and groundbreaking african medical supplies platform to enable all african countries to quickly secure personal protective equipment and other medical supplies in an equitable, affordable manner.
tgt: kubo bonke ubudlelwano obenziwe kanzima namazwe anezinsiza ezingcono kakhulu kanye nomphakathi wabaxhasi bamazwe ngamazwe, sisungule inkundla yokusabalalisa izinsiza zokwelapha eafrika entsha sha nengakaze ibonwe ukuvumela ukuthi wonke amazwe aseafrika asheshe athole izinsizakusebenza zokuzivikela nezinye izinsiza zokwelapha ngendlela elinganayo, futhi engabizi.

src: and now that the covid19 vaccine is available, we have worked as a collective to ensure that the continent gets its fair share, working with the covax facility and led by our own african vaccine acquisition task team.
tgt: futhi manje umgomo wecovid19 usukhona, sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuqinisekisa ukuthi izwekazi liyayithola imigomo yalo ngokufanele, sisebenza nesikhungo icovax nokuholwa ithimba laseafrika eliqinisekisa ukutholwa komgomo.

src: vaccine rollout has already commenced on the continent and we aspire to have the majority of the continent’s population vaccinated by the end of 2021 to achieve herd immunity.
tgt: ukuqaliswa kokugonywa kwabantu sekuqalile ezwenikazi futhi sifisa ukuba nenanibantu elikhulu ezwenikazi eseligomile uma kuphela unyaka wezi2021 ukuze sizogoma inani elanele labantu.

src: we have acted as one to protect health, people and livelihoods on the continent.
tgt: sisebenze ngobunye ukuvikela impilo, abantu kanye nendlela yokuziphilisa ezwenikazi.

src: in doing so, we have demonstrated our capacity for selfreliance and our ability to be the drivers of our own development.
tgt: ngokwenzenjalo, sibonise ukwazi kwethu ukuthembela kithina kanye nekhono lethu lokuba abalawuli bentuthuko yethu.

src: despite the dominance of covid19, we have still managed to make advances in several of our key priorities.
tgt: ngaphandle kokubusa kwecovid19, sikwazile futhi ukuphumelela kokuningana kwebesikubeke eqhulwini.

src: during our term, the africa continental free trade area (afcfta) was finally launched, heralding a new era of intraafrican trade and economic integration.
tgt: ngesikhathi sethu, indawo yokuhwebelana mahhala ezwenikazi laseafrika (iafcfta) yethulwa ngokusemthethweni, okwakumemezela inkathi entsha yokuhwebelana ezwenikazi laseafrika kanye nokuhlanganyela kwezomnotho.

src: even under the difficult conditions posed by the pandemic, the continent has pushed ahead with towards the goal of ‘silencing the guns’ on the continent.
tgt: ngisho nangaphansi kwezimo ezinzima ezidalwe ubhubhane, izwekazi liphokophele phambili nephupho ‘lokuthulisa izibhamu’ ezwenikazi.

src: the au has been actively involved in negotiations around the grand ethiopian renaissance dam, in achieving a ceasefire in libya and promoting peace in south sudan.
tgt: iau ibilokhu izibandakanye ezingxoxweni ezithinta idamu igrand ethiopian renaissance dam, ukuqeda udlame elibya nokugqugquzela ukuthula esouth sudan.

src: another focus of our term has been on the economic empowerment of women, which we will continue to champion even beyond our term and throughout the decade of african women’s financial and economic inclusion to 2030. as we hand over the baton to the democratic republic of congo (drc) we leave this preeminent continental body in a position of greater strength.
tgt: okunye ebesigxile kukho ngesikhathi sethu kube ukuthuthukiswa kwabesifazane kwezomnotho, esizoqhubeka nakho ngisho sekudlule isikhathi sethu kuze kwedlulele kwishumi leminyaka lokubandakanywa kwabesifazane kwezezimali nakwezomnotho kuya kunyaka wezi2030.

src: south africa will continue to play its part to foster integration on the continent, and support the incoming chair and the organisation in its efforts to meet the aspirations of the au’s agenda 2063. when the organisation for african unity was founded in 1963, member states planted the seeds of cooperation and solidarity in pursuit of a better life for all the peoples of africa.
tgt: njengoba sesiphosela idemocratic republic of congo (idrc) izintambo sishiya le nhlangano evelele endaweni enamandla amakhulu.

src: they affirmed that african unity was paramount if the welfare and wellbeing of africa’s people was to be assured.
tgt: iningizimu afrika izoqhubeka nokudlala indima yayo ukukhulisa ukuhlangana ezwenikazi, nokwesekela usihlalo ozongena nenhlangano emizamweni yayo yokufeza izifiso zeagenda 2063 yeau.

src: history bears witness that these seeds have not always fallen on fertile ground, and over the years the continental unity project has experienced many hurdles and false starts.
tgt: ngesikhathi inhlangano yobumbano lwamazwe aseafrika isungulwa ngonyaka we1963, amazwe angamalungu atshala imbewu yokusebenzisana nobumbano ukuze kuzozuzwa impilo engcono yabo bonke abantu baseafrika.

src: covid19 vaccine: what you need to know allison cooper with south afri ca’s mass coro navirus disease (covid19) vaccination programme rolling out for healthcare workers in february, vuk’uzenzele sheds some light on what the covid19 vaccine is, how it works and why it’s so important to stop the spread of the virus.
tgt: umgomo wecovid19 : okudingeka ukuthi ukwazi allison cooper njengoba kuzoqali swa uhlelo olu khulu lwaseni ngizimu afrika loku gomela isifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) kubasebenzi bezempilo ngonhlolanja, iphepha ndaba ivuk’uzenzele li dlulisa ulwazi olukhanyisa ngokuthi uyini umgomo wecovid19, usebenza kanjani futhi kungani uba lulekile ekunqandeni ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane lecorona.

src: a vaccine trains your body’s immune system (which fights infection), to produce antibodies (proteins that fight disease) – exactly like it would if you were exposed to a virus.
tgt: umgomo uqeqesha izivikela zifo zomzimba wakho (okuyizona ezilwa nokwesuleleka), ukuthi zikhiqize amasotsha omzimba (okungamaprotheni alwa nezifo) – ngokufana ncimishi nanjengoba bekungenzeka uma bewuvuleleke egciwaneni.

src: why is the vaccine so important?
tgt: kungani ubaluleke kangaka umgomo?

src: being vaccinated against covid19 is an effective way to protect yourself against the virus because your risk of infection is reduced.
tgt: ukugomela icovid19 kuyindlela esebenzayo ukuzivikela egciwaneni ngoba kwehlisa ubungozi bokuthi usuleleke ngegciwane.

src: you are then less likely to pass the virus on to someone else.
tgt: laphoke asuke esemancane amathuba okuthi ungadlulisela igciwane komunye umuntu.

src: the aim of vaccination is to reach herd immunity – when enough of the population is immune to the virus it provides indirect protection to those who aren’t immune, bringing the spread of the virus under control.
tgt: inhlosongqangi yokugoma ukuthi sifinyelele enanini elanele lokugonywa kwabantu – uma abantu abenele sebeligomele leli gciwane lokhu kuhlinzeka ukuvikeleka kulabo abangaligomele, kanti lokho kwenza izinga lokubhebhetheka kwegciwane lilawuleke.

src: are vaccines necessary to prevent the spread of covid19?
tgt: ngakube imigomo ibalulekile ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwecovid19?

src: there is overwhelming scientific evidence that vaccination is the best defence against serious infections.
tgt: kunobufakazi obunzulu bososayensi obeseka ukuthi ukugoma kuyiyona ndlela ehamba phambili yokuzivikela ekwesulelekeni okudla lubi.

src: will the vaccine stop me from getting covid19?
tgt: ngakube umgomo ungavimbela ukuthi ngingayitholi icovid19?

src: no vaccine provides 100% protection.
tgt: awukho umgomo ohlinzeka ngokuvikeleka okungamaphesenti ayi100.

src: herd immunity also does not provide full protection to those who are not vaccinated.
tgt: ukugonywa kwenani elanele labantu nakho kakuhlinzeki ngokuvikeleka okuphelele kulabo abangagomile.

src: however, with herd immunity, these people will have substantial protection.
tgt: noma kunjalo, ngokugonywa kwenani elanele labantu, laba bantu bazoba nokuvikeleka okusezingeni elikahle.

src: is the vaccination safe?
tgt: ngakube ukugoma kuphephile na?

src: covid19 vaccines go through a demanding, multistage testing process, including large trials that involve tens of thousands of people.
tgt: imigomo yecovid19 idlula kwinqubo enomsebenzi omkhulu, enezigabagaba zokuhlola, okubandakanya ukuhlolwa kokusebenza kwayo okufaka phakathi izinkulungwane eziyishumi zabantu.

src: every vaccine used in south africa’s mass vaccination programme has to be approved by the south african health products regulatory authority.
tgt: wonke umgomo osetshenzisiwe ohlelweni lokugoma abantu abaningi eningizimu afrika kumele ugunyazwe ukusetshenziswa inhlangano yeziphathimandla ezilawula imikhiqizo yezempilo eningizimu afrika isouth african health products regulatory authority.

src: the oxford universityastrazeneca vaccine has already been approved by various regulators around the world and is being rolled out in other countries.
tgt: umgomo ioxford universityastrazeneca usuvele ugunyaziwe kakade ngabalawuli abehlukahlukene emhlabeni jikelele futhi usuqalile ukukhishwa unikezwe abantu kwamanye amazwe.

src: the country’s estimated 1.25 million healthcare workers will receive the vaccine first.
tgt: izwe lilinganisele ekutheni abasebenzi bezempilo ababalelwa kwisigidi esi1.25 yibona abazothola umgomo kuqala.

src: in phase two, essential workers such as teachers, police, municipal workers, taxi drivers and other frontline personnel; people in institutions such as old age homes, shelters and prisons; and people over 60 and adults with comorbidities will be prioritised.
tgt: esigabeni sesibili, abasebenzi abenza imisebenzi engumongo njengothisha, amaphoyisa, abasebenzi bakwamasipala, abashayeli bamatekisi kanye nabanye abasebenzi abasebenza phambili; abantu abasezikhungweni ezinjengamakhaya abantu abadala, izindawo zabaswele amakhaya kanye nasemajele; nabantu abaneminyaka engaphezulu kwama60 ubudala kanye nabantu abadala abanezifo ezingamahlalakhona bazobekwa eqhulwini kulolu hlelo lokugoma.

src: in phase three, about 22.5 million of the remaining adult population will be vaccinated.
tgt: esigabeni sesithathu, cishe abantu ababalelwa kwizigidi ezingama22.5 zalabo bantu abadala ezisele bazogonywa.

src: the target is to vaccinate 67% of the population by the end of 2021. by then we should reach herd immunity.
tgt: inani labantu okubhekeke ukuba ligonywe ngaphambi kokuba unyaka wezi2021 uphele lilinganiselwa kumaphesenti angama67.

src: steps to revive the economy vukuzenzele unnamed it will soon be a year since the first reported case of coronavirus disease (covid19) in our country.
tgt: izinyathelo zokuvuselela kabusha umnotho vukuzenzele unnamed akusasele sikha thi esingakanani kuphele unyaka selokhu kwabikwa isigameko sokuqala segciwane lecorona ezweni lakithi.

src: the pandemic has come at a great cost to both public health and the livelihoods of millions of our people.
tgt: ubhubhane luze nomonakalo omkhulu kwezempilo yomphakathi kanye nendle la yokuziphilisa yezigidi zabantu bakithi.

src: many workers lost part of their income as their work hours were reduced with many being retrenched.
tgt: baningi abasebenzi aba lahlekelwe imalingeniso njengoba isikhathi sabo sokusebenza sancishiswa kanti iningi labo ladilizwa emsebenzini.

src: several businesses have incurred heavy losses from scaledback operations.
tgt: amabhizinisi amaningi alahlekelwa ka khulu ngenxa yokusebe nzela emuva.

src: others have had to close.
tgt: kanti amanye kwadingeka ukuthi avalwe.

src: people working in the informal sector have also suffered.
tgt: abantu abasebenza emikha kheni engahlelekile nabo bakhahlamezeka kakhulu.

src: most difficult of all, the pandemic has claimed the lives of breadwinners in many families, leaving them destitute and fearful for the future.
tgt: kodwa okunzima kunakho konke nje, lolu bhubhane seluthathe izimpilo zabantu abondlayo emakhaya amaningi, lwabashiya benga bantulayo futhi baphila ngo kwesaba uma becabanga ngekusasa.

src: this is why the extensive relief measures we put in place were both necessary and urgent.
tgt: yingakho izinyathelo zosizo esazibeka zazibalulekile futhi zaziphuthuma kakhulu.

src: and, now that nearly a year has passed, we can say that these measures have proved effective.
tgt: futhi, njengamanje njengoba cishe sekusele kancane nje ukuthi kuphele unyaka, singakusho kugcwale umlomo nje ukuthi lezi zinyathelo zibonise ukusebenza kahle kakhulu.

src: of the full package of relief measures that we introduced, perhaps the two measures that had the greatest impact were the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and the unemployment insurance fund's (uif) covid19 temporary employer/employee relief scheme, generally known as covid ters.
tgt: ohlelweni olugcwele lwezinyathelo zosizo lwesibonelelo olwethulwa, mhlawumbe izinyathelo ezimbili ezibe nomthelela omkhulu kube yisibonelelo esikhethekile sikahulumeni secovid19 kanye nesibonelelo sesikhashana seco vid19 sokusiza abaqashi nabasebenzi sesikhwama somshwalense wabalahlekelwe ngumsebenzi, ngoku jwayelekile esaziwa njengecovid ters.

src: we would not have been able to roll out these measures in such a short space of time if we had not had an extensive social security infrastructure already in place.
tgt: besingeke sikwazi uku khipha lezi zinyathelo kulesi sikhashana esifushane uma ngabe besingenayo ingqalasizinda yokuvikelela ko mphakathi ebanzi ebesivele ikhona.

src: we were able to respond to this huge and immediate need in our society thanks to the substantial nationwide infrastructure and systems of the south african social security agency and the uif.
tgt: kuze kube sikwazile ukubhekana nalesi sidingo esikhulu futhi esiphuthu mayo emphakathini waki thi sibonga ingqalasizinda kazwelonke ekahle yenhla ngano yezimpesheni nezibo nelelo zikahulumeni eningi zimu afrika (isassa) kanye nesikhwama somshwalense wabalahlekelwe ngumsebenzi (iuif).

src: there were certainly technical and other glitches along the way, but most of these were speedily resolved.
tgt: noma bebukhona ubuxakaxaka kanye nezinye izi nkinga, kodwa iningi lazo lixazululwe ngokushesha.

src: these government agencies did outstanding work to enroll millions of new beneficiaries and ensure they were paid.
tgt: lawa maejensi kahulumeni enze umsebenzi oncomekayo ekubhaliseni izigidi zabantu abasha abazohlomula futhi aqinisekisa ukuthi bayakhokhelwa.

src: the support provided by the uif was a lifeline to struggling businesses and employees.
tgt: ukwesekela okuhlinze kwe yiuif kube yiyona ndlela yempilo emabhizinisini adonsa kanzima kanye nabasebenzi.

src: it made the difference between companies remaining open and being forced to close, between jobs saved and jobs lost.
tgt: kwenze umehluko phakathi kokuthi izinkampani ziqhubeke nokuvula nokuthi ziphoqeleke ukuthi zivale, phakathi kwemisebenzi elondolozekile kanye naleyo egcine ilahleka.

src: this benefited businesses like sihle’s brew, a restaurant in gauteng, which was able to retain its 18 employees because of the ters scheme.
tgt: la mabhizinisi azuzile njengesihle’s brew, okuyi ndawo yokudlela egauteng, ekwazile ukugcina abasebenzi bayo abayi18 ngenxa yohlelo lweters .

src: thanks to government support, mamoshal agae trading and projects, an autoelectrical business in mokopane, was able to pay its workers as well as its rent and rates during the lockdown.
tgt: siyabonga ekwesekweni nguhulumeni, inkampani imamoshalagae trading and projects, okuyi bhizinisi lezinto ezisebenza ngogesi emokopane, likwazile ukukhokhela abasebenzi balo ngokunjalo nemali yokuqasha kanye nemali yente la yakamasipala ngesikhathi sokuvalwa kwezwe.

src: employees in dire straits were able to receive a portion of their salaries.
tgt: abasebenzi abebexinwe ngusizi olukhulu bakwazile ukuthola ingxenyana yomho lo wabo.

src: lindiwe ntuli, a paralegal in centurion, has told how receiving her benefits enabled her to work from home and be able to afford her rent.
tgt: ulindiwe ntuli, ongummeli wezomthetho ecenturion, uye washo ukuthi ukuhlomula kwakhe kumsize kanja ni ukuthi asebenzele ekhaya futhi akwazi nokukhokha imali yakhe yasemqashweni.

src: there are many stories of companies that have been able to stay afloat over the past year because of the support they received from the uif.
tgt: ziningi izindaba zezinka mpani ezikwazile ukuqhu beka ngempumelelo nokuse benza onyakeni owedlule ngenxa yokwesekelwa ezikuthole kwiuif.

src: the same can be said of the small businesses helped by the various grants and loans provided by a number of departments.
tgt: into efanayo ingashiwo ngamabhizinisi asizwe yizibonelelo zikahulumeni ezahlukene kanye nemalimboleko ehlinzekwe yiminyango eminingi.

src: these measures greatly helped our people in their time of need.
tgt: lezi zinyathelo zibasize kakhulu abantu bakithi ngesikhathi bezidinga kakhulu.

src: as we transition from relief to recovery, we have to shift gear.
tgt: ekuguqukeni sisuka esigabeni sokudinga usizo siya ekululameni, kumele sishi ntshe ukwenza.

src: while these relief measures were designed to be temporary, the economy will continue to feel the effects of the pandemic for some time.
tgt: ngesikhathi lezi zinyathelo zosizo zazihlelelwe isikhashana, umnotho usazoqhubeka nokushayeka isikhathi eside ngenxa yalolu bhubhane.

src: even as lockdown restrictions have been eased, many companies are struggling to cope with the fallout of months of diminished operations and lost revenue.
tgt: nakuba imikhawulo yokuvalwa kwezwe isixegi siwe, izinkampani eziningi ziyahluleka ukubhekana nezinyanga lapho zingasebenzanga khona lapho kwa kunokuncipha komsebenzi kanye nokulahlekelwa yi nzuzo.

src: it is for this reason that, following extensive discussion with social partners at the national economic development and labour council the covid ters benefit has been extended until 15 march 2021 for sectors that have not been able to fully operate.
tgt: yisona kanye lesi sizathu esenze ukuba, emva kwezingxoxo ezijulile nesisebe nzisana nabo kwezenhlalo kunedlac, usizo lwecovid ters lelulelwe umhla ziyi15 kundasa 2021 kuleyo mikhakha ebingakakwazi ukusebenza ngokuphelele.

src: the special covid grant has been extended for another three months.
tgt: isibonelelo esikhethekile secovid19 sizolulwa ngezinye futhi izinyanga ezintathu.

src: these remain shortterm measures.
tgt: lezi zinyathelo zingezesi khashana.

src: our focus now must be on creating an enabling environment for businesses to recover, and for economic growth that spurs job creation and attracts invest ment.
tgt: manje kumele sigxile ekwakheni indawo ezovumela ukululama kwamabhi zinisi, kanye nokukhula komnotho okuzoqhubezela ukusungulwa kwamathuba emisebenzi futhi ihehe utsha lomali.

src: the recovery will be difficult and will take time, not least because we are still in the midst of the pandemic.
tgt: ukululama komnotho kuzoba nzima kakhulu futhi kuzothatha isikhathi, hhayi ngoba sisephakathi kwalolu bhubhane.

src: important as these relief measures are now, we will not be able to sustain them indefinitely.
tgt: kubaluleke njengalezi zi nyathelo zosizo, esingeke si kwazi ukuzigcina unomphela.

src: we need to make sure that these relief measures provide a firm foundation for a broader recovery without driving the country deeper into debt.
tgt: kumele siqinisekise ukuthi lezi zinyathelo zosizo zihli nzeka isisekelo esiqinile ukuze silulame kakhulu ngaphandle kokufaka izwe ezikweletini kakhulu.

src: unless we can bring our national debt down to sustainable levels no meaningful economic recovery will be possible.
tgt: ngaphandle uma singakwazi ukwehlisa isikweletu sikazwelonke sisibeke ezigabeni ezisimeme ukwelulama komnotho ngeke kwenzeke.

src: our national consciousness must now move beyond the realm of relief into that of recovery, and we must all be part of this effort.
tgt: izingqondo zethu njengesizwe kumele zisuke eku khululekeni ziye ekwelula meni, futhi kumele sonke sibe yingxenye yalo mzamo.

src: as government, hard decisions on public spending will need to be made and implemented this year.
tgt: njengohulumeni, izinqumo ezinamandla ekusetshenzi sweni kwemali kahulumeni kumele zenziwe futhi ziqali swe ukusebenza kulo nyaka.

src: companies will need to be innovative in driving methods and processes that secure their sustainability and profitability, with job retention being their foremost consideration.
tgt: izinkampani kumele zibe nezindlela ezintsha zokuphatha kanye nezinqubo ezi zovikela ukusimama kwazo kanye nenzuzo, nokugcinwa kwemisebenzi njengezinto ezihamba phambili.

src: we must put our money back into our economy by buying local products, supporting local businesses and industrie and procuring from local suppliers.
tgt: kumele sibuyisele imali yethu emnothweni wethu ngokuthi sithenge imikhiqizo yalapha ekhaya, sesekele amabhizinisi asekhaya kanye nezimboni futhi sithenge kubathengisi balapha ekhaya.

src: an injured patient with strong prospects for recovery is given regular phys ical therapy to help them get stronger until they can stand unaided.
tgt: isiguli esilimele esinethe mba lokululama sinikwa ukwelashwa kokunyakazisa umzimba kwansuku zonke ukuze sisizwe ukuthi sibe namandla size sikwazi ukuma ngaphandle kokusizwa.

src: so must these temporary relief measures be seen as the means to get our economy back on its feet.
tgt: ngakhoke lezi zinyathelo zosizo kumele zibonakale njengemizamo yokuphinde futhi simise umnotho wethu ume qingqo.

src: dealing with the loss of a loved one vukuzenzele unnamed many people have lost loved ones as a result of the coronavirus pandemic and the death may often feel unreal.
tgt: ukubhekana nokushonelwa ngothandiweyo vukuzenzele unnamed baningi kakhulu abantu abashone lwe ngababatha ndayo ngenxa yobhubha ne lwegciwane lecorona futhi lokhu kushona kwabantu kungenzeka esi khathini esiningi kunga kholakali.

src: "you are not alone," says community psychologist zanele ludziya from the stikland hospital in the western cape.
tgt: "aninodwa kulokho," kusho ungcweti wezokusebenza kwengqondo emphakathini uzanele ludziya wasesibhedlela istikland esisentshonalanga kapa.

src: losing a loved one is never easy and can trigger a range of emotions.
tgt: ukushonelwa ngomthandayo akukaze kwaba yinto elula futhi kungavusa imizwa ehlukahlukene.

src: "there are many signs you can look out for when a loved one is grieving, but an absence of symptoms does not mean that the person is not grieving.
tgt: "ziningi izimpawu ongazibheka nje uma othandiweyo ezilile, kodwa futhi nokungabonisi zinkomba kakuchazi ukuthi umuntu akazilile.

src: "people may show signs of anger, irritability, sadness or apathy.
tgt: "abantu bengatshengisa izimpawu zokuthukuthela, ukucasuka, ukudabukisa noma ukungabi nandaba.

src: their cog nitive functioning may also be affected, as they may be preoccupied with thoughts and memories of the deceased.
tgt: indlela yokusebenza komqondo yabo nayo ingaphazamiseka, njengoba umqondo wabo kungenzeka ukuthi usaphuphuma imicabango kanye nenkumbulo yalowo oshonile.

src: they could also have trouble concentrating or may appear confused," says ludziya.
tgt: bangaphinde futhi babe nenkinga yokungakwazi ukugxila kulokho abakwenzayo noma babukeke njengabadidekile," kusho uludziya.

src: she advises people to be aware of behavioural changes, such as being tearful or increased alcohol and substance use.
tgt: uludziya weluleka abantu ukuthi bakuqaphele ukushintsha kwendlela yokuziphatha, njengokuhlala sengathi ungakhala noma ukwenyusa izinga lokuphuza utshwala kanye nokusebenzisa izidakamizwa.

src: "they may smoke more than they usually do, they may withdraw or isolate or they may avoid people and places.
tgt: "bangazithola bebhema ngokwedlulele ukunalokho abakujwayele, bangahoxa noma bazivalele ngabodwana noma baqoke ukugwema ezinye izindawo kanye nokuhlangana nabanye abantu.

src: they may want silence or increased noise.
tgt: bangafuna ukuthula nje noma benyuse izinga lomsindo.

src: they could also be more aggressive or snappy," she says.
tgt: bangaphinde futhi babe nolaka ngokwedlulele noma basheshe ukucasuka," kusho yena.

src: when supporting a loved one, ludziya says it is helpful to understand the grieving process and that everyone experiences it differently.
tgt: uma weseka othandiweyo, uludziya uthi kuyasiza ukuthi uqonde indlela yokuzila kanye nokuthi wazi ukuthi omunye nomunye ubhekana nakho ngendlela engafani.

src: she explains that grief is not a state, but a process, and people usually go through stages of grief.
tgt: uyachaza ukuthi ukuzila akusona isimo nje, kodwa inqubo, futhi abantu bajwayele ukudlula ezigabeni zokuzila.

src: common stages of griefthe common stages of grief are denial or isolation (experiencing numbness or shock); anger (getting angry with others when they have not done anything wrong); bargaining (experiencing feelings of guilt over things not done or said); depression (the sadness that comes with realising that life will continue without their loved); and acceptance (finding a way to living a fulfilled life without the person).
tgt: izigaba ezijwayelekile zokuzilaizigaba zokuzila ezijwayelekile kungaba ukungavumi ukuthi ulahlekelwe noma ukuzivalela ngawedwana (uma ubhekana nokuba ndikindiki noma ukushaqeka); ukuthukuthela (ukuthukuthelela abanye abantu bengenzanga lutho okubi); ukuzibuzauziphendule (uma ubhekana nemizwa yokudliwa unembeza ngezinto ongazenzanga noma ongazishongo); ukukhathazeka (ukudabukisa okuza nokuthi ucabange ukuthi impilo izoqhubeka ngaphandle kothandiweyo); kanye nokwamukela (ukuthola indlela yokuphila impilo ngokupheleleyo ngaphandle komuntu othile).

src: "one way of coping or showing support is to understand the stage of grief you are in or that a loved one is experiencing.
tgt: "indlela eyodwa yokubhekana noma yokutshengisa ukweseka ukuqonda isigaba sokuzila okusona noma leso esibhekene nothandiweyo.

src: a professional public service vukuzenzele unnamed when i was elected to the position of president of south africa, i said that building an efficient, capable and ethical state free from corruption was among my foremost priorities.
tgt: imisebenzi kahulumeni eqeqeshekile vukuzenzele unnamed ngesikhathi ngiqo kelwa esikhundle ni sokuba umonga meli waseningizimu afrika, ngathi ukwakha umbuso osebenza kahle, okhonayo nonomthetho ongenayo inkohlakalo kwakungenye yezinto eziseqhulwini.

src: only a capable, efficient, ethical and developmentoriented state can deliver on the commitment to improve the lives of the people of this country.
tgt: umbuso okhonayo, ose benza kahle, onomthetho noqhakambisa intuthuko kuphela ongakwazi ukufeza izibophezelo zokuthuthukisa izimpilo zabantu baleli lizwe.

src: this means that the public service must be staffed by men and women who are professional, skilled, selfless and honest.
tgt: lokhu kusho ukuthi imi sebenzi kahulumeni kumele iqashe amadoda nabesifazane abawufundele umsebenzi, abanamakhono, abangaca bangeli bona bodwa futhi abaneqiniso.

src: they must be committed to upholding the values of the constitution, and must, as i said in my inaugural speech, "faithfully serve no other cause than that of the public".
tgt: kumele bazinikele ukupha kamisa amagugu omthethosi sekelo, futhi kumele, njengo ba ngangishilo enkulumweni yami yokugcotshwa, "base benzele umphakathi ngoku thembeka kuphela".

src: over the past two weeks, public consultations have been underway on an important policy document that will give greater impetus to our efforts to bolster, strengthen and capacitate the civil service.
tgt: emavikini amabili edlule, izingxoxo nomphakathi bezi qhubeka mayelana nomthe tho obalulekile ozonikeza umfutho omkhulu emizamwe ni yethu yokuqinisa, ukunike za amandla kanye nokunike za amakhono ezomsebenzi kahulumeni.

src: the draft national implementation framework towards the professionalisation of the public service aims to build a state that better serves our people, that is insulated from undue political interference and where appointments are made on merit.
tgt: umthetho osadingidwa wohlaka lokuqaliswa ko kusebenza lukazwelonke ekuqeqeshekeni emisebe nzini yomphakathi uhlose ukwakha umbuso osebenze la kangcono abantu bakithi, ongenakho ukungenelela kwezepolitiki futhi lapho imisebenzi inikezwa ngoku faneleka.

src: the framework was approved by cabinet in november last year and structured consultation with various sectors of society are now underway.
tgt: uhlaka lwagunyazwa yi khabhinethi ngolwezi ngo nyaka owedlule futhi izi ngxoxo ezihlelekile nemikha kha yomphakathi eyehluka hlukene ziyaqhubeka njenga manje.

src: twentyseven years into democracy, it can be said of the public service that while several pockets of excellence exist, we have serious challenges in many government departments with regards to skills, competence and professionalism.
tgt: iminyaka engamashumi amabili nesikhombisa yenta ndo yeningi, singasho ukuthi uma sikhuluma ngemisebenzi kahulumeni noma kukhona okuningi okuhamba kahle kakhulu, sisasenazo izinselele eminyangweni eminingi kahulumeni uma kuziwa kumakhono, ukwenza kahle umsebenzi kanye nokuqeqe sheka emsebenzini.

src: all too often, people have been hired into and promoted to key positions for which they are neither suitable nor qualified.
tgt: isikhathi esiningi, abantu bebeqashwa futhi benyu selwa ezikhundleni eziphe zulu ezingabafanele noma abangaziqeqeshelwe.

src: this affects government performance, but also contributes to nepotism, political interference in the work of departments, lack of accountability, mismanagement and corruption.
tgt: lokhu kuthunaza ukusebenza kuka hulumeni, kodwa futhi kuvu na ukunikezana umsebenzi ngobuhlobo, ukugamanxa kwepolitiki kumsebenzi weminyango, ukungaphe nduli, ukungaphathi kahle kanye nenkohlakalo.

src: there is also the related problem of political and executive interference in the administration of the public service.
tgt: kunenye futhi inkinga ehambisana nalokhu yepo litiki kanye nokugamanxa kwabaphathi ekuphathweni kwemisebenzi kahulumeni.

src: one need only to look at the instability in government departments when senior managers are swopped or replaced each time a new minister is appointed.
tgt: umuntu kumele abheke ku phela ukungazinzi kweminya ngo kahulumeni uma abapha thi abakhulu beshintshwa noma bekhishwa njalo nje uma kubekwa ungqongqo she omusha.

src: directorsgeneral (dgs) and provincial heads of departments (hods) are particularly affected.
tgt: abaqondisijikelele naba phathi beminyango ezifu ndazweni bathinteka ka khulu.

src: in some departments, dgs, hods and executive managers have had stability of tenure, enabling the departments to function with little disruption.
tgt: kweminye iminyango, amadg, amahod kanye nabaphathi abakhulu babe nozinzo esikhathini, lokho okwenze iminyango yakwazi ukusebenza ngokuphazami seka okuncane.

src: in most of these departments where there is leadership stability, audit outcomes tend to be positive and public funds can be accounted for.
tgt: kweminingi yale minyango lapho kukhona uzinzo kubaholi, imiphumela yocwaningo lwamabhuku ivame ukuba mihle futhi nezimali zikahulumeni kuya phenduleka ngazo.

src: where there is a high turnover of heads of department, there is often administrative turmoil.
tgt: lapho kukhona uguquko olukhulu kubaphathi bomnyango, ku vamise ukuthi kube khona isiphithiphithi ekuphatheni.

src: one of the key recommendations made in the draft framework is that the public service must be depoliticised and that government departments must be insulated from politics.
tgt: esinye sezincomo ezibalu lekile ezenziwe kumthetho osadingidwa wohlaka ukuthi imisebenzi kahulumeni kumele abezepolitiki banga gamanxi kuyona nokuthi iminyango kahulumeni ku mele ivaleleke kwezepolitiki.

src: professionalisation is necessary for stability in the public service, especially in the senior ranks.
tgt: ukuqeqesheka emsebenzi ni kuyadingeka ukuze ku zoba nozinzo emisebenzi ni kahulumeni, ikakhuluka zi ezikhundleni eziphezulu.

src: public servants must be able to continue doing their jobs "regardless of any changes of ministers, members of the executive council or councillors within the governing party in charge of the administration, or changes to political parties after elections".
