src: "these findings show that cyberbullying is a serious issue... getting everyone involved – youth, parents, educators, law enforcement and social media companies – is the key to dealing with this problem," he adds.
tgt: ububhoklolo obenziwa ngeinthanethi benzeka uma omunye esebenzisa ubuchwepheshe bezoku xhumana ukuhlukumeza, ukusabisa, ukuhlambalaza, ukuthusa, ukucathamela, ukuphoxa noma ukuhlekisa ngamabomu ngomunye umuntu.

src: most cyberbullying, 42%, occurs on instagram, 31% on facebook, 31% on snapchat, 12% on whatsapp, 10% on youtube and 9% on twitter.
tgt: ungobeni uthi ucwaningo lubonisa ukuthi abantwana abangama41% baqala ukuba nexhala phakathi kwabantu emva koku bhekana nobubhoklolo obenziwa ngeinthanethi, abangama37% baqala ukukhathazeka, abangama26% banemicabango yokuzibulala bese kuthi abangama25% bona bayazilimaza.

src: csir expert rofhiwa netshiya says there is a need for public education about all forms of cyberbullying.
tgt: "le miphumela ibonisa ukuthi ububhoklolo obenziwa ngeinthanethi bu yinkinga enkulu kakhulu.

src: "we need to educate children that cyberbullying can lead to serious consequences," she says.
tgt: ukubandakanya wonke umuntu – intsha, abazali, othisha, abomthetho kanye nezinkampani zezinkundla zokuxhumana – iyona ndlela yokubhekana nale nkinga," engeza.

src: to tackle cyberbullying, the csir team is working on a platform that detects bullying in chatrooms.
tgt: ungcweti wasecsir urofhi wa netshiya uthi kunesi dingo sokufundiswa kompha kathi ngazo zonke izinhlobo zobubhoklolo obenziwa ngeinthanethi.

src: "the platform will automatically detect cyberbullying on chat groups and block users who continue to send hate speech.
tgt: "kufanele sifundise aba ntwana ukuthi ububhoklolo obenziwa ngeinthanethi bungaholela kwimiphumela emibi," kusho yena.

src: it will give the user three warning messages and, if they persist, it will block them," says netshiya.
tgt: luzothumelela loyo oyisebenzisayo imiyalezo emithathu yezixwayiso, uma beqhubeka, luzobavimbela ukuthi basebenzise inkundla leyo yokuxhumana," kusho unetshiya.

src: she advises parents to install basic internet monitoring software on their children's devices to monitor their activities.
tgt: weluleke abazali ukuthi bafake isoftware yoku qapha omakhalekhukhwini babantwana babo ukuze bezohlale bebheke ukuthi benzani.

src: "there are lowcost products that can invisibly monitor the activities of your kids and privately email you the results as often as you like.
tgt: "kunemikhiqizo engabizi kakhulu ekwazi ukuqapha ngokungabonakali konke okwenziwa abantwana bakho bese uthunyelelwa iimeyili ngasese yemiphumela ngalezo zikhathi ezithandwa uwena.

src: these are very important to track internet sites visited, downloads, chatroom conversations and instant messaging.
tgt: lokhu kubalulekile kakhulu ukulandelela izizinda ze inthanethi okungenwe ku zona, okuthathwe kuinthanethi kwafakwa kumakhalekhukhwini, izingxoxo za sezinkundleni zokuxhumana kanye nemiyalezo.

src: "the csir offers the following tips for parents who suspect their children are victims of cyberbullying: ensure the child feels safe, show unconditional support.
tgt: "icsir inikeza la masu alandelayo kubazali abasola ukuthi abantwana babo bayi zisulu zobubhoklolo obenzi wa ngeinthanethi: qinisekisa ukuthi umntwana uzizwa ephephile, bonisa ukumeseka ngokuphelele.

src: work with your child to arrive at a course of action that you both agree on.
tgt: bambisana nomntwana wakho ukuthola indlela enizo kwenza ngayo enivumelana ngayo nobabili.

src: discuss the cyberbullying matter with the relevant school.
tgt: xoxisana nesikolo esithi ntekayo ngodaba lobubhoklo lo obenziwa ngeinthanethi.

src: contact parents of the aggressor to investigate the matter and remove offending material.
tgt: thinta abazali bomntwana onodlame ukuze kuzophe nyisiswa udaba futhi kususwe nakho konke okukhubekisayo.

src: report the issue to police in the case of physical threats or extortion, stalking, blackmail and the sexual exploitation of minors.
tgt: bika udaba emaphoyiseni uma kukhona ukusatshiswa okukhona noma ukuphangwa, ukucathanyelwa, ukuphoqwa ngenkokhelo kanye noku xhashazwa kwabantwana.

src: educate your child about appropriate online behaviour.
tgt: fundisa umntwana wakho ngokuziphatha okufanele kuinthanethi.

src: sa strives to realise the vision of the constitution vukuzenzele unnamed sixty years ago, on 31 may 1961, apartheid south africa became a republic, cutting its ties with the british empire.
tgt: ningizimu afrika iphokophelele ukufeza umbono womthethosisekelo vukuzenzele unnamed iminyaka engamashu mi ayisithupha eyedlu le, mhla zingama31 kunhlaba 1961, umbuso wobandlululo waseningi zimu afrika wazimela nje ngeriphabhulikhi, waxe buka kumbuso wasebhri thani.

src: while a ‘republic’ is generally defined as a state in which supreme power is held by the people and their elected representatives, this was not the case in south africa.
tgt: ngesikhathi ‘iriphabhuli khi’ ingachazwa njengo mbuso lapho amandla ama khulu ephethwe ngabantu kanye nalabo ababamele abakhethiwe, kwakunge njalo eningizimu afrika.

src: the constitution of the apartheid republic pledged allegiance to god, "who gathered our forebears together from many lands and gave them this as their own".
tgt: umthethosisekelo wombu so wobandlululo wawuthe mbisa ukuthembeka kunku lunkulu, "owahlanganisa okhokho bethu ndawonye besuka ezindaweni eziningi wase ebanika lokhu njengo kwabo".

src: it was a constitution written by and for a racial minority, and it used faith to justify tyranny.
tgt: kwakungumthethosisekelo owawubhalwe futhi ubha lelwe ingcosana yababandlu lula ngokobuhlanga, futhi wawusebenzisa inkolo uku thethelela unya.

src: it outlined the administration of government, providing that only white people were eligible to vote and serve as public representatives.
tgt: wawucacisa ukuphatha kukahulumeni, unikeza labo abamhlophe ukuthi ibona kuphela abane gunya lokuvota futhi bamele umphakathi.

src: the country’s majority was relegated to a footnote towards the end of its 121 provisions, in a section titled ‘administration of bantu affairs, etc.’.
tgt: iningi labantu bezwe la kithi lalibalwe embhalweni ophansi ngasekugcineni kwizinhlinzeko eziyi121, esahlukweni esasinesihloko esithi ‘ukuphathwa kwezi ndaba zabantu abansundu, njll.’.

src: in a televised message, prime minister hf verwoerd said: "we seek the gradual development of each of our groups in a certain direction.
tgt: kumyalezo owasakazwa kumabonakude, unduna nkulu uhf verwoerd wa thi: "sihlose ukuthuthuka kancane kancane kwawo wonke amaqembu akithi sibheke endaweni ethile.

src: here the solution is openly sought by retaining the white man’s guiding hand.
tgt: lapha isisombululo sizotho lakala ngokuthi siqhubeke nokuholwa isandla somuntu omhlophe.

src: "we are very happy to be a united people," he declared to the world.
tgt: ""sithokoze kakhulu ukuthi singabantu ababumbene," wamemezela kuwo wonke umhlaba.

src: but the reality was that we were not a united people.
tgt: kodwa iqiniso lalithi sasi ngabumbene neze.

src: we were inhabitants of a country where one’s rights, prospects and life expectancy was determined by one’s race.
tgt: sasingabahlali basezweni lapho amalungelo omuntu, amathemba kanye nokuli ndelekile empilweni beku nqunywa ibala lomuntu.

src: for two decades, the republic of south africa constitution act of 1961 was the legal impetus for the repression of nearly 90% of the south african population.
tgt: iminyaka engamashumi amabili, umthethosisekelo weriphabhulikhi yaseningi zimu afrika wangowe1961 wawungumfutho osemthe thweni wengcindezelo yaba ntu abacishe babe ngama90% baseningizimu afrika.

src: this unhappy anniversary took place in the same month that we celebrated the 25th anniversary of the adoption by the constitutional assembly of our new democratic constitution, which became the birth certificate of a real united nation.
tgt: loku kukhumbula iminya ka engajabulisi kwenzeka enyangeni efanayo naleyo esibungaza ngayo iminyaka engama25 yokwamukelwa komthethosisekelo wenta ndo yabantu omusha yisi gungu somthethosisekelo, okwaba ukuzalwa kwesizwe esibumbene ngempela.

src: now we have one law for one nation.
tgt: manje sesinomthetho owodwa wesizwe esisodwa.

src: together, we have chosen for ourselves a system of government that gives true meaning to the concept of a republic.
tgt: sisonke, sizikhethele thina ngokwethu uhulumeni onikeza iqiniso lokuthi iyini iriphabhulikhi.

src: we have said that in our democratic republic, everyone is equal before the law and has the right to equal protection and benefit of the law.
tgt: sithe kwiriphabhulikhi yethu yentando yabantu, wonke umuntu uyalingana ngaphambi komthetho futhi unelungelo lokuvikelwa ngokulinganayo kanye no kuzuza kumthetho.

src: south africa today is a country where the administration of justice is vested in independent courts and a judiciary that is subject only to the constitution.
tgt: iningizimu afrika iyizwe lapho ukwenza ubulungi swa kubekwe ezinkantolo ezizimele kanye nohlelo lwe zinkantolo olusebenza ngo komthethosisekelo.

src: we live in a country where everyone has the right to approach the courts for the fulfilment of their rights.
tgt: sihlala ezweni lapho wonke umuntu enelungelo lokuya ezinka ntolo ukuze kuzogcwalise kiswa amalungelo abo.

src: we live in a country where communities can stake a legal claim on land they were forcefully moved from, and where individuals or families are protected against arbitrary eviction from their homes.
tgt: siphila ezweni lapho imi phakathi ingafaka isima ngalo somthetho emhlabeni eyasuswa kuyona ngendlu zula, nalapho abantu noma imindeni ivikelekile ekuxo shweni okungafanele ema khaya abo.

src: we live in a country where everyone is permitted to freely practise their culture and traditions.
tgt: siphila ezweni lapho bonke abantu bevumelekile ukwe nza amasiko nemikhuba yabo ngokukhululeka.

src: it is a country where anyone can freely protest in support of social, political and other causes anywhere.
tgt: izwe lapho noma ngubani anga bhikisha ngokukhululeka ngokweseka ezenhlalo, eze politiki nanoma yini enye imbangela noma ikuphi.

src: our constitutional dispensation is premised on accountable government, where the executive is answerable to the people and where parliament is representative of the people.
tgt: ukusebenza komthethosi sekelo wethu kuphezu kohu lumeni ophendulayo, lapho abaphathi bephendula ku bantu nalapho iphalamende limele abantu.

src: it is a country where the law applies equally to any citizen.
tgt: ilizwe lapho umthetho usebenza ngokulinganayo kunoma isiphi isakhamuzi.

src: we now have a government of the people, for the people and by the people.
tgt: manje sesinohulumeni wa bantu, osebenzela abantu, futhi ngabantu.

src: when the apartheid regime triumphantly paraded its racist constitution to the world 60 years ago, it had misplaced confidence that it would endure.
tgt: ngesikhathi umbuso wo bandlululo wawuqholosha sakunqoba ngomthethosi sekelo obandlulula ngoko buhlanga emhlabeni jikelele eminyakeni engama60 eya dlula, ulahle ukuzethemba nokubekezelela.

src: in an unanswered letter to verwoerd a month before the republic was declared, nelson mandela affirmed the liberation movement’s rejection of the forcibly imposed white republic.
tgt: encwadini engaphendu lwanga eyayiya kuverwoerd ngenyanga phambi koku menyezelwa kweriphabhu likhi, unelson mandela waqinisekisa ukuchithwa kwenhlangano yenkululeko yiriphabhulikhi yabamhlo phe eyaphoqelelwa nge nkani.

src: he said that no constitution or form of government decided without the participation of the african people would enjoy moral validity.
tgt: wathi awukho umthetho sisekelo noma ukubunjwa kohulumeni ngaphandle ko kubandakanywa kwabantu baseafrika oyoke ufaneleke ngokuziphatha.

src: indeed no system that entrenches the systematic denial of people’s rights can be sustained.
tgt: nebala alukho uhleloku sebenza oluvumela uhle lokusebenza oluphikisa ama lungelo abantu olungagci nwa.

src: though it would be over three decades before the demands of the liberation movement were met, we eventually won our freedom.
tgt: yize kuzoba ngaphezu kweminyaka engamashumi amathathu ngaphambi ko kuthi izimfuno zenhlangano yenkululeko ziphumelele, sagcina sinqobile ukuthola inkululeko yethu.

src: in relegating the apartheid constitution to the dustbin of history, we committed ourselves to a new constitution and a new set of values.
tgt: ukulahla umthethosisekelo wombuso wobandlululo e mgqonyeni womlando, sizinikele thina kumthetho sisekelo omusha kanye nohlu olusha lwamagugu.

src: when i addressed the constitutional assembly 25 years ago, i said our constitution must become more than words on a page; it must become a reality in the lives of our people.
tgt: ngesikhathi ngethula inku lumo kusigungu somthe thosisekelo eminyakeni engama25 eyadlula, ngathi umthethosisekelo wethu kumele ube yinto enkulu ukudlula amagama nje ase phepheni; kumele ube iqi niso ezimpilweni zabantu bakithi.

src: unless we do so, this progressive and revolutionary document will be rendered irrelevant and meaningless.
tgt: uma singenzi kanjalo, lo mqulu oya phambili kanye nowenkululeko uzoba yize leze futhi uzobe ungasho lutho.

src: we have long decided what kind of society we want to be.
tgt: sanquma kudala ukuthi ilu phi uhlobo lomphakathi esi funa ukuba yilona.

src: it is a society rooted in human dignity, equality, freedom and nondiscrimination.
tgt: umpha kathi osekelwe ngesithunzi somuntu, ukulingana, inku luleko kanye nokungacwasi.

src: for a quarter of a century we have worked to build such a society.
tgt: esikhathini esingangekota yeminyaka elikhulu sisebe nzile ukwakha umphakathi onjalo.

src: dreams come true for tafelkop community vukuzenzele unnamed a group of black farmers in tafelkop in grob lersdal, limpopo are the proud owners of 189 hectares of land, which they have been farming for the past 25 years.
tgt: akufezeke amaphupho emphakathini wasetafelkop vukuzenzele unnamed iqembu labalimi aba mnyama basetafe lkop egroblersdal, elimpopo, bayaziqhenya ngokuba ngabanikazi bo mhlaba onobubanzi obuli nganiselwa kumahektha ayi189, abesebelime kuwo na iminyaka engama25 eyedlule.

src: the 30 farmers received title deeds for the land from president cyril ramaphosa after the department of public works and infrastructure transferred it for land redistribution purposes.
tgt: laba balimi abangama30 bathole amatayitela obuni kazi balo mhlaba kumonga meli ucyril ramaphosa emva kokuba umnyango wezemisebenzi kahulu meni kanye nengqalasizinda unikezele ngalo mhlaba ngenhloso yokuwaba kabu sha.

src: the land is valued at more than r25.5 million, but was handed over to the farmers for free.
tgt: lo mhlaba ubiza isamba semali esingaphezulu kwe zigidi ezingama25.5 zama randi kodwa unikezelwe kulaba balimi mahhala.

src: "this is indeed a great day for the community of tafelkop, for the people of limpopo and for the whole of south africa.
tgt: "lolu ngusuku oluhle ka khulu impela kumphakathi wasetafelkop, kubantu baselimpopo, futhi ngo kunjalo kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: "today we are witnessing a community’s dream being fulfilled.
tgt: "namhlanje singofakazi bokufezwa kwephupho lalo mphakathi.

src: it is the vision that this community has spent the past 25 years fighting to see realised," said the president at the handover ceremony.
tgt: kungumbono walo mphakathi osekuphele iminyaka engama25 be lwela ukuwubona ufezeka," kusho umongameli emci mbini wokunikezelwa kwa lo mhlaba.

src: the farmers have been successfully farming various agricultural produce on the land since 1996. they organised themselves in the 1990s to be registered commercial farmers under the banner of the tafelkop farmers association and started to engage government.
tgt: laba balimi bebelima ngempumelelo imikhiqizo yezolimo ehlukahlukene kulo mhlaba kusukela ngo nyaka we1996.

src: in 2000, the then national department of agriculture entered into lease agreements with the tafelkop farmers association in terms of the land redistribution for agricultural development programme.
tgt: bazihlela ngeminyaka ye1990 ukuba babe nga balimi abalimela ukuthe ngisa ababhalisiwe ngapha nsi kwenhlangano ebizwa ngokuthi itafelkop farmers association futhi baqala ukukhulumisana nohulu meni.

src: in 2009, the former limpopo department of agri culture recommended to the department of public works that the land be transferred to the farmers.
tgt: ngonyaka wezi2000, u mnyango wezolimo kuzwe lonke wangaleso sikhathi wangena ezivumelwaneni zokuqashiswa komhlaba kwitafelkop farmers associa tion okuhambisana nokwa biwa kabusha komhlaba ngokohlelo lokuthuthu kiswa kwezolimo.

src: the deeds were registered in the names of the farmers earlier this year.
tgt: ngonyaka wezi2009, umnyango wezolimo waselimpopo wangaphambilini waphakamisa kumnyango wezemisebenzi kahulumeni ukuthi umhlaba kumele unikezelwe kubalimi.

src: the land is currently being used to farm tobacco, cotton and fresh produce.
tgt: okwamanje lo mhlaba usetshenziselwa ukutshala ugwayi, ukotini kanye ne mikhiqizo yokudla.

src: thirtytwo households are supported by the land and farming activities which provide employment to 128 permanent workers and up to 320 seasonal workers.
tgt: amakhaya angamashumi amathathu nambili ondliwa yilo mhlaba kanye nemise benzi yokulima ehlinzeka ngemisebenzi kubasebenzi abasebenza ngokugcwele abayi128 kanye nalabo abasebenza ngezikhathi ezithile abangama320.

src: justice for the communitythe president said the com munity had endured many hardships over the years and the "title deeds bring justice to a dispossessed community".
tgt: ubulungiswa kumphakathiumongameli uthe umpha kathi ubusubekezelele ubu nzima obuningi eminyakeni eyedlule futhi "amatayitela agunyaza ubunikazi aletha ubulungiswa kumphakathi owawuphucwe umhlaba".

src: "we have not forgotten the dispossession, land theft and forced removals that the people of this community and many communities across the country had to endure.
tgt: "asikakhohlwa ngokuphu cwa komhlaba, ukuntsho ntshwa komhlaba kanye nokususwa ngendluzula kwabantu balo mphakathi futhi miningi imiphakathi ezweni lonkana ebekezelele lokhu.

src: "we have not forgotten the harsh legacy of farming here in limpopo, where farmdwellers were forced to be labour tenants on their forefathers’ land and not allowed to own land to feed their families or graze their animals."
tgt: "asikakhohlwa umlando obuhlungu wokulima la pha elimpopo, lapho aba ntu abahlala epulazini bapho qelelwa ukuthi bebe yizi qashi ezisebenza emhlabeni wokhokho babo, futhi be ngavunyelwa ukuthi babe abanikazi bomhlaba ukuze bezokondla imindeni yabo noma umhlaba wemfuyo yabo.

src: he added that black farmworkers were exploited and abused in what was previously the northern transvaal.
tgt: "wengeze ngokuthi abase benzi abamnyama basema pulazini baxhashazwa futhi bahlukunyezwa endaweni eyayaziwa ngenorthern transvaal phambilini.

src: "we also recall how the apartheid government supported white farmers with equipment, technical support and access to credit to build their businesses, but black subsistence farmers struggled to survive.
tgt: "siyakhumbula futhi noku thi uhulumeni wobandlu lulo wabasekela kanjani abalimi abamhlophe ngezi nsizakusebenza, ngoxhaso lobuchwepheshe kanye nokuthola ukuboleka imali ukuze bakhe amabhizinisi abo, kepha abalimi abamnya ma abasafufusa bathwala kanzima ukuze baziphilise.

src: "transforming the agricultural industrythe president said the trans fer of land inspires hope because it shows that with the right support and opportunities, the agricultural industry can be transformed for the benefit of the country.
tgt: "ukuguqulwa kwemboni yezolimoumongameli uthe ukunike zelwa komhlaba kukhuthaza ithemba ngoba kukhombisa ukuthi ngokuxhaswa nama thuba afanele, imboni ye zolimo ingaguqulwa ukuze kuzuze izwe.

src: "we celebrate our progress, because day by day our land reform programme is gaining momentum.
tgt: "sibungaza inqubekelaphambili yethu, ngoba usu ku nosuku uhlelo lwethu lwezinguquko kwezomhla ba luthola amandla.

src: "to date, government has redistributed over five million hectares of land, totalling around 5 500 farms, to more than 300 000 beneficiaries."
tgt: "kuze kube namuhla, uhu lumeni usabe kabusha umhla ba ongaphezu kwamahektha ayizigidi ezinhlanu, usuwo nke ubalelwa emapulazini ayizi5 500, nozozuzwa nga bantu abangaphezu wezi 300 000.

src: so far, the land restitution process has benefited over two million land claimants and resulted in the transfer of around 2.7 million hectares.
tgt: "kuze kube manje, inqu bo yokwabiwa kabusha ko mhlaba ihlomulise abafaka izicelo zomhlaba abanga phezu kwezigidi ezimbili kwaholela ekunikezelweni komhlaba ongamahektha ayizigidi ezi2.7.

src: "land reform isn’t just in the interests of redress, justice and social cohesion.
tgt: "uguquko kwezomhlaba alukho mayelana nentshi sekelo yokulungisa kuphela nje, ubulungiswa kanye no kuhlangana komphakathi.

src: it is also about economic development.
tgt: kuphinde kube mayela na nokuthuthukiswa ko mnotho.

src: agriculture and the agriculture value chain can and must transform rural economies," said president ramaphosa.
tgt: ezolimo nochunge chunge lwezolimo kunga kwazi futhi kufanele ku guqule iminotho yasema khaya," kusho umongameli uramaphosa.

src: government plans to establish a land and agrarian reform agency to fasttrack land reform.
tgt: uhulumeni uhlela ukusu ngula iejensi yezomhlaba kanye neyezolimo ukuze kusheshiswe uguquko kwe zomhlaba.

src: "we are looking at how effective our past policies have been.
tgt: "sibheka ukuthi inqubo mgomo yethu yaphambi lini isebenze ngempumelelo kangakanani.

src: we are going to address this issue of land reform urgently.
tgt: sizolungisa lolu daba loguquko kwe zomhlaba ngokushesha.

src: "addressing past mistakesthe president said govern ment was working hard to correct what went wrong during the apartheid years and since the start of de mocracy.
tgt: "silungisa ama phutha aphambiliniumongameli uthe uhulume ni usebenza ngokuzikhandla selokhu kwaqala intando yeningi labantu ukulungisa okungahambanga kahle nge sikhathi sobandlululo.

src: "we do this in tribute to those who lived among us; who resided here.
tgt: "lokhu sikwenzela uku hlonipha labo ababehlala phakathi kwethu; ababehlala kuwo lo mhlaba wakithi.

src: "land reform is vital to improving the country’s food security, building an inclusive economy and providing a better future for all south africans, added the president.
tgt: "uguquko kwezomhlaba lubalulekile ekuthuthuki seni ukuba khona kokudla ezweni, ukwakha umno tho obandakanya wonke umuntu, kanye nokunikeza ikusasa elingcono labo bo nke abantu baseningizimu afrika, kwengeza umonga meli.

src: the youth are our greatest asset vukuzenzele unnamed on june 16th 1976, the youth of soweto and other parts of the country rose up against the iniquity of bantu education.
tgt: intsha iyigugu lethu vukuzenzele unnamed mhla we16 ku nhlangulana 1976, intsha ya sesoweto nakwezinye izi ngxenye zezwe yasuka ya lwa nokungabi nobulungi swa kwimfundo yabantu abamnyama.

src: on that day and in the days that followed, many lost their lives.
tgt: ngalolo suku nangezinye ezilandelayo, abantu abaningi abasha balahlekelwa izimpilo zabo.

src: they were killed by a callous regime that had little regard for black lives and thought nothing of opening fire on unarmed, uniformed schoolchildren.
tgt: babulawa ngumbuso onesihluku owawungenandaba nezimpilo zabantu abamnyama futhi owawungenandaba nokudubula abantwana besikole abangahlomile futhi abagqoke umfaniswano wesikole.

src: these events hardened international opinion against the apartheid regime and gave further impetus to the liberation struggle.
tgt: lezi zigameko zaqinisa indlela amazwe ngamazwe abona ngayo umbuso wobandlululo abe esegqugquzela ukulwelwa kwenkululeko.

src: young people have always been at the forefront of social protest, from the antiauthoritarian protests in latin america in the late 1950s, to the protests across africa in the late 1960s.
tgt: abantu abasha bahlale behamba phambili emibhikishweni yomphakathi, kusukela kumibhikisho yokulwisana nondlovukayiphikiswa elatin america ekupheleni kweminyaka ye1950, kuya kwimibhikisho kulolonke izwekazi laseafrika ekupheleni kweminyaka ye1960.

src: history faithfully records the contribution of the generation of 1976 to the international student movement and its stance against oppression and injustice.
tgt: umlando ubonisa ngokweqiniso igalelo lesizukulwane sangowe1976 kwinhlangano yabafundi yamazwe ngamazwe nalapho lime khona ekulweni nengcindezelo nokulwa nokungabibikho kobulungiswa.

src: this historic event 45 years ago continues to be commemorated across africa and the world.
tgt: lesi sigameko esiyingqophamlando esenzeka eminyakeni engama45 edlule siyaqhubeka nokubungazwa kuyoyonke iafrika kanye nomhlaba wonke.

src: it is therefore disturbing that knowledge of june 16th is diminishing among young south africans.
tgt: ngakhoke kuyathikameza kakhulu ukuthi ulwazi mayelana nosuku lwe16 kunhlangulana luyancipha kakhulu entsheni yaseningizimu afrika.

src: this is particularly so among the socalled generation z, or young people born between 1997 and 2015. the 2019/2020 south african social attitudes survey published by the human sciences research council found that close to 40% of generation z has not heard of the historical events of june 16th.
tgt: lokhu kudlange kakhulu entsheni eyaziwa ngokuthi igeneration z, noma abantu abasha abazalwe phakathi kowe1997 kuya kowezi2015.

src: a similar percentage has heard about it but knows very little or nothing about it.
tgt: iphesenti elifanayo like lezwa ngazo kodwa lazi okuncane kakhulu noma alazi lutho ngazo.

src: nevertheless, the survey also found that young people of this generation are open to learning about key historical events and believe in their continued importance.
tgt: noma kunjalo, ucwaningo luphinde lwathola ukuthi abantu abasha balesi sizukulwane bavulelekile ukuthi bafunde ngezigameko zomlando futhi bakholelwe ekubalulekeni kwazo okuqhubekayo.

src: we need to do more as a country to ensure that the message of 1976 is transmitted faithfully.
tgt: kumele senze okuthe xaxa njengezwe ukuqinisekisa ukuthi umyalezo wangowe1976 udluliswa ngokweqiniso.

src: this is a collective responsibility of government, schools, tertiary institutions, parents, families, musicians, artists, and all of society.
tgt: lokhu kungukuzinikela okuhlanganisile kukahulumeni, izikole, izikhungo zemfundo ephakeme, abazali, imindeni, abaculi, amaciko, kanye nawo wonke umphakathi.

src: the generation that was born after apartheid ended inherited a country with a democratic constitution and where fundamental freedoms are protected.
tgt: isizukulwane esazalwa emva kokuphela kobandlululo sagcina sizuze izwe elinomthethosisekelo wentando yabantu lapho izisekelo zenkululeko zivikelwe.

src: the opportunities young black people have today are both vastly different and greatly improved.
tgt: amathuba abantu abasha abanawo manje ahlukile kakhulu futhi athuthukile kakhulu.

src: keeping the story of june 16th alive is a reminder to today’s generation of the great sacrifices made to secure their freedom.
tgt: ukugcina umlando wange16 kunhlangulana uphila kuyisikhumbuzo kwisizukulwane sanamuhla ngokuzidela okukhulu okwenziwa ukuzuza inkululeko yabo.

src: youth day is a reminder of the immense power and agency that young people have to create a better future for themselves.
tgt: usuku lwentsha luyisikhumbuzo samandla amakhulu nokuthi abantu abasha kumele bazakhele ikusasa elingcono.

src: the struggles of young people in south africa today are many.
tgt: ukuzabalaza kwabantu abasha eningizimu afrika kuningi kakhulu kulezi zikhathi zanamuhla.

src: young people have remained at the forefront of activism, whether in pursuit of free education or against social ills like genderbased violence.
tgt: abantu abasha basalokhu behamba phambili kubushoshovu, kungaba ngenxa yokulwela imfundo yamahhala noma ukulwa nezinkinga zenhlalo ezifana nodlame olubhekiswe kubulili obuthile.

src: today the greatest struggle young people wage is against unemployment, which has worsened under the covid19 pandemic.
tgt: namuhla umzabalazo omkhulu abantu abasha ababhekene nawo ukuntuleka kwemisebenzi, okube nzima kakhulu ngesikhathi sobhubhane lwecovid19.

src: creating more opportunities for young people, and access to these opportunities, is government’s foremost priority.
tgt: ukudalela abantu abasha amathuba amaningi, nokufinyelela kulawo mathuba, kuyinto eseqhulwini kuhulumeni.

src: everything that we do as a government contributes towards improving the lives of young people.
tgt: konke esikwenzayo njengohulumeni kunegalelo ekuphuculeni izimpilo zabantu abasha.

src: tackling youth unemployment requires accelerating economic growth, particularly in labourintensive sectors, and building the capability of the state to fulfil its developmental role.
tgt: ukubhekana nokungasebenzi kwentsha kudinga ukukhula komnotho ngesivinini, ikakhulukazi emikhakheni yezemisebenzi, kanye nokwakha ikhono lombuso ukuthi ukwazi ukufeza indima yawo yokuthuthukisa.

src: we are also driving this agenda through targeted interventions.
tgt: lolu hlelo sibuye siluqhube ngezingenelelo eziqonde ngqo.

src: these include the presidential employment stimulus, which has provided work opportunities and livelihoods support for many young people.
tgt: ezibandakanya uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi, oseluhlinzeke ngamathuba emisebenzi nokwesekelwa kwezindlela zokuphila kubantu abasha abaningi.

src: we have launched a range of additional measures to create opportunities, enhance skills development, support young entrepreneurs and enable the full participation of young people in the economy.
tgt: sesethule uchungechunge lwezinyathelo ezengeziwe ukusungula amathuba, ukuthuthukiswa kwamakhono, ukwesekela osomabhizinisi abancane kanye nokubandakanyeka ngokugcwele kwabantu abasha emnothweni.

src: this includes the establishment of a national pathway management network, sa youth, to make it easier for young people to view and access opportunities and receive active support to find pathways into the labour market.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya ukusungulwa kwenational pathway management network, isa youth, ukwenza lula ukuthi abantu abasha babuke futhi bafinyelele kumathuba futhi bathole ukwesekwa ukuthola izindlela ezizobafaka emnothweni.

src: these are among the priorities of the presidential youth employment intervention, which was launched just weeks before we entered a national lockdown last year and which is now entering full implementation.
tgt: lokhu kuyingxenye yokuseqhulwini ohlelweni lukamongameli lokusungulela intsha imisebenzi, olwethulwa emavikini ngaphambi nje kokuthi kuvalwe izwe ngonyaka owedlule nokuyimanje luzoqaliswa ngokugcwele.

src: the presidential youth employment intervention was built on the understanding that addressing the youth unemployment crisis requires innovative thinking and strong partnerships across society.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungulela intsha imisebenzi lwalwakhelwe phezu kokuqonda ukuthi ukubhekana nenkinga yokungasebenzi kwentsha kudinga ukucabanga amaqhinga amasha kanye nokusebenzisana okuqinile kuwowonke umphakathi.

src: its ultimate objective is to find models that work, whether in skills development or active labour market policies, and to scale these rapidly to reach as many young people as possible.
tgt: inhlosongqangi ukuthola izindlela ezisebenzayo, kungaba ekuthuthukisweni kwamakhono noma kumithethonqubo yezemisebenzi, nokusabalalisa lokhu ngokushesha ukuze kuzofinyelela kubantu abasha abaningi ngokusemandleni.

src: most importantly, it recognises that young people must be at the centre of any effort to boost youth employment.
tgt: okubaluleke kakhulu, kuyabonisa ukuthi abantu abasha kumele babe ngumongo wanoma ngumuphi umzamo wokufukula ukuqashwa kwentsha.

src: young people are our greatest asset, and our greatest weapon in this fight.
tgt: abantu abasha bayigugu lethu, futhi bayisikhali sethu kule mpi.

src: we salute the resilience of every young person playing their part to build and develop this country.
tgt: sethulela isigqoko ukuqina kwawo wonke umuntu omusha odlala indima yakhe ekwakheni nasekuthuthukiseni leli lizwe.

src: they are the young people volunteering in our communities, building our country through the presidential employment stimulus, running their own businesses and studying to better themselves.
tgt: abantu abasha abavolontiya emiphakathini yakithi, abakha izwe lakithi ngohlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi, baqhuba amabhizinisi abo futhi bayafunda ukuthi baphucule izimpilo zabo.

src: they are the young people who are forging their own path and bringing their families along with them.
tgt: bangabantu abasha abaphemba indlela yabo futhi baletha nemindeni yabo.

src: we salute young people who keep working to improve their lives.
tgt: sethulela isigqoko abantu abasha abaqhubeka nokusebenzela ukuphucula izimpilo zabo.

src: young people are doing their part; they need government, and indeed all of society, to do ours.
tgt: abantu abasha badlala indima yabo; badinga uhulumeni, kanjalo nomphakathi wonke, ukudlala eyethu.

src: our country is going through the most difficult of times, but we are working daily to expand the frontiers of hope.
tgt: izwe lethu libhekene nezikhathi ezinzima, kodwa sisebenza zinsuku zonke ukwenyusa amathemba.

src: we are seeing the green shoots of growth in our economy, and are confident this will translate to better opportunities for all.
tgt: siyakubona ukulokoza kwethemba lokukhula emnothweni wethu, futhi siyathemba ukuthi lokhu kuzoholela emathubeni angcono kithi sonke.

src: prevent burns this winter allison cooper just as winter brings with it the need to keep warm, it also increases the risk of burn injuries from candles, fires, stoves, heaters and boiling water.
tgt: gwema ukusha kulobu busika allison cooper njengoba ubusika budinga ukuthi si fudumale, buphi nde bandise ubungozi bo kushiswa amakhandlela, imililo, izitofu, izifudumezi kanye namanzi abilayo.

src: "burn injuries inc rease dramatically during winter and parents and caregivers need to be extra careful to ensure their own and their children’s safety," says doctor gary dos passos.
tgt: "ukusha kuba mandla ka khulu ngesikhathi sasebusika futhi abazali nabanakekeli kudingeka ukuthi bacophelisise ukuqinisekisa ukuphepha kwabo nokwezingane zabo," kusho udokotela ugary dos passos.

src: he is the head of the burns unit at the red cross war memorial children’s hospital (rcwmch) and an executive committee member of the burn society of south africa.
tgt: ungumphathi wengxenye yabashile esibhedlela ired cross war memorial chi ldren’s hospital (ircw mch) aphinde abe ilungu lekomidi labaphathi beburn society of south africa.

src: while accidental fires are inevitable, many burn injuries can be prevented with vigilance, proper adult supervision and safer practices.
tgt: nakuba imililo eyenzeka ngephutha ingeke yagwemeka, ukulimala ngokusha okuningi kungagwemeka ngokuqaphelisisa okufanele, komuntu omdala kanye nokulandela izindlela zokuphepha.

src: "flame burns are devastat ing injuries with substantial lifelong physical and psychosocial consequences for the affected survivors and their families," says dr dos passos.
tgt: "ukushiswa ngumlilo ku yalimaza futhi kunomthelela omkhulu wempilo yonke nangokwengqondo kulabo abasindile kanye nemindeni yabo," kusho udkt udos passos.

src: how to prevent burnsburn injuries can be pre vented around the home.
tgt: ungakugwema kanjani ukushaukushiswa ngumlilo ku ngagwemeka ekhaya.

src: here are some tips: keep matches, lighters, accelerants (petrol and paraffin), candles, gas and paraffin lamps and heaters out of children’s reach.
tgt: nawa amanye amasu: gcina umentshisi, okoku thungela umlilo, okubhe bhethekisa masinya umlilo (uphethiloli nophalafini), amakhandlela, izibani zegesi nezikaphalafini kanye nezifudumezi kude nalapho kufinyelela khona abantwana.

src: this is extremely dangerous.
tgt: lokhu kuyingozi kakhulu.

src: do not let children play near paraffin or gas lamps or heaters.
tgt: ungavumeli abantwana badlale eduze kophalafini noma izibani zegesi noma izifudumezi.

src: do not hold a child while cooking or leave children unsupervised in or near the kitchen.
tgt: ungaphathi umntwana ngesikhathi upheka noma ushiye abantwana benga bhekiwe eduzane noma ekhishini.

src: ensure the kettle is out of reach.
tgt: qiniseka ukuthi akufinye leleki eketeleni.

src: buy a cordless kettle if you can.
tgt: thenga ike tela elingenayo intambo uma ukwazi.

src: do not carry urns or pots of boiling water around near children.
tgt: ungaphakamisi imigqomo noma amabhodwe okubilisa amanzi eduze kwaba ntwana.

src: turn pot handles away from the front of the stove.
tgt: qhelisa izibambo zamabho dwe ngaphambi kwesitofu.

src: put candles in a deep glass bottle with sand at the bottom so that they will go out if they fall over.
tgt: faka amakhandlela ebho dleleni lengilazi elishona phakathi elinesihlabathi phakathi ukuze azocima uma ewa phansi.

src: do not cover fires with sand.
tgt: ungambozi imililo ngesihlabathi.

src: the heat stays in the sand for hours.
tgt: ukushisa kuhlala amahora amaningi esihlabathini.

src: put cold water in the bath first, and then add hot water.
tgt: faka kuqala amanzi abandayo ebhavini, bese ula ndelisa ngashisayo.

src: always test the bath water with your elbow first.
tgt: hlola amanzi okugeza ngendo lolwane yakho kuqala nja lo nje.

src: if you sustain a burn injury involving flames, stop, drop to the ground and roll to put out the flames.
tgt: uma ushiswe ngamalangabi, yima kanjalo, iwa phansi bese uyagingqika ukuze kuzocisha amalangabi.

src: "heat from a fire, hot water or electrical burn will continue to burn the tissue long after the contact is removed.
tgt: "ukushisa komlilo, amanzi ashisayo noma ukushiswa ugesi kuzoqhubeka kushise izicubu zomzimba noma nga be kudala umlilo ususiwe."

src: "stop the burning by keeping the burnt body part under cold running tap water for 20 minutes.
tgt: "nqanda ukusha ngokugcina ingxenye eshile yomzimba ngaphansi kompompi wamanzi abandayo imizuzu engama20.

src: soes must drive economic growth and transformation vukuzenzele unnamed for some years now, south africa’s stateowned enterprises (soes) have mostly been associated in the public eye with state capture, financial mismanagement and inefficiency.
tgt: amasoe kumele aqhubele phambili ukukhula komnotho alethe nezinguquko vukuzenzele unnamed sekuyiminyaka ma nje, amabhizinisi ka hulumeni eningizi mu afrika (amasoe) ese hlobana nokubhekwa yiso lomphakathi mayelana nokuqhwagwa kombuso, ukuxhashazwa kwezimali kanye nokungasebenzi nge ndlela efanele.

src: in addition to needing regular bailouts from government, some of the country’s biggest and most important stateowned companies have been struggling to meet their mandates.
tgt: ngaphezu kokuhlale edinga ukutakulwa nguhulumeni, amanye amabhizinisi kahulumeni amakhulu kanye nezinkampani ezibaluleke kakhulu bezilokhu zithwele kanzima ekufezeni igunya lazo.

src: these soes should be at the forefront of economic and social transformation.
tgt: lawa masoe kumele engabe yiwo ahamba phambili ekuguquleni ezomnotho kanye nezenhlalo yabantu.

src: they are responsible for providing the infrastructure and the services on which the economy depends, whether it be in the generation of electricity, commuter transport, water provision, freight logistics or telecommunications.
tgt: la mabhizinisi anesibophezelo sokuhlinzeka ngengqalasizinda kanye nemisebenzi umnotho onqike kuyona, okungaba ngukuphehlwa kukagesi, ezokuthuthwa komphakathi, ukuhlinzekwa kwamanzi, ukuthuthwa kwempahla noma ezokuxhumana ngocingo.

src: our approach to state ownership is informed by the need for the effective functioning of key network industries, such as energy and ports, and by the need to ensure that the basic needs of all south africans, particularly the poor, can be met.
tgt: indlela yethu yokuthi abe ngaphansi kobunikazi bukahulumeni yayisuselwa kwisidingo sokusebenza ngempumelelo kochungechunge lwezimboni ezingumongo, njengezamandla kanye namachweba, kanye nesidingo sokuqinisekisa ukuthi izidingongqangi eziyisisekelo zabantu baseningizimu afrika, ikakhulukazi labo abadla imbuya ngothi, ziyafezwa.

src: we firmly believe that public ownership is necessary in critical sectors of the economy and that the country needs robust soes that are able to drive economic growth and transformation.
tgt: siyathemba ukuthi amabhizinisi aphethwe nguhulumeni abaluleke kakhulu emikhakheni ebucayi yomnotho kanye nokuthi izwe lidinga amandla amasoe okuyiwona akwazi ukuqhubela phambili ukukhula komnotho nokuletha uguquko.

src: this is particularly the case in the delivery of public goods such as electricity and water, where soes are able to pursue a developmental mandate in the public interest as opposed to a purely commercial one.
tgt: lokhu kunjalo ikakhulukazi ngesikhathi lapho kuthunyelwa khona izidingongqangi zomphakathi ezifana nogesi namanzi, lapho amasoe enamandla okufezekisa igunya lokuthuthukisa ukuze kuzuze umphakathi kunokuthi kwenziwe inzuzo yezezimali.

src: that is why we have made it a priority of this government to turn these companies around to root out corruption, improve their governance and enable them to play the role they should in driving economic growth and employment creation.
tgt: yingakho nje sikubeke eqhulwini kulo hulumeni ukuthi sikhuculula inkohlakalo kulezi zinkampani, sithuthukise ukuphathwa kwazo futhi sizenze zikwazi ukudlala indima okufanele ziyidlale ekufukuleni ukukhula komnotho nokusungulwa kwamathuba emisebenzi.

src: to this end, we have embarked upon a number of reforms to strengthen these soes so that they can produce the results that the country needs and expects.
tgt: kuze kufike lapha, siqalise izinguquko eziningi ukuqinisa lawa masoe ukuze akhiqize imiphumela edingwa futhi elindelwe yileli lizwe.

src: one of the most important reforms is in the energy sector.
tgt: enye yezinguquko ezibaluleke kakhulu nguguquko emkhakheni wezamandla.

src: we have begun the process of restructuring eskom into three different soes, responsible for generation, transmission and distribution, respectively.
tgt: sesiqalile ngenqubo yokwakha kabusha inkampani yakwaeskom yaba ngamasoe amathathu ehlukene, abhekelele ukuphehla, ukudluliswa kanye nokuphakelwa kwamandla kagesi, ngokulandelana.

src: this is because the previous structure of eskom was illsuited for a changing energy landscape.
tgt: lokhu kungenxa yokuthi isakhiwo saphambilini sakwaeskom besingakulungele ukuguquguquka kwamandla kagesi.

src: it had become inefficient and costly and was not sufficiently transparent.
tgt: besingasebenzi ngendlela efanelekile futhi besibiza kakhulu futhi sasingekho obala ngokwanele.

src: the establishment of a transmission entity in particular will mean that eskom will be able to purchase power from a broader range of providers, both private and public.
tgt: ukusungulwa kwezinkampani ezidlulisa ugesi ikakhulukazi kuzosho ukuthi ueskom usuzokwazi ukuthenga amandla kagesi kubahlinzeki abahlukahlukene, emikhakheni yomibili okungozimele kanye nokahulumeni.

src: this will improve transparency, increase competitiveness and promote the purchase of lowestcost electricity.
tgt: lokhu kuzothuthukisa indlela yokusebenzela obala, ukukhulisa ukuncintisana kanye nokukhuthaza ukuthengwa kukagesi obiza amanani aphansi.

src: through the renewable energy independent power producers programme, there has been significant private investment in energy generation.
tgt: ngohlelo lwabakhiqizi abazimele bamandla kagesi avuselelekayo, kube nokutshalwa kwezimali okubalulekile komkhakha ozimele ekuphehlweni kwamandla kagesi.

src: with the proposal to raise the licencing exemption for embedded generation – where companies produce electricity for themselves and other commercial users – from 1mw to 100mw, we can expect even more private investment.
tgt: ngokwesiphakamiso sokwenyusa ukususa ukuthi kudingeke imvume uma uzophehla ugesi – lapho izinkampani ziziphehlela ugesi wazo futhi zithengisele nabanye – ukusuka kwi1mw kuya kuma100mw, futhi singalindela utshalomali oluningi kumkhakha ozimele.

src: this is vital at a time when the country is suffering from severe and sustained electricity shortages and where neither eskom nor the state is able to invest in new generation capacity.
tgt: lesi yisikhathi esibaluleke kakhulu lapho izwe likhahlamezeke kanzima kanye nokuswelakala kwamandla kagesi okusimeme futhi lapho kungekho noyedwa phakathi kukaeskom noma uhulumeni ongakwazi ukutshala izimali kwisiphehlimandla esisha.

src: importantly, these reforms will give eskom the space to address its financial and operational challenges.
tgt: okubaluleke kakhulu, lezi zinguquko zizonikeza ueskom ithuba lokubhekana nezinselele zakhe zezezimali kanye nezokusebenza.

src: another critical reform is the establishment of the national ports authority as an independent subsidiary of transnet.
tgt: olunye uguquko olubucayi ukusungulwa kwabalawuli bezamachweba kuzwelonke njengenkampani ezimele yakwatransnet.

src: this a crucial part of transnet’s broader strategy to revitalise our logistics infrastructure.
tgt: lena yingxenye ebalu leke kakhulu yeqhingasu letransnet lokuvuselela ingqalasizinda yezokusebenza.

src: transnet plans to invest r100 billion over the next five years in upgrading its infrastructure across the ports system.
tgt: inkampani yakwatransnet ihlela ukutshala izimali ezilinganiselwa kwizigidigidi ezingama100 zamarandi eminyakeni emihlanu ezayo ukuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda yayo kulo lonke uhlelo lwamachweba.

src: this will make our ports more efficient and our exports more competitive, and benefit the entire economy.
tgt: lokhu kuzokwenza ukuthi amachweba ethu asebenze kahle futhi kwenze izinga lokuncintisana elingcono kulabo abathumela izimpahla kwamanye amazwe, futhi lokho kuzokwenza ukuthi umnotho uzuze wonkana.

src: for the ordinary consumer, it will mean reduced prices in the long term for many of our goods.
tgt: kumthengi ojwayelekile, lokhu kusho ukuthi amanani entengo yesikhathi eside azokwehla ezimpahle ni zethu eziningi.

src: for our exporters, it will mean greater competitiveness in global markets.
tgt: kulabo bethu abathumela impahla kwamanye amazwe, kuzosho ukuncintisana okukhulu ezimakethe zomhlaba.

src: as our exports grow, our economy will expand and create more jobs.
tgt: njengoba ukuthunyelwa kwezimpahla kwethu kwa manye amazwe kukhula, umnotho wethu uzokhula futhi udale amathuba emisebenzi.

src: more efficient ports will make the entire economy work better – and as port volumes increase, jobs will be created at the ports themselves.
tgt: amachweba asebenza kahle azokwenza ukuthi wonke umnotho usebenze kangconywana futhi njengoba inani lamachweba lenyuka, kuzodaleka imisebenzi emachwebeni uqobo lwawo.

src: establishing the national ports authority as a transnet subsidiary with its own board will, among other things, mean that revenues generated by the ports can be used to replace old equipment and upgrade and expand our ports, work which has been delayed for more than a decade.
tgt: ukusungulwa kwabalawuli bezamachweba kuzwelonke njengenkampani ephethwe yitransnet nebhodi layo kuzothi, phakathi kokunye, kusho ukuthi imali etholwe ngamachweba ingasetshe nziswa ukushintsha imishini emidala nokuthuthukisa kanye nokwandisa ama chweba ethu, okungumse benzi osubambezeleke isikhathi esingaphezu kwe minyaka eyishumi.

src: among other things, these reforms will encourage greater private investment in the country’s economic infrastructure.
tgt: phakathi kwezinye izinto, lezi zinguquko zizokhuthaza utshalomali olukhulu lo mkhakha ozimele kwingqala sizinda yezomnotho wezwe.

src: some people have expressed concerns that this will diminish the importance or reduce the value of soes.
tgt: abanye abantu bazwakalise ukukhathazeka ukuthi lokhu kuzonciphisa ukubaluleka noma kwehlise ubugugu balamasoe.

src: prevent identity theft kgaogelo letsebe shenki mabitsela (28) is all too aware of identity theft and the crimes relating to it, as he has been a victim of it.
tgt: gwema ukwebiwa kukamazisi kgaogelo letsebe ushenki mabitse la (28) uyazi ka mhlophe ngokwe biwa kukamazisi kanye nobugebengu obuhlobene nakho, njengoba eseke waba yisisulu salesi senzo sobugebengu.

src: mabitsela, from modimolle in limpopo, applied for a loan at a bank in november 2020, but was told he was overindebted and didn’t qualify.
tgt: umabitsela, odabuka endaweni yasemodimolle elimpopo, wafaka isicelo semalimboleko ebhange ngolwezi kowezi2020, kodwa watshelwa ukuthi ungene shi ezikweletini ngokwedlulele futhi aka fanelekile yimalimboleko.

src: "i went to apply for a shortterm loan as i needed to make ends meet after being retrenched in june 2020. to my surprise, i was told i did not qualify.
tgt: "ngangiyofuna imalimboleko yesikhashana njengoba ngangifuna ukuhlanganisa impilo emva kokudilizwa emsebenzini ngonhlangulana wangowezi2020.

src: "i initially thought it was because of my unstable income, but it wasn’t.
tgt: okwethusa kakhulu, ukuthi ngatshelwa ukuthi angifanelekile.

src: i knew i only had one clothing account and no other debt, so i asked for a printout of my profile," he says.
tgt: "ekuqaleni ngangicabanga ukuthi kungenxa yemalingeniso yami eyayingenazinzo, kodwa kwakungenja lo.

src: mabitsela saw that two cellphone contracts, a r65 000 bank loan and numerous re tail shop accounts had been opened in his name.
tgt: umabitsela wabona izinko ntileka zomakhalekhukhwi ni ababili, imalimboleko ye bhange elinganiselwa kwizi 65 000 zamarandi kanye nenqwaba yezikweletu ezitolo ezivuliwe ngaphansi kwegama lakhe.

src: the debt was close to r100 000.
tgt: isikweletu sesisonke sasisondele kwizi100 000 zamarandi.

src: "just before the national level 5 lockdown, i lost my id book.
tgt: "ngaphambi nje kwesigaba sesihlanu sokuvalwa kwe zwe, ngalahlekelwa uma zisi wami.

src: i thought it was somewhere in the house and wasn’t too worried because i had my smart card id," he says.
tgt: bengilokhu ngi cabanga ukuthi kukhona la ucashe khona lapha endlini futhi bengingakhathazekile kakhulu ngoba benginomazisi wami wekhadi," kusho yena.

src: after realising that someone was creating debt in his name, mabitsela opened a case of stolen identity at the south african police service (saps).
tgt: ngemva kokubona ukuthi kukhona owenza izikweletu ngegama lakhe, umabitsela wavula icala ngokwebiwa kukamazisi wakhe kumbu tho wamaphoyisa aseningi zimu afrika (isaps).

src: he had to write an affidavit stating that he lost his identity book and take it to credi tors with his case number to avoid being blacklisted.
tgt: kwakumele abhale incwadi efungelwe echaza kabanzi ngokulahleka kukamazisi wakhe futhi kwakumele ukuthi ayihambise kulabo okwakuvulwe izikweletu ngegama lakhe khona ukuze agweme ukungcoliswa kwegama lakhe ezimakethe.

src: mabitsela’s experience is not unique.
tgt: lokhu okwahlangabezana nomabitsela akusiyo into entsha.

src: according to the south african fraud prevention service’s (safps) 2020 fraud report, last year fraud increased by 161% in the eastern cape and 120% in gauteng.
tgt: ngokombiko wezenkohlakalo wangowezi2020 ohlanganiswe ngabasebenzi bomsebenzi wezokunqa ndwa kwenkohlakalo eni ngizimu afrika (isafps), ngonyaka owedlule izi nga lenkohlakalo lenyuke lafinyelela kuma161% empumalanga kapa kanti futhi lafinyelela kuma120% egauteng.

src: manie van schalkwyk, the executive director of the safps, says: "the most worrying is that impersonation fraud – otherwise known as identity fraud – has increased by an alarming 337%."
tgt: umanie van schalkwyk, ongumqondisi omkhulu kwisafps, uthi: "okukha thaza kakhulu inkohlakalo eyenziwa ngegama lomunye umuntu – okubuye kwaziwe ngenkohlakalo kamazisi – futhi eseyinyuke ngokushaqisa ikhanda yafinyelela kuma337%."

src: van schalkwyk says people must report a lost or stolen id book or passport immediately.
tgt: uvan schalkwyk uthi aba ntu kumele babike ngoku shesha ngomazisi noma ama phasiphothi alahlekile noma ebiwe.

src: support for businesses and workers vukuzenzele unnamed starting and building a business is a lot like raising a family.
tgt: ukwesekwa kwamabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi vukuzenzele unnamed ukuqala kanye no kwakha ibhizi nisi kufana nokukhu lisa umndeni.

src: it takes time, patience, con stant support and consistent nurturing from infancy to maturity.
tgt: kuthatha isikhathi, isineke, ukwese kwa okungaguquguquki kanye nokunakekelwa ku sukela ebuntwaneni kuya ebudaleni.

src: for many business owners, seeing a business that you grew from scratch struggling to survive, or even being forced to close its doors, is heartbreaking.
tgt: kubanikazi abaningi bama bhizinisi, ukubona ibhizinisi olikhulisile kusuka ekuqaleni lithwele kanzima ekutheni liphokophele phambili, noma ukuphoqeleka ukuthi livalwe, kuzwisa ubuhlungu obukhulu.

src: since the onset of the covid19 pandemic, this has sadly been the situation facing many businesses both large and small, not just in our country but around the world.
tgt: kusuka kubheduka ubhu bhane lwecovid19, lobu buhlungu bube yisimo esi bhekane namabhizinisi amaningi amakhulu kanye namancane, hhayi ezweni lakithi kuphela nje kodwa umhlaba wonke jikelele.

src: the pandemic and the meas ures we have had to take to contain the spread of the virus have had a detrimental impact on businesses.
tgt: ubhubhane kanye nezinyathelo obekufanele sizithathe ukunqanda ukubhebhetheka kwegciwane lecorona zibe nomthelela omubi emabhizinisini.

src: in dealing with the pandemic we have sought to adopt an evidencebased approach in both policy and practice, con sidering scientific research, clinical expertise and capabil ities, and impact on all sectors of the population.
tgt: ekubhekaneni nalolu bhubhane siye sadinga uku sebenzisa indlela enobufa kazi benqubomgomo kanye nokwenza, ngokubheka ucwaningo lwezesayensi, ubu ngcweti kanye namandla ezokwelapha, kanye nomthelela kuyo yonke imikhakha yomphakathi.

src: we have sought to have a balance between saving lives and preserving livelihoods.
tgt: kudingeke ukuthi silinga nise phakathi kokusindiswa kwezimpilo kanye nokulondwa kwendlela yabantu yokuziphilisa.

src: we have sought to mitigate the impact of the successive lockdown restrictions on people’s livelihoods, or risk a second and possibly worse epidemic of poverty and hunger in future.
tgt: siye sadinga ukunciphisa umthelela wemikhawulo endleleni yabantu yokuziphilisa ekuvalweni kwezwe okulandelanayo, noma sibeke ingcuphe enga bakhona yehlandla lesibili kanye nobhubhane lobubha kanye nendlala esikhathini esizayo.

src: in the earliest days last year, we introduced measures such as the covid temporary employer/employee relief scheme (ters), the covid19 loan guarantee scheme and various mechanisms to support small businesses to provide immediate and shortterm relief to burdened employees and business owners.
tgt: ezinsukwini zokuqala ngonyaka owedlule, sethula izinyathelo zokungenelela ezifana nohlelo lwecovid19 lwesikhashana lokusiza abaqashi kanye nabasebenzi (iters), isikhwama secovid19 semalimboleko kanye ne zinye izindlela zokweseka amabhizinisi amancane ngosizo lwamanje futhi lwesikha shana kubasebenzi kanye nabanikazi bamabhizinisi.

src: in addition, the special covid19 social relief of distress grant and broadening access to existing social grants provided lifelines to indigent individuals and families.
tgt: ukwengeza kulokhu, isibonelelo esikhethekile sosizo lwezenhlalo secovid19 kanye nokwandisa ukufinyelela kwizibonelelo zikahulumeni ezikhona kuhlinzeke izindlela zokuziphilisa zabantu kanye nemindeni entulayo.

src: through these interventions we were able to mitigate the worst effects of the pandemic, preventing the closure of many businesses and the loss of even further jobs.
tgt: ngalezi zingenelelo sikwa zile ukunciphisa umthelela omubi kakhulu walolu bhubhane, ukunqanda ukuvalwa kwamabhizinisi amaningi kanye nokulahleka kweminye imise benzi.

src: they pro vided a firm foundation for the economic reconstruction and recovery plan that we launched in october last year.
tgt: zihlinzeke ngesisekelo esiqinile ohlelweni lokwakha kabusha kanye nokuvuselelwa komnotho esalwethula ngo kusemthethweni ngomfumfu wangonyaka owedlule.

src: as part of that plan, we introduced the presidential employment stimulus to provide income and livelihood support to millions of beneficiaries.
tgt: njengengxenye yalolu hlelo, sethula uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungula imisebenzi ukuze kuhlinzekwe ngemalingeniso nokweseka indlela yokuziphilisa yezigidi zabantu abafanelekile.

src: through the stimulus, over 300 000 young people have been placed as school assistants.
tgt: ngalolu hlelo, bangaphezu kwezi300 000 abantu abasha abaqashwe njengabasizi eziko leni.

src: more than 100 000 subsistence farmers are registered on the firstever database of its kind where they have access to technical support.
tgt: bangaphezu kwezi100 000 abalimi abaziphilisa ngokulima ababhalisiwe okokuqala ngqa ohlelweni lokugcinwa kwemininingwane ngezobuchwepheshe lapho bekwazi ukufinyelela ekwese kweni ngezobuchwepheshe.

src: more than 30 000 young people have been given opportunities in the cultural, creative and sports sectors.
tgt: bangaphezu kwezi30 000 abantu abasha abanikwe amathuba emkhakheni wezamasiko, amakhono kanye nezemidlalo.

src: young professionals have been given opportunities in infrastructure development, healthcare, environmental conservation and a number of other sectors.
tgt: ochwepheshe abasebasha banikwe amathuba okuthuthukisa ingqalasizinda, ezempilo, ukulo ndolozwa kwemvelo kanye nakweminye imikhakha eminingi.

src: there are promising indi cations that our economy is steadily recovering, with growth and job creation in a number of sectors, from manufacturing to mining to agriculture.
tgt: zikhona izinkomba ezinika ithemba lokuthi umnotho wethu uyasimama kancane, ngokukhula kanye nokwa khiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi emikhakheni eminingi, ukusuka ekukhiqizeni kuya kwezezima yini kuya nakwezolimo.

src: at the same time we know that this ‘bigger picture’ is cold comfort to workers and business owners who have suffered immeasurably over the past year and a half, and were hoping to see their situa tions improve as the economy slowly opened up.
tgt: ngaleso sikhathi siyazi ukuthi ‘lesi sinyathelo esikhulu’ siyinduduzo engaphelele kubasebenzi nakosomabhi zinisi abahlupheke kanzima ngokungelinganiswe kulo nyaka nesigamu owedlule, futhi bebenethemba lokubona isimo sabo sibangcono njengoba umnotho uvuleka kancane.

src: the rapid rise in infections being fueled by the new delta variant necessitated the imposing of tighter restric tions on the movement of persons, on the operation of certain businesses and on public gatherings, among others.
tgt: ukunyuka ngesivinini ko kwesuleleka okubhebhethe kiswa ngumxhantela omusha wegciwane idelta kwenze kwaba nesidingo sokubekwa kwemikhawulo eqinile eku hambeni kwabantu, ekuse benzeni kwamabhizinisi athize nasemibuthanweni yomphakathi, phakathi kokunye.

src: these were not been easy decisions to make, mindful of their impact on people’s livelihoods.
tgt: lezi azange kwaba yizinqumo ezilula ukuzithatha, uma ubheka umthelela wazo ezimpilweni zabantu.

src: just as we did at the beginning of the pandemic, we engaged in deliberations with all social partners, business, labour and civil society to see what financially sustainable measures we could intro duce to support businesses and individuals in distress at this time.
tgt: njengoba senza ngesikhathi kuqala lolu bhubhane, sihlanganyele ezingxoxweni nabo bonke ababambiqhaza bomphakathi, amabhizinisi, ezabasebenzi kanye nomphakathi ukubona ukuthi yiziphi izinyathelo ezingasimamisa ezezimali esingazethula ukweseka ama bhizinisi nabantu ababhekene nosizi ngalesi sikhathi.

src: the negotiations at the national economic development and labour council resulted in consen sus that the most practical and financially sustainable measure that can provide urgent relief is extending the covid19 ters scheme to sectors that have been affected by the adjusted level 4 restrictions.
tgt: izingxoxo nomkhandlu kazwelonke wokuthuthukiswa komnotho kanye nezabasebenzi ziholele esivumelwaneni sokuthi isinyathelo esisebenza kakhulu futhi esisimeme ngokwezezimali esinganikeza usizo olu phuthumayo ukwelula uhlelo lwecovid19 ters emikhakheni ethinteke kakhulu ngenxa yemikhawulo yesigaba sesine esiguquliwe.

src: to support businesses whose operating licenses and per mits expired between march 2020 and june 2021, we are extending their validity until 31 december 2022. in addition, new business licenses or permits that are issued from the 1 july will also be valid until 31 december 2022, and no license fee will be payable.
tgt: ukwesekela amabhizinisi amalayisense kanye nezimvume zawo zokusebenza ebeziphelelwa yisikhathi so kusebenza phakathi kuka ndasa kowezi2020 kanye nonhlangulana kowezi2021, selula isikhathi sawo kuze kube mhla zingama31 kuzibandlela 2022. ukwengeza kulokhu, amalayisense noma izimvume zamabhizinisi ezintsha zokusebenza ezikhishwe mhla lu1 kuntulikazi nazo zizosebenza kuze kube mhla zingama31 kuzibandlela 2022, futhi ayikho imali oku zomele uyikhokhele le layisense.

src: over the past year, we have also been working consist ently to protect vulnerable workers whose jobs were at risk, particularly in hardhit sectors like retail, food and beverage and the metals industry.
tgt: ngonyaka owedlule, besilokhu sisebenza ngoku ngaguquguquki ukuvikela abasebenzi ababuthakathaka abanemisebenzi esengcu pheni, ikakhulukazi emikha kheni eshayeke kanzima efana neyezokuthengisa, imboni yokudla neziphuzo kanye nensimbi.

src: sandf fights covid19 more matshediso the south african national defence force (sandf) is helping fight the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic in gauteng, which is currently the epicentre of the third wave.
tgt: isandf ilwisana necovid19 more matshediso umbutho we zokuvikela ku zwelonke wase ningizimu afrika (isandf) usiza empini yokulwisana nobhubhane lwesifo segciwane lecorona (icovid19) egauteng, okuyilapho njenga manje lidlange khona ihlandla lesithathu laleli gciwane.

src: the sandf is assisting with mass community test ing, screening and contact tracing, and is also lending a hand at hospitals.
tgt: isandf isiza ngokuhlola umphakathi, ukuxilonga kanye nokulandela umkhondo walabo okungenzeka ukuthi basulele kile, futhi iyasiza nasezibhedlela.

src: the south african military health service was deployed in the province to ease the burden on healthcare workers.
tgt: umbutho wezempilo wamasosha aseningizimu afrika wathunyelwa esifu ndazweni ukuze wenze lula umthwalo osemahlombe aba sebenzi bezempilo.

src: a medical task group has been stationed at chris hani baragwanath academic hospital in johannesburg.
tgt: ithimba lomsebenzi wezo kwelashwa libekwe esi bhedlela ichris hani baragwanath academic hospital egoli.

src: with gauteng recording the highest number of covid19 cases during the third wave, the hospital was named a pro vincial health facility and is now dedicated to patients with covid19.
tgt: njengoba igauteng iqopha inani eliphezulu lezigameko zokwesuleleka ngecovid19 ngalesi sikhathi sehlandla lesithathu, lesi sibhedlela si qanjwe njengesikhungo seze mpilo sesifundazwe futhi manje sesibhekele ukusiza iziguli ezihaqwe yicovid19.

src: before assuming their duties, the medical task group had to be vaccinated so that they could be kept safe while handling the increased number of positive cases and hospital admissions.
tgt: ngaphambi kokuqala imise benzi yabo, ithimba lomsebenzi wezokwelashwa ligonyiwe ukuze lizovikeleka ngesikhathi lisebenza ngokwenyuka kwe zinga lezigameko zokwe suleleka ngecovid19 kanye nokulaliswa kweziguli esibhedlela.

src: medical task group commander colonel fezeka mabona, who is a professional nurse, says she works on the ground with other members of the group.
tgt: induna ephethe ithimba lomsebenzi wezokwelashwa ufezeka mabona, ongumhle ngikazi oneziqu, uthi usebenza kanye namanye amalungu ethimba.

src: "the group comprises various healthcare professionals, including nurses, doctors, clinical associates and occu pational health and safety professionals," she says.
tgt: "leli thimba liyinhlanga nisela yabasebenzi bezempilo abahlukahlukene, ababandakanya abahlengikazi, odokotela, abasebenzi basemithola mpilo kanye nabasebenzi abangochwepheshe kweze mpilo nokuphepha emsebenzini," kusho yena.

src: the majority of the nurses have nursing qualifications at the degree level, with different specialities, including primary healthcare.
tgt: iningi labahlengikazi lineziqu ezisezingeni lobuhlengikazi, ezigxile emikhakheni yezobuchwepheshe obehlukene, obubandakanya ukunakekelwa kwezempilo okuyisisekelo.

src: "some nurses are theatre tr ained.
tgt: "abanye abahlengikazi baqeqeshelwe izindawo zoku hlinzwa ngenhloso yokwe lashwa kwezempilo.

src: all of us have worked as general nurses, midwives, nurse educators and managers in both the military and public health system," she adds.
tgt: sonke sisebenze njengabahlengi kazi abajwayelekile, aba belethisi, abaqeqeshi babahle ngikazi kanye nabaphathi be zindawo zombili yezamasosha kanye neyohlelo lwezempilo yomphakathi," kusho yena.

src: the group is divided into task teams and work with the hospital staff in shifts, according to the demand at the facility.
tgt: ithimba lihlukaniswe ngokwamaqembu omsebenzi futhi lisebenza ngokushintshana nabasebenzi basesibhedlela, kuya ngokuhambisana nesidingo kuleso sikhungo.

src: the team is currently providing healthcare services in six wards.
tgt: leli qembu okwamanje lihlinzeka ngomsebenzi wokunakekela emagunjini eziguli ayisithupha.

src: "the hospital staff is quite low to handle the number of cases at the moment.
tgt: "abasebenzi basesibhedlela bancane kakhulu ukuthi bangakwazi ukubhekana nenani lezigameko njenga manje.

src: it is very important for us to try as much as we can to assist them in order for all of us to avoid further strain on the health care system," says mabona.
tgt: kubaluleke kakhulu kithina ukuthi sizame ngoku semandleni ukubasiza ukuze sonke sigweme ingci ndezi eyengeziwe ohlelweni lokunakekelwa kwezempilo," kusho umabona.

src: inclusive communities critical to sa’s success vukuzenzele unnamed while the violence and destruction that engulfed parts of kwazulunatal and gauteng recently caused much damage to property and livelihoods, it also had a huge impact on the cohesion of our communities.
tgt: ubumbano lwemiphakathi lubalulekile empumelelweni yeningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed ngesikhathi udlame kanye nokubhu bhisa obekugu buzele izingxenye za kwazulunatali nasegau teng kamuva nje kuda la umonakalo omkhulu ezakhiweni nasendlele ni yabantu yokuziphili sa, kuphinde futhi kwa ba nomthelela omkhulu ekubumbaneni kwemi phakathi yakithi.

src: this was most evident in the tragic events that took place in and around phoenix in ethekwini.
tgt: l o k h u k u b o n a k a l e ngokusobala ezigamekweni ezibuhlungu ezenzeke endaweni yasephoenix namaphethelo ethekwini.

src: during some of the worst unrest in our democracy, and in a climate already thick with suspicion and paranoia, people that had lived sidebyside in relative peace turned on each other.
tgt: ngesikhathi sothuthuva olwedlula lonke ngesikha thi sentando yethu yabantu, esikhathini esivele sigcwele ukusolana nokuphambana, abantu abebephilisana ngokuthula bavukelana bodwa.

src: there is still much we have to unearth about the events that took place.
tgt: kusekuningi kakhulu okusamele sikuvumbu lule ngalezi zigameko ezenzekile.

src: the proliferation of fake news, doctored images and incorrect information has made it difficult to separate fact from fiction.
tgt: ukubhebhethekiswa kwezindaba ezingamampunge, imifanekiso eyenziwe kanye nolwazi olungesilona iqiniso kwenze kwaba nzima ukuhlukanisa okuliqiniso nokuqanjiwe.

src: but we do know from official reports and personal accounts that people were racially profiled at illegal roadblocks, some people were pulled out of cars and beaten, and some were humiliated and degraded.
tgt: kodwake siyazi ngokwe mibiko esemthethweni kanye nalokho esizibonele kona mathupha ukuthi abantu bebehlukaniswa ngokobuhlanga kwizi vimbamgwaqo ezingekho emthethweni, abanye abantu babedonswa bekhishwa ezi motweni beshaywa, futhi abanye balulazeka behliswa nesithunzi.

src: several people were killed.
tgt: abantu abaningi babulawa.

src: much of what has happened is the inevitable outcome when people take the law into their own hands.
tgt: okuningi kwalokhu okwenzekile kungumphumela ongenakugwemeka uma abantu bezithathela umthetho ngezandla zabo.

src: vigilantism will not be tolerated in this country.
tgt: ukuzitha thela umthetho ngezandla ngeke kubekezelelwe kuleli lizwe.

src: it is criminal and it is dangerous.
tgt: kungubugebengu futhi kuyingozi.

src: now that calm has been restored to the affected areas, our law enforcement agencies are investigating all acts of criminality.
tgt: n j e n g o b a m a n j e e z i ndaweni ezithintekayo amaphaphu esehlile, abomthetho baphenya zonke izenzo zobugebengu.

src: a team of detectives has been assigned to deal with the murders and are working closely with local communities.
tgt: ithimba labaphenyi selijutshwe ukubhekana namacala okubulala futhi asebenza ngokubambisana nemipha kathi yasendaweni.

src: there have been arrests and those responsible will face the full might of the law.
tgt: kukhona asebeboshiwe futhi labo aba thintekayo bazobhekana ngqo nengalo yomthetho.

src: much of the narrative around the events in phoenix has been dominated by attempts to turn one race against another.
tgt: o k u n i n g i o k u s h i w o y o ngalezi zigameko ephoenix zibuswa imizamo yokuvu kelana kwezinhlanga.

src: it has been stoked by anonymous people on social media and in messaging groups making outrageous claims and calling for revenge.
tgt: ziqalwe ngabantu abangaziwa ezinkundleni zokuxhumana nasekuthumeleni imiyalezo kumaqembu ehlukene benza izinsongo futhi befuna noku ziphindiselela.

src: there is an attempt to present this as a sign of imploding race relations between african and indian communities.
tgt: kunomzamo wokufuna ukubeka lokhu kubukeke engathi kufaka ubudlelwane bobuhlanga phakathi kwemiphakathi yabantu abamnyama kanye namandiya.

src: just as there were people who tried to exploit people’s vulnerability and cause mayhem, there are those who want to present criminal acts in racial terms to serve their own purposes.
tgt: njengoba nje kunabantu abazama ukuxhaphaza ubuthakathaka babantu futhi badale isiphithiphithi, kunalabo abafuna ukuca shisa izenzo zobugebengu ngobuhlanga ukufeza izinhloso zabo.

src: they will not succeed.
tgt: angeke baphumelele.

src: south africa has a proud history of principled nonracialism and working class solidarity.
tgt: iningizimu afrika inomlando ozigqajayo onemigomo engacwasi ngokobuhlanga kanye nobumbano lwabase benzi.

src: african and indian communities were united in the struggle against apartheid and, together with other communities, remain committed to a united and democratic society.
tgt: imiphakathi yabantu abamnyama namandiya yayimunye emzabalazweni olwa nobandlululo, futhi ngokubambisana neminye imiphakathi, yaqhubeka nokuzinikela ekubeni nomphakathi obumbene nonentando yabantu.

src: in response to the fear and mistrust, the people of phoenix and the neighbouring areas of bhambayi, zwelitsha and amaoti are working to repair the damage.
tgt: ekubhekaneni nokwesaba nokungethembani, abantu basephoenix nezindawo eziseduze zasebhambayi, ezwelisha nasemawoti basebenza ukulungisa umo nakalo.

src: aided by a peace forum established by the south african police service in partnership with community leaders, the communities have come together to support those affected by the unrest and to open channels of dialogue.
tgt: ngokusizwa inhlangano yezokugcina ukuthula eyasungulwa uphiko lwa maphoyisa eningizimu afrika ngokusebenzisana nabaholi basemphakathini, imiphakathi ihlangene ukweseka labo abakhahlanyezwe uthuthuva kanye nokuvula imigudu yokuxoxi sana ngalokhu.

src: this is not the only part of the country that is confronted with such challenges.
tgt: lena akuyona kuphela ingxenye yezwe ebhekene nezinselele ezifana nalezi.

src: our efforts to build integrated communities are frustrated by the legacy of apartheid planning and persistent inequality.
tgt: imizamo yethu yokwakha imiphakathi ehlangene ithunazwa ifa lohlelo lobandlu lulo kanye nokungalingani okulokhu kuqhubeka.

src: our cities, towns and rural areas are still all divided by both race and class.
tgt: amadolobhakazi ethu, amadolobha nezindawo zasemakhaya zisahlukaniswe ngokobuhlanga nangokwe zinga lempilo.

src: this discourages cooperation and understanding, and hampers the work we have undertaken to build a nonracial society.
tgt: lokhu kuqeda amandla okusebenzisana kanye nokuqondisisa, futhi kuphazamisa umsebenzi esesiwuqalile wokwakha umphakathi ongacwasani ngokobuhlanga.

src: correcting these spatial distortions must be part of our work of building an inclusive economy and improving the living conditions of all south africans.
tgt: ukulungisa lezi zindawo ezimapeketwane kumele kube yingxenye yomsebenzi wethu wokwakha umnotho obandakanya wonke umuntu kanye nokuthuthukisa isimo senhlalo sabo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: it is why we are working to build flourishing township and rural economies, and focusing on the growth of small businesses.
tgt: y i n g a k h o s i s e b e n z a ukwakha iminotho echumayo yasemalokishini nasezinda weni zasemakhaya, nokugxila ekukhuleni kwamabhizinisi amancane.

src: it is why we are investing in infrastructure in these areas and working to improve the provision of services.
tgt: yingakho sitshala izimali kwingqalasizinda kulezi zindawo futhi sisebenza ukuthuthukisa ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingongqangi.

src: at the same time, we need to confront racism in our society.
tgt: ngasikhathi sinye, sidinga ukubhekana ngqo nokucwasana ngokobuhlanga emphakathini wethu.

src: we need to have honest conversations not only about our attitudes to one another, but also about the material conditions that divide us.
tgt: sidinga nezingxoxo eziyiqiniso hhayi nje ngokuziphatha kwethu komunye nomunye, kodwa futhi ngezimo zezinto ezisihlukanisayo.

src: for as long as the division of wealth and opportunity in south africa is largely still determined by race and gender, we will not be able to build a truly united nation.
tgt: uma nje ukwahlukana ngokwengcebo kanye namathuba eningizimu afrika kusabhekwa ngoko buhlanga kanye nobulili, angeke sikwazi ukwakha isizwe esibumbene ngokweqiniso.

src: the events in phoenix are a painful reminder of how much work we still need to do to build inclusive communities that have successfully broken down the boundaries of the past.
tgt: izigameko zasephoe nix ziyisikhumbuzo esi buhlungu kakhul u sokuthi mkhulu kangakanani umse benzi okusamele siwenze ukwakha imiphakathi ebumbene esilwe nge mpumelelo ukudiliza i m i n g c e l e y e s i k h a t h i esedlule.

src: these events also demonstrate how determined some people are to divide us, and how we need to do everything we can to resist them.
tgt: lezi zigameko futhi zibonisa ukuthi abanye abantu bazimisele kanjani ukudala uqhekeko phakathi kwethu, nokuthi sikudinga kanjani ukwenza konke okuse mandleni ethu ukunga bavumeli.

src: it is our collective responsibility to support these communities in ethekwini and elsewhere in their journey towards reconciliation and healing.
tgt: kungumsebenzi wethu ngokubambisana ukweseka le miphakathi esethekwini futhi nanoma iyiphi indawo ohambeni lwayo oluya eku buyisaneni nasekupholeni.

src: help learners cope with covid19 vukuzenzele unnamed parents and teachers can help learners cope with the anxiety and depression they are experiencing because of the coronavirus disease pandemic.
tgt: siza abafundi ukuthi babhekane necovid19 more matshediso abazali nothisha bangabasiza abafundi ukuthi babhekane nexhala nokukhathazeka ababhekane nakho ngenxa yobhubhane lwesifo segciwane lecorona.

src: more matshediso learners have been faced with many challenges as a result of the coronavirus disease (covid19) and the lockdown restrictions.
tgt: abafundi balokhu bebhekene ne zinselele eziningi ngenxa yesifo segciwane lecorona ( i covid19) kanye nemikhawulo yoku valwa kwezwe.

src: there has been constant change in the learning environment at south africa’s schools, which can leave learners feeling anxious and fearful.
tgt: selokhu kukhona uguquko olwenzeka njalo endimeni yezokufunda ezikoleni zase ningizimu afrika, lokho okungashiya abafundi bezizwa benexhala kanye nokwesaba.

src: learners have had to navigate a new world of online or delayed learning, social isolation, loss, grief and trauma, all of which can cause increased anxiety and depression.
tgt: abafundi kufanele ukuthi babhekane nomhlaba o m u s h a w o k u f u n d a ngeinthanethi noma uku bambezeleka ekufundeni, ukuzihlukanisa kwabanye abantu, ukulahlekelwa, usizi nokuhlukumezeka, konke okungadala ixhala nokukhathazeka okukhulu.

src: counselling psychologist boitumelo tlhapane, who works for the inclusive education unit at the free state department of education, says feeling anxious or depressed during these trying times is understandable.
tgt: umeluleki ngokwengqondo uboitumelo tlhapane, osebenzela uphiko lwezemfundo ebandakanyayo ii nclusive education unit kumnyango wezemfundo efreyistata, uthi ukuzizwa unexhala noma ukhathazekile ngalezi zikha thi ezinzima kuyaqondakala.

src: "for about ayearandahalf now, learners have had to adjust to a new way of learning, with less contact and teaching time.
tgt: "isikhathi esingangonyaka nesigamu manje, abafundi kumele bajwayele indlela entsha yokufunda, enesikhathi esincane bebhekene nothisha ubuso nobuso.

src: "many have had to study independently, while living with uncertainty about their future and the impact of covid19 on their hopes and dreams, family and social life," says tlhapane.
tgt: "abaningi kuphoqeleke ukuthi bazifundele bodwa, ngesikhathi bephila ngokungenasiqiniseko ngekusasa labo kanye nomthelela wecovid19 emathembeni nasemaphusheni abo, impilo yomndeni kanye neyompha kathi," kusho utlhapane.

src: how to cope she explains that anxiety is the fear of or worrying about something that has an uncertain outcome.
tgt: ubhekana kanjani nalesi simo uchaze wathi ixhala ngukwe saba noma ukukhathazeka ngento okungaziwa umphu mela wayo.

src: to help learners to cope, she offers the following advice: understand that it is normal to be anxious or fearful.
tgt: ukusiza abafundi ukuthi babhekane nalesi simo, unikeze iseluleko esilande layo: kuqonde ukuthi kujwayelekile ukuzizwa unexhala noma wesaba.

src: this does not mean that you are weak.
tgt: lokhu kakusho ukuthi untekenteke.

src: what you do with your fear is what is important.
tgt: ukuthi wenzani ngo kwesaba kwakho yikho okubalulekile.

src: are you obeying all the covid19 rules that have put in place to protect you and others?
tgt: ingabe uyayithobela imithetho yecovid19 ebekiwe uku vikela wena nabanye?

src: what else can you do to ensure your and others’ safety?
tgt: yini enye ongayenza ukuqini sekisa ukuphepha kwakho nokwabanye?

src: do you have reliable information about covid19 in case you or a loved one gets infected?
tgt: ingabe unalo ulwazi oluthembekile ngecovid19 uma kungenzeka wena noma othandiweyo wakho esuleleka?
