src: significantly, if the court releases someone charged with domestic violence on bail who does not have a protection order granted against them, the court must issue one after holding an enquiry.
tgt: okubalulekile, uma inkantolo idedela umuntu obekwe icala lodlame lwasekhaya ngebheyili ongenayo incwadi yokuvikelwa anikezwe yona, inkantolo kumele ikhiphe eyodwa ngemuva kokwenza uphenyo.

src: when the court issues a protection order it must at the same time authorise the issuing of an arrest warrant, suspended, that must be provided to the south african police service (saps).
tgt: lapho inkantolo ikhipha incwadi yokuvikelwa kumele ngaso leso sikhathi igunyaze ukukhishwa kwencwadi egunyaza ukuboshwa, elengisiwe, okumele inikwe umbutho wamaphoyisa aseningizimu afrika (isaps).

src: if a saps member suspects a complainant is in danger due to breach of the order, they must arrest the respondent immediately.
tgt: uma ilungu lesaps lisola ukuthi ummangali usengozini ngenxa yokwephula umyalelo, kumele libophe ummangalelwa ngokuphazima kweso.

src: the act now expressly protects the elderly from all forms of domestic violence, and also permits complainants to apply for protection orders online, saving them time and travel costs.
tgt: umthetho manje usuvikela ngokusobala abantu abadala kuzo zonke izinhlobo zodlame lwasekhaya, futhi uvumela abamangali ukuthi bafake izicelo zokuvikelwa ngobuchwepheshe beinthanethi, ubongele isikhathi kanye nezindleko zokuhamba.

src: to protect complainants against further abuse, the court may an issue a safety monitoring notice that will require a member of saps to be in constant contact with the complainant without the knowledge of the abuser.
tgt: ukuvikela abamangali ekuhlukunyezweni okuqhubekayo, inkantolo ingakhipha isaziso sokuqapha ukuphepha isafety monitoring notice esizodinga ukuthi ilungu lesaps lithintane nommangali ngaphandle kolwazi lomnukubezi.

src: survivors of gbv often complain of illtreatment or disregard for their concerns when they lay complaints at police stations.
tgt: izisulu ezisinde kugbv zijwayele ukukhala ngokuphathwa kabi noma ukushaywa indiva kwezinkinga zabo lapho befaka izikhalazo eziteshini zamaphoyisa.

src: saps members who fail to comply with their obligations under the new law will be guilty of misconduct.
tgt: amalungu esaps ehluleka ukuthobela izibopho zawo ngaphansi komthetho omusha ayobekwa icala lokungaziphathi kahle.

src: all adult persons who have knowledge or suspicion that domestic violence is being perpetrated against a child, a person with a mental disability or an elderly person are obliged to report such acts to a social worker or to the police.
tgt: bonke abantu abadala abanolwazi noma abasola ukuthi kukhona udlame lwasekhaya olwenziwa enganeni, umuntu okhubazeke ngokwengqondo noma umuntu osemdala banesibopho sokubika izenzo ezifana nalezo kusonhlalakahle noma emaphoyiseni.

src: failure to do so is a criminal offence.
tgt: ukwehluleka ukwenza lokho kuyicala elibomvu.

src: sona 2022: bettering lives and livelihoods vukuzenzele unnamed government is committed to putting people first, and has given itself 100 days to finalise a plan to involve all sectors of society in growing south africa’s economy, creating jobs and combating hunger.
tgt: isona yangowezi2022: senza ngcono izimpilo kanye nendlela yabantu yokuziphilisa vukuzenzele unnamed uhulumeni uzimisele ekubekeni abantu phambili, futhi uzinike izinsuku eziyi100 ukuphothula uhlelo olubandakanya yonke imikhakha yomphakathi ekukhulisweni komnotho waseningizimu afrika, ukwakha amathuba omsebenzi kanye nokulwa nendlala.

src: this was emphasised by president cyril ramaphosa in his 2022 state of the nation address.
tgt: lokhu kugcizelelwe ngumongameli ucyril ramaphosa enkulumweni yakhe echaza ngesimo sezwe yangowezi2022.

src: "this work will build on the foundation of the economic reconstruction and recovery plan, which remains our common programme to rebuild the economy," he said.
tgt: "lo msebenzi uzokwakhela phezu kwesisekelo sohlelo lokwakhiwa kabusha kanye nokuvuselelwa komnotho, olulokhu luwuhlelo olujwayelekile lokwakhiwa kabusha komnotho," kusho yena.

src: the president said government’s priorities are overcoming the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic, building infrastructure, increasing local production, creating jobs and addressing the energy crisis.
tgt: umongameli uthe uhulumeni ukubeka eqhulwini ukunqoba isifo sobhubhane lwegciwane lecorona (icovid19), ukwakhiwa kwengqalasizinda, ukwenyuswa komkhiqizo walapha ekhaya, ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokubhekana nezinkinga zokuntuleka kwamandla kagesi awenele.

src: "if there is one thing we all agree on, it is that the present situation – of deep poverty, unemployment and inequality – is unacceptable and unsustainable."
tgt: "uma ikhona into eyodwa esingavumelana ngayo, ngukuthi isimo samanje – sobubha, ukwentuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kanye nokungalingani – akuvumelekile futhi akugcineki."

src: creating jobs last year, the unemployment rate reached its highest recorded level of 34.9% in the third quarter, following the financial devastation caused by covid19.
tgt: ukwakhiwa kwamathuba omsebenzi"ngonyaka owedlule, ukuntuleka kwamathuba omsebenzi kwenyuka kwaze kwafika ezingeni elingakaze libonwe lama34.9% kwikota yesithathu, emva kokukhahlamezeka komnotho ngenxa yecovid19.

src: "we all know that government does not create jobs.
tgt: "sonke siyazi ukuthi uhulumeni akawakhi amathuba omsebenzi.

src: business creates jobs.
tgt: amabhizinisi yiwona akha amathuba omsebenzi.

src: the key task of government is to create the conditions that will enable the private sector – both big and small – to emerge, to grow, to access new markets, to create new products, and to hire more employees," he said.
tgt: umsebenzi osemqoka kahulumeni ngukwakha izimo ezizokwenza ukuthi umkhakha ozimele – yomibili omkhulu kanye nomncane – ibonakale ikhule, ifinyelele kwimakethe entsha, ikhiqize izimpahla ezintsha, futhi iqashe abantu abaningi," kusho yena.

src: around 80% of employed people work in the private sector.
tgt: babalelwa kuma80% abantu abaqashiwe abasebenzela umkhakha ozimele.

src: the president said government will introduce a new loan guarantee scheme to help small businesses recover.
tgt: umongameli uthe uhulumeni wethule uhlelo oluqinisekisiwe lwemalimboleko olusha ukuze lusize amabhizinisi ukuthi avuseleleke.

src: the presidential employment stimulus programme, which has already supported over 850 000 employment opportunities, will be stepped up.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi, oseluseke amathuba omsebenzi angaphezu kwezi850 000, luzoqhutshelwa phambili.

src: most of the beneficiaries were young people; over 60% were women.
tgt: iningi labazuzile kulolu hlelo bekungabantu abasha; kanti abangaphezulu kwama60% bekungabesifazane.

src: the employment stimulus will enable the department of home affairs to recruit 10 000 unemployed youth for the digitisation of paper records, and the social employment fund will create another 50 000 work opportunities.
tgt: lolu hlelo lukamongameli lokusungulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi luzovumela umnyango wezasekhaya ukuthi uqashe abantu abasha abangasebenzi abayizi10 000 ukuze bakwazi ukufaka imininingwane engamaphepha kubuchwepheshe bedijithali, futhi isikhwama sesibonelelo somphakathi sabangasebenzi sizokwakha amanye amathuba omsebenzi ayizi50 000. umnyango wezemfundo ephakeme kanye nokuqeqeshwa uzofaka abafundi abayizi10 000 abathole iziqu zasemakolishi angamatvet abafundele imisebenzi yezandla ezindaweni zokuqeqeshelwa ukusebenza kusukela ngombasa kowezi2022.

src: mobi platform, which helps young work seekers to access opportunities and support, now has over 2.3 million youth registered.
tgt: mobi esiza abantu abasha abafuna amathuba omsebenzi ukuze bafinyelele emathubeni nasekwesekweni manje inabantu abasha abangaphezu kwezigidi ezi2.3 asebebhalisile kuyona.

src: of these, over 600 000 have been placed into employment opportunities.
tgt: abangaphezu kwezi600 000 babo sebefakiwe emathubeni omsebenzi.

src: "a revitalised national youth service will recruit its first cohort of 50 000 young people during the next year [2023], creating opportunities for young people to contribute to their communities, develop their skills and grow their employability."
tgt: "inhlangano yabantu abasha kuzwelonke evuselelwe izonxenxa iqembu labantu abasha abayizi50 000 ngonyaka ozayo [wezi2023], idale amathuba omsebenzi abantu abasha ukuze babe negalelo emiphakathini yabo, bathuthukise amakhono abo futhi bakhulise amathuba abo okuqasheka."

src: srd grant continuesthe covid19 social relief of distress (srd) grant, which has helped over 10 million unemployed people, has been extended for another year – to the end of march 2023. in addition, government and its partners will look at ways to continue to support people in financial distress in a manner that is affordable to the country over the long term.
tgt: isibonelelo sesrd siyaqhubekaisibonelelo soxhaso lomphakathi sabakhahlanyezwe yicovid19 (isrd), esesisize abantu abangasebenzi abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyi10, seselulelwe isikhathi esingangonyaka – kuze kube ngundasa 2023. ngaphezu kwalokhu, uhulumeni kanye nalabo asebenzisana nabo bazobheka izindlela zokuqhubeka nokuseka abantu ngosizo lwezezimali ngendlela ekhonekayo ezweni isikhathi esithe ukweluleka.

src: access to land government is moving ahead with land reform and anticipates the approval of the expropriation bill this year.
tgt: ukufinyelela kumhlaba uhulumeni uyaqhubeka loguquko kwezomhlaba futhi kulindeleke ukugunyazwa komthethosivivinywa wokubuyiselwa komhlaba.

src: the establishment of the agriculture and land reform development agency will also be finalised this year.
tgt: ukusungulwa kweejensi yezolimo kanye noku thuthukiswa koguquko kwezomhlaba kuzophinde kuphothulwe kulo nyaka.

src: "the department of public works and infrastructure will finalise the transfer of 14 000 hectares of state land to the housing development agency," the president said.
tgt: "umnyango wezemise benzi kahulumeni kanye nengqalasizinda uzophuthula ukudluliselwa kwamahektha ayizi14 000 zomhlaba kahulumeni kwiejensi yokuthuthukiswa kwezi ndlu," kusho umongameli.

src: he added that there is enough arable land to support millions of thriving smallscale farmers in poultry, livestock, fruit and vegetables.
tgt: wengeze ngokuthi kuno mhlaba owanele ongalimeka ukusekela izigidi zabalimi abancane abafuya izinkukhu, imfuyo, izithelo kanye nezitshalo.

src: already, over 100 000 farmers have received input vouchers to expand their production and the programme will be expanded to reach more farmers.
tgt: kwamanje, abalimi abangaphezulu kwezi100 000 bathole amavawusha okwandisa imikhiqizo yabo futhi lolu hlelo luzonwetshwa ukuze lufinyelele kubalimi abaningi.

src: corruption and crime from instituting the commission of inquiry into state capture, to investigating covid19related procurement contracts, president ramaphosa is leaving no stone unturned when it comes to ending corruption.
tgt: inkohlakalo kanye nobugebengu kusukela ekusungulweni kwekhomishana ephenya ngokuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, ukuya ekuphenyweni mayelana nezinkontileka zokuthengwa kwezimpahla ezihambisana necovid19, umongameli uramaphosa wenza konke okusemandleni ukuvundulula aqede inkohlakalo.

src: "none of our efforts to revive our economy will succeed if we do not tackle the scourge of corruption once and for all," the president said.
tgt: "awukho namunye umzamo wethu oyakuphumelela ekufukuleni umnotho wethu uma singasisusi lesi sihlava esibi senkohlakalo manje futhi unomphela," kusho umongameli.

src: by no later than 30 june 2022, he will present a plan of action in response to the commission’s recommendations.
tgt: ungakashayi umhla zingama30 kunhlangulana, umongameli uzokwethula uhlelokusebenza lokubhekana nezincomo zekhomishana.

src: he explained that various government agencies were working together to identify wrongdoers, punish them, and to get looted state money refunded.
tgt: uchaze wathi amaejensi kahulumeni ahlukahlukene abesebenza ngokubambisana ukuveza obala izigilamkhuba, bazijezise, futhi bazikhokhise imali yombuso eyebiwe.

src: safety and security will be strengthened through the recruitment of 12 000 police personnel and the reestablishment of community policing forums.
tgt: ezokuphepha kanye nokuvikela zizoqiniswa ngokuthi kuqashwe amaphoyisa ayizi12 000 kanye nokusungulwa kabusha kwamaforamu amaphoyisa omphakathi.

src: fighting gbvf government will also continue to intensify the fight against genderbased violence and femicide (gbvf) this year, through the implementation of the national strategic plan on gbvf.
tgt: ukulwisana negbvf uhulumeni uzophinde asebenze ngokuzikhandla ukulwisana nodlame olubhekiswe kwabobulili obuthile kanye nokubulawa kwabesifazane (igbvf) kulo nyaka, ngokuqaliswa ngokusemthethweni kweqhingasu lohlelo lukazwelonke mayelana negbvf.

src: three new laws are already working to strengthen the criminal justice system and support survivors.
tgt: imithetho emithathu emisha isivele iyasebenza njengamanje ukuqinisa ubulungiswa kubugebengu kanye nokweseka labo abasindile.

src: "the implementation of this legislation will go a long way to ensuring that cases are successfully prosecuted, that survivors are protected and that there are more effective deterrents in place."
tgt: "ukuqaliswa ngokusemthethweni kwalo mthetho kuzohambisana nokuqinisekisa ukuthi amacala ashushiswa ngokufanele, ukuthi labo abasindile bavikelekile futhi nokuthi ziningi izindlela ezisebenza kahle ezinganqanda lolu dlame."

src: one of the new laws that president ramaphosa was referring to is the criminal and related matters amendment act which protects the vulnerable from secondary victimisation.
tgt: owodwa wemithetho emisha umongameli uramaphosa abekhuluma ngawo umthetho ochitshiyelwe wobugebengu kanye nezindaba ezihlobene nawo ovikela abantu ababuthakathaka ekubeni yizisulu kabili.

src: this act allows the courts to appoint intermediaries through which a minor, a disabled person or an elderly person can be examined in proceedings.
tgt: lo mthetho uvumela izinkantolo ukuba ziqoke abalamuli abazosetshenziswa lapho ingane encane, umuntu okhubazekile noma umuntu omdala ehlolwa lapho kuqhubeka icala.

src: the president was also referring to the new criminal law (sexual offences and related matters) amendment act which outlaws sexual exploitation and grooming of persons with mental disabilities.
tgt: umongameli ubephinde ebhekise emthethweni ochitshiyelwe womthetho wobugebengu (amacala ocansi kanye nezindaba ezihlobene nawo) ovimbela ukunukubezwa ngokocansi kanye nokuheha ngokocansi abantu abakhubazekile ngokomqondo.

src: end of state of disaster in sight for sa vukuzenzele unnamed president cyril ramaphosa recently announced in his 2022 state of the nation address (sona) that government plans to scrap the national state of disaster as the coun try enters a new phase in the management of the coronavirus disease (covid19) pandemic.
tgt: ukuqedwa kwesimo senhlekelele kuzwelonke kusondele eningizimu afrika vukuzenzele unnamed umongameli ucyril ramaphosa usanda kumemezela enkulumweni yakhe echaza ngesimo sezwe yowezi2022 (isona) ukuthi uhulumeni uhlela ukuqeda isimo senhlekelele kuzwelonke njengoba izwe lingena esigabeni esisha sokulawu lwa kwesifo sobhubhane segciwane lecorona (icovid19).

src: "it is our intention to end the national state of disaster as soon as we have finalised other measures under the national health act and other legislation to contain the pandemic," said the president.
tgt: "kuyinhloso yethu ukuqeda isimo senhlekelele kuzwelonke ngokushesha uma nje sesiqedele ezinye izinyathelo ngaphansi komthetho wezempilo kuzwelonke kanye neminye imithetho yokunqanda lolu bhubhane," kusho umongameli.

src: on 15 march 2020, president ramaphosa declared the national state of disaster in terms of the disaster management act and announced a range of measures to contain the covid19 outbreak.
tgt: mhla ziyi15 kundasa 2020, umongameli uramaphosa wamemezela isimo senhlekelele sikazwelonke ngokomthetho wokulawulwa kwenhle kelele futhi wamemezela inqwaba yezinyathelo zokunqanda ukubheduka kwecovid19.

src: president ramaphosa said nearly all restrictions on economic and social activity have already been lifted, which is largely thanks to the vaccination rollout programme.
tgt: umongameli uramaphosa uthe cishe yonke imikhawulo yemisebenzi yezomnotho nezenhlalakahle isivele ixegisiwe, lokhu kuyabongeka kakhulu ngenxa yohlelo lokukhishwa ngempumelelo komgomo.

src: he reminded citizens that vaccines are the best defence against illness, death and covid19, which has claimed close to 100 000 lives locally.
tgt: ukhumbuze izakhamuzi ukuthi imigomo iyindlela engcono kakhulu yokuzivikela ekuguleni, ukufa kanye necovid19, esibulale abantu abacishe babalelwe kwizi100 000 lapha ezweni lakithi.

src: "i've always said from a personal point of view, had i have not been vaccinated, in december when i contracted covid19, i probably will not be standing here," he reflected.
tgt: "bengihlala ngisho ngokwami ukuthi, ukube angizange ngigonywe, ngozibandlela lapho ngesuleleka ngecovid19, mhlawumbe ngabe angimile lapha," esika kwelijikayo.

src: the president took the time to urge south africans to take the lifesaving jab and continue to observe basic health measures and remain vigilant.
tgt: umongameli uzinike isikhathi sokunxusa abantu baseningizimu afrika ukuthi bathathe umgomo osindisa impilo futhi baqhubeke nokulandela izinyathelo eziyisisekelo sezempilo futhi bahlale beqaphile.

src: "we will be able to get on with our lives, even with the virus in our midst," he said, adding that the pandemic has exacerbated the divide between those who are employed and those who are jobless.
tgt: "sizokwazi ukuqhubeka nempilo yethu, ngisho naleli gciwane liphakathi kwethu," usho kanje, wengeza ngokuthi lolu bhubhane selubhebhethekise uqhekeko phakathi kwalabo abasebenzayo kanye nabangasebenzi.

src: solidarity fund president ramaphosa announced that the solidarity fund has raised r3.4 billion from more than 300 000 south africans and companies, while more than 400 individuals and 100 companies volunteered their time and services.
tgt: isikhwama sobumbano umongameli uramaphosa umemezele ukuthi isikhwama sobumbano siqoqe izigidigidi ezi3.4 zamarandi kubantu baseningizimu afrika kanye nasezinkampanini ezingaphezu kwezi300 000, ngesikhathi abantu abangaphezu kwama400 kanye nezinkampani eziyi100 bezinikele ngesikhathi nemisebenzi yabo.

src: "the fund has played a pivotal role in supporting the national health response and alleviating the humanitarian crisis that confronted our country and our people.
tgt: "lesi sikhwama sidlale indima esemqoka ekwesekeni indlela yezempilo kuzwelonke yokubhekana kanye nokunciphisa inkinga yabantu ebibhekene nezwe lethu kanye nabantu bakithi.

src: "he thanked everyone who contributed to the fund, including some members of parliament, and other initiatives to support those affected by the pandemic.
tgt: "ubonge wonke umuntu ofake isandla kulesi sikhwama, okuhlanganisa namalungu ephalamende kanye nezinye izinhlelo zokweseka labo abakhahlanyezwe yilolu bhubhane.

src: the president also paid tribute to the many healthcare and frontline workers who play a key role in the fight against covid19.
tgt: umongameli uphinde wethulela isigqoko inqwaba yabasebenzi bezokunakekelwa kwempilo kanye nabasebenzi abahamba phambili abadlala indima esemqoka ekulwisaneni necovid19.

src: "the nation owes a great debt of gratitude to the dedicated health workers and to other frontline staff who put their own health and lives at risk to care for the ill and the vulnerable during this period," he said.
tgt: "isizwe sinesikweletu esikhulu sokubonga kubasebenzi bezempilo abazinikele kanye nakwabanye abasebenzi abasebenza phambili ababeka impilo yabo engcupheni ukuze banakekele abagulayo nababuthakathaka ngalesi sikhathi," kusho yena.

src: – sanews.
tgt: – sanews.

src: gov.
tgt: gov.

src: public and private sector key to economic growth vukuzenzele unnamed as we work to grow our economy and create employment, there is much debate about the relative roles of the state and business in pursuing these goals.
tgt: umkhakha kahulumeni nozimele ibalulekile ekukhuleni komnotho vukuzenzele unnamed njengoba sisebenza ngokuzikhandla ukukhulisa umnotho futhi sakhe amathuba omsebenzi, kunenkulumompikiswano enkulu mayelana nobudlelwano beqhaza elibanjwa nguhulumeni kanye namabhizinisi ekufezeni lezi zinhloso.

src: some people have suggested that we must make a choice between, on the one hand, a developmental state that plays a vital role in economic and social transformation, and, on the other, a vibrant, expanding private sector that drives growth and employment.
tgt: abanye abantu baphakamise ukuthi kufanele sikhethe phakathi, ngakolunye uhlangothi, umbuso othuthukayo odlala indima esemqoka ekuguqulweni kwezomnotho kanye nezenhlalakahle, ngakolunye uhlangothi, umkhakha ozimele, onomdlandla oqhuba ukukhula nokuqashwa.

src: the reality is that we need both.
tgt: eqinisweni sikudinga kokubili lokhu.

src: we need a capable developmental state and a dynamic and agile private sector.
tgt: sidinga umbuso okhonayo ukuthuthukisa kanye nomkhakha ozimele osebenza kahle nosheshayo.

src: we need them to work together and complement each other.
tgt: sidinga ukuthi yomibili imikhakha isebenzisane futhi iphelelisane.

src: this idea is not new.
tgt: leli cebo alikho lisha.

src: thirty years ago, in 1992, the african national congress adopted a document titled "ready to govern".
tgt: eminyakeni engamashumi amathathu eyedlule, ngonyaka we1992, iafrican national congress yemukela umqulu onesihloko esithi ‘ready to govern’.

src: the document set out policy guidelines for a democratic south africa and has, over nearly three decades, influenced the policy direction of successive democratic administrations.
tgt: lo mqulu ubeka imihlahlandlela yenqubomgomo yeningizimu afrika yentando yeningi labantu futhi, cishe iminyaka engamashumi amathathu, ubenomthelela ekuqondisweni kwenqubomgomo yokuphatha ngokulandelana kwentando yeningi labantu.

src: the "ready to govern" document envisaged a democratic state with ultimate responsibility for coordinating, planning and guiding the development of the economy towards a sustainable growth pattern’ in cooperation with the trade union movement, business and other organs of society.
tgt: umqulu othi ‘ready to govern’ wawuhlose umbuso wentando yeningi labantu onesibopho esikhulu ‘sokuxhumanisa, ukuhlela kanye nokuqondisa ukuthuthukiswa komnotho ukuze kuthuthukiswe umnotho ogcinekayo’ ngokubambisana nenhlangano yezinyunyana zabasebenzi, amabhizinisi kanye nezinye izinhlaka zomphakathi.

src: it spoke of the need for economic policy that democratises the economy and creates productive employment opportunities at a living wage for all south africans.
tgt: ukhuluma ngesidingo senqubomgomo yezomnotho eyenza umnotho wentando yeningi labantu futhi udale namathuba omsebenzi akhiqizayo ngamaholo aphilisayo kubo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika.

src: the document further envisages a dynamic private sector, employing the skills and acumen of all south africans … and of business activities which contribute significantly to job creation, being actively encouraged.
tgt: lo mqulu ubuye ubheke ‘umkhakha ozimele oguquguqukayo, osebenzisa amakhono kanye nekhono labo bonke abantu baseningizimu afrika kanye nemisebenzi yamabhizinisi enomthelela omkhulu ekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi, ukuthi ugqugquzelwe ngenkuthalo.’enkulumweni echaza ngesimo sezwe yakamuva nje, ngibalule ukuthi uhulumeni, amabhizinisi kanye nabasebenzi kufanele basebenze ngokubambisana, umuntu ngamunye asebenzise amakhono akhe ahlukile, ukudala amathuba omsebenzi.

src: in the recent state of the nation address, i outlined how government, business and labour should work together, each using their unique capabilities, to create jobs.
tgt: abanye futhi abangabasunguli ababalulekile bokukhula komnotho nemisebenzi ngamabhizinisi kahulumeni (amasoe).

src: one of the most important drivers of growth and employment are stateowned enterprises (soes).
tgt: aphehla ugesi, alawule amachweba, akha imigwaqo futhi ahlinzeka ngamanzi adingekayo ukuze umnotho usebenze.

src: they generate electricity, manage the ports, build the roads and supply the water that the economy needs to function.
tgt: kusukela kwafika intando yeningi labantu, lawa masoe anyuse izinga lokufinyelela kwezidingongqangi kwabampofu.

src: since the advent of democracy, these soes have significantly expanded access to basic services for the poor.
tgt: yingakho ingxenye esemqoka yohlelo lwethu kuwukuqinisa amabhizinisi kahulumeni, ukuwabuyisela esimweni esiyiso sezezimali, ukwenza ngcono ukusebenza kwawo kanye nokwenza ukuthi adlale indima egqamile futhi enenzuzo emnothweni wezwe lakithi.

src: that is why a critical part of our programme is to strengthen stateowned enterprises, restoring them to financial health, improving their operational performance and enabling them to play a more prominent and beneficial role in the economy.
tgt: ngokuvumelana neqhaza elihlongoziwe emqulwini i'ready to govern’, umbuso ulawula kokubili ukukhula kanye noguquko ngokusebenzisa imigudu efana nenqubomgomo yokuncintisana, ukufukulwa kwabamnyama kwezomnotho kanye nemithetho yokulingana kwezemisebenzi, nangokuxhumanisa ukuklonyeliswa kwezimvume ezihlukahlukene nomsebenzi womhlaba wonke kanye nokuzibophezela ekunikeni amandla.

src: true to the role envisaged in "ready to govern", the state directs both growth and transformation through levers like competition policy, broadbased black economic empowerment provisions and employment equity laws, and by linking the award of various licences to universal service and empowerment obligations.
tgt: uhulumeni naye udlala indima eqondile ekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi ngaphezu kwalabo bantu abaqashwe emisebenzini kahulumeni.

src: government is also directly involved in employment creation beyond those people employed in the public service.
tgt: uhlelo lwemisebenzi kahulumeni eyengeziwe, elokhu lwaba khona kusukela ngowezi2003, inikeze amathuba omsebenzi ezigidini zabantu.

src: the expanded public works programme, which has been in existence since 2003, has provided work opportunities to millions of people.
tgt: kamuva nje, ekubhekaneni nomthelela omubi wobhubhane lwecovid19 kwezomnotho, lo hulumeni wengamele ukwanda okukhulu kokuqashwa komphakathi emlandweni wezwe lethu.

src: the presidential employment stimulus has supported more than 850 000 opportunities in just 16 months.
tgt: uhlelo lukamongameli lokusungulwa kwamathuba omsebenzi luseke amathuba angaphezulu kwezi850 000 ezinyangeni eziyi16 nje kuphela.

src: in addition to expanding public employment, we are providing support to unemployed young people to prepare them for work, make them more employable and connect them to opportunities.
tgt: ngaphezulu kokwandisa ukuqashwa komphakathi, sihlinzeka ngosizo kubantu abasha abangasebenzi ukuze sibalungiselele umsebenzi, sibenze baqasheke kakhulu futhi sibabeke ebalazweni lamathuba omsebenzi.

src: there are many other ways in which government is contributing directly to job creation, including through largescale investments in infrastructure, the establishment of special economic zones and through support to labourintensive growth industries.
tgt: ziningi ezinye izindlela uhulumeni afaka ngazo isandla ngqo ekudaleni amathuba omsebenzi, okuhlanganisa ukutshalwa kwezimali okukhulu kwingqalasizinda, ukusungulwa kwezindawo zomnotho ezikhethekile kanye nokwesekwa kwezimboni eziqashe abasebenzi abaningi.

src: a special focus this year is on small, medium and micro businesses, on cooperatives and the informal sector.
tgt: okugxilwe kakhulu kukho kulo nyaka ngamabhizinisi amancane, amaphakathi nendawo kanye namancanyana, akwimifelandawonye yamabhizinisi kanye nomkhakha ongahlelekile.

src: through the redesign of the loan guarantee scheme that we introduced in the early months of the covid19 pandemic, we are making ‘bounce back’ finance more accessible for small businesses.
tgt: ngokuklanywa kabusha kohlelo lwesiqinisekiso semalimboleko esethulwe ezinyangeni zokuqala zobhubhane lwecovid19, senza imali ‘iphinde ibuye’ ukuthi ifinyelele kalula emabhizinisini amancane.

src: we are expanding the employment tax incentive and looking at various other regulatory changes to make it easier for small businesses to employ more people.
tgt: sandisa isikhuthazo sentela yokuqasha futhi sibheka ezinye izinguquko zomthetho ukuze kube lula kumabhizinisi amancane ukuqasha abantu abaningi.

src: as i indicated in the state of the nation address, these are among the measures we are taking as government to create the conditions that will enable the private sector – both big and small – to emerge, to grow, to access new markets, to create new products, and to hire more employees.
tgt: njengoba ngishilo enkulumweni echaza ngesimo sezwe, lezi ngezinye zezinyathelo esizithathayo njengohulumeni "ukwenza izimo ezizokwenza ukuthi umkhakha ozimele omkhulu nomncane ubonakale, ukhule, ufinyelele kwizimakethe ezintsha, udale imikhiqizo emisha, futhi uqashe abasebenzi abaningi.

src: the private sector employs some three quarters of south africa’s workers and accounts for over twothirds of investment and research and development expenditure.
tgt: "umkhakha ozimele uqashe ingxenye yokuthathu kokune kubasebenzi baseningizimu afrika futhi ubhekene notshalomali olungaphezulu kwezingxenye ezimbili kwezintathu kanye nezindleko zocwaningo nentuthuko.

src: alongside a capable and developmental state, our country therefore needs a thriving private sector that is investing in productive capacity.
tgt: ngokuhambisana nombuso okhonayo futhi othuthukayo, izwe lethu ngakhoke lidinga umkhakha ozimele ophumelelayo otshala izimali kumakhono okukhiqiza.

src: as private sector employment expands, more livelihoods are supported and sustained.
tgt: njengoba imisebenzi kumkhakha ozimele yanda, izindlela zabantu zokuziphilisa eziningi ziyagcineka futhi ziyesekwa.

src: special tribunal is showing that crime does not pay vukuzenzele unnamed during the recent presidential imbizo in mahikeng, several citizens raised concerns about the pace of the fight against corruption.
tgt: inkantolo ekhethekile ibonisa ukuthi ubugebengu abubuyiseli allison cooper ngesikhathi sembizo kamongameli emahikeng, izakhamuzi eziningi zizwakalise ukukhathazeka ngokuhambisa ngonyawo lonwabu ukulwa nenkohlakalo.

src: they told me what i have heard in many other communities across the country: that the perpetrators of such acts are known, not least because they flaunt the proceeds of their crimes.
tgt: bangitshele lokho esengikuzwile kweminye imiphakathi kulo lonke izwe: ukuthi ababhebhezeli bale zenzo ezimbi bayaziwa, ngoba baqhosha ngalokho abakuzuze ngenxa yobugebengu babo.

src: but the arm of the law is long.
tgt: kodwa ingalo yomthetho yinde.

src: those who have stolen from the state may believe they have gotten away with it.
tgt: labo abebele umbuso bangacabanga ukuthi baphumelele.

src: they will learn that crime does not pay.
tgt: bazofunda ukuthi ubugebengu abubuyiseli.

src: in this regard, one of our most effective weapons in the fight against corruption and state capture is the special tribunal of the special investigating unit (siu), which i established in 2019. it adjudicates on matters that the siu institutes for civil litigation after it has concluded its investigations.
tgt: kulolu daba, esinye sezi khali zethu esisebenzayo ekulweni nenkohlakalo kanye nokuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso inkantolo ekhethekile yophiko lwezokuphenywa kwamacala akhethekile (isiu), enga yisungula ngowezi2019.

src: the special tribunal was set up to speed up litigation.
tgt: ihlulela amacala alethwa isiu ukuze ezoqulwa emuva kokuthi isiphothule uphenyo lwayo.

src: this approach has made it possible for public funds and state assets lost to corrupt acts to be recovered faster, avoiding delays in the high courts, where the siu has to wait its turn together with other litigants.
tgt: le ndlela seyenze kwenzeka ukuthi izimali zikahulumeni kanye nempahla yombuso eyalahleka ngenxa yezenzo zenkohla kalo zibuye ngokushesha, ngokugwema ukuchitha isikhathi ezinkantolo ezi phakeme, lapho isiu kumele ilinde isikhathi sayo kanye nabanye abamangaleli.

src: the siu can request preservation orders and the freezing of assets to prevent further losses to the state.
tgt: isiu ingafaka isicelo senkantolo sokumisa ukusebenza kwesakhi wo noma kwempahla ukunqanda okunye ukulahlekelwa kombuso.

src: this is important when considering that per petrators who are under suspicion often go to great lengths to move around, hide or dispose of proceeds of corruption.
tgt: lokhu kubalulekile uma kucatshangwa ukuthi ababhebhezeli abasolekayo bahlezi bengenza noma yini ukuhambisa, bacashise noma balahle ubufakazi benkohlakalo.

src: there can be no doubt the special tribunal has been a game changer.
tgt: akukho ukungabaza ukuthi inkantolo ekhethekile ikushintshile ukwenza.

src: since its establishment, the tribunal has recovered around r8.6 billion from unlawful contracts.
tgt: selokhu yasungulwa, inkantolo isibuyise izigidigidi eziyisir8.6 kwizinkontileka ezakhishwa ngokungemthetho.

src: for any fight against corruption to be deemed effective, it is not sufficient that perpetrators are pro secuted.
tgt: ukuze konke ukulwisana nenkohlakalo kuzophumelela, akwanele ukuthi ababhebhezeli bayashu shiswa.

src: the proceeds of their crimes must be recovered.
tgt: konke abakuzuze ngenxa yobugebengu babo kumele kubuyiswe.

src: this money belongs to citizens and should be used to meet their needs.
tgt: le mali ngeyezakhamuzi futhi kumele isetshenziselwe ukuhlangabezana nezidingo zazo.

src: the special tribunal recently ordered two construction companies to return the profits they earned from r40 million in contracts to erect the beit bridge border fence.
tgt: inkantolo ekhethekile kamuva iyalele izinka mpani zokwakha ezimbili ukuthi zibuyise inzuzo eziyithole kwizinkontileka ezibiza izigidi ezingamar40 zokwakha ucingo lokubiya emngceleni ibeit bridge.

src: this followed an investigation by the siu that uncovered a number of irregularities, including a prepayment to the companies by the department of public works and infrastructure.
tgt: lokhu kulandela uphenyo olwenziwe isiu oluthole ukungalandelwa komthetho okuningi, kubandakanya nokukhokhelwa kwezinkampani zingakawenzi umsebenzi ngumnyango wezemi sebenzi yomphakathi nezingqalasizinda.

src: over the past few weeks alone, the tribunal has reviewed and set aside more than r100 million worth of irregular and unlawful contracts arising from covidrelated pro curement.
tgt: emavikini ambalwa edlule, inkantolo ekhethekile isibuyekeze futhi yabekela eceleni izinko ntileka ezingalandelanga umthetho zenani elinga phezu kwezigidi eziyir100 eziphume ekuthengweni kwempahla yecovid19.

src: the special tribunal has also been successful in getting back money from senior executives in stateowned enterprises who conducted irregular business activities.
tgt: inkantolo ekhethekile iphinde yaphumelela ekubuyiseni imali kwizikhulu eziphezulu zezinkampani eziphethwe nguhulumeni ezazenza imisebenzi yamabhizinisi ngokungalandeli umthetho.

src: for example, last year a former transnet executive was ordered to pay r26 million he received as a shareholder of a firm of consulting engineers contracted to transnet while he was a fulltime employee.
tgt: isibonelo, ngonyaka owedlule isikhulu saphambilini sasetransnet sayalelwa ukuba sikhokhe izigidi ezingamar26 esazithola njengomninizabelo wenkampani yonjiniyela eyanikwa inkontileka yetransnet ngesikhathi sisesengumsebenzi wa khona ngokuphelele.

src: the siu has in a number of cases approached the tribunal to delay the payment of pension benefits, pending the outcome of its investigations, to public servants implicated in financial irregularities or fruitless and wasteful expenditure.
tgt: isiu emacaleni amaningi icele inkantolo ekhethekile ukuthi ibambezele ukukhokhwa kwezinzuzo zempesheni, kusalindwe umphumela wophenyo lwayo, kubasebenzi baka hulumeni abathinteka ekungahambisini ngomthetho kwezimali noma ukuthenga ngokungenasidingo kanye nokumosha imali.

src: the cases before the special tribunal show that much work still needs to be done to strengthen governance and management across all arms of the state.
tgt: amacala asenkantolo ekhethekile abonisa ukuthi umsebenzi omkhulu kusamele wenziwe ukuqinisa ukuphatha kanye nokulawula kuzo zonke izinhlaka zombuso.

src: they point to serious lapses on the part of accounting officers and failures to adhere to laws and regulations governing procurement i have said before that winning the war on cor ruption will be difficult, and that it will take time to unravel the vast webs of patronage that had become entrenched.
tgt: abonisa igebe elikhulu phakathi kwezikhulu eziziphendulelayo kanye nokuhluleka ukulandela imithetho nemithethonqubo ephethe ukuthengwa kwempahla nokukhishwa kwezinko ntileka.

src: i have also maintained that we must fight private sector corruption with equal vigour, because for every public sector employee willing to be bribed, there is a business person willing to pay a bribe.
tgt: ngasho ngaphambilini ukuthi ukunqoba impi yenkohlakalo kuzoba nzima, futhi kuzothatha isikhathi ukusiphula izimpande zala mandla okwenzelelana esezinabe zasabalala.

src: these corrupt relationships have eroded the capacity of the state to deliver on its mandate.
tgt: ngisamile futhi ekutheni kumele silwe nenkohlakalo emkhakheni ozimele ngo mfutho olinganayo, ngoba wonke umsebenzi osebenza emkhakheni kahulumeni ofuna ukufunjathiswa, kusho ukuthi kukhona usomabhizinisi ofunayo ukukhokha intshontsho.

src: they have set back the state’s efforts to provide decent healthcare, to deliver clean water, and to ensure a consistent supply of power to communities and businesses.
tgt: lobu budlelwano benkohlakalo sebuqede ikhono lombuso lokufeza igunya lalo.

src: all you need to know about epilepsy vukuzenzele unnamed most people with epilepsy can live a normal life if they take their medication and the condition is well controlled.
tgt: konke okumele ukwazi ngesithuthwane vukuzenzele unnamed abantu abaningi abanesithuthwane bangaphila impilo eyejwayelekile uma bephuza imithi yabo futhi belawula kahle lesi simo.

src: according to dr nhlakanipho gumede, the clinical manager of medical services at harry gwala regional hospital in pietermaritzburg, epilepsy is not a psychological disorder, disease or illness, and it is not contagious.
tgt: ngokusho kukadkt nhlakanipho gumede, ongumphathi womtho lampilo kwezokwelashwa esibhedlela eharry gwala regional hospital emgu ngundlovu, isithuthwane akukona ukungasebenzi kwengqondo, isifo noma ukugula, futhi asithathelani.

src: he explains that epilepsy is a neurological disorder marked by sudden recurrent episodes of sensory disturbance, loss of consciousness or convulsions, associated with abnormal electrical activity in the brain.
tgt: uchaza uthi isithuthwane ukungasebenzi kwezinzwa okubonakala ngokuphazamiseka kwezinzwa okuphindaphinda izi khawu, ukuquleka noma ukudlikizela, okuhlobene nokubanika okungajwayelekile ebuchosheni.

src: "the brain comprises of billions of nerve cells (neurons) communicating through electrical and chemical signals.
tgt: "ubuchopho bunamangqamuzana ezinzwa ayizigidigidi (amaneurons) okuyiwona athumela umyalezo ngezimpawu zokubanika nangokwekhe mikhali.

src: when there is a sudden excessive electrical discharge that disrupts the normal activity of the nerve cells, a seizure may result.
tgt: uma kuba khona ukubanika okweqile ngokuzuma okuphazamisa ukusebenza ngokujwayelekile kwamangqamuzana ezinzwa, kungaholela ekudlikizeni.

src: "a single seizure does not necessarily mean you have epilepsy.
tgt: ""ukudlikizela kanye akusho ukuthi unesithuthwane.

src: a diagnosis by a medical practitioner needs to confirm this," he says.
tgt: ukuxilongwa ngudokotela kumele kuqinisekise lokhu," kusho yena.

src: according to epilepsy south africa, 80% of people with epilepsy will be able to control their seizures with medication.
tgt: ngokwenhlangano yesithuthwane eningi zimu afrika, ama80% abantu abanesithuthwane bazokwazi ukulawula ukudlikizela kwabo ngokuphuza imithi.

src: causes and seizures the cause of epilepsy in six out of 10 people is not known.
tgt: izimbangela nokudlikiza imbangela yesithuthwane kubantu abayisithupha kwabayishumi ayaziwa.

src: in the other 40%, it can be caused by a head injury, injury during the birthing process, alcohol and drug abuse, aging or a metabolic or biochemical disturbance or imbalance.
tgt: kulaba abanye abanga ma40%, singabangelwa ukulimala ekhanda, ukulimala ngesikhathi sokubelethwa, utshwala kanye nokusebenzisa izidakamizwa, ukuguga noma ukuphazamiseka noma ukungalingani kwendlela yokwakheka komzimba noma kwamakhemikhali emzimbeni.

src: dr gumede says the signs and symptoms of epilepsy vary, and can present in various ways, including generalised absence seizures (petit mal), when a person looks blank and stares; generalised tonicclonic seizures (grand mal), which commonly start with body stiffening, before the person falls down and has jerking movements; and complex partial seizures, which affect a part of the brain.
tgt: udkt gumede uthi izimpawu nezinkomba zesithuthwane ziyahluka, futhi zingaziveza ngezindlela ezahlukene, kubandakanya ukudlikiza kwesikhashana (ipetit mal), uma umuntu kuvele kube mnyama amehlo noma agqolozele esikha leni nje; ukudlikizela okubizwa ngetonicclonic (igrand mal), okujwayele ukuqala ngokuqina komzimba, ngaphambi ko kuthi umuntu awe phansi bese eqala ukudlikizela; kanye namacomplex partial seizures, wona athinta ingxenye yobuchopho.

src: a petit mal seizure only lasts a few seconds, and the person may be unaware that they had one.
tgt: ipetit mal seizure ithatha imizuzwana embalwa, futhi umuntu kungenzeka anga boni uma iqeda kumubamba.

src: during a grand mal seizure, the person may have a blue colour around their mouth, which fades when normal breathing resumes.
tgt: ngesikhathi kwenzeka igrand mal seizure, loyo muntu angaba nombala oluhlaza okwe sibhakabhaka ngaphandle komlomo, okuyaye kuye ngokuphela uma eseqala futhi ephefumula ngendlela ejwayelekile.

src: grand mal seizures usually last a few minutes.
tgt: amagrand mal seizures ajwayele ukuthatha imizuzu embalwa.

src: "protect the person from injury by moving objects away and cushioning their head.
tgt: "vikela umuntu ukuthi angalimali ngokuqhelisa izinto nangokuqamelisa ikhanda lakhe.

src: don’t restrict their movement or put any thing in their mouth.
tgt: ungamvi mbeli ukuthi anyakaze noma ufake utho emlonyeni wakhe.

src: help breathing by laying the person on their side when the seizure ends.
tgt: msize ngokuphefumula ngokumlalisa ngecala uma ukudlikiza sekuphelile.

src: food at school ensures children don’t go hungry vukuzenzele unnamed over nine million children receive a nutritious meal at school thanks to government’s national school nutrition programme (nsnp), which was introduced in 1994. the programme aims to improve children’s ability to learn, by reducing malnutrition and hunger and improving school attendance, especially at disadvantaged schools.
tgt: uhlelo lokudla esikoleni luqinisekisa ukuthi abantwana abalambi vukuzenzele unnamed abantwana abangaphezu kwezigidi eziyisishiyagalolunye bathola ukudla okunomsoco esikoleni ngalokho sibonga uhlelo lukahulumeni lokudla ezikolweni kuzwelonke (insnp), olwethulwa ngowe1994.

src: "the programme is critical for furthering learners’ constitutional rights to basic nutrition and basic education," explains deputy minister of basic education dr reginah mhaule.
tgt: lolu hlelo luhlose ukuthuthukisa ikhono labantwana lokufunda, ngokunciphisa ukungondleki kahle nendlala kanye nokwenza ngcono ukuya kwabo esikoleni, ikakhulukazi ezikoleni ezincishwe amathuba.

src: as a result of the nsnp, more children are attending school on time and more regularly, and their concentration in class has improved.
tgt: "lolu hlelo lubaluleke kakhulu ekuqhubeleni phambili amalungelo omthethosisekelo abafundi okuthola ukondliwa kanye nemfundo eyisisekelo," kuchaza iphini likangqongqoshe wemfundo eyisisekelo udkt reginah mhaule.

src: according to the department of basic education (dbe), learners are taught good eating and lifestyle habits.
tgt: ngenxa yensnp, abantwana abaningi baya esikoleni ngesikhathi futhi njalo nje, futhi nokulalela kwabo ekilasini sekungcono.

src: schools are also encouraged to set up their own food gardens to supplement the nsnp menu.
tgt: ngokomnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo (idbe), abafundi bafundiswa imikhuba emihle yokudla kanye nendlela yokuphila.

src: learners, teachers and parents are taught grow their own food.
tgt: abafundi, othisha kanye nabazali bafundiswa ukuzitshalela ukudla kwabo.

src: nsnp awards thabang primary school in bethlehem, free state, is one of the schools that benefits from the nsnp.
tgt: imiklomelo yensnp isikole ithabang primary school esisebethlehem, efreyistata, singesinye sezikole ezihlomula ohlelweni lwensnp.

src: the school recently won the nsnp best school award.
tgt: lesi sikole sisanda kuhlabana ngomklomelo wensnp wesikole esihamba phambili.

src: the awards celebrate schools’ nutrition programmes by looking at their hygiene and safety practices, nutritious meals, food gardens and nutrition education.
tgt: imiklomelo ibungaza izinhlelo zezikole zokudla ngokubheka inhlanzeko kanye nokuphepha kwazo, ukudla okunomsoco, izivande zokudla kanye nokufundiswa ngokudla okunomsoco.

src: "i am extremely grateful that the school won the award," says seyanokeng sejake, the thabang pri mary principal for the past 24 years.
tgt: "ngiyabonga kakhulu ukuthi isikole sihlomule umklomelo," kusho useyanokeng sejake, osebe nguthishanhloko wasethabang primary iminyaka engama24.

src: thabang primary school has been running its nutrition programme since 1994. today, it ensures that its 1 065 learners receive a healthy breakfast daily from a local business.
tgt: ithabang primary school isiqhube uhlelo lwayo lokudla kusukela ngowe1994.

src: the food is cooked by unemployed members of the community, who are appointed by the school governing body (sgb).
tgt: ukudla kuphekwa ngamalungu omphakathi angasebenzi, aqashwe umkhandlu owengamele isikole (isgb).

src: "our six employed voluntary food handlers (vfh) make the food provided by the department of basic education through the allocation of funds to the school," says sejake.
tgt: "abapheki bethu abayisithupha abaqashiwe (amavfh) bapheka ukudla okuhlinzekwe umnyango wezemfundo ngesabelo sezi mali esithunyelwa esikoleni," kusho usejake.

src: they vfhs each receive a stipend for preparing the food.
tgt: amavfh ngamanye athola inkokhelo ngokupheka ukudla.

src: thabang primary school took top honours at the awards due to the hard work and commitment of its sgb, management team and functional nsnp com mittee, says sejake.
tgt: ithabang primary school ihambe phambili kwimiklomelo ngenxa yokusebenza kanzima nangokuzimisela kwesgb yayo, ithimba labaphathi kanye nekomidi elibhekelele ukusebenza kwensnp, kusho usejake.

src: "punctuality is the order of the day.
tgt: "ukugcina isikhathi kuhamba phambili osukwini.

src: we don’t allow absenteeism, without a valid reason, and we have no dropouts.
tgt: asikuvumeli ukuphutha esikoleni, ngaphandle kwesizathu esizwakalayo, futhi asinabo abafundi abayeka isikole.

src: our learners’ concentration and general performance have also improved," she adds.
tgt: ukulalela kwabafundi bethu kanye nokuphumelela kwabo ezifundweni nakho sekungcono kakhulu," engeza.

src: as the prize for winning the award is a stateoftheart kitchen built by the tiger brands foundation, the school’s nutrition programme is set to become even better.
tgt: njengoba umklomelo ohlonyuliwe kulikhishi likanokusho elakhiwe inkampani itiger brands foundation, uhlelo lwesikole lokudla seluzoba ngcono kunakuqala.

src: the school also ensures that there are enough food supplies which are managed properly, to ensure there is always food for the programme.
tgt: isikole futhi siqinisekisa ukuthi kunezinsiza zokudla ezanele ezilawulwa ngokufanele, ukuqinisekisa ukuthi kuhlale kunokudla ukuqhuba lolu hlelo.

src: "for example, we have a food garden that supplies vegetables to supplement the nsnp allocation," explains sejake.
tgt: "isibonelo, sinesivande sokudla esisinika izitshalo ukwengeza ekudleni kwensnp," kuchaza usejake.

src: award winners in the best schools category, grootdrink intermediate, in the mgcawu district in the northern cape, took second place and aaron gqedu primary school, in nelson mandela bay in the eastern cape, came third.
tgt: abahlomule imiklomelo esigabeni sezikole ezihamba phambili, isikole igrootdrink intermediate, esifundeni imgcawu enyakatho kapa, sithathe indawo yesibili; kwathi iaaron gqedu primary school, esenelson mandela bay empumalanga kapa, yaphuma isithathu.

src: they will receive kitchen equipment from the depart ment of basic education.
tgt: zizothola impahla yasekhishini evela kumnyango wemfundo eyisisekelo.

src: the best district award was won by umzinyathi (kwazulunatal).
tgt: umklomelo wesifunda esihamba phambili utholwe isifunda sasemzinyathi (kwazulunatali).

src: the zf mgcawu district (northern cape) came second and metro north (western cape) came third.
tgt: isifunda izf mgcawu (enyakatho kapa) siphume isibili kwathi imetro north (entshonalanga kapa) yaphuma isithathu.

src: each district won office and computer equipment.
tgt: isifunda ngasinye sihlomule ihhovisi kanye nekhompyutha.

src: keep children safe online vukuzenzele unnamed with the world increasingly moving online, it’s important for children to take advantage these opportunities while also staying safe.
tgt: gcina abantwana bephephile kuinthanethi vukuzenzele unnamed ngenxa yokuthi umhlaba uguqukela kubuchwepheshe beinthanethi, kubalulekile ukuthi abantwana basebenzise la mathuba kodwa bephephile.

src: the government communication and information system (gcis) and digify africa recently hosted a webinar with media monitoring africa (mma) and the film and publication board (fpb) to teach children, educators, parents and the public about how to be responsible online.
tgt: uphiko lohlelo lukahulumeni lwezokuxhumana nokudluliswa kolwazi (igcis) kanye nedigify africa kamuva nje basingathe isithangami kuinthanethi nemedia monitoring africa (imma) kanye nefilm and publication board (ifpb) ukufundisa abantwana, othisha, abazali kanye nomphakathi indlela yokuziphatha kuinthanethi.

src: phakamile khumalo, the programme manager of public and media skills development at mma, said seven out of 10 children who answered questions as part of the sa kids online study said they used the internet without their parents’ permission.
tgt: uphakamile khumalo, umlawuli wohlelo lokuthu thukiswa kwamakhono abantu nabezindaba emma, uthe izingane eziyisikhombisa kwezilishumi eziphendule imibuzo njengengxenye yocwaningo olubizwa ngesa kids online study zithe zisebenzisa iinthanethi ngaphandle kwemvume yabazali bazo.

src: only four out of 10 children said they have some sort of information about online safety.
tgt: zine kuphela izingane kwezilishumi ezithe zinolwazi oluthile mayelana nokuphepha kwiinthanethi.

src: this shows that children need skills and resources to help them use the internet safely.
tgt: lokhu kubonisa ukuthi izingane zidinga amakhono kanye nezinsiza ezizozisiza ukuthi zisebenzise iinthanethi ngokuphepha.

src: mmaletjema poto, the fpb’s child protection officer, said parents need to be aware of the dangers their children face online, in cluding viewing child pornography or child sexual abuse, and being groomed by sexual predators.
tgt: ummaletjema poto, isikhulu sefpb’s child protection, uthe abazali kufanele babazi ubungozi abantwana babo ababhekana nabo kwiinthanethi, kubalwa nokubuka imifanekiso yabantwana yocansi noma yokuhlukunyezwa kwabantwana ngokocansi, kanye nokuqeqeshwa izigilamkhuba zocansi.

src: children can become the target of online sexual predators by just conducting an innocent internet search and clicking on the wrong link.
tgt: abantwana bangahehwa izigilamkhuba zocansi kwiinthanethi ngokuthi bangene kwiinthanethi bebheka into ethile emsulwa bese bechofoza ilinki okungafanele bayichofe.

src: offenders then gain their trust and start grooming them.
tgt: abantwana babe sebezithemba lezi zigilamkhuba bese ziqala ukubafundisa ngocansi.

src: "the child is often embarrassed and therefore doesn’t speak about it, which makes it hard for them to get out of the grooming cycle," said poto.
tgt: "umntwana ujwayele ukuba namahloni ngakhoke akakhulumi ngakho, lokho okwenza kube nzima ukuthi baphunyuke kulolu dobo lokufundiswa ngocansi," kusho upoto.

src: she also warned against sharing videos or images of child pornography online.
tgt: uphinde wexwayisa ngokwabelana ngamavidiyo noma izithombe zocansi kubantwana kuinthanethi.

src: "it has become a norm to share content on social media.
tgt: "sekujwayelekile nje ukwabelana ngokuthile ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.

src: but sharing this type of content is evidence of child abuse.
tgt: kodwa ukwabelana ngalolu hlobo lwemifanekiso kungubufakazi bokuhlukunyezwa kwabantwana.

src: being in possession of such content or sharing it is a criminal offence," added poto.
tgt: ukuba nale mifanekiso noma ukwabelana ngayo kuyisenzo sobugebengu," kwengeza upoto.

src: help at hand there are various resources available to help children use the internet safely.
tgt: usizo olukhona kunezinsiza ezehlukene ezikhona ukusiza abantwana ukuthi basebenzise iinthanethi ngokuphepha.

src: the mma runs web rangers, a digital literacy programme to upskill learners, teachers and parents.
tgt: imma iqhuba uhlelo lweweb rangers , uhlelo olufundisa ngeinthanethi ukucijisa amakhono abafundi, othisha kanye nabazali.

src: educational videos about cyberbullying, sexting and online grooming, are available at www.
tgt: ama vidiyo ezemfundo mayelana nobuqhwaga obenzeka kwiinthanethi, ukuthunyelwa kwemiyalezo yezocansi kanye nokufundiswa ucansi kwiinthanethi, akhona kuwww.

src: webrangers.co.za the mma also helps children through its hashplay (https://hashplay.co.za) website, which includes a social media platform that allows children to talk to an online consultant about what they are experiencing on social media.
tgt: webrangers.co.zaimma iphinde isize abantwana ngewebhusayithi yayo yehashplay (https://hashplay.co.za) , ebandakanya inkundla yezokuxhumana evumela abantwana ukuthi bakhulume nosebenza kwiinthanethi ngalokho abahlangabezana nakho ezinkundleni zokuxhumana.

src: digify africa has a free kitso whatsapp bot that helps children develop digital literacy skills.
tgt: idigify africa inohlelo lwamahhala lwekitso whatsapp olusiza abantwana ukuthuthukisa amakhono abo ezobuchwepheshe beinthanethi.

src: visit https://digifyafrica.
tgt: vakashela kuhttps://digifyafrica.

src: com/learnersresponsiblecitizens.
tgt: com/learnersresponsiblecitizens.

src: improved tax revenue supports recovery and growth vukuzenzele unnamed recently, the south african revenue service (sars) announced in its preliminary tax revenue collection outcome that it had collected over r1.5 trillion between april 2021 and march 2022. this a 25% improvement over the previous year and a 15% increase over the last year prior to the covid19 pandemic.
tgt: ukuqoqwa kwentela kweseka komnothoukuvuselelwa nokukhula komnotho vukuzenzele unnamed kamuvanje, umnyango wokuqoqwa kwentela eningizimu afrika (isars) wamemezela ngaphambi kokuphothulwa kokuqoqwa kwentela ukuthi usuqoqe ngaphezu kukar1.5 trillion phakathi kukambasa wowezi2021 nondasa wowezi2022.

src: over the same period, sars also paid out its highest amount in tax refunds since it was established 25 years ago.
tgt: lokhu kungukwenza ngcono ngama25% onyakeni owedlule kanye nokunyuka ngama15% onyakeni owedlule ngaphambi kobhubhane lwecovid19.

src: a competent tax revenue collection agency is at the heart of building a capable state.
tgt: esikhathini esifanayo, ihhovisi lakwasars liphinde lakhokha inani eliphezulu kakhulu lokubuyisela intela selokhu lasungulwa eminyakeni engama25 eyadlula.

src: tax revenue propels our nation’s development.
tgt: iejensi enekhono lokuqoqa intela ingummongo wokwakha umbuso okhonayo.

src: the money collected by sars finances service delivery and infrastructure.
tgt: imali eqoqwe ngusars ikhokhela izidingonqangi kanye nengqalasizinda.

src: through the r17.8 trillion that sars has collected since its establishment in 1997, we have been able to build more social infrastructure like clinics, schools and hospitals, upgrade and build new roads, and support society’s most vulnerable through social grants and other measures.
tgt: ngemali engangor17.8 trillion eqoqwe ngusars selokhu asungulwa ngowe1997, sikwazile ukwakha izingqalasizinda zomphakathi eziningi ezifana nemitholampilo, izikole nezibhedlela, salungisa futhi sakha imigwaqo emisha, saphinde seseka umphakathi obuthakathaka ngezibonelelo zikahulumeni kanye nezinye izinyathelo.

src: when tax revenue collection systems and their supporting legislation are efficient, uncomplicated and equitable, it incentivises greater compliance.
tgt: uma uhlelokusebenza lokuqoqwa kwentela kanye nemithetho eseka lokho isebenza kahle, ingaxaki futhi isebenza ngokulinganayo, ikhuthaza ukuthotshelwa kokukhokhwa kwentela.

src: restoring stability and credibility in sars was among my foremost priorities when i was elected president in 2018. like a number of other key institutions, sars had suffered from the illeffects of state capture, with political meddling, mismanagement and other factors seriously affecting its efficiency.
tgt: ukugcina uzinzo kanye nokwethembeka kwasars bekungokunye okuseqhulwini uma ngikhethwa njengomongameli ngowezi2018.

src: this had the direct consequence of not only undermining taxpayer morality, but also loss of business confidence in the organisation.
tgt: njengezinye izikhungo eziningi, usars naye ushayeke kakhulu ngumthelela omubi wokuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, ukugxambukela kwezepolitiki, ukungaphathi ngomthetho kanye nezinye izinto ezikhinyabeza ukusebenza kahle kwakhe.

src: in 2018, i appointed a commission of inquiry into tax administration and governance at sars chaired by retired justice robert nugent.
tgt: ngowezi2018, ngaqoka ikhomishana ezophenya ngokuphathwa nokwenganyelwa kwentela kwasars usihlalo wayo kwakungujaji osewathatha umhlalaphansi urobert nugent.

src: the commission delivered its final report by the end of the same year.
tgt: ikhomishana yethula umbiko wayo wokugcina ekupheleni kwawo lowo nyaka.

src: four years later, sars has implemented nearly all of the 16 recommendations and 27 subrecommendations to restore stability to the organisation.
tgt: eminyakeni emine eyalandela, usars useqalise cishe zonke izincomo eziyi16 kanye nezinye izincomo ezingama27 ukugcina uzinzo kulo mnyango.

src: sars has driven a focused turnaround strategy to position itself at the forefront of efficiency and service excellence.
tgt: usars useqhube iqhingasu lokushintsha indlela yokusebenza ukuthi azibeke phambili ekusebenzeni kahle nokwethula izinsiza ngendlela ehamba phambili.

src: it has a concerted programme to promote tax morality and compliance.
tgt: usehlanganise uhlelo lokugqugquzela ukuziphatha kahle nokuthobela imithetho yentela.

src: current high commodity prices, resulting in increased corporate income tax revenues, have contributed to the latest revenue collection windfall.
tgt: amanani aphezulu amanje empahla, aholela ekunyukeni kwentela yezinkampani, abe nesandla ekuqoqweni kwakamuva kwentela eyeqile.

src: what has also played a role are the steps sars has taken to improve its information technology and other infrastructure, modernise customs, recruit skilled staff, and combat tax avoidance and criminal activity.
tgt: okuphinde kwadlala indima izinyathelo usars azithathile ukwenza ngcono ubuchwepheshe bokuthumela ulwazi nezinye izingqalasizinda, indlela yokusebenza yesimanje, ukuqasha abasebenzi abanekhono, kanye nokulwa nokubalekela ukukhokhwa kwentela kanye nobugebengu.

src: one of the recommendations of the nugent commission was that sars reestablish capacity to monitor and investigate illicit trades.
tgt: esinye sezincomo zekhomishana kanugent kwakungukuthi usars aphinde asungule ithimba elizoqapha liphinde liphenye ukuhweba okungekho emthethweni.

src: the illicit economy unit that was reconstituted in 2018 has notched up a number of successes in combating illicit economy trades, including through a focus on customs noncompliance.
tgt: uphiko lomnotho ongekho emthethweni olwasungulwa ngowezi2018 seluphumelele izikhathi eziningi ekuqedeni ukuhweba komnotho okungekho emthethweni, kubandakanya nokugxila ekungalandelini umthetho wentela yempahla ephuma kwamanye amazwe.

src: tax collection from jse listed companies, multinationals and high net worth individuals is now more effectively managed through its large business unit, which was relaunched in 2020. as a result of sars’ turnaround there has been improved compliance in personal income tax, corporate income tax and pay as you earn.
tgt: ukuqoqwa kwentela ezinkampanini ezisohlwini lwejse, abahlala kumazwe amaningi kanye nalabo bantu abagwilike kakhulu manje sekusebenza kahle kakhulu kulawulwa uphiko lwamabhizinisi amakhulu, olwaphinde lwethulwa ngowezi2020.

src: sars is taking the wind out of the sails of tax dodgers, beneficiaries of the proceeds of crime, and those involved in corrupt activities.
tgt: umphumela woshintsho lwakasars ludale ukuba ngcono ekuthotshelweni kwentela yomuntu ngamunye, intela yenkampani kanye nentela ngobungakomholo.

src: it is wellestablished that ‘the taxman’ is one of the most efficient tools to combat corruption.
tgt: usars uveza obala labo ababalekela ukukhokha intela, abazuza ezenzweni zobugebengu, kanye nalabo ababandakanyeka kwizenzo zenkohlakalo.

src: in cases where an individual’s lifestyle does not match what they declare, sars has been conducting lifestyle audits.
tgt: ezigamekweni lapho indlela yokuphila yomuntu ayihambelani nalokho akuveza obala, usars ubenza ucwaningo lwendlela yokuphila.

src: in the last year, sars has completed lifestyle audits that resulted in the collection of a further r474 million.
tgt: onyakeni owedlule, usars uphothule ucwaningo lwezindlela zokuphila okuholele ekuqoqweni kwezinye izigidi ezingamar474.

src: as we forge ahead with efforts to strengthen the capacity of the state and rebuild institutions that were systematically weakened by state capture, we have much to learn from what sars has achieved in a relatively short space of time.
tgt: njengoba siphokophelele phambili nemizamo yokuqinisa amandla ombuso nokwakha kabusha izikhungo ebeziqedwe amandla ukuqhwagwa kwamandla ombuso, kuningi okusafanele sikufunde kulokho okuzuzwe ngusars esikhathini esifushane.

src: when state institutions are wellrun and efficient, when they demonstrate credibility and fairness in their operations, this contributes to increasing levels of trust in government.
tgt: uma izikhungo zikahulumeni zilawulwa kahle futhi ngempumelelo, uma zibonisa ukuthembeka nokuba neqiniso ekusebenzeni kwazo, lokhu kufaka isandla ekwenyuseni ukuthembeka kuhulumeni.

src: business and investor confidence also improve, encouraging greater investment and economic growth.
tgt: ukuzithemba kumabhizinisi nakubatshalizimali nakho kuba ngcono, kugqugquzeleka utshalomali olukhulu kanye nokukhula komnotho.

src: flood relief for kzn and e cape allison cooper government will help residents of kwazulunatal and the eastern cape rebuild their lives and homes after floods recently left a trail of death and destruction in the two provinces.
tgt: isibonelelo sezikhukhula kwazulunatali nasempumalanga kapa allison cooper uhulumeni uzosiza abahlali bakwazulunatali nasempumalanga kapa ukwakha kabusha izimpilo zabo kanye namakhaya emva kwezikhukhula zakamuva ezishiye zibulele futhi zibhubhisile kulezi zifundazwe ezimbili.

src: president cyril ramaphosa said national treasury will make money available for relief efforts to help those affected by the floods.
tgt: umongameli ucyril ramaphosa uthe umnyango wezamafa kuzwelonke uzokwenza ukuthi kube khona imali yemizamo yesibonelelo ezosiza labo abakhahlanyezwe yizikhukhula.

src: "the minister of finance has said that r1 billion is immediately available," he said.
tgt: "ungqongqoshe wezezi mali uthe isigidigidi esir1 sesivele sikhona," kusho yena.

src: president ramaphosa will also approach parliament for additional resources.
tgt: umongameli uramaphosa uzophinde aye ephalamende ukuyonxenxa ezinye izinsiza.

src: government is working with the solidarity fund, private sector and nongovernmental and communitybased organisations to support victims.
tgt: uhulumeni usebenza nesikhwana sobumbano, umkhakha ozimele kanye nezinhlangano ezizimele nezomphakathi ukweseka izisulu.

src: the solidarity fund will set up a separate bank account for the flood disaster for south african and foreign donors to contribute to relief efforts.
tgt: isikhwama sobumbano sizovula enye iakhawunti yasebhange ebhekelele izikhukhula ukuze abantu baseningizimu afrika kanye nalabo abazonikela abaphuma kwamanye amazwe bezofaka isandla emizamweni yokusiza.

src: government will also provide vouchers to help households rebuild partially damaged houses, the president said.
tgt: uhulumeni uzophinde ahlinzeke ngamavawusha ukusiza amakhaya ukuthi aphinde akhe izindlu ezibhidlikile, kusho umongameli.

src: "a comprehensive assessment of the economic cost of these floods still has to be made, but it is clear that it will run into billions of rands for the rebuilding of infrastructure and loss of production."
tgt: "ukuhlolisiswa kwezindleko zomnotho zalezi zikhukhula kusazokwenziwa, kodwa kucace bha ukuthi kuzobiza izigidigidi zamarandi ukwakha kabusha ingqalasizinda kanye nokulahlekelwa umkhiqizo.

src: he added that the money set aside for the flood victims must reach those who need it the most.
tgt: "wengeze ngokuthi imali ebekwe eceleni yezisulu zezikhukhula kumele ifinyelele kulabo abayidinga ngempela.

src: "it will be critical, as we undertake this work, that all the re sources we mobilise are used for their intended purposes and reach the intended recipients.
tgt: "kuzoba bucayi kakhulu, njengoba siqalisa lo msebenzi, ukuthi zonke izinsiza esizitholayo zisetshenziselwe lokho okuhlosiwe ngazo futhi zifinyelele kulabo ezibafanele.

src: there can be no room for corruption, mismanagement or fraud of any sort," the president stressed.
tgt: angeke siyivumele inkohlakalo, ukungaphathi kahle noma ukukhwabanisa kwanoma iluphi uhlobo," kugcizelela umongameli.

src: threephased response president ramaphosa said government will respond to the disaster in three phases.
tgt: usizo oluzigaba zintathu umongameli uramaphosa uthe uhulumeni uzobhekana nale nhlekelele ngezigaba ezintathu.

src: it will first focus on immediate humanitarian relief, ensuring that everyone affected is safe and their basic needs are met.
tgt: uzoqale agxile ekusizeni abantu ngokushesha, kuqinisekiswe ukuthi wonke umuntu othintekile uphephile futhi izidingonqangi zabo zikhona.

src: "second, we will focus on stabilisation and recovery, rehousing people who have lost homes and restoring the provision of services.
tgt: "okwesibili, sizogxila ekuletheni uzinzo nokuvuselela, ukuthola indawo yokuhlala yabantu abalahlekelwe amakhaya kanye nokuqhubeka nokuhlinzeka ngezinsiza.

src: "third, we will focus on reconstruction and rebuilding," he said.
tgt: okwesithathu, sizogxila ekwakheni kabusha," kusho yena.

src: the reconstruction and building phase will include the construction of houses in suitable areas.
tgt: isigaba sokwakha kabusha sizofaka phakathi ukwakhiwa kwezindlu ezindaweni ezifanele.

src: the department of human settlements has already begun an assessment of damages to houses across the province.
tgt: umnyango wezo kuhlaliswa kwabantu usuvele uqalile ukuhlola umonakalo ezindlini kusosonke isifundazwe.

src: "an immediate task is to house those people who have been displaced by the floods and preparations are underway to provide temporary residential units," said president ramaphosa.
tgt: "umsebenzi wamanje ukuhlalisa labo bantu abalahlekelwe amakhaya ngenxa yezikhukhula futhi amalungiselelo aseqalile ukuhlinzeka ngezindawo zokuhlala zesikhashana," kusho umongameli uramaphosa.

src: the department of public works and infrastructure is identifying suitable state land that can be used for resettlement.
tgt: umnyango wezemi sebenzi kahulumeni nengqalasizinda uthola indawo kahulumeni efanele engasetshenziswa ukuhlalisa abantu.

src: extensive damage the rains caused extensive damage to houses; businesses; roads and bridges; water, electricity, rail and telecommunications infrastructure.
tgt: umonakalo omkhulu izimvula zidale umonakalo omkhulu ezindlini; amabhizinisi; imigwaqo namabhuloho; amanzi, ugesi, ojantshi bezitimela kanye nengqalasizinda yezokuxhumana.

src: schools, health facilities, police stations and magistrates’ courts were also affected, along with fuel and food supplies.
tgt: izikole, izikhungo zezempilo, iziteshi zamaphoyisa kanye nezinkantolo zikamantshi nazo zakhahlamezeka, kanjalo nezinsiza zikawoyela nokudla.

src: "it is estimated that over 270 000 learners were affected and over 600 schools were damaged, 16 of which cannot be accessed due to damage to connecting roads and bridges.
tgt: "balinganiselwa ngaphezu kwezi270 000 abafundi abakhahlamezekile kanye nezikole ezingaphezu kwama600 zibe nomonakalo, eziyi16 kulezi zikole akufinyeleleki kuzona ngenxa yomonakalo ekuxhumaneni kwemigwaqo namabhuloho.

src: "sixtysix public healthcare facilities were affected, although there has been minimal disruption to health services in most affected districts," the president said.
tgt: "izikhungo zezempilo ezingamashumi ayisithupha nesithupha zithintekile, yize kube khona ukuphazamiseka okuncane ekulethweni kwezinsiza zezempilo ezifundeni eziningi ezithintekile," kusho umongameli.

src: extensive work is under way to restore basic services to various areas in kzn.
tgt: umsebenzi omkhulu uyaqhubeka ukugcina ukuhlinzekwa kwezidingonqangi ezi ndaweni ezehlukahlukene kwazulunatali.

src: more than 400 people have lost their lives in kzn and many people are missing.
tgt: bangaphezu kwama400 abantu abashonile kwazulunatali futhi abaningi basalahlekile.

src: one death has also been reported in the eastern cape.
tgt: kubikwe ukushona komuntu oyedwa empumalanga kapa.

src: over 4 000 homes have been destroyed and 8 300 have been partially damaged, leaving 40 000 people homeless.
tgt: amakhaya angaphezu kwezi4 000 amoshekile kwathi ayizi8 300 aba nomonakalo ongemkhulu kakhulu, okushiye abantu abayizi40 000 bengenamakhaya.

src: the president said that the south african police service (saps) and the south african national defence force (sandf) have been leading search and rescue efforts.
tgt: umongameli uthe uphiko lwamaphoyisa eningizimu afrika (isaps) kanye nombutho kazwelonke wezokuvikela eningizimu afrika (isandf) bebelokhu behamba phambili emizamweni yokuthungatha nokuhlenga abantu.

src: this includes the deployment of saps personnel, diving teams, canine units and various vessels, helicopters and fixedwing planes to the most affected areas.
tgt: lokhu kubandakanya ukuphakwa kwabasebenzi besaps, amaqembu abatshuzi, amaphoyisa asebenza ngezinja nezikebhe, izindiza ezinophephela emhlane nezindizamshini ezindaweni ezikhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src: "aircraft from the sandf have been used both for rescue and for the delivery of relief supplies – such as food, water, tents and blankets – to people in inaccessible areas.
tgt: "izindiza zesandf bezilokhu zisetshenziswa ekutakuleni nasekuha njisweni kwezinsiza ezifana nokudla, amanzi, amathende kanye nezingubo zokulala kubantu abasezindaweni okungafinyeleleki kuzona.

src: "i have authorised the sandf to bring in more personnel, water storage and purification supplies and engineering teams to assist with electricity and water restoration," he said government departments at national and provincial levels; municipalities; nongovernmental organisations and businesses have been distributing basic relief materials such as food, blankets, mattresses, clothing, chronic medication, toiletries and cooking utensils.
tgt: "sengigunyaze isandf ukuthi ilethe abanye abasebenzi, iziqukathi zamanzi nezinsiza zokuhlanza kanye nonjiniyela abazosiza ukubuyisa ugesi namanzi," kusho yena.

src: cabinet recently declared a national state of disaster in response to floods.
tgt: ikhabhinethi kamuva libeke isimo senhlekelele kuzwelonke njengendlela yokubhekana nezikhukhula.

src: the president described the floods as a humanitarian disaster that called for a "massive and urgent relief effort.
tgt: umongameli uchaze izikhukhula njengenhlekelele kubantu edinga "ukusukunyelwa okukhulu futhi okuphuthumayo.

src: ""the lives, h ealth and wellbeing of thousands of people are still at risk.
tgt: ""izimpilo, impilo kanye nenhlalakahle yezinkulungwane zabantu kusalokhu kusengcupheni.

src: the floods have caused great economic and social damage," he said.
tgt: izikhukhula zidale umonakalo omkhulu kwezomnotho nakwezenhlalo," ubeke kanjalo.

src: the port of durban, which is vital to south africa’s economy and is one of the largest and busiest shipping terminals on the continent, has been severely affected.
tgt: ichweba lasethekwini, elibaluleke kakhulu emnothweni waseningizimu afrika futhi lingelinye lemigudu emikhulukazi nehlale isebenza ukuthutha impahla ezwenikazi, likhahlamezeke kakhulu.

src: fight crime, not migrants vukuzenzele unnamed twentyfive years ago, our new democratic constitution came into effect.
tgt: yilwa nobugebengu, hhayi nabokufika vukuzenzele unnamed eminyakeni engamashumi amabili nanhlanu eyadlula, umthethosisekelo wethu omusha wentando yeningi labantu waqala ukusebenza.

src: in adopting this constitution, we affirmed our commitment to a society based on democratic values, social justice and human rights.
tgt: ekwamukeleni lo mthethosisekelo, saqinisekisa ukuzinikela kwethu emphakathini onesisekelo sentando yeningi labantu, ubulungiswa kwezenhlalo kanye namalungelo abantu.

src: we were also making a complete break with our past.
tgt: futhi sasilishiya ngempela imuva lethu.

src: this was a past of racebased social engineering that manifested itself through influx control, job reservation, group areas and the dreaded dompas.
tgt: leli bekuyimuva elalakhelwe phezu kobuhlanga okwaholela ekulawulweni, ekubekeni imisebenzi, izindawo zabantu abathile kanye nokuphathwa kodompasi.

src: when our forebears drafted the freedom charter in 1955, whose principles have been incorporated in our constitution, and declared that south africa belongs to all who live in it, they were seeking a society free from ethnic chauvinism, tribalism, racism and sexism.
tgt: ngesikhathi izingqalabutho zakithi zenza uhlaka losomqulu wenkululeko ngowe1955, izimiso zawo ezifakwe kumthethosisekelo wethu, babeka ukuthi iningizimu afrika eyawo wonke umuntu ohlala kuyona, babehlose umphakathi ongenako ukuzibeka phambili ngokobuhlanga, ngokobuzwe, ukucwasana ngokwebala nangokobulili.

src: it is therefore deeply disturbing how the recent incidents of antiforeigner sentiment in parts of the country echo our apartheid past.
tgt: ngakhoke kuyaphazamisa kakhulu ukuthi izigameko zakamuva zokulwa nabantu bokufika ezingxenyeni zezwe zibuyisa imuva lethu lobandlululo.

src: we have seen people being stopped on the street by private citizens and being forced to produce identification to verify their immigration status.
tgt: sibone abantu bemiswa emigwaqeni ngabantu abathile abayizakhamuzi bephoqwa ukuba bakhiphe omazisi abaqinisekisa isimo samo sokuba kuleli lizwe.

src: we have seen some political leaders making unscientific statements about immigrants to exploit people’s grievances for political gain.
tgt: sibone abanye abaholi bezepolitiki benza inkulumo engaqinisekisiwe ngabokufika bexhaphaza izikhalo zabantu ukuze bezozuza okuthile kupolitiki.

src: we have seen marches being led on people’s homes and their dwellings raided for evidence of criminal activity.
tgt: sibone imibhikisho ebiya emakhaya abantu nasezindaweni abahlala kuzona kuyofunwa ubufakazi bobugebengu.

src: we have seen people being attacked, hurt and even killed because of how they looked or because they have a particular accent.
tgt: sibone abantu behlaselwa, belinyazwa futhi bebulawa ngenxa yokuthi babukeka kanjani noma bakhuluma ngayiphi indlela.

src: this was how the apartheid oppressors operated.
tgt: le indlela ababeqhuba ngayo abacindezeli bobandlululo.

src: they said some people could only live in certain areas, operate certain businesses or take certain jobs.
tgt: babethi abanye abantu bangahlala ezindaweni ezithile, baqhube amabhizinisi athile noma bathathe imisebenzi ethile.

src: under apartheid, black people were deemed suspects by default and stopped by police when found in socalled white areas.
tgt: ngaphansi kombuso wobandlululo, abantu abamnyama babevele nje bengabasolwa futhi babemiswa ngamaphoyisa uma betholakala besezindaweni ezaziwa ngokuthi ezabamhlophe.

src: black people were forced to produce a dompas and if they could not do so, they were jailed.
tgt: abantu abamnyama babephoqelekile ukuthi baveze udompasi futhi uma bengawuphethe, babeboshwa.

src: we cannot allow such injustices to happen again.
tgt: angeke sivumele lokho kungabi nabulungiswa ukuthi kwenzeke futhi.

src: the events in the gauteng township of diepsloot recently were a tragedy.
tgt: izigameko zakamuva elokishini lasegauteng idiepsloot bezithusa.

src: in the course of a single weekend, seven people were killed, sparking protests.
tgt: ngempelasonto eyodwa nje, abantu abayisikho mbisa babulawa, okwaholela emibhikishweni.

src: this loss of life is deplorable, as is the killing of a fellow african from zimbabwe allegedly at the hands of vigilantes.
tgt: lokhu kulahleka kwempilo kuyadabukisa, njengoba kungukubulawa komuntu waseafrika ophuma ezimbabwe ezandleni zezingqapheli ezizibeke zona.

src: crime is a serious problem in this country.
tgt: ubugebengu buyinkinga enkulu kuleli lizwe.

src: it affects all communities and people are justifiably tired of living in fear of criminals.
tgt: buthinta yonke imiphakathi futhi nabantu kuyezwakala ukuthi sebekhathele ukuphila ngokusaba izigebengu.

src: contrary to what is claimed by some antiimmigration groupings and individuals, the perpetrators of crime are both black and white, male and female, foreigner and citizen.
tgt: okuphambene nalokho okushiwo amaqembu kanye nalabo bantu abalwisana nabokufika, ababhebhezeli bobugebengu ngabantu abamnyama nabamhlophe, abesilisa nabesifazane, abokufika kanye nezakhamuzi.

src: crime, not migrants, is the common enemy we must work together to defeat.
tgt: ubugebengu, hhayi abokufika, isona isitha okumele sisebenze ngokubambisana ukuthi sisinqobe.

src: we cannot defeat crime through incitement, violence, intimidation and vigilantism aimed at foreign nationals, and specifically nationals from other african countries.
tgt: ngeke sinqobe ubugebengu ngokugqugquzela ukwephula umthetho, udlame, ukusabisa kanye nokuzithathela umthetho ezandleni kwezingqapheli ngokungemthetho okubhekiswe kwabokufika kuleli, futhi ikakhulukazi kubantu abavela kumazwe aseafrika.

src: we acknowledge many communities are frustrated by the apparent inability of the police to deal with criminals.
